## <a name="gx_accordion_menu_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1070">gx_accordion_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1070">gx_accordion_menu_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1071">Criar um menu de acordeão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1071">Create an accordion menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1072">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1072">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_accordion_menu_create(
    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style ,
    USHORT accordion_menu_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1073">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1073">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1074">Este serviço cria um menu de acordeão conforme especificado e anexa o menu de acordeão ao widget dos pais fornecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1074">This service creates an accordion menu as specified and attaches the accordion menu to the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1075">Um menu de acordeão é um widget de visualização do menu anexpanding/collapsing.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1075">An accordion menu is anexpanding/collapsing menu display widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1076">Aceita todos os tipos de widget como os seus itens de menu infantil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1076">It accepts all types of widget as its child menu items.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1077">Os menus de acordeão podem ser aninhados, o que significa que vários níveis de profundidade do menu podem ser criados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1077">Accordion menus can be nested, meaning several levels of menu depth can be created.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1078">Para inserir um item infantil num widget de item de menu, é recomendado usar GX_MENU tipo widget como um item do menu dos pais.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1078">To insert a child item into a menu item widget, it’s recommended touse GX_MENU type widget as a parent menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1079">Dicas para criar um menu de acordeão de nível único:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1079">Tips for creating a single level accordion menu:</span></span>

1.  <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1080">Crie um menu de acordeão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1080">Create an accordion menu.</span></span>

2.  <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1081">Fixe GX_MENU widgets de tipo ao menu de acordeão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1081">Attach GX_MENU type widgets to the accordion menu.</span></span>

3.  <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1082">Ligue os widgets das crianças ao GX_MENU tipo de progenitor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1082">Attach child widgets to the GX_MENU type parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1083">O tipo de artigo de criança pode ser qualquer tipo de widget GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1083">The child item type can be any GUIX widget type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1084">Dicas para criar menu de acordeão de vários níveis:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1084">Tips for creating multi level accordion menu:</span></span>

1.  <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1085">Crie um menu de acordeão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1085">Create an accordion menu.</span></span>

2.  <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1086">Fixe GX_MENU widgets de tipo ao menu de acordeão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1086">Attach GX_MENU type widgets to the accordion menu.</span></span>

3.  <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1087">Fixe GX_ACCORDION_MENU widget do tipo ao progenitor do tipo GX_MENU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1087">Attach GX_ACCORDION_MENU type widget to the GX_MENU type parent.</span></span>

4.  <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1088">Anexe os itens do menu ao GX_ACCORDION_MENU tipo de pai, conforme descrito na criação do menu de acordeão de nível único.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1088">Attach menu items to the GX_ACCORDION_MENU type parent as described in the single level accordion menu creation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1089">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1089">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1090">**acordeão** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo do menu de acordeão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1090">**accordion** Pointer to accordion menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1091">**nome** Nome do menu de acordeão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1091">**name** Name of the accordion menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1092">**pai** Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1092">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1093">**estilo** Estilo do widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1093">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1094">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1094">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1095">**accordion_menu_id** ID definido pela aplicação do menu de acordeão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1095">**accordion_menu_id** Application-defined ID of the accordion menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1096">**tamanho** Tamanho do menu de acordeão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1096">**size** Size of the accordion menu</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1097">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1097">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1098">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Criação de menu de acordeão bem-sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1098">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful accordion menu creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1099">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1099">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1100">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1100">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1101">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1101">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1102">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1102">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1103">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1103">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1104">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1104">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1105">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1105">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ACCORDION_MENU my_accordion;
GX_MENU menu_1;
GX_MENU item_1;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 100, 100, 300, 150);

status = gx_accordion_menu_create(&my_accordion, “my_accordion”,
                                  parent, GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                  MY_ACCORDION_ID, &size);

gx_menu_create(&menu_1, “menu_1”, &my_accordion,
               GX_STRING_ID_MENU_1, GX_ID_NONE,
               GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_TYLE_BORDER_THIN, 0, &size);

gx_menu_create(&item_1, “item_1”, &my_accordion,
               GX_STRING_ID_ITEM_1, GX_ID_NONE,
               GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN, 0, &size);

gx_text_offset_set(&item_1, 30, 0);

gx_menu_insert(&menu_1, &item_1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the accordion menu was successfully created. */

```

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1106">A aplicação de demonstração demo_guix_widget_types, fornecida como parte da instalação do GUIX Studio, fornece um exemplo completo de utilização do widget do menu de acordeão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1106">The demo application demo_guix_widget_types, provided as part of the GUIX Studio installation, provides a complete example of using the accordion menu widget.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_accordion_menu_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1117">gx_accordion_menu_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1117">gx_accordion_menu_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1118">Desenhe o menu de acordeão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1118">Draw accordion menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1119">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1119">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_accordion_menu_draw(GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1120">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1120">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1121">Este serviço desenha o menu de acordeão especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1121">This service draws the specified accordion menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1122">Este serviço é normalmente chamado internamente pelo mecanismo de atualização de lona GUIX, mas está exposto à aplicação para ajudar na implementação de funções de desenho personalizado para widgets personalizados do menu de acordeão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1122">This service is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom accordion menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1123">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1123">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1124">**acordeão** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo do menu de acordeão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1124">**accordion** Pointer to accordion menu control block</span></span>

## <a name="gx_accordion_menu_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1140">gx_accordion_menu_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1140">gx_accordion_menu_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1141">Evento do menu de acordeão de processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1141">Process accordion menu event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1142">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1142">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_accordion_menu_event_process(
    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1143">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1143">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1144">Este serviço processa um evento para o menu de acordeão especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1144">This service processes an event for the specified accordion menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1145">Este serviço deve ser chamado como o manipulador de eventos predefinido por quaisquer funções de processamento de eventos de acordeão personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1145">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom accordion menu event processing functions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1146">Este serviço lida com eventos GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN e GX_EVENT_PEN_UP para expandir/colapsar um item de menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1146">This service handles GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN and GX_EVENT_PEN_UP events to expand/collaps a menu item.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1147">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1147">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1148">**acordeão** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo do menu de acordeão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1148">**accordion** Pointer to accordion menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1149">**event_ptr** Ponteiro para o evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1149">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1150">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1150">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1151">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo de evento do menu de acordeão bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1151">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful accordion menu event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1152">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1152">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1153">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1153">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1154">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1154">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1155">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1155">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1156">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1156">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic accordion menu event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_accordion_event_process( 
    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default accordion menu
            event processing */
        status =
        gx_accordion_menu_event_process(accordion, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}

```

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1171">Este serviço posiciona os itens de menu para o menu de acordeão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1171">This service positions the menu items for the accordion menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1172">Esta função é normalmente chamada internamente quando o menu de acordeão está a tornar-se visível.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1172">This function is normally called internally when the accordion menu is becoming visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1173">Se pretender inserir/remover itens de/para um menu de acordeão ou alterar os estilos de expansão do item da criança, esta função deve ser chamada para reposicionar os itens da criança.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1173">If you want to insert/remove items to/from an accordion menu, or change the expand styles of the child item, this function should be called to reposition the child items.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_animation_canvas_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1193">gx_animation_canvas_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1193">gx_animation_canvas_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1194">Fornecer memória de tela a um controlador de animação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1194">Provide canvas memory to an animation controller</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1195">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1195">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_canvas_define(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1196">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1196">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1197">Este serviço fornece uma tela de memória a um controlador de animação usado para implementar a sequência de animação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1197">This service provides a memory canvas to an animation controller used to implement the animation sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1198">Esta tela fornecida deve ser grande o suficiente para manter o widget alvo de animação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1198">This provided canvas should be large enough to hold the animation target widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1199">Quando uma tela de animação é definida, o widget alvo é desenhado uma vez para esta tela de animação, e o efeito de deslizamento ou desvanecimento do ecrã é realizado modificando o valor alfa de lona e/ou lona alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1199">When an animation canvas is defined, the target widget is drawn once to this animation canvas, and the screen slide or fade effect is accomplished by modifying the canvas offset and/or canvas alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1200">Quando o suporte de hardware para várias camadas gráficas é fornecido, definir uma tela de animação que está ligada a uma camada de sobreposição de gráficos de hardware pode melhorar ***muito*** o desempenho de animações de slide e fade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1200">When hardware support for multiple graphics layers is provided, defining an animation canvas that is bound to a hardware graphics overlay layer can ***greatly*** improve the performance of slide and fade animations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1201">O gestor de animação requer uma tela de animação para executar tipos de animação desvanecimento e desvanecimento se correr a profundidade de cor inferior a 16 bpp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1201">The animation manager does require an animation canvas to execute fade-in and fade-out animation types if running at color depth less than 16 bpp.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1202">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1202">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1203">**animação** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de animação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1203">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1204">**tela** Tela de memória usada para implementar a animação de tradução.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1204">**canvas** Memory canvas used to implement the translation animation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1205">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1205">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1206">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Tela de animação definida com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1206">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully defined animation canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1207">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x10) Estado de animação inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1207">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x10) Invalid animation status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1208">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) O bloco de memória fornecido não é grande o suficiente para criar a tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1208">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) The provided memory block is not large enough to create the canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1209">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1209">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1210">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1210">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1211">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1211">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1212">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1212">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_CANVAS animation_canvas;
GX_ROOT_WINDOW animation_root;
/* Create animation canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_create(
        &animation_canvas, /* Canvas control block. */
        “animation_canvas”, /* Name of canvas. */
        display, /* Display control block. */
        GX_ANIMATION_MANAGED, /* Type of canvas. */
        width, /* Width of canvas. */
        height, /* Height of canvas. */
        memory_area, /* Memory area of canvas. */
        memory_size /* Size of canvas memory. */
        );
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    /* Create the root window for the canvas. */
    status = gx_window_root_create(
        &animation_root, /* Root window control block. */
        “animation_root”, /* Name of root window. */
        &animation_canvas, /* Canvas of the root window. */ GX_STYLE_NONE, /* Style of the window. */
        GX_ID_NONE, /* Root window ID. */
        &root_size /* Window size. */
        );
}
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    /* Define canvas for the animation. */
    status = gx_animation_canvas_define(&animation,
                &animation_canvas);
}
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new canvas was successfully set to the animation manager. */

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1224">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1224">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1225">Este serviço cria um controlador de animação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1225">This service creates an animation controller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1226">O controlador é inicializado para o estado ocioso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1226">The controller is initialized to the idle state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1227">Não se pode começar uma animação a menos que esteja no estado de IDLE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1227">One cannot start an animation unless it is in the IDLE state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1228">O ponteiro do bloco de controlo GX_ANIMATION pode ser obtido com gx_system_animation_get ou pode ser um bloco de controlo estático.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1228">The GX_ANIMATION control block pointer may be obtained using gx_system_animation_get(), or it may be a statically defined control block.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1229">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1229">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1230">**animação** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de animação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1230">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>


### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1231">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1231">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1232">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) criou com sucesso o controlador de animação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1232">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created animation controller</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1233">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Bloco de controlo já inicializado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1233">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Control block already initialized</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1234">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1234">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1235">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1235">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1236">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1236">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1237">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1237">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

/* Allocate an animaton control from system pool */
gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

/* Initialize the control block */

if (animation)
{
    status = gx_animation_create(&animation);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new animation controller was successfully created and initialized. */

```

## <a name="gx_animation_drag_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1248">gx_animation_drag_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1248">gx_animation_drag_disable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1249">Desativar o gancho de animação de arrasto de tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1249">Disable screen drag animation hook</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1250">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1250">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_drag_disable(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1251">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1251">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1252">Este serviço remove o procedimento do gancho de animação de arrasto do ecrã da função de processo de evento padrão do widget e para a sequência de animação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1252">This service removes the screen drag animation hook procedure from the widget’s default event process function and stops the animation sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1253">O procedimento do gancho de animação de arrasto de tela lida com eventos para uma animação de arrasto de tela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1253">The screen drag animation hook procedure handles events for a screen drag animation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1254">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1254">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1255">**animação** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de animação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1255">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1256">**widget** Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo do widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1256">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1257">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1257">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1258">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1258">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1259">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1259">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1260">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1260">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1261">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1261">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1262">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1262">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1263">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1263">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_WIDGET *animation_parent;

/* Disable screen drag animation of “animation_parent”. */
status = gx_animation_drag_disable(&animation, animation_parent);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen drag hook has been removed
    from the event process of “animation_parent”. */

```

## <a name="gx_animation_drag_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1273">gx_animation_drag_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1273">gx_animation_drag_enable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1274">Ativar o gancho de animação de arrasto de tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1274">Enable screen drag animation hook</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1275">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1275">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_drag_enable(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation,
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_ANIMATION_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1276">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1276">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1277">Este serviço define a função de processo de evento de animação de arrasto de arrasto definida internamente como um procedimento de gancho da função de processo de evento padrão de um widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1277">This service sets the internally defined screen drag animation event process function as a hook procedure of a widget’s default event process function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1278">A função de processo de evento de animação de arrasto de tela lida com eventos para uma animação de arrasto de ecrã.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1278">The screen drag animation event process function handles events for a screen drag animation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1279">O procedimento do gancho de arrasto do ecrã torna-se o manipulador predefinido para eventos de entrada de caneta enviados para o widget alvo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1279">The screen drag hook procedure becomes the default handler for pen input events sent to the target widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1280">A função original de processamento de eventos widget é chamada de forma de cadeia de margarida depois de verificar se existem tipos de eventos de entrada de arrasto de ecrã.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1280">The original widget event processing function is called in a daisy-chain fashion after checking for screen drag input event types.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1281">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1281">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1282">**animação** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de animação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1282">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1283">**widget** Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo do widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1283">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1284">**informação** Informação de animação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1284">**info** Animation information</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1285">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1285">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1286">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1286">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1287">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Estado de animação inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1287">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Invalid animation status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1288">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1288">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1289">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valor inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1289">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1290">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Lista de tela de diapositivos não é fornecida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1290">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Slide screen list is not provided</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1291">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1291">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1292">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1292">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1293">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1293">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_ANIMATION_INFO info;
GX_WIDGET *animation_parent;
GX_WIDGET *screen_list[] = {
    screen_1,
    screen_2,
    screen_3,
    GX_NULL
}

memset(&info, 0, sizeof(GX_ANIMATION_INFO);
info.gx_animation_parent = animation_parent;

/* If GX_STYLE_ANIMATION_WRAP is set, the screen list will wrap itself. */
info.gx_animation_style = GX_ANIMATION_SCREEN_DRAG |
                          GX_ANIMATION_HORIZONTAL |
                          GX_STYLE_ANIMATION_WRAP;
info.gx_animation_frame_interval = 1;
info.gx_animation_slide_screen_list = screen_list;

status = gx_animation_drag_enable(&animation, animation_parent,
                                  info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen slide animinatin event
    process function has been set as a hook procedure of
    “animation_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_animation_landing_speed_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1303">gx_animation_landing_speed_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1303">gx_animation_landing_speed_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1304">Definir velocidade de aterragem para a animação de drag de tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1304">Set landing speed for screen drag animation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1305">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1305">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_landing_speed_set(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    USHORT shift_per_step);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1306">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1306">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1307">Este serviço define a velocidade de aterragem para a animação de arrasto de ecrã.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1307">This service sets the landing speed for screen drag animation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1308">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1308">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1310">**shift_per_step** Distância de mudança para cada passo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1310">**shift_per_step** Shift distance for each step</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1313">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Parâmetro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1313">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid parameter</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1314">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1314">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1315">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1315">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1316">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1316">Example</span></span>


## <a name="gx_animation_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1326">gx_animation_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1326">gx_animation_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1327">Inicie uma animação orientada pelo temporizador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1327">Start a timer-driven animation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1328">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1328">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_start(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    GX_ANIMATION_INFO *params);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1329">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1329">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1330">Este serviço inicia uma sequência de animação usando uma instância de animação previamente criada e um novo conjunto de parâmetros de animação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1330">This service initiates an animation sequence using a previously created animation instance and a new set of animation parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1331">Esta função faz uma cópia local dos parâmetros, o que significa que a estrutura do parâmetro não precisa de ser definida estáticamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1331">This function makes a local copy of the parameters, meaning the parameter structure does not need to be statically defined.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1332">A estrutura de controlo GX_ANIMATION pode ser definida estáticamente pela aplicação, ou pode ser obtida através da API gx_system_animation_get().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1332">The GX_ANIMATION control structure can be statically defined by the application, or it can be obtained using the gx_system_animation_get() API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1333">A estrutura GX_ANIMATION_INFO define os parâmetros da animação a executar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1333">The GX_ANIMATION_INFO structure defines the parameters of the animation to be executed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1334">Para uma descrição completa desta estrutura e o significado de cada campo, consulte a secção de Componente de Animação GUIX no Capítulo 3 deste manual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1334">For a complete description of this structure and the meaning of each field, refer to the GUIX Animation Component section in Chapter 3 of this manual.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1335">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1335">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1336">**animação** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de animação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1336">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1337">**params** Ponteiro para a estrutura do parâmetro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1337">**params** Pointer to parameter structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1338">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1340">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Parâmetro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1340">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid parameter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1342">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Alvo de animação inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1342">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid animation target</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1343">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Estado de animação inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1343">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Invalid animation status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1344">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Tela de animação inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1344">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid animation canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1345">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1345">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1346">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1346">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1347">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1347">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION_INFO params;
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

/* obtain an animation control block pointer */
gx_system_animation_get(&animation);
if (animation)
{
    /* define a slide down and to the right */
    params.gx_animation_start_position.gx_point_x = 0;
    params.gx_animation_start_position.gx_point_y = 0;
    params.gx_animation_end_position.gx_point_x = 100;
    params.gx_animation_end_position.gx_point_y = 200;
    params.gx_animation_style= GX_ANIMATION_TRANSLATE;
    params.gx_animation_target = &my_window;
    params.gx_animation_parent = root_window;
    params.gx_animation_start_alpha = 255;
    params.gx_animation_end_alpha = 255;

    params.gx_animation_delay_before = 0;
    params.gx_animation_steps = 10;
    params.gx_animation_tick_rate = 2;

    status = gx_animation_start(&animation, &params);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the animation is initiated. */
```

## <a name="gx_animation_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1357">gx_animation_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1357">gx_animation_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1358">Pare uma animação ativa orientada pelo temporizador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1358">Stop an active timer-driven animation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1359">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1359">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_stop(GX_ANIMATION *animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1360">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1360">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1361">Pare uma animação iniciada anteriormente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1361">Stop a previously started animation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1362">Se o ponteiro do bloco de controlo de animação foi atribuído utilizando gx_system_animation_get, a aplicação pode reutilizar o bloco de controlo ou devolvê-lo ao pool do sistema utilizando gx_system_animation_free).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1362">If the animation control block pointer was allocated using gx_system_animation_get, the application can re-use the control block or return it to the system pool using gx_system_animation_free().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1363">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1363">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1364">**animação** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de animação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1364">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1365">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1365">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1366">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ponteiro inválido de GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1366">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1367">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1367">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1368">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Estado do controlador inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1368">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Invalid controller status</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1369">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1369">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1370">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1370">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;

status = gx_animation_stop(&animation);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the animation is stopped */
```

## <a name="gx_binres_language_count_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1380">gx_binres_language_count_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1380">gx_binres_language_count_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1381">Devolva o número de idiomas presentes em dados binários de recursos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1381">Return the number of languages present in binary resource data</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1382">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1382">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_count_get(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_VALUE *returned_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1383">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1383">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1384">Este serviço analisa um cabeçalho de dados de recursos binários para devolver o número de idiomas contidos nos dados binários.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1384">This service parses a binary resource data header to return the number of languages contained within the binary data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1385">Isto é útil para aplicações que devem apresentar uma lista de seleção ao utilizador, permitindo ao utilizador selecionar a partir de uma escolha de idiomas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1385">This is useful for applications that must display a selection list to the user allowing the user to select from a choice of languages.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1386">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1386">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1387">**root_address** Endereço de dados binários de recursos na memória</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1387">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1388">**return_count** Localização para armazenar contagem de idiomas devolvidas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1388">**return_count** Location to store returned language count</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1389">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1389">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1390">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1390">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1391">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Recurso binário inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1391">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1392">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1392">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1393">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1393">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1394">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1394">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1395">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1395">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE language_count = 0;

/* Specify address that binary resource data is located. */
GX_UBYTE    *root_address = 0x60000000;

status = gx_binres_language_count_get(root_address,
    &language_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table was successfully loaded. */

```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1396">Consulte também</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1396">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1397">gx_binres_language_info_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1397">gx_binres_language_info_load</span></span>

## <a name="gx_binres_language_info_load"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1398">gx_binres_language_info_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1398">gx_binres_language_info_load</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1399">Informação de tabela de linguagem de carga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1399">Load language table information</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1400">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1400">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_info_load(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_LANGUAGE_HEDAER *put_info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1401">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1401">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1402">Este serviço analisa uma bolha binária de dados de recursos para povoar uma série de estruturas GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER, informando a aplicação dos nomes linguísticos e tamanho da tabela de cordas de cada idioma contida nos dados binários.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1402">This service parses a binary resource data blob to populate an array of GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures, informing the application of the language names and string table size of each language contained within the binary data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1403">A aplicação deve primeiro ligar gx_binres_language_count_get para determinar o número de línguas dentro dos dados binários, e garantir que o ponteiro put_info passou para esta função aponta para um conjunto de estruturas language_count GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1403">The application should first call gx_binres_language_count_get() to determine the number of languages within the binary data, and insure that the put_info pointer passed to this function points to an array of language_count GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1404">Este serviço é utilizado por aplicação para determinar em tempo de execução o conteúdo de um pedaço de dados de recursos binários.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1404">This service is used by application to determine at runtime the content of a binary resource data chunk.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1405">A estrutura GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER é definida como:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1405">The GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structure is defined as:</span></span>

```c
typedef struct GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER_STRUCT{
    USHORT gx_language_header_magic_number;
    USHORT gx_language_header_index;
    UCHAR gx_language_header_name[GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER_NAME_SIZE];
    ULONG  gx_language_header_data_size;
} GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER;
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1406">O *campo magic_number* é utilizado para validação interna do formato de dados binários de recursos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1406">The *magic_number* field is used for internal validation of the binary resource data format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1407">O *campo header_index* indica a ordem pela qual as línguas são definidas nos dados binários.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1407">The *header_index* field indicates the order in which the languages are defined in the binary data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1408">O *campo header_name* contém o nome da língua.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1408">The *header_name* field contains the language name.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1409">O campo *header_data_size* contém o tamanho dos dados da tabela de cordas linguística.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1409">The *header_data_size* field contains the data size of the language string table.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1410">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1410">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1411">**root_address** Endereço de dados binários de recursos na memória</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1411">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1412">**put_info** Ponteiro para conjunto de estruturas GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1412">**put_info** Pointer to array of GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1413">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1413">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1414">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1414">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1415">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Recurso binário inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1415">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1416">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1416">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1417">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1417">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_binres_language_table_load"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1422">gx_binres_language_table_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1422">gx_binres_language_table_load</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1423">Recurso de tabela de linguagem de carga (precotado)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1423">Load language table resource (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1424">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1424">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_table_load(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_UBYTE **returned_language_table);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1425">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1425">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1426">Esta API precotado permite que as aplicações carreguem dados de tabelas de cordas a partir de ficheiros de dados binários de recursos binários mais antigos (antes de lançar 5.6).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1426">This deprecated API allows applications to load string table data from older (prior to release 5.6) binary resource data files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1427">As novas aplicações devem ser utilizadas gx_binres_language_table_load_ext).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1427">New applications should use gx_binres_language_table_load_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1428">Este serviço constrói uma estrutura de mesa linguística contendo ponteiros para apresentar recursos, as estruturas de dados geradas apontam para os dados de recursos "em vigor", não copia os dados dos recursos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1428">This service builds up a language table structure containing pointers to table resources, the generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1429">Os dados dos recursos devem ser colocados num local geral de memória de acesso, e o endereço base deste local de memória é passado para esta API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1429">The resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1430">Este serviço requer um bloco de memória repartido suficientemente grande para manter a estrutura da mesa linguística, pelo que a gx_system_memory_allocator_set API deve ser invocada uma vez antes deste serviço ser solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1430">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the language table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1431">A tabela linguística devolvida define uma ou mais tabelas de cordas, cada tabela de cordas contendo ponteiros para prender recursos na memória de dados de recursos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1431">The returned language table defines one or more string table(s), each string table containing pointers to string resources in resource data memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1432">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1432">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1433">**root_address** Endereço de dados binários de recursos na memória</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1433">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1434">**devolveu _language_table** Ponteiro para tabela de linguagem carregada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1434">**returned _language_table** Pointer to loaded language table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1435">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1435">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1437">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Recurso binário inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1437">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1439">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) O alocador de memória ou função gratuita não está definido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1439">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator or free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1440">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1441">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1441">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Specify address that binary resource data is located. */
GX_UBYTE *root_address = 0x60000000;

status = gx_binres_language_table_load(root_address,
                                        &language_table);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table was successfully loaded. */

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1448">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1448">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1449">Este serviço constrói uma estrutura de mesa linguística contendo ponteiros para apresentar recursos, as estruturas de dados geradas apontam para os dados de recursos "em vigor", não copia os dados dos recursos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1449">This service builds up a language table structure containing pointers to table resources, the generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1450">Os dados dos recursos devem ser colocados num local geral de memória de acesso, e o endereço base deste local de memória é passado para esta API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1450">The resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1451">Este serviço requer um bloco de memória repartido suficientemente grande para manter a estrutura da mesa linguística, pelo que a gx_system_memory_allocator_set API deve ser invocada uma vez antes deste serviço ser solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1451">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the language table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1452">A tabela linguística devolvida define uma ou mais tabelas de cordas, cada tabela de cordas contendo ponteiros para prender recursos na memória de dados de recursos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1452">The returned language table defines one or more string table(s), each string table containing pointers to string resources in resource data memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1453">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1453">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1454">**root_address** Endereço de dados binários de recursos na memória</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1454">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1455">**devolveu _language_table** Ponteiro para tabela de linguagem carregada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1455">**returned _language_table** Pointer to loaded language table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1456">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1456">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1457">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1457">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1458">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Recurso binário inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1458">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1459">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1459">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1460">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) O alocador de memória ou função gratuita não está definido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1460">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator or free function is not defined</span></span>

## <a name="gx_binres_theme_load"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1466">gx_binres_theme_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1466">gx_binres_theme_load</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1467">Recurso temático de carga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1467">Load theme resource</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1468">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1468">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    INT theme_id, GX_THEME **returned_theme);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1469">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1469">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1470">Este serviço constrói uma estrutura GX_THEME contendo ponteiros para as tabelas de recursos para o tema solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1470">This service builds up a GX_THEME structure containing pointers to the resource tables for the requested theme.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1471">As estruturas de dados geradas apontam para os dados de recursos "no lugar", não copiam os dados dos recursos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1471">The generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1472">Assim, os dados de recursos devem ser colocados num local geral de memória de acesso, e o endereço base deste local de memória é passado para esta API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1472">So the resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1473">Este serviço requer um bloco de memória alocado suficientemente para manter a estrutura temática da mesa, pelo que a gx_system_memory_allocator_set API deve ser invocada uma vez antes deste serviço ser solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1473">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the theme table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1474">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1474">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1475">**root_address** Endereço de dados binários de recursos na memória</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1475">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1476">**theme_id** O identificador do tema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1476">**theme_id** The identifier of the theme</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1477">**returned_theme** Ponteiro para o tema carregado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1477">**returned_theme** Pointer to loaded theme</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1478">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1478">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1479">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1479">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1480">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Recurso binário inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1480">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1481">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1481">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1482">**ID** tema GX_INVALID_VALUE (0x22) Inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1482">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid theme ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1483">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) O alocador de memória ou função gratuita não está definido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1483">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator or free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1484">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1484">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_brush_default"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1489">gx_brush_default</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1489">gx_brush_default</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1493">Este serviço define a escova para o contexto atual ao valor predefinido do sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1493">This service sets the brush for the current context to the system default value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1496">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1496">Return Values</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1499">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1499">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1507">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1507">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1508">Este serviço define um pincel com a cor de linha especificada, preencha a cor e o estilo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1508">This service defines a brush with the specified line color, fill color and style.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1509">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1509">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1510">**pincel** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de escova</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1510">**brush** Pointer to brush control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1511">**line_color** Cor da linha de pincel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1511">**line_color** Color of brush line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1512">**O apêndice A** contém cores pré-definidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1512">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1513">Note que a aplicação também pode adicionar cores personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1513">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1514">**fill_color** Cor do enchimento de escova.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1514">**fill_color** Color of brush fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1515">**O apêndice A** contém cores pré-definidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1515">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1516">Note que a aplicação também pode adicionar cores personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1516">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1517">**estilo** Estilo pincel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1517">**style** Brush style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1518">**O apêndice D** descreve os estilos de escova suportados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1518">**Appendix D** describes the supported brush styles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1519">Os estilos de escova podem ser combinados numa variável utilizando uma operação bitwise OR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1519">Brush styles can be combined into one variable using bitwise OR operation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1521">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Definição de pincel bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1521">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful brush definition</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1522">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de escova inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1522">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid brush pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1523">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1523">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1524">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1524">Initialization and threads</span></span>

## <a name="gx_button_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1528">gx_button_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1528">gx_button_background_draw</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1529">Desenhe o fundo do botão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1529">Draw button background</span></span>

###<a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1530">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1530">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_button_background_draw(GX_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1531">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1531">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1532">Este serviço desenha o fundo do botão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1532">This service draws the button background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1533">Esta função é normalmente chamada internamente pela função gx_button_draw, mas está exposta à aplicação para ajudar a escrever funções de desenho personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1533">This function is normally called internally by the gx_button_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1534">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1534">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1535">**botão** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1535">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1536">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1536">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1537">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1537">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1538">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1538">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1539">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1539">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1540">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1540">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID custom_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Draw button background. */
    gx_button_background_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)button);
}
```
