## <a name="gx_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1555">gx_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1555">gx_button_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1556">Botão Criar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1556">Create button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1557">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1557">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_create(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1558">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1558">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1559">Este serviço cria um botão conforme especificado e associa o botão ao widget dos pais fornecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1559">This service creates a button as specified and associates the button with the supplied parent widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1560">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1560">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1561">**botão** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1561">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1562">**nome** Nome lógico do botão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1562">**name** Logical name of button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1563">**pai** Ponteiro para o widget dos pais do botão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1563">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1564">**estilo** Estilo botão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1564">**style** Button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1565">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1565">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1566">**button_id** ID definido pela aplicação do botão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1566">**button_id** Application-defined ID of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1567">**tamanho** Tamanho do botão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1567">**size** Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1568">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1568">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1569">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Criação de botões bem sucedidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1569">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1570">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1570">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1571">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1571">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1572">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1572">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1573">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1573">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1574">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1574">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1575">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1575">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1576">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1576">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BUTTON my_top_button;

/* Create a stop button. */
status = gx_button_create(&my_stop_button, "my stop button",
                            &my_parent_window,
                            GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE,
                            MY_STOP_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the stop button was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_button_deselect"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1591">gx_button_deselect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1591">gx_button_deselect</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1592">Botão de desmarcação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1592">Deselect button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1593">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1593">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_deselect(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_BOOL gen_event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1594">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1594">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1595">Este serviço desmarca o botão especificado e gera um evento de sinal dependendo dos estilos dos botões.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1595">This service deselects the specified button and generate a signal event depending on button styles.</span></span>


| <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1596">Estilo de botão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1596">Button Style</span></span>              | <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1597">Sinal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1597">Signal</span></span>                     |
|---------------------------|----------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1598">Nenhum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1598">None</span></span>                      | <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1599">GX_EVENT_CLICKED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1599">GX_EVENT_CLICKED</span></span>         |
| <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1600">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_RADIO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1600">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_RADIO</span></span>  | <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1601">GX_EVENT_RADIO_DESELECT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1601">GX_EVENT_RADIO_DESELECT</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1602">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1602">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1603">GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1603">GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFF</span></span>     |



### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1604">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1604">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1605">**botão** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1605">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1606">**gen_event** Se GX_TRUE, o botão gerará um evento GX_EVENT_CLICKED, GX_EVENT_DESELECT ou GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFFSET dependendo do estilo do botão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1606">**gen_event** If GX_TRUE, the button will generate a GX_EVENT_CLICKED, GX_EVENT_DESELECT, or GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFFSET event depending on the button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1607">Se GX_FALSE, o botão não gerará qualquer evento de nível superior, mesmo que normalmente o faça.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1607">If GX_FALSE, the button will not generate any higher level event even if it would normally do so.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1608">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1608">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1609">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Deseselecção de botão de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1609">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button deselect</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1610">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1610">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1612">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1612">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1630">gx_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1630">gx_button_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1631">Desenhe botão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1631">Draw button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1632">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1632">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1633">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1633">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1634">Este serviço desenha o botão especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1634">This service draws the specified button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1635">Esta função é normalmente chamada internamente pelo mecanismo de atualização de lona GUIX, mas está exposta à aplicação para ajudar na implementação de funções de desenho personalizado para widgets de botões personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1635">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom button widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1636">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1636">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1637">**botão** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1637">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1638">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1638">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1639">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1639">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1640">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1640">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1641">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1641">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1642">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1642">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom button draw function. */
VOID custom_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Call default button draw. */
    gx_button_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}

```

## <a name="gx_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1657">gx_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1657">gx_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1658">Evento de botão de processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1658">Process button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1659">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1659">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_event_process(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1660">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1660">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1661">Este serviço processa um evento para o botão especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1661">This service processes an event for the specified button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1662">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1662">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1663">**botão** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1663">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1664">**event_ptr** Ponteiro para o evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1664">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1665">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1665">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1666">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo de evento de botão de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1666">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1667">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1667">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1668">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1668">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1669">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1669">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1670">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1670">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1671">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1671">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_button_event_process(GX_BUTTON *button,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default button
            event processing */
        status = gx_button_event_process(button, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1726">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1726">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1727">Este serviço define o valor de mistura alfa para a tela especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1727">This service sets the alpha-blend value for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1728">Os valores alfa de lona podem variar de 0 (transparente) a 255 (totalmente opaco).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1728">Canvas alpha values can range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1729">A mistura de telas sobrepostas requer suporte de camada de gráficos de hardware ou suporte ao software através da criação de uma tela composta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1729">Blending overlay canvases requires either hardware graphics layer support, or software support via the creation of a composite canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1730">O suporte de hardware para a mistura de tela é ativado invocando a API gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API antes de definir o valor alfa de tela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1730">Hardware support for canvas blending is enabled by invoking the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API prior to setting the canvas alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1731">Quando uma tela está ligada a uma camada de gráficos de hardware, chamando a gx_canvas_alpha_set() API invoca diretamente os serviços de mistura de camadas de gráficos de hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1731">When a canvas is bound to a hardware graphics layer, calling the gx_canvas_alpha_set() API directly invokes the hardware graphics layer blending services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1732">Para utilizar o suporte ao software para a mistura de tela, a aplicação deve criar uma tela com GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE estilo, no qual todas as outras telas geridas são compostas antes do visor final.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1732">To utilize software support for canvas blending, the application must create a canvas with GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE style, into which all other managed canvases are composited prior to final display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1733">O suporte ao software para a mistura de lona só é fornecido quando funciona com um controlador de ecrã de 16 bpp ou profundidade de cor superior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1733">Software support for canvas blending is only provided when running with a display driver of 16-bpp or higher color depth.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1734">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1734">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1735">**tela** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de lona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1735">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1736">**alfa** Valor alfa-blend, variam de 0 (transparente) a 255 (opaco).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1736">**alpha** Alpha-blend value, range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (opaque).</span></span>

### <a name="return--values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1737">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1737">Return  Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1738">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de valor de mistura alfa-blend bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1738">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful alpha-blend value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1739">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1739">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1740">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1740">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1741">**GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0x20) Tela inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1741">**GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1742">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1742">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1743">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1743">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1744">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1744">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the alpha-blend value of “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_alpha_set(&my_canvas, GX_ALPHA_VALUE_OPAQUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the alpha-blend value was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_arc_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1754">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1754">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1755">Desenhar arco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1755">Draw arc</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1756">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1756">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_arc_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r,
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1757">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1757">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1758">Este serviço desenha um arco de círculo na tela utilizando a escova atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1758">This service draws a circle arc on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1759">O arco do círculo é cortado à região inválida de lona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1759">The circle arc is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1760">Este serviço requer GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT para ser definido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1760">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1761">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1761">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1762">**xcenter** x-posição do centro do arco círculo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1762">**xcenter** x-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1763">**ycenter** y-position do centro do arco círculo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1763">**ycenter** y-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1764">**r** Raio do arco do círculo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1764">**r** Radius of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1765">**start_angle** Ângulo inicial do arco do círculo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1765">**start_angle** Starting angle of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1766">**end_angle** Ângulo final do arco do círculo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1766">**end_angle** Ending angle of the circle arc</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1767">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1767">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1768">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Sorteio de arco bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1768">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1769">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1769">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1770">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valor inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1770">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1771">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho aberto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1771">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1772">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1772">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1773">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1773">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1774">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1774">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw a circle arc from 0 degree to 90 degree in clockwise. */
status = gx_canvas_arc_draw(100, 100, 50, 0, 90);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the arc has been drawn on “my_canvas”. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_block_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1787">gx_canvas_block_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1787">gx_canvas_block_move</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1788">Mova bloco de pixels de lona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1788">Move block of canvas pixels</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1789">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1789">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_block_move(GX_RECTANGLE *block,
    GX_VALUE x_shift, GX_VALUE y_shift, GX_RECTANGLE *dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1790">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1790">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1791">Este serviço move um bloco de dados de pixel de tela na direção especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1791">This service moves a block of canvas pixel data in the direction specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1792">Este serviço é utilizado internamente pelo GUIX para realizar deslocamento rápido, mas também pode ser utilizado pelo software da aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1792">This service is used internally by GUIX to accomplish fast scrolling, but may also be used by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1793">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1793">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1794">**bloco** Coordenadas de área para mover</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1794">**block** Coordinates of area to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1795">**x_shift** Número de pixels para deslocar no eixo x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1795">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1796">**y_shift** Número de pixels para deslocar no eixo y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1796">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1797">**sujo** Se o movimento do bloco for bem sucedido, esta função devolve a parte do retângulo de origem que ainda está suja ao chamador neste parâmetro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1797">**dirty** If the block move is successful, this function returns the portion of the source rectangle that is still dirty to the caller in this parameter.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1798">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1798">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1799">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Movimento de bloco bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1799">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1800">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Movimento de bloco falhado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1800">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Failed block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1801">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1801">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1802">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1802">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1803">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1803">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1804">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1804">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1805">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1805">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE invalid;
GX_RECTANGLE move;

/* define 100 x 100 pixel rectangle */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&move, 0, 0, 99, 99);

/* Move this rectangle 10 pixels to the right”. */
status = gx_canvas_block_move(&move, 10, 0, &invalid);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, then ‘invalid’ marks the area that needs to be redrawn after the block move. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_circle_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1818">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1818">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1819">Desenhar círculo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1819">Draw circle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1820">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1820">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_circle_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1821">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1821">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1822">Este serviço desenha um círculo sobre a tela utilizando a escova atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1822">This service draws a circle on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1823">O círculo é cortado à região inválida de lona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1823">The circle is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1824">Este serviço requer GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT para ser definido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1824">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1825">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1825">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1826">**xcenter** x-coord do centro do círculo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1826">**xcenter** x-coord of center of the circle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1827">**ycenter** y-coord do centro da cirlce</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1827">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the cirlce</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1828">**r** Raio do círculo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1828">**r** Radius of the circle</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1849">gx_canvas_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1849">gx_canvas_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1850">Criar tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1850">Create canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1851">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1851">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_create(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    UINT type, 
    UINT width, 
    UINT height,
    GX_COLOR *memory_area, 
    ULONG memory_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1852">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1852">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1853">Este serviço cria a tela com as propriedades especificadas e memória associada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1853">This service creates the canvas with the specified properties and associated memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1854">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1854">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1855">**tela** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de lona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1855">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1856">**nome** Nome lógico para a tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1856">**name** Logical name for the canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1857">**exibir** Ponteiro para exibição previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1857">**display** Pointer to previously created display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1858">**tipo** Tipo de telaOs tipos de lona incluem:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1858">**type** Type of canvasThe canvas types include:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1859">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** Uma tela de memória que é usada para desenhar fora do ecrã.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1859">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** A memory canvas which is used to off-screen drawing.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1860">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** Uma tela que automaticamente se despejou para o visor ativo, quer como parte do processo de construção composta, quer como parte do funcionamento do tampão para arquiteturas de tela única.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1860">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** A canvas which automatically flushed to the active display, either as part of the composite building process or as part of the buffer toggle operation for single-canvas architectures.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1861">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** Esta bandeira pode ser usada para ligar e sair de uma tela, sem perder o conteúdo de desenho de tela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1861">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** This flag can be used to turn on and off a canvas, without losing the canvas drawing contents.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1862">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Reservado para uso futuro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1862">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Reserved for future use.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1863">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** Esta bandeira é utilizada pela aplicação ao configurar um sistema de múltiplas telas que compôs várias telas geridas na tela composta, e o composto é o acionado para o tampão de quadro de hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1863">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** This flag is used by the application when configuring a multiple-canvas system which will composite multiple managed canvases into the composite canvas, and the composite is the driven to the hardware frame buffer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1864">**largura** Largura em pixels</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1864">**width** Width in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1865">**altura** Altura em pixels</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1865">**height** Height in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1866">**memory_area** Área de memória para tela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1866">**memory_area** Memory area for canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1867">Este valor pode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1867">This value can</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1868">**GX_NULL** no momento da criação de tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1868">**GX_NULL** at the time of canvas creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1869">**e** posteriormente inicializada usando gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1869">**and** later initialized using gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1870">**memory_size** Tamanho da área da memória em bytes, ou 0 se a memória de tela será definida após a criação da tela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1870">**memory_size** Size of memory area in bytes, or 0 if the canvas memory will be defined after the canvas is created.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1871">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1871">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1872">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Cria lona bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1872">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1873">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1873">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1874">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1874">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1875">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1875">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1876">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0x1C) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de lona inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1876">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0x1C) Invalid canvas control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1877">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Tipo de lona inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1877">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid canvas type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1878">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1878">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1879">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1879">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1880">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1880">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define global canvas memory area. */
GX_COLOR my_canvas_memory[272*480];

…

/* Create “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_create(&my_canvas, "my canvas", &my_display,
                    (GX_CANVAS_MANAGED | GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE),
                    272, 480,
                    my_canvas_memory,
                    sizeof(default_canvas_memory));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the 272 x 480 canvas was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1885">gx_canvas_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1885">gx_canvas_delete</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1889">Este serviço elimina a tela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1889">This service deletes the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1890">A tela é removida da lista interna ligada de lona mantida pelo GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1890">The canvas is removed from the internal linked list of canvas maintained by GUIX.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1893">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1893">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1894">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Cria lona bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1894">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1895">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1895">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1896">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1896">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1897">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Tela inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1897">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1898">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1898">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_complete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1908">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1908">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1909">Desenho completo de tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1909">Complete canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1910">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1910">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_complete(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_BOOL flush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1911">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1911">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1912">Este serviço permite ao GUIX saber que o desenho da aplicação na tela especificada está completo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1912">This service lets GUIX know the application’s drawing on the specified canvas is complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1913">A aplicação pode usar este serviço para forçar o desenho imediato a uma tela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1913">The application can use this service to force immediate drawing to a canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1914">Isto coloca a tela no tampão visível do quadro e/ou desencadeia um funcionamento do interruptor, dependendo da arquitetura da memória do sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1914">This flushes the canvas to the visible frame buffer and/or triggers a bugger toggle operation, depending on system memory architecture.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1915">Este serviço só deve ser chamado pela aplicação para encerrar uma sequência de desenho iniciada com gx_canvas_drawing_initiate().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1915">This service should only be called by the application to close a drawing sequence begun with gx_canvas_drawing_initiate().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1916">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1916">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1917">**tela** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de lona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1917">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1918">**flush** Se **_GX_TRUE,_** as alterações de lona são lavadas no visor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1918">**flush** If **_GX_TRUE_**, canvas changes are flushed to the display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1919">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1919">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1920">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conclusão de desenho bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1920">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1921">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1921">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1922">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1922">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1923">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1923">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1924">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1924">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1925">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1925">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Complete drawing on “my_canvas” and flush to display. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_complete(&my_canvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully completed. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_initiate"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1932">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1932">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1933">Iniciar desenho de tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1933">Initiate canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1934">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1934">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_WIDGET *who, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1935">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1935">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1936">Este serviço inicia a sua base na tela especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1936">This service initiates drawing on the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1937">Este serviço é chamado internamente como parte da operação de desenho diferido realizada automaticamente pelo GUIX quando uma tela precisa de ser atualizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1937">This service is called internally as part of the deferred drawing operation performed automatically by GUIX when a canvas needs to be update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1938">No entanto, a aplicação é permitida para contornar o algoritmo de desenho diferido GUIX e executar o desenho imediato e direto sobre uma tela, chamando primeiro gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, depois chamando as funções de desenho desejadas, chamando depois gx_canvas_drawing_complete().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1938">However, the application is allowed bypass the GUIX deferred drawing algorithm and perform immediate and direct drawing on a canvas by first calling gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, then calling the desired drawing functions, then calling gx_canvas_drawing_complete().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1939">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1939">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1940">**tela** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de lona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1940">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1941">**que** Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo widget do chamador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1941">**who** Pointer to widget control block of the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1942">Este parâmetro é utilizado para inicializar os parâmetros de corte e visualização de desenho para as operações de desenho subsequentes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1942">This parameter is used to initialize the drawing clipping and view parameters for subsequent drawing operations.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1943">**dirty_area** Área para desenhar dentro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1943">**dirty_area** Area to draw within.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1944">Este parâmetro é passado pelo chamador para indicar a área à qual o chamador quer todas as operações de desenho cortadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1944">This parameter is passed by the caller to indicate the area to which the caller wants all drawing operations clipped.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1945">Esta é geralmente a área previamente marcada como suja, mas o chamador é livre para expandir ou contrair a área de clipping.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1945">This is usually the area previously marked as dirty, but the caller is free to expand or contract the clipping area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1946">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1946">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Iniciação de desenho bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing initiation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1948">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) Exceda a contagem máxima de nidificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1948">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) Exceed maximum nesting count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1949">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0x03) Sem visualizações para quem o chamador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1949">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0x03) No viewports for the caller</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1950">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1950">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1951">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1951">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1952">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Tela inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1952">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1953">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1953">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1954">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1954">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1955">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1955">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Initiate drawing on “my_canvas”, my_widget.gx_widget_size
specify the area the application wants GUIX to redraw. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(&my_canvas, &my_widget,
    &my_widget.gx_widget_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully initiated. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_ellipse_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1962">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1962">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1963">Desenhar elipse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1963">Draw ellipse</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1964">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1964">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    INT a, 
    dINT b);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1965">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1965">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1966">Este serviço desenha uma elipse na tela utilizando a escova atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1966">This service draws an ellipse on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1967">A elipse é cortada à região inválida de lona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1967">The ellipse is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1968">Este serviço requer GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT para ser definido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1968">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1969">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1969">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1970">**xcenter** x-coord do centro da elipse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1970">**xcenter** x-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1971">**ycenter** y-coord do centro da elipse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1971">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1972">**um** comprimento do eixo semi-major</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1972">**a** Length of the semi-major axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1973">**b** Comprimento do eixo semi-menor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1973">**b** Length of the semi-minor axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1974">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1974">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Sorteio de círculo bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circle draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1977">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valor inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1977">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1978">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho aberto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1978">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1979">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1979">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1980">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1980">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1981">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1981">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw an ellipse of semi-major radius 100, semi-minor radius 50
    and centered at (200, 200). */
status = gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(200, 200, 100, 50);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the ellipse has been drawn on
    “my_canvas”. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1994">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1994">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1995">Ligue a tela à camada de gráficos de hardware</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1995">Bind canvas to hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1996">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1996">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    INT layer);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-1997">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1997">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-1998">Este serviço liga uma tela de desenho GUIX a uma camada gráfica de hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1998">This service binds a GUIX drawing canvas to a hardware graphics layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-1999">Este serviço só é necessário para dispositivos de hardware que suportem várias camadas de gráficos de hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-1999">This service is only required for hardware devices supporting multiple hardware graphics layers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2000">A ligação de uma tela a uma camada de gráficos de hardware resulta na gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide(), gx_canvas_alpha_set() e gx_canvas_offset_set() APIs sendo implementadas diretamente pelos serviços do controlador de ecrã de hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2000">Binding a canvas to a hardware graphics layer results in the gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide(), gx_canvas_alpha_set(), and gx_canvas_offset_set() APIs being implemented directly by hardware display driver services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2001">Se o controlador de visualização de hardware não suportar várias camadas gráficas, este serviço falhará em voltar GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2001">If the hardware display driver does not support multiple graphics layers, this service will fail returning GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2002">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2002">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2003">**tela** de tela para ser implementado em hardware</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2003">**canvas** canvas to be implement in hardware</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2004">**camada** de gráficos de hardware de camada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2004">**layer** hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2005">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2005">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2006">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Vinculação bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2006">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful binding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2007">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) O serviço de camada de exibição não está definido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2007">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Display layer service is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2008">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Ponteiros inválidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2008">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2009">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2009">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2010">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Tela inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2010">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2011">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Não apoiado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2011">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2012">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2012">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2013">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2013">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2014">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2014">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Binds the canvas to the hardware graphics layer 1. */
status = gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(&my_canvas, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the drawing canvas is bound to the
    hardware graphics. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2018">gx_canvas_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2018">gx_canvas_hide</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2019">Esconda uma tela, tornando-a invisível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2019">Hide a canvas, making it invisible</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2020">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2020">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_hide(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2021">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2021">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2022">Este serviço esconde uma tela GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2022">This service hides a GUIX canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2023">Se a tela tiver sido ligada a uma camada de gráficos de hardware utilizando gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind,, este serviço é implementado com suporte a hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2023">If the canvas has been bound to a hardware graphics layer using gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(), this service is implemented using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2024">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2024">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2025">**tela** de tela a ser escondida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2025">**canvas** canvas to be hidden</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2026">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2026">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2027">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Esconderijo bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2027">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2028">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Tela inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2028">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2029">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Ponteiros inválidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2029">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_line_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2043">gx_canvas_line_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2043">gx_canvas_line_draw</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2045">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2045">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_line_draw(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_VALUE x_end, 
    GX_VALUE y_end);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2046">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2046">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2047">Este serviço traça uma linha sobre a tela utilizando a escova atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2047">This service draws a line on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2048">A linha é cortada à região inválida de lona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2048">The line is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2050">**x_start** Início da posição x da linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2050">**x_start** Starting x-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2051">**y_end** Início da posição y da linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2051">**y_end** Starting y-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2052">**x_start** Terminando a posição x da linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2052">**x_start** Ending x-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2053">**y_end** Fim da posição y da linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2053">**y_end** Ending y-position of the line</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2055">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Sorteio de linha bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2055">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful line draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2056">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2056">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2057">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2057">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2058">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho aberto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2058">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2059">**GX_INVALID_WIDTH** (0x1E) Largura da escova inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2059">**GX_INVALID_WIDTH** (0x1E) Invalid brush width</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the line has been drawn to canvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_memory_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2075">gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2075">gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2076">Definir memória de tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2076">Define canvas memory</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2077">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2077">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_memory_define(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_COLOR *memory,
    ULONG memsize);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2078">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2078">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2079">Este serviço pode ser utilizado para atribuir o endereço de memória de tela após a criação da tela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2079">This service can be used to assign the canvas memory address after the canvas has been created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2080">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2080">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2081">**tela** Ponteiro para tela previamente criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2081">**canvas** Pointer to previously created canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2082">**memória** Endereço de memória de tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2082">**memory** Canvas memory address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2083">**memsize** Tamanho do bloco de memória de tela em bytes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2083">**memsize** Size of the canvas memory block in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2084">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2084">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2085">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Atribuição de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2085">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2086">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Bloco de controlo inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2086">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2087">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2087">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2088">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2088">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2089">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2089">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2090">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2090">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign canvas memory block. */
status = gx_canvas_memory_define(canvas,
    (GX_COLOR *) DRAM_MEMORY,
    (640 * 480 * 2));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the canvas memory pointer has be
reassigned. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_mouse_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2094">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2094">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2095">Defina a imagem do cursor do rato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2095">Define the mouse cursor image</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2096">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2096">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_mouse_define(GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2097">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2097">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2098">Este serviço define as informações do rato para a tela especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2098">This service defines mouse information for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2099">Este serviço requer GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT para ser definido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2099">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2100">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2100">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2101">**tela** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de lona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2101">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2102">**informação** Informação do cursor do rato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2102">**info** Pointer to mouse cursor information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2103">**O apêndice I** contém definição para GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO estrutura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2103">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2104">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2104">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2105">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de informações de rato bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2105">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2106">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2106">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2107">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2107">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2108">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2108">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2109">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2109">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2110">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2110">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set mouse cursor info. */
GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO mouse_cursor;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_image_id = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_MOUSE;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_x = 0;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_y = 0;

status = gx_canvas_mouse_define(&my_canvas, &mouse_cursor);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the mouse info of “my_canvas” has been
set successfully. */

```


- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2123">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pele de cursor de rato bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2123">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse cursor hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2124">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) Pele de cursor de rato falhado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2124">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) Failed mouse cursor hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2125">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2125">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2126">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2126">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2127">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2127">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2128">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2128">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2135">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2135">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_mouse_show(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2136">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2136">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2137">Este serviço torna o cursor do rato visível para a tela especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2137">This service makes the mouse cursor visible for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2138">Este serviço requer GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT para ser definido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2138">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2139">A API gx_canvas_mouse_define deve ser invocada para definir a imagem do cursor do rato antes de este serviço ser solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2139">The gx_canvas_mouse_define API should be invoked to define the mouse cursor image before this service is requested.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2140">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2140">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2142">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2142">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2143">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de informações de rato bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2143">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse info set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2145">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2145">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2146">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2146">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
