## <a name="gx_canvas_offset_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2153">gx_canvas_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2153">gx_canvas_offset_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2154">Atribuir a lona x,y despensar o ecrã</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2154">Assign canvas x,y display offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2155">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2155">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_offset_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2156">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2156">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2157">Este serviço atribui uma compensação de visualização x,y para a tela especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2157">This service assigns an x,y display offset for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2158">Isto controla a posição em que a tela é composta no tampão visível da moldura, e é frequentemente usada quando a tela é menor do que o visor físico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2158">This controls the position at which the canvas is composited into the visible frame buffer, and is often used when the canvas is smaller than the physical display.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2159">Se a tela tiver sido ligada a uma camada de gráficos de hardware utilizando a API gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind,,o serviço gx_canvas_offset_set é implementado diretamente usando suporte de hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2159">If the canvas has been bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_offset_set service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2160">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2160">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2161">**tela** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de lona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2161">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2162">**x** X coordenada de offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2162">**x** X coordinate of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2163">**y Y** coordenada de offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2163">**y** Y coordinate of offset</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2164">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2164">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2165">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Atribuição bem sucedida de compensação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2165">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2166">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2166">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2167">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2167">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2168">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Tela inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2168">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2169">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2169">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2170">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2170">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2171">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2171">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set display offset for “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_offset_set(&my_canvas, 20, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing is now offset from
position 20,30. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pie_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2181">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2181">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2182">Desenhe a tarte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2182">Draw pie</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2183">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2183">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pie_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter,
    UINT r, 
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2184">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2184">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2185">Este serviço atrai uma tarte na tela usando a escova de contexto de desenho atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2185">This service draws a pie into the canvas using the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2186">A tarte é cortada à região inválida de lona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2186">The pie is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2187">Este serviço requer que a opção de configuração GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT ser definida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2187">This service requires the configuration option GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2188">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2188">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2189">**xcenter** x-posição do centro da tarte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2189">**xcenter** x-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2190">**ycenter** y-position do centro da tarte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2190">**ycenter** y-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2191">**r** Raio da tarte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2191">**r** Radius of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2192">**start_angle** Ângulo inicial da tarte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2192">**start_angle** Starting angle of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2193">**end_angle** Ângulo final da tarte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2193">**end_angle** Ending angle of the pie</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2194">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2194">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2195">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Sorteio de arco bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2195">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2196">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2196">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2197">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valor inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2197">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2198">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho aberto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2198">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

```C

status = gx_canvas_pie_draw(100, 100, 50, 0, 90);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pie has been drawn to canvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixel_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2214">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2214">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2215">Desenhar pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2215">Draw pixel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2216">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2216">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixel_draw(GX_POINT position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2217">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2217">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2218">Este serviço desenha um pixel na tela usando a cor da linha da escova de contexto de desenho atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2218">This service draws a pixel on the canvas using the line color of the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2219">Se a opção de configuração GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT for definida, misture o pixel com o contrário, desenhe o pixel como totalmente opaco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2219">If configuration option GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT is defined, blend the pixel with the otherwise, draw the pixel as fully opaque.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2220">**ponto** x,y posição de pixel para desenhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2220">**point** x,y position of pixel to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2221">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2221">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2222">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Sorteio de pixelmap bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2222">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2223">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2223">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2224">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho aberto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2224">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2225">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2225">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2226">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2226">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2227">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2227">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point; /* the x,y position you want to draw to */
GX_RECTANGLE drawto; /* the rectangle bounding your drawing */
GX_CANVAS *mycanvas; /* the canvas you want to draw to */

/* calculate 1x1 pixel drawing area: */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&drawto,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y);

/* get my canvas: */
gx_widget_canvas_get(win, &mycanvas);

/* open my canvas for drawing: */
gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(mycanvas, win, &drawto);

/* setup my brush colors. Use any color ID in your resources: */
gx_context_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_ID_WINDOW_BORDER);

/* draw a pixel: */
status = gx_canvas_pixel_draw(point);

/* close the canvas: */
gx_canvas_drawing_complete(mycanvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixel was successfully drawn to mycanvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2232">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2232">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2233">Misturar pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2233">Blend pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2234">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2234">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend(
    GX_VALUE x_position,
    GX_VALUE y_position, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2235">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2235">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2236">Este serviço combina um mapa pixel com o fundo de lona.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2236">This service blends a pixelmap with the canvas background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2237">A relação de mistura é especificada pelo chamador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2237">The blending ratio is specified by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2238">O valor alfa pode variar de 0 (totalmente transparente) a 255 (totalmente opaco).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2238">The alpha value can range from 0 (fully transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2239">O mapa de pixels também pode incluir um canal alfa interno, que é combinado com o valor de mistura de entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2239">The pixelmap may also include an internal alpha channel, which is combined with the incoming blending value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2240">Este serviço só é suportado por controladores de exibição que estão a funcionar a uma profundidade de cor de 16 bpp e superior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2240">This service is only supported by display drivers running at 16-bpp color depth and higher.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2241">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2241">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2242">**x_start** Início da posição x do pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2242">**x_start** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2243">**y_end** Posição inicial do pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2243">**y_end** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2244">**pixelmap** Ponteiro para pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2244">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2245">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2245">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2246">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Sorteio de pixelmap bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2246">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2249">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Não apoiado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2249">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2250">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho aberto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2250">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2251">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2251">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2252">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2252">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2253">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2253">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw pixelmap on active canvas */

GX_PIXELMAP *map;
gx_system_pixelmap_get(ID_MY_PIXELMAP, &map);

status = gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend(10, 20, map, 128);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap has been blended onto the current canvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2281">gx_canvas_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2281">gx_canvas_pixelmap_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2282">Obter mapa de tela pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2282">Get canvas pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2283">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2283">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_get(GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2284">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2284">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2285">Este serviço devolve uma estrutura GX_PIXELMAP que aponta para os dados de tela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2285">This service returns a GX_PIXELMAP structure pointing to the canvas data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2286">O formato pixelmap está definido para o formato de cor do ecrã atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2286">The pixelmap format is set to the current display color format.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2287">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2287">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2288">**pixelmap** Pixelmap devolvido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2288">**pixelmap** Returned pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2289">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2289">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2290">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pixelmap de sucesso obter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2290">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2292">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2292">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Draw pixelmap on active canvas */

status = gx_canvas_pixelmap_get(map);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2299">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2299">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2300">Desenhe o pixelmap rotativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2300">Draw rotated pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2301">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2301">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_VALUE x_position, 
    GX_VALUE y_position,
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    INT angle,
    INT rot_cx, 
    INT rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2302">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2302">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2303">Este serviço gira um mapa pixel no ângulo especificado e torna o mapa de pixels diretamente à medida que a rotação é realizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2303">This service rotates a pixelmap at the specified angle and renders the pixelmap to the canvas directly as the rotation is performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2304">Este serviço difere de gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate na medida em que a saída da rotação é diretamente entregue à memória de tela, e o mapa de pixels rotativo não é devolvido ao chamador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2304">This service differs from gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate in that the output of the rotation is directly rendered to the canvas memory, and the rotated pixelmap is not returned to the caller.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2305">A vantagem deste serviço ao longo de gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate é que não é necessária nenhuma memória adicional para manter o pixelmap rotativo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2305">The advantage of this service over gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate is that no additional memory is required to hold the rotated pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2306">A desvantagem é que o código de rotação deve ser executado cada vez que o mapa de pixels é desenhado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2306">The disadvantage is that the rotation code must be executed each time the pixelmap is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2307">A validação de recortes e visualizações são aplicadas durante a renderização do pixelmap rotativo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2307">Clipping and viewport validation are enforced during rendering of the rotated pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2308">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2308">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2309">**x_position** Início da posição x do pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2309">**x_position** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2310">**y_position** Posição inicial do pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2310">**y_position** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2311">**pixelmap** Ponteiro para pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2311">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2312">**ângulo** Ângulo para rodar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2312">**angle** Angle to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2313">**rot_cx** X-coord do centro de rotação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2313">**rot_cx** X-coord of center of rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2314">Se este valor for definido para -1, o centro da imagem é usado como centro de rotação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2314">If this value is set to -1, the center of the image is used as the rotation center.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2315">**rot_cy** Y-coord do centro de rotação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2315">**rot_cy** Y-coord of center of rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2316">Se este valor for definido para -1, o centro da imagem é usado como o centro de rotação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2316">If this value is set to -1, the center of the image is used as the center of rotation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2317">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2317">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2318">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Sorteio de pixelmap bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2318">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2319">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2319">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2320">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2320">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2321">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho aberto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2321">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2322">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2322">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2323">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2323">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2324">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2324">Example</span></span>

```C
/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 30 degree in clockwise direction and draw in on canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate(10, 20, &my_pixelmap, 30,
    -1, -1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the rotated pixelmap “my_pixelmap” has been drawn. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2333">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2333">Description</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_polygon_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2352">gx_canvas_polygon_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2352">gx_canvas_polygon_draw</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_polygon_draw(
    GX_POINT *point_array,
    INT number_of_points);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2355">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2355">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2356">Este serviço desenha um polígono sobre a tela utilizando a escova de contexto de desenho atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2356">This service draws a polygon on the canvas using the current drawing context brush.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2359">**number_of_points** Número de pontos de polígono</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2359">**number_of_points** Number of points of polygon</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2360">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2360">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Sorteio de polígono bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful polygon draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2364">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho aberto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2364">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2367">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2367">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT my_polygon[4] =
{
    { 208, 63 },
    { 274, 63 },
    { 274, 163 },
    { 208, 163 }
};

/* Draw polygon “my_polygon” on canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_polygon_draw(&my_polygon, 4);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the polygon “my_polygon” has been drawn. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2407">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2407">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2408">Desenhar texto rotativo sobre um ponto central (precedido)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2408">Draw text rotated about a center point (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2409">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2409">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(
    const GX_CHAR *text,
    GX_VALUE xCenter, 
    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2410">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2410">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2411">Esta API foi depreciada a favor ou gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2411">This API has been deprecated in favor or gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2412">Apesar de ainda apoiadas, as novas aplicações não devem utilizar esta API e devem, em vez disso, utilizar gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext).).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2412">While still supported, new applications should not use this API and should instead use gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2413">Este serviço atrai texto para a tela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2413">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2414">O texto é desenhado rotativamente sobre o ponto central solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2414">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2415">A fonte de contexto de desenho atual e a cor da linha de contexto de desenho são usadas para tornar o texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2415">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2416">Este serviço utiliza a função gx_utility_string_to_alphamap para tornar o fio de texto num mapa de pixels de 8bpp temporário contendo apenas valor alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2416">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2417">Em seguida, o serviço roda o mapa alfa utilizando a função gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2417">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2418">Após a substituição alfa final para a tela, este serviço liberta o mapa alfa temporário e a memória associada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2418">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2419">Uma vez que é necessário um mapa alfa temporário para fazer texto rotativo, o pedido deve configurar o gx_system_memory_allocator pela chamada gx_system_memory_allocator_set() API antes de tentar desenhar texto rotativo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2419">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling gx_system_memory_allocator_set() API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2420">Este serviço só deve ser utilizado para tornar o texto rotativo "uma vez".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2420">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2421">Se a mesma cadeia de texto for desenhada várias vezes em diferentes locais ou ângulos de rotação diferentes, é mais eficiente utilizar a função de utilidade gx_utility_string_to_alphamap gx_utility_string_to_alphamap para criar o mapa alfa do texto uma vez, em seguida, usar gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate várias vezes para rodar o mapa alfa resultante repetidamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2421">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2422">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2422">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2423">**texto** Cadeia de texto a ser desenhada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2423">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2424">**xCenter** Posicione central em torno do texto será rodado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2424">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2425">**yCenter** Posição central em torno do texto será rodado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2425">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2426">**ângulo** O ângulo de rotação de texto desejado, em graus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2426">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2427">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2427">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2428">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Renderização de texto bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2428">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2429">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2429">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2430">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2430">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2431">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Não foi atribuída memória suficiente ou gx_system_memory_allocator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2431">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2432">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Comprimento da corda inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2432">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2433">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2433">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2434">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2434">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2435">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2435">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(dynamic_text, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2443">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2443">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2444">Desenhar texto rotativo sobre um ponto central</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2444">Draw text rotated about a center point</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2445">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2445">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *text,
    GX_VALUE xCenter, 
    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2446">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2446">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2447">Este serviço atrai texto para a tela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2447">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2448">O texto é desenhado rotativamente sobre o ponto central solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2448">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2449">A fonte de contexto de desenho atual e a cor da linha de contexto de desenho são usadas para tornar o texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2449">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2450">Este serviço utiliza a função gx_utility_string_to_alphamap para tornar o fio de texto num mapa de pixels de 8bpp temporário contendo apenas valor alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2450">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2451">Em seguida, o serviço roda o mapa alfa utilizando a função gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2451">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2452">Após a substituição alfa final para a tela, este serviço liberta o mapa alfa temporário e a memória associada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2452">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2453">Uma vez que é necessário um mapa alfa temporário para fazer texto rotativo, o pedido deve configurar o gx_system_memory_allocator pela chamada ***gx_system_memory_allocator_set*** API antes de tentar desenhar texto rotativo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2453">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling ***gx_system_memory_allocator_set*** API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2454">Este serviço só deve ser utilizado para tornar o texto rotativo "uma vez".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2454">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2455">Se a mesma cadeia de texto for desenhada várias vezes em diferentes locais ou ângulos de rotação diferentes, é mais eficiente utilizar a função de utilidade gx_utility_string_to_alphamap gx_utility_string_to_alphamap para criar o mapa alfa do texto uma vez, em seguida, usar gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate várias vezes para rodar o mapa alfa resultante repetidamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2455">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2456">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2456">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2457">**texto** Cadeia de texto a ser desenhada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2457">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2458">**xCenter** Posicione central em torno do texto será rodado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2458">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2459">**yCenter** Posição central em torno do texto será rodado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2459">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2460">**ângulo** O ângulo de rotação de texto desejado, em graus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2460">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2461">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2461">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2462">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Renderização de texto bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2462">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2463">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2463">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2464">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2464">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2465">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Contexto de sorteio inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2465">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid draw context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2466">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Não foi atribuída memória suficiente ou gx_system_memory_allocator.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2466">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2467">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Comprimento da corda inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2467">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2468">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2468">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2469">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2469">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2470">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2470">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];
    GX_STRING string;

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    string.gx_string_ptr = dynamic_text;
    string.gx_string_length = strlen(dynamic_text);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(&string, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2478">gx_canvas_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2478">gx_canvas_shift</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2479">Tela de turno por x,y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2479">Shift canvas by x,y</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2480">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2480">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_shift(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_VALUE x, GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2481">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2481">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2482">Este serviço desloca a lona especificada compensada pela quantidade especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2482">This service shifts the specified canvas offset by the specified amount.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2483">Isto afeta a posição em que a tela é renderizada dentro do tampão visível da armação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2483">This affects the position at which the canvas is rendered within the visible frame buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2484">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2484">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2485">**tela** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de lona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2485">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2486">**x** Pixels para mudar no eixo X</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2486">**x** Pixels to shift on the X axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2487">**y** Pixels para mudar no eixo Y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2487">**y** Pixels to shift on the Y axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2488">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2488">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2489">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Turno de lona bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2489">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2490">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2490">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2491">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2491">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2492">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Tela inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2492">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2493">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2493">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2494">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2494">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2495">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2495">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Shift canvas “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_shift(&my_canvas, 10, 15);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas has been shifted by 10 pixels
    on the X axis and 15 on the Y axis. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2502">gx_canvas_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2502">gx_canvas_show</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2503">Faça uma tela visível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2503">Make a canvas visible</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2504">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2504">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_show(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2505">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2505">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2506">Este serviço torna visível uma tela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2506">This service makes a canvas visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2507">Se a tela tiver sido previamente ligada a uma camada gráfica de hardware utilizando a API gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind,,o serviço gx_canvas_show() é implementado diretamente usando suporte de hardware.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2507">If the canvas has been previously bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_show() service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2508">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2508">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2509">**tela** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de lona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2509">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2510">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2510">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2511">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Atribuição bem sucedida de compensação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2511">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2512">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2512">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2513">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2513">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2514">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Tela inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2514">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2515">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2515">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2516">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2516">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2517">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2517">Example</span></span>

```C

status = gx_canvas_show(&my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing is now visible */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2526">gx_canvas_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2526">gx_canvas_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2527">Desenhar texto (precotado)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2527">Draw text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2528">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2528">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_text_draw(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string, 
    INT length);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2529">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2529">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2530">Este serviço desenha texto na tela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2530">This service draws text on the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2531">Esta API, apesar de ainda apoiada, é depreciada e as novas aplicações devem, em vez disso, utilizar gx_canvas_text_draw_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2531">This API, while still supported, is deprecated and new applications should instead use gx_canvas_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2532">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2532">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2533">**x_start** Início da coordenada x para texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2533">**x_start** Starting x-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2534">**y_start** Início da coordenada y para texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2534">**y_start** Starting y-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2535">**cadeia** Ponteiro para corda para desenhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2535">**string** Pointer to string to draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2536">**comprimento** Se o comprimento >= 0, limita o número de caracteres atraídos para o comprimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2536">**length** If length >= 0, limits the number of characters drawn to length.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2537">Se o comprimento < 0, toda a corda até que o exterminador NULL seja puxado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2537">If length < 0, the entire string until NULL terminator is drawn.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2538">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2538">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2539">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Sorteio de texto bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2539">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2540">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) Sorteio de texto falhado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2540">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) Failed text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2543">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho aberto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2543">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2544">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Comprimento da corda inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2544">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2545">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2545">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2546">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2546">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2547">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2547">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text “example” on current canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 20, “example”, 7);

/* Draw all of a string of unknown length on the current canvas */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 40, string_ptr, -1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text “example” has been drawn. */
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2592">gx_checkbox_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2592">gx_checkbox_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2593">Criar caixa de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2593">Create checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2594">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2594">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_create(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT checkbox_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2595">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2595">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2596">Este serviço cria um widget de caixa de verificação com as propriedades especificadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2596">This service creates a checkbox widget with the specified properties.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2597">GX_CHECKBOX é derivado de GX_TEXT_BUTTON, e todos os serviços gx_text_button podem ser usados com widgets GX_CHECKBOX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2597">GX_CHECKBOX is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and all gx_text_button services may be used with GX_CHECKBOX widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2598">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2598">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2599">**caixa de verificação** Ponteiro para o nome do bloco de controlo da caixa de verificação Nome lógico do widget da caixa de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2599">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block name Logical name of checkbox widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2600">**pai** Ponteiro para o widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2600">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2601">**text_id** ID de recurso do texto da caixa de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2601">**text_id** Resource ID of checkbox text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2602">**estilo** Estilo de caixa de verificação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2602">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2603">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2603">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2604">**checkbox_id** ID definido pela aplicação da caixa de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2604">**checkbox_id** Application-defined ID of checkbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2605">**tamanho** Dimensões da caixa de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2605">**size** Dimensions of checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2606">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2606">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2607">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Cria caixa de verificação com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2607">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2608">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2608">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2609">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2609">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2610">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2610">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2611">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2611">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2612">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2612">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2613">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2613">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2614">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2614">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_checkbox”. */
status = gx_checkbox_create(&my_checkbox, “my_checkbox”,
    &my_parent,
    MY_CHECKBOX_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_CHECKBOX_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the checkbox “my_checkbox” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2619">gx_checkbox_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2619">gx_checkbox_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2620">Desenhar caixa de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2620">Draw checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2621">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2621">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_checkbox_draw(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2622">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2622">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2623">Este serviço desenha a caixa de verificação especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2623">This service draws the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2624">Esta função é normalmente chamada internamente pelo mecanismo de atualização de lona GUIX, mas está exposta à aplicação para ajudar na implementação de funções de desenho personalizado para widgets de caixa de verificação personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2624">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom checkbox widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2625">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2625">Parameters</span></span>

## <a name="gx_checkbox_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2636">gx_checkbox_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2636">gx_checkbox_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2637">Evento de caixa de verificação de processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2637">Process checkbox event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2638">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2638">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_event_process(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2639">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2639">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2640">Este serviço processa um evento para a caixa de verificação especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2640">This service processes an event for the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2641">Este serviço deve ser chamado como o manipulador de eventos predefinido por quaisquer funções de processamento de eventos de caixa de verificação personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2641">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom checkbox event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2642">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2642">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2643">**caixa de verificação** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo da caixa de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2643">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2644">**event_ptr** Ponteiro para o evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2644">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2645">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2645">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2646">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo de evento de caixa de verificação bem-sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2646">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2647">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2647">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2648">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2648">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2649">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2649">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2650">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2650">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2651">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2651">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2652">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2652">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic checkbox event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_checkbox_event_process(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default checkbox
            event processing */
        status = gx_checkbox_event_process(checkbox, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2657">gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2657">gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2658">Definir pixelmap para caixa de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2658">Set pixelmap for checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2659">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2659">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID unchecked_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID checked_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID unchecked_disabled_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID checked_disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2660">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2660">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2661">Este serviço atribui as pixelmaps a serem apresentadas pela caixa de verificação especificada para cada estado da caixa de verificação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2661">This service assigns the pixelmaps to be displayed by the specified checkbox for each checkbox state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2662">Os IDs de recursos podem ser duplicados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2662">The resource IDs can be duplicated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2663">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2663">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2664">**caixa de verificação** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo da caixa de verificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2664">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2665">**unchecked_id** Pixelmap utilizado para estado não controlado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2665">**unchecked_id** Pixelmap used for unchecked state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2666">**checked_id** Pixelmap utilizado para estado verificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2666">**checked_id** Pixelmap used for checked state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2667">**unchecked_disabled_id** Pixelmap utilizado para uma caixa de verificação desativada e não verificada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2667">**unchecked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and unchecked checkbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2668">**checked_disabled_id** Pixelmap usado para uma caixa de verificação desativada e verificada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2668">**checked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and checked checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2669">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2669">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2670">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Selecionado caixa de verificação com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2670">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2671">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2671">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2672">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2672">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2673">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2673">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2674">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2674">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2675">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2675">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select “my_checkbox”. */
status = gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set(&my_checkbox,
    PIXELMAP_UNCHECKED_ID,
    PIXELMAP_CHECKED_ID, PIXELMAP_UNCHECKED_DISABLED_ID,
    PIXELMAP_CHECKED_SIABLED_ID));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmaps are assigned to the checkbox “my_checkbox” */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_angle_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2699">gx_circular_gauge_angle_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2699">gx_circular_gauge_angle_get</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2702">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2702">Description</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2707">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2707">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2709">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2709">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_animation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2742">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2742">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2743">Definir parâmetros de animação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2743">Set animation parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2744">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2744">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    INT steps, 
    INT delay);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2745">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2745">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2746">Este serviço define passos de animação e atrasa o tempo para um widget de bitola circular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2746">This service sets animation steps and delay time for a circular gauge widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2747">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2747">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2748">**bitola** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de bitola circular</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2748">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2749">**passos** Passos totais para uma rotação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2749">**steps** Total steps for one rotation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2750">**atraso** Atraso do tempo para cada passo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2750">**delay** Delay time for every step</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2751">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2751">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2752">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Selecionado caixa de verificação com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2752">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2753">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2753">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2754">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2754">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2755">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valor inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2755">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2756">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2756">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2757">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2757">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2758">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2758">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set animation steps and delay time of circular gauge “my_gauge”
    to 30 and 1, the needle of “my_gauge” will rotate from
    current angle to target angle by 30 steps with 1 tick delay between every step. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(&my_gauge, 30, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the steps and delay time of “my_gauge” has been set. */
```


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2770">Este serviço desenha o fundo do bitola circular especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2770">This service draws background of the specified circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2771">Este serviço é normalmente chamado internamente pela função gx_circular_gauge_draw, mas está exposto à aplicação para ajudar a escrever funções de desenho personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2771">This service is normally called internally by the gx_circular_gauge_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>
