## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2786">gx_circular_gauge_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2786">gx_circular_gauge_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2787">Criar bitola circular</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2787">Create circular gauge</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2788">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2788">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_create(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO *info,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID background_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT circular_gauge_id,
    GX_VALUE xpos,
    GX_VALUE ypos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2789">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2789">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2790">Este serviço cria um widget de bitola circular com as propriedades especificadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2790">This service creates a circular gauge widget with the specified properties.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2791">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2791">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2792">**bitola** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de bitola circular</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2792">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2793">**nome** Nome lógico do widget de bitola circular</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2793">**name** Logical name of circular gauge widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2794">**pai** Ponteiro para o widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2794">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2795">**informação** Ponteiro para a estrutura de informação do medidor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2795">**info** Pointer to the gauge information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2796">**Apêndice I** contém definição para GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO estrutura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2796">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2797">**background_id** ID de recurso do pixelmap de fundo de bitola circular</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2797">**background_id** Resource ID of circular gauge background pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2798">**estilo** Estilo de bitola circular.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2798">**style** Style of circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2799">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2799">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2800">**circular_gauge_id** ID definido pela aplicação do bitola circular</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2800">**circular_gauge_id** Application-defined ID of circular gauge</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2801">**xpos** Posição de coordenada x bitola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2801">**xpos** Gauge x-coordinate position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2802">**ypos** Posição de coordenada y de bitola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2802">**ypos** Gauge y-coordinate position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2803">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2803">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2804">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Selecionado caixa de verificação com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2804">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2805">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2805">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2806">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2806">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2807">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2807">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2808">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2808">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2809">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2809">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2810">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2810">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2811">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2811">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE gauge_info;

gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_steps = 30;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_delay = 1;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_xpos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_ypos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_xcor = 20;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_ycor = 88;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_gauge”. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_create(&my_gauge, “my_gauge”,
            &my_parent,
            &gauge_info, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_NULL,
            MY_ICON_ID, 5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circular gauge “my_gauge” has been created. */
```

```C
VOID gx_circular_gauge_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2822">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2822">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2823">Este serviço desenha o medidor circular especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2823">This service draws the specified circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2824">Esta função é normalmente chamada internamente pelo mecanismo de atualização de lona GUIX, mas está exposta à aplicação para ajudar na implementação de funções de desenho personalizado para widgets de bitola personalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2824">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom gauge widgets.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2839">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2839">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2840">Evento de bitola circular do processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2840">Process circular gauge event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2841">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2841">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_event_process(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2842">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2842">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2843">Este serviço processa um evento para o bitola circular especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2843">This service processes an event for the specified circular gauge.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2844">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2844">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2845">**bitola** Ponteiro para medir bloco de controlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2845">**gauge** Pointer to gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2846">**event_ptr** Ponteiro para o evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2846">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2847">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2847">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo de evento de bitola bem-sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful gauge event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2850">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2850">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2851">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2851">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2852">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2852">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2853">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2853">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic circular gauge event processing as part of custom event processing function. */
UINT custom_gauge_event_process(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default circular gauge
             event processing */
        status = gx_circular_gauge_event_process(gauge, event);
        break;
}
return status;
```

```C
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2891">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2891">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2892">Este serviço define a escova do contexto de desenho atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2892">This service defines the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2893">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2893">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2894">**line_color_id** Identificação de recursos da cor da linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2894">**line_color_id** Resource ID of line color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2895">**O apêndice B** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2895">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2896">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2896">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2897">**fill_color_id** Identificação de recursos da cor de preenchimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2897">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2898">**O apêndice B** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2898">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2899">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2899">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2900">**estilo** Estilo de pincel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2900">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2901">**O apêndice D** descreve os estilos de escova suportados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2901">**Appendix D** describes the supported brush styles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2902">Os estilos de escova podem ser combinados numa variável utilizando uma operação bitwise OR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2902">Brush styles can be combined into one variable using bitwise OR operation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2903">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2903">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2904">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Definição de pincel de contexto bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2904">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2905">**ID** de recursos inválidos de GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2905">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2906">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Nenhum contexto de desenho ativo define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2906">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2907">**ID** de recursos inválidos de GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2907">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2908">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho ativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2908">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_brush_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2926">gx_context_brush_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2926">gx_context_brush_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2928">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2928">Prototype</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2929">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2929">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2930">Este serviço devolve um ponteiro à escova ativa no contexto de desenho atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2930">This service returns a pointer to the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2931">Se não houver um contexto de desenho ativo, o serviço falha e devolve um ponteiro NULO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2931">If there is no active drawing context, the service fails and returns a NULL pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2932">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2932">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2933">**return_brush** Ponteiro para destino para escova.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2933">**return_brush** Pointer to destination for brush.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2934">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2934">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2935">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) escova de contexto recuperada com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2935">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved context brush</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2936">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho ativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2936">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2938">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2939">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2939">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2940">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2940">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRUSH *my_brush;

/* Get the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_get(&my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_pattern_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2955">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2955">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2956">Definir padrão de pincel do contexto de desenho atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2956">Set brush pattern of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2957">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2957">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_pattern_set(ULONG pattern);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2958">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2958">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2959">Este serviço define o padrão de escova do contexto de desenho atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2959">This service sets the brush pattern of the current drawing context.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2960">O padrão da escova é utilizado para desenhar linhas verticais horizontais e tracejadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2960">The brush pattern is used for drawing dashed horizontal and dashed vertical lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2961">Quando o gx_canvas_line_draw é chamado, e a linha é horizontal ou vertical, e o campo de brush.gx_brush_line_pattern não é zero, uma linha de padrão é desenhada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2961">When the gx_canvas_line_draw() is called, and the line is horizontal or vertical, and the brush.gx_brush_line_pattern field is non-zero, a pattern line is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2962">A máscara de padrão da escova é atualmente suportada apenas para linhas horizontais e verticais.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2962">The brush pattern mask is currently only supported for horizontal and vertical lines.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2963">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2963">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2964">**padrão** Padrão para ser usado para a escova.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2964">**pattern** Pattern to be used for the brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2965">Este é um simples padrão hexadécimal ligado/desligado para ser usado para desenho de linha de padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2965">This is a simple hexidecimal on/off pattern to be used for pattern line drawing.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2966">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2966">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2967">**conjunto** de pincel de GX_SUCCESS (0x00) de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2967">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2968">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Contexto de desenho inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2968">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2969">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2969">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2970">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2970">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2971">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2971">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush pattern for the current contex. */
status = gx_context_brush_pattern_set(0x80808080);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush pattern of the current context
has been set to the specified pattern. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2985">gx_context_brush_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2985">gx_context_brush_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2986">Conjunto pincel do contexto de desenho atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2986">Set brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2987">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2987">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_set(GX_BRUSH *brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2988">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2988">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2989">Este serviço define a escova do contexto de desenho atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2989">This service sets the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2990">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2990">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2991">**pincel** Ponteiro para escovar para o contexto atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2991">**brush** Pointer to brush to use for current context.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2992">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2992">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2993">**conjunto** de pincel de GX_SUCCESS (0x00) de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2993">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2994">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho ativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2994">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-2995">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2995">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2996">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2996">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-2997">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2997">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-2998">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-2998">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRSUH my_brush;
GX_FONT *font;
GX_COLOR fill_color;
GX_COLOR line_color;

/* Retrieve the font that associated with the specified font ID. */
gx_context_font_get(MY_FONT_ID, &font);

/* Retrieve the color that associated with the specified color ID. */
gx_context_color_get(MY_FILL_COLOR_ID, &fill_color);
gx_context_color_get(MY_LINE_COLOR, &line_color);

my_brush.gx_brush_pixelmap = MY_PIXELMAP_ID;
my_brush.gx_brush_font = font;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_pattern = 0x80808080;
my_brush.gx_brush_pattern_mask = 0x80000000;
my_brush.gx_brush_fill_color = fill_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_color = line_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_style = GX_BRSUH_SOLID_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ALIAS |
                          GX_BRUSH_PIXELMAP_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ROUND
my_brush.gx_brush_width = 2;
my_brush.gx_brush_alpha = 255;

/* Set the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_set(my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_width_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3041">gx_context_brush_width_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3041">gx_context_brush_width_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3042">Definir largura da escova do contexto de desenho atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3042">Set brush width of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3043">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3043">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_width_set(UINT width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3044">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3044">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3045">Este serviço define a largura da escova ativa no contexto de desenho atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3045">This service sets the width of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3046">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3046">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3047">**largura** Largura da escova em pixels do contexto atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3047">**width** Brush width in pixels of current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3048">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3048">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3049">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de largura de pincel de contexto bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3049">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush width set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3050">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho ativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3050">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3051">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3051">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3052">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3052">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3053">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3053">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush width of the current context to 10 pixels. */
status = gx_context_brush_width_set(10); /*

If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush width of the current context has been set to 10. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3068">gx_context_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3068">gx_context_color_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3069">Obtenha valor de cor associado com iD de cor no contexto de desenho atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3069">Get color value associated with color ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3070">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3070">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_color_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id,
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3071">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3072">Este serviço recupera o valor de cor associado ao ID de cor indicado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3072">This service retrieves the color value associated with the indicated color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3073">O valor da cor é devolvido no formato de cor do ecrã de contexto ativo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3073">The color value is returned in the color format of the active context display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3074">Este serviço só deve ser chamado a partir de uma operação de desenho ativo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3074">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3075">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3075">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3076">**color_id** Identificação de recursos de cor solicitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3076">**color_id** Resource ID of color requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3077">**return_color** Endereço de variável para manter o valor de cor devolvido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3077">**return_color** Address of variable to hold returned color value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3078">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3078">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3079">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Valor de cor bem sucedido obtém</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3079">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color value get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3080">**ID** de recursos inválidos de GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3080">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3081">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho ativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3081">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3082">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3082">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3083">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3083">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3084">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3084">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3085">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3085">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR color_value;

/* Get the color vaue. */
status = gx_context_color_get(MY_BLACK_COLOR_ID, &color_value);
```

## <a name="gx_context_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3100">gx_context_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3100">gx_context_fill_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3101">Definir a cor do preenchimento do contexto de desenho atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3101">Set fill color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3102">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3102">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_fill_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3103">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3103">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3104">Este serviço define a cor de preenchimento da escova ativa no contexto de desenho atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3104">This service sets the fill color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3105">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3105">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3106">**fill_color_id** ID de recurso da cor de preenchimento do contexto atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3106">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3107">**O apêndice B** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3107">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3108">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3108">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3109">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3109">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3110">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de cores de preenchimento de contexto bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3110">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3111">**ID** de recursos inválidos de GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3111">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3112">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho ativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3112">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3113">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3113">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3114">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3114">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3115">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3115">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the fill color of the current context to black. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the fill color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3130">gx_context_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3130">gx_context_font_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3131">Obtenha o tipo de letra associado com iD de fonte no contexto de sorteio atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3131">Get font associated with font ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3132">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3132">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3133">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3133">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3134">Este serviço recupera o ponteiro de fonte associado ao ID de fonte indicado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3134">This service retrieves the font pointer associated with the indicated font ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3135">Este serviço só deve ser chamado a partir de uma operação de desenho ativo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3135">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3136">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3136">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3137">**font_id** Identificação de recursos de fonte solicitada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3137">**font_id** Resource ID of font requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3138">**return_font** Endereço de variável para segurar ponteiro de fonte devolvido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3138">**return_font** Address of variable to hold returned font pointer.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3142">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho ativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3142">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3161">gx_context_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3161">gx_context_font_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3162">Fonte definida do contexto de desenho atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3162">Set font of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3163">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3163">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3164">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3164">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3165">Este serviço define a fonte na escova ativa do contexto de desenho atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3165">This service sets the font in the active brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3166">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3166">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3167">**font_id** ID de recurso de fonte do contexto atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3167">**font_id** Font resource ID of current context</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3170">**ID** de recursos inválidos de GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3170">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3171">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho ativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3171">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3172">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3172">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3173">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3173">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C

```

## <a name="gx_context_line_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3189">gx_context_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3189">gx_context_line_color_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3191">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3191">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_line_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID line_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3192">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3192">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3193">Este serviço define a cor de linha da escova ativa no contexto de desenho atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3193">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3195">**line_color_id** Cor de linha do contexto atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3195">**line_color_id** Line color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3196">**O apêndice B** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3196">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3197">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3197">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3200">**ID** de recursos inválidos de GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3200">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3201">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho ativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3201">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3202">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3202">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3203">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3203">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the line color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3219">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3219">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3220">Obtenha pixelmap associado com ID pixelmap no contexto de sorteio atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3220">Get pixelmap associated with pixelmap ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3221">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3221">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3222">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3222">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3223">Este serviço recupera o ponteiro pixelmap associado ao ID do pixelmap indicado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3223">This service retrieves the pixelmap pointer associated with the indicated pixelmap ID.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3224">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3224">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3225">**pixelmap_id** Identificação de recursos do pixelmap solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3225">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3226">**return_map** Endereço de variável para manter o endereço de pixelmap devolvido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3226">**return_map** Address of variable to hold returned pixelmap address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3227">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3227">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3228">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) recuperou com sucesso o pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3228">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3229">**ID** de recursos inválidos de GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3229">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3230">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho ativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3230">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3231">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de pixels inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3231">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pixelmap pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3232">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3232">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3233">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3233">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3234">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3234">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP *map;

/* Get the pixelmap pointer. */
status = gx_context_pixelmap_get(MY_PIXELMAP_ID, &map);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap was successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3249">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3249">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3250">Definir pixelmap do contexto de sorteio atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3250">Set pixelmap of current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3251">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3251">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3252">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3252">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3253">Este serviço atribui o mapa pixel da escova ativa no contexto de desenho atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3253">This service assigns the pixelmap of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3254">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3254">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3255">**pixelmap_id** ID de recursos Pixelmap para usar para o contexto atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3255">**pixelmap_id** Pixelmap resource ID to use for current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3256">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3256">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3257">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de pixels de contexto bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3257">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3258">**ID** de recursos inválidos de GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3258">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3259">**GX_INVLAID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Contexto inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3259">**GX_INVLAID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3260">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3260">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3261">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3261">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3262">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3262">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap of the current context to MY_PIXELMAP_ID. */
status = gx_context_pixelmap_set(MY_PIXELMAP_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_brush_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3277">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3277">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3278">Defina pincel cru do contexto de desenho atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3278">Define raw brush of current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3279">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3279">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_brush_define(
    GX_COLOR line_color,
    GX_COLOR fill_color, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3280">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3280">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3281">Este serviço define a escova crua do contexto atual do ecrã.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3281">This service defines the raw brush of the current screen context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3282">Definições brutas são usadas quando os valores de cor ARGB de 32 bits devem ser passados para a escova em vez de IDs de cor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3282">Raw definitions are used when 32-bit ARGB color values are to be passed into the brush rather than color IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3283">As definições de cor bruta são úteis quando a cor desejada não está presente na tabela de cores do sistema atual ou quando o valor da cor RGB é calculado no tempo de execução.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3283">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3284">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3284">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3285">**line_color** Cor da linha em formato de cor ARGB cru de 32 bits.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3285">**line_color** Color of line in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3286">**O apêndice A** contém cores pré-definidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3286">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3287">Note que a aplicação também pode adicionar cores personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3287">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3288">**fill_color** Cor de preenchimento em formato de cor ARGB cru de 32 bits.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3288">**fill_color** Color of fill in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3289">**O apêndice A** contém cores pré-definidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3289">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3290">Note que a aplicação também pode adicionar cores personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3290">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3291">**estilo** Estilo de pincel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3291">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3292">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3292">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3293">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3293">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3294">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Definição de pincel cru de contexto bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3294">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw brush define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3295">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho ativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3295">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3296">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3296">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3297">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3297">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3298">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3298">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define the raw brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_brush_define(GX_COLOR_BLACK,
    GX_COLOR_BLACK, GX_STYLE_BORDER_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw brush of the current context has been defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3313">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3313">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3314">Definir a cor de preenchimento bruto do contexto de desenho atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3314">Set raw fill color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3315">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3315">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_fill_color_set(GX_COLOR line_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3316">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3316">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3317">Este serviço define a cor de enchimento bruto do contexto atual do ecrã.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3317">This service sets the raw fill color of the current screen context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3318">O parâmetro line_color é um valor de cor bruta de formato ARGB de 32 bits, em vez de um valor de ID de cor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3318">The line_color parameter is a 32-bit ARGB format raw color value, rather than a color ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3319">As definições de cor bruta são úteis quando a cor desejada não está presente na tabela de cores do sistema atual ou quando o valor da cor RGB é calculado no tempo de execução.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3319">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3320">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3320">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3321">**line_color** Cor da linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3321">**line_color** Color of line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3322">**O apêndice A** contém cores pré-definidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3322">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3323">Note que a aplicação também pode adicionar cores personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3323">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3324">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3324">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3325">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de cores de preenchimento bruto de contexto bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3325">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3326">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Sem contexto de desenho ativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3326">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3327">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3327">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3328">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3328">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Set the raw fill color of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_fill_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw fill color of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_raw_line_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3344">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3344">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3345">Definir a cor da linha bruta do contexto de desenho atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3345">Set raw line color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3346">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3346">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3347">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3347">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3348">Este serviço define a cor de linha da escova ativa no contexto de desenho atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3348">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3349">O parâmetro line_color é um valor de cor bruta de formato ARGB de 32 bits, em vez de um valor de ID de cor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3349">The line_color parameter is a 32-bit ARGB format raw color value, rather than a color ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3350">As definições de cor bruta são úteis quando a cor desejada não está presente na tabela de cores do sistema atual ou quando o valor da cor RGB é calculado no tempo de execução.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3350">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3351">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3351">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3352">**line_color** Cor do valor da linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3352">**line_color** Color of line value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3353">**O apêndice A** contém cores pré-definidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3353">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3354">Note que a aplicação também pode adicionar cores personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3354">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3355">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3355">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3356">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de cores de linha crua de contexto bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3356">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3357">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) Sem contexto de desenho ativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3357">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3358">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3358">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3359">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3359">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Set the raw line color of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw line color of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3374">gx_context_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3374">gx_context_string_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3375">Obter corda associada ao ID de corda (precotado)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3375">Retrieve string associated with String ID (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3376">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3376">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_string_get(GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3377">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3377">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3378">Esta API prevadizada devolve a cadeia associada ao ID de cadeia dado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3378">This deprecated API returns the string associated with the given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3379">As novas aplicações devem ser utilizadas gx_context_string_get_ext( ).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3379">New applications should use gx_context_string_get_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3380">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3380">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3381">**string_id** ID de corda gerado pela aplicação GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3381">**string_id** String ID generated by the GUIX Studio application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3382">**return_string** Endereço de variável para devolver ponteiro de corda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3382">**return_string** Address of variable to return string pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3383">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3383">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3384">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de cores de linha crua de contexto bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3384">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3385">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3385">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3386">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3386">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3387">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) Sem contexto de desenho ativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3387">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3388">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3388">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3389">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3389">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3390">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3390">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *text;

status = gx_context_string_get(GX_ID_ERROR, &text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string pointer has been returned. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_string_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3393">gx_context_string_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3393">gx_context_string_get_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3394">Recupere a corda associada ao ID da corda dada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3394">Retrieve string associated with given string ID.</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3395">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3395">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_string_get_ext(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id, 
    GX_STRING *return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3396">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3396">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3397">Este serviço devolve a cadeia associada a um dado ID de cadeia.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3397">This service returns the string associated with a given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3398">Este serviço só pode ser invocado quando existe um contexto de desenho ativo, ou seja, a partir da função de desenho de um widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3398">This service can only be invoked when there is an active drawing context, i.e. from within the drawing function of a widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3399">Este serviço identifica a tela e o visor ativo e recupera a corda da placa de exibição localizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3399">This service identifies the active canvas and display and retrieves the string from the located display instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3400">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3400">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3401">**string_id** O String ID foi utilizado para identificar a cadeia, tal como gerado pelo GUIX Studio no ficheiro de cabeçalho de recursos de aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3401">**string_id** String ID used to identify the string, as generated by GUIX Studio in the application resource header file.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3402">**return_string** Endereço de GX_STRING variável em que o ponteiro de corda e o comprimento da corda serão devolvidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3402">**return_string** Address of GX_STRING variable in which the string pointer and string length will be returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3403">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3403">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3404">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de cores de linha crua de contexto bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3404">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3405">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3405">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3406">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3406">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3407">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) Sem contexto de desenho ativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3407">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3408">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3408">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3409">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3409">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Set the raw line color of the current context. */
status = gx_context_string_get_ext(ID_ERROR, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string.gx_string_ptr and
string.gx_string_length values have been returned. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3425">gx_display_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3425">gx_display_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3426">Atribua o idioma ativo do ecrã</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3426">Assign the display active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3427">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3427">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_active_language_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3428">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3428">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3429">Este serviço atribui o idioma ativo atualmente para o visor indicado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3429">This service assigns the currently active language for the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3430">O índice linguístico corresponde às línguas definidas na tabela de linguagem de exibição, e não é um identificador de língua ANSI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3430">The language index corresponds to the languages defined in the display language table, and is not an ANSI language identifier.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3431">Diferentes ecrãs num sistema multi-ecrã podem executar diferentes idiomas ativos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3431">Different displays in a multi display system can each run different active languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3432">A tabela de idiomas de visualização deve ser atribuída antes da utilização desta API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3432">The display language table should be assigned before this API is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3433">Quando um visor é inicializado usando gx_studio_display_configure, a tabela de idiomas é automaticamente instalada e a aplicação passa no índice de linguagem ativa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3433">When a display is initialized using gx_studio_display_configure, the language table is automatically installed and the application passes in the active language index.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3434">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3434">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3435">**exibir** Ponteiro para exibir bloco de controlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3435">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3436">**língua** Índice de linguagem ativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3436">**language** Active language index</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3437">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3437">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3438">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Designação de linguagem de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3438">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful language assign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3439">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de exibição inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3439">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid display pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3440">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Índice linguístico inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3440">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3441">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3441">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3442">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3442">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3443">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3443">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_active_language_set(&my_display,
    LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3448">Reatribuir um valor de cor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3448">Re-assign one color value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3449">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3449">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_color_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id, 
    GX_COLOR new_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3450">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3450">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3451">Este serviço reatribui o valor de cor associado ao ID de cor especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3451">This service re-assigns the color value associated with the specified color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3452">Isto pode ser usado para modificar a tabela de cores de um ecrã sem fornecer uma mesa de cores inteiramente nova.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3452">This can be used to modify the color table of a display without providing an entirely new color table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3453">O valor de cor fornecido deve estar no formato nativo suportado pelo visor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3453">The color value provided must be in the native format supported by the display.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3454">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3454">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3455">**exibir** Ponteiro para exibir bloco de controlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3455">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3456">**color_id** ID de cor para reatribuir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3456">**color_id** Color ID to reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3457">**new_color** Valor de cor para atribuir a esta ranhura de color_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3457">**new_color** Color value to assign to this color_id slot</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3458">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3458">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3459">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Reatribuição de cor bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3459">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3460">**ID** de cor inválida GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3460">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid color ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3461">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3461">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3462">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Exibição inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3462">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3463">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3463">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3464">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3464">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3465">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3465">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_color_set(&my_display, MY_COLOR_ID, 0x5454);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the color has been reassigned. */
```
