## <a name="gx_display_color_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3468">gx_display_color_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3468">gx_display_color_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3469">Atribuir tabela de cores de exibição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3469">Assign display color table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3470">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3470">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_color_table_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_COLOR *color_table, 
    INT color_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3471">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3471">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3472">Este serviço reatribui a tabela de cores a utilizar pelo visor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3472">This service re-assigns the color table to be used by the display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3473">Este serviço é normalmente invocado pela função de configuração gerada pelo GUIX Studio, mas também pode ser chamado pelo software de aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3473">This service is normally invoked by the GUIX Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3474">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3474">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3475">**exibir** Ponteiro para exibir bloco de controlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3475">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3476">**color_table** Matriz de valores de cor no formato nativo de exibição.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3476">**color_table** Array of color values in display native format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3477">**color_count** Indica o número de entradas na tabela de cores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3477">**color_count** Indicates number of entries in color table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3478">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3478">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3479">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de mesa de cores bem-sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3479">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3480">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3480">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3481">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3481">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3482">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Exibição inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3482">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3483">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3483">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3484">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3484">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3485">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3485">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR default_table[32] = { … };

/* Change the color table */
status = gx_display_color_table_set(&my_display, default_table, 32);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the color table has been reassigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3488">gx_display_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3488">gx_display_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3489">Criar exibição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3489">Create display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3490">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3490">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_create(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_CONST CHAR *name,
    UINT (*display_driver_setup)(GX_DISPLAY *),
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3491">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3491">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3492">Este serviço cria um visor e chama a função de configuração do controlador de exibição.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3492">This service creates a display and calls the display driver setup function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3493">O GUIX pega neste ecrã e adiciona-o à sua lista interna de visualizações.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3493">GUIX takes this display and adds it to its internal list of displays.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3494">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3494">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3495">**exibir** Ponteiro para exibir bloco de controlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3495">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3496">**nome** Nome do visor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3496">**name** Name of the display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3497">**display_driver_setup** Ponteiro para exibir função de configuração do controlador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3497">**display_driver_setup** Pointer to display driver setup function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3498">**optional_driver_info** Ponteiro para informações opcionais do condutor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3498">**optional_driver_info** Pointer to optional driver information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3499">**color_format** Formato de cor, tal como definido no **Apêndice C**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3499">**color_format** Color format, as defined in **Appendix C**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3500">**largura** Número de pixels no eixo x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3500">**width** Number of pixels on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3501">**altura** Número de pixels no eixo y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3501">**height** Number of pixels on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3502">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3502">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3503">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Criação de exibição bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3503">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful display create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3504">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0xFE) Não conseguir configurar o ecrã</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3504">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0xFE) Fail to setup display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3505">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3505">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3506">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3506">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3507">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x23) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de exibição inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3507">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x23) Invalid display control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3508">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3508">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3509">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3509">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3510">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3510">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DISPLAY my_display;

UINT my_driver_setup_callback(GX_DISPLAY *display)
{
    …
}

/* Create screen “my_display”. */
status = gx_display_create(&my_display, “my display”,
    my_driver_setup_callback, 320, 480);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the screen “my_display” has been created. */
```

```C
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    VOID (*display_driver_cleanup)(GX_DISPLAY *));
```

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3517">Este serviço encerra um ecrã e limpa os recursos atribuídos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3517">This service shuts down a display, and cleans up allocated resources.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3521">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3521">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3522">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Exibição bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3522">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful display delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3523">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Lista de visualização criada é NU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3523">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Created display list is NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3524">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3524">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3525">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3525">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3526">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3526">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3527">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3527">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3528">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3528">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID driver_cleanup_callback(GX_DISPLAY *display)
{
    …
}

/* Delete a display “my_display”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen “my_display” has been destroyed. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_font_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3538">gx_display_font_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3538">gx_display_font_table_set</span></span>

```C

    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_CHAR **table, 
    GX_UBYTE *language_count,
    UINT *string_table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3562">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3562">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3563">Este serviço recupera a tabela linguística do visor indicado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3563">This service retrieves the language table from the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3564">Este serviço pode ser utilizado por uma aplicação para modificar a tabela de linguagem de exibição, em tempo de execução, utilizando cordas dinâmicas definidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3564">This service can be used by an application to modify the display language table, at runtime, using dynamically defined strings.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3565">Esta API é depreciada e suportada apenas para aplicações usando a antiga tabela de linguagem de estilo (ou seja, o ficheiro de recursos gerados pelo Studio é gerado para a versão da biblioteca antes da versão 5.6).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3565">This API is deprecated and supported only for applications using the old style language table (i.e. the Studio generated resource file is generated for library version prior to version 5.6).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3566">As novas aplicações devem ser utilizadas gx_display_language_table_get_ext).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3566">New applications should use gx_display_language_table_get_ext().</span></span>

```C
    UINT *table_size);
```

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3724">Este serviço é precotado e substituído por gx_display_string_table_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3724">This service is deprecated and replaced by gx_display_string_table_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3725">Este serviço recupera a tabela de cordas associada à linguagem ativa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3725">This service retrieves the string table associated with the active language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3726">Este serviço não é frequentemente utilizado, mas é fornecido para a completude para as aplicações que podem precisar de fazer modificações de tempo de execução na tabela de cordas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3726">This service is not frequently used, but is provided for completeness for those applications that might need to make runtime modifications to the string table.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3732">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3732">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3734">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3734">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3736">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3736">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_string_table_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3744">gx_display_string_table_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3744">gx_display_string_table_get_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3745">Recupere a tabela de cordas ativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3745">Retrieve the active string table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3746">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3746">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_string_table_get(
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_UBYTE language, 
    GX_STRING **table, 
    UINT *table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3747">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3747">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3748">Este serviço recupera a tabela de cordas associada à linguagem ativa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3748">This service retrieves the string table associated with the active language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3749">Este serviço não é frequentemente utilizado, mas é fornecido para a completude para as aplicações que podem precisar de fazer modificações de tempo de execução na tabela de cordas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3749">This service is not frequently used, but is provided for completeness for those applications that might need to make runtime modifications to the string table.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3750">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3750">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3751">**exibir** Ponteiro para exibir bloco de controlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3751">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3752">**língua** Coluna de mesa para recuperar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3752">**language** Table column to retrieve.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3753">**tabela** Endereço de variável para ponter de retorno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3753">**table** Address of variable to return pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3754">**table_size** Endereço de variável para devolver tamanho da tabela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3754">**table_size** Address of variable to return table size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3755">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3755">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3756">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de tabelas de fontes bem sucedidas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3756">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful font table set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3757">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3757">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3758">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Índice linguístico inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3758">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Invalid language index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3759">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3759">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3760">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3760">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3761">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3761">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3762">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3762">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING *string_table;
UINT table_size;

/* Retrieve string table */
status = gx_display_string_table_get_ext(&my_display,
    LANGUAGE_ENGLISH, &string_table, &table_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string table has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_theme_install"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3767">gx_display_theme_install</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3767">gx_display_theme_install</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3768">Instale temas no visor especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3768">Install themes to the specified display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3769">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3769">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_theme_install(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_THEME *theme_table);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3770">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3770">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3771">Este serviço instala temas para o visor especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3771">This service install themes to the specified display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3772">Este serviço é normalmente invocado pela função de configuração gerada pelo Estúdio, mas também pode ser chamado pelo software da aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3772">This service is normally invoked by the Studio generated display configuration function, but can also be called by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3773">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3773">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3774">**exibir** Ponteiro para exibir bloco de controlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3774">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3775">**theme_table** Tabela temática a instalar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3775">**theme_table** Theme table to be installed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3776">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3776">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3777">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Tabela temática instalada com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3777">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully installed theme table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3778">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3778">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3779">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro de tabela temática inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3779">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid theme table pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3780">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Exibição inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3780">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3781">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3781">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3782">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3782">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3783">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3783">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_THEME theme_1;

&theme_table[1] = {
    &theme_1,
    …
}

/* Define resource tables. */
GX_COLOR color_table[32] = {…};
GX_FONT *font_table[32] = {…};
GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap_table[32] = { … };

/* Define scroll appearance. */
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE scroll_appearance;

memset(&scroll_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
scroll appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style =
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

theme_1.theme_color_table = color_table;
theme_1.theme_font_table = font_table;
theme_1.theme_pixlemap_table = pixelmap_table;
theme_1.theme_palette = GX_NULL;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scroll_style = GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scroll_style =
    GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_color_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_font_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_pixelmap_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_palette_size = 0;

/* Install theme table. */
status = gx_display_theme_install(&my_display, theme_table);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the theme table has been installed. */
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_close"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3788">gx_drop_list_close</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3788">gx_drop_list_close</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3791">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3791">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3792">Este serviço fecha a lista popup da lista de lançamentos especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3792">This service closes the popup list of the specified drop list.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3797">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3797">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3798">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3798">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3799">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3799">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3800">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3800">Initialization and threads</span></span>

## <a name="gx_drop_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3807">gx_drop_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3807">gx_drop_list_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3808">Criar uma lista de lançamentos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3808">Create a drop list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3809">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3809">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_create(
    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list, 
    GX_CONST
    GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, 
    INT open_height,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *, 
    GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT drop_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3810">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3810">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3811">Este serviço cria uma lista de entrega.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3811">This service creates a drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3812">Uma lista de drop é uma combinação do widget da lista de lançamento, e uma lista vertical pop-up que é exibida quando a lista de lançamento é aberta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3812">A drop list is a combination of the drop list widget, and a popup vertical list that is displayed when the drop-list is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3813">A lista vertical popup é criada automaticamente quando o widget da lista de lançamento é criado, e exibido ou escondido quando o widget da lista de lançamento é aberto ou fechado, respectivamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3813">The popup vertical list is created automatically when the drop-list widget is created, and displayed or hidden when the drop-list widget is opened or closed, respectively.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3814">O widget da lista de lançamento suporta dois pixelmaps associados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3814">The drop list widget supports two associated pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3815">O primeiro, descrito como "List Wallpaper" na vista de propriedades do Estúdio, é o mapa de pixels de papel de parede opcional que é apresentado como o fundo da lista vertical que é exibido quando o widget da lista de lançamento é aberto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3815">The first, described as “List Wallpaper” in the Studio properties view, is the optional wallpaper pixelmap that is displayed as the background of the vertical list that is displayed when the drop-list widget is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3816">O segundo pixelmap, descrito como "Background Image" na vista de propriedades do Estúdio, é uma imagem opcional exibida como o fundo da própria lista de lançamentos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3816">The second pixelmap, described as the “Background Image” in the Studio properties view, is an optional image displayed as the background of the drop-list itself.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3817">Um widget de lista de lançamento pode ter (mas não é necessário ter) um widget para crianças que é usado para abrir e fechar a lista de drop.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3817">A drop-list widget can have (but is not required to have) a child widget that is used to open and close the drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3818">Este é habitualmente um widget de ícone ou botão, mas até mesmo um widget personalizado poderia ser usado como o toggle aberto/próximo para a lista de drop dos pais.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3818">This is customarily an icon or button widget, but even a custom widget could be used as the open/close toggle for the parent drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3819">A definição de chave que faz com que este widget infantil opere a lista de gotas é que este widget infantil deve ter o widget id pré-definido ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3819">The key setting which makes this child widget operate the drop list is that this child widget must have the pre-defined widget id ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3820">Para definir um widget para crianças que abrirá e fechará a lista de entrega, primeiro-ad e widget infantil para a lista de gotas, e posicionar esta criança dentro da lista de entregas como desejado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3820">To define a child widget which will open and close the drop-list, firstadd and child widget to the drop list, and position this child within the drop list as desired:</span></span>

![Screenshot da lista de lançamentos.](./media/guix/image6.jpg)

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3822">Em seguida, use a vista propriedades do Estúdio para atribuir a este widget o valor de ID ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON, que é um valor de ID definido internamente reconhecido pela lista de drop dos pais:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3822">Then use the Studio properties view to assign this child widget the ID value ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON, which is an internally defined ID value recognized by the parent drop list:</span></span>

![Screenshot da vista das propriedades do Estúdio.](./media/guix/image7.jpg)

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3824">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3824">Parameters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3825">**drop_list** Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo da lista de lançamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3825">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3826">**nome** Nome da lista de entrega</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3826">**name** Name of the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3827">**pai** Ponteiro para o widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3827">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3828">**total_rows** Número total de linhas na lista de lançamentos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3828">**total_rows** Total number of rows in the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3829">**open_height** A altura da lista vertical apresentada quando a lista de lançamentos é aberta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3829">**open_height** The height of the vertical list displayed when the drop list is opened.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_drop_list_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3849">gx_drop_list_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3849">gx_drop_list_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3850">Evento de lista de drop de processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3850">Process drop list event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3851">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3851">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_event_process(
    GX_DROP_LIST *list, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3852">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3852">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3853">Este serviço processa um evento para a lista de entrega.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3853">This service processes an event for the drop list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3854">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3854">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3855">**drop_list** Bloco de controlo widget de lista de lançamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3855">**drop_list** Drop list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3856">**evento** Ponteiro para o evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3856">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3857">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3857">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3858">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) evento de lista de entrega processado com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3858">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed drop list event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3859">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3859">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3860">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3860">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3861">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3861">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3862">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3862">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3863">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3863">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic drop list event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_drop_list_event_process(GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default drop list
            event processing */
        status = gx_drop_list_event_process(drop_list, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3893">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3893">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3894">Atribua uma imagem de fundo à lista de lançamentos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3894">Assign a background image to the drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3895">Este pixelmap é usado como pano de fundo para o próprio widget da lista de lançamento, e não para a lista vertical popup que é apresentada quando a lista é aberta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3895">This pixelmap is used as the background for the drop list widget itself, and not for the popup vertical list that is displayed when the list is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3896">Para atribuir um pixelmap ao pop-up da lista de lançamento, você precisaria primeiro ligar para gx_drop_list_popup_get para recuperar um ponteiro para a lista pop-up e, em seguida, usar gx_window_wallpaper_set() para atribuir um pixelmap a esta lista pop-up.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3896">To assign a pixelmap to the drop-list popup, you would need to first call gx_drop_list_popup_get to retrieve a pointer to the popup list, and then use gx_window_wallpaper_set() to assign a pixelmap to this popup list.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3902">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3902">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_drop_list_popup_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3914">gx_drop_list_popup_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3914">gx_drop_list_popup_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3915">Recupere o ponteiro para a lista vertical popup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3915">Retrieve pointer to popup vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3916">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3916">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST **return_list);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3917">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3917">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3918">Um widget drop-list é composto pelo widget drop-list em si, e uma lista vertical pop-up que é mostrada quando o widget da lista de lançamento é aberto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3918">A drop-list widget is composed of the drop-list widget itself, and a popup vertical list that is shown when the drop-list widget is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3919">Este serviço recupera um ponteiro para o componente de lista vertical da lista de entrega, permitindo que a aplicação invoque serviços API diretamente nesta lista vertical.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3919">This service retrieves a pointer to the vertical list component of the drop list, allowing the application to invoke API services directly on this vertical list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3920">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3920">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3921">**drop_list** Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo da lista de lançamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3921">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3922">**return_list** Ponteiro para a lista vertical armazenada na lista de entrega</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3922">**return_list** Pointer to the vertical list stored in the drop list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3923">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3923">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3945">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3945">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3957">gx_horizontal_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3957">gx_horizontal_list_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3958">Criar lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3958">Create horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3959">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3959">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_create(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *horizontal_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_columns,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *, 
    GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT horizontal_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3960">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3960">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3961">Este serviço cria uma lista horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3961">This service creates a horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3962">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3962">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3963">**horizontal_list** Bloco de controlo widget de lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3963">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3964">**nome** Nome da lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3964">**name** Name of horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3965">**pai** Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3965">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3966">**total_columns** Número total de comum na lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3966">**total_columns** Total number of comumns in horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3967">**callback** Este é um ponteiro para uma função de retorno fornecido pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3967">**callback** This is a pointer to a callback function provided by the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3968">A função de retorno é invocada quando a lista horizontal é deslocalizada, para criar os itens de lista recém-visíveis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3968">The callback function is invoked when the horizontal list is scrolled, to create the newly visible list items.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3969">Desta forma, a lista horizontal pode apresentar qualquer tipo de widget definido pelo utilizador como os itens da lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3969">In this way the horizontal list can display any user-defined widget type as the list items.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3970">**estilo** Estilo de widget de barra de rolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3970">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3971">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3971">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3972">**horizontal_list_id** ID definido pela aplicação da lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3972">**horizontal_list_id** Application-defined ID of horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3973">**tamanho** Dimensões da lista horitzonal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3973">**size** Dimensions of the horitzonal list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3974">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3974">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) criou com sucesso a lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3975">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created the horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3976">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3977">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3977">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3978">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3978">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3979">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3979">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3980">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Número de colunas não válidas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3980">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Number of columns not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3981">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3981">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3983">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3983">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create horizontal list “my_list” with 5 columns. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_create(&my_list, “my_list”, &my_parent,
    5, callback, GX_STYLE_WRAP, MY_LIST_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the horizontal list “my_list” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3992">gx_horizontal_list_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3992">gx_horizontal_list_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3993">Evento de lista horizontal de processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3993">Process horizontal list event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3994">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3994">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_event_process(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *list,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3995">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3995">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-3996">Este serviço processa um evento para a lista horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3996">This service processes an event for the horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-3997">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3997">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3998">**lista** Bloco de controlo widget de lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3998">**list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-3999">**evento** Ponteiro para o evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-3999">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4000">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4000">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4001">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Evento de lista horizontal processada com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4001">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed horizontal list event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4002">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4002">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4003">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4003">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4004">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4004">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4005">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4005">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4006">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4006">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic horizontal list event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_list_event_process(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *list,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default horizontal
        list event processing */
        status =
        gx_horizontal_list_event_process(list, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4039">gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4039">gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4040">Obtenha o índice de entrada selecionado da lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4040">Get selected entry index from horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4041">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4041">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get(
    GX_horizobntal_LIST *horizontal_list,
    INT *return_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4042">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4042">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4043">Este serviço devolve o índice de inscrição da lista selecionada da lista horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4043">This service returns the selected list entry index of the horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4044">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4044">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4045">**horizontal_list** Bloco de controlo widget de lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4045">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4046">**return_index** Destino para índice de lista de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4046">**return_index** Destination for return list index</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4047">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4047">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4048">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Com sucesso obteve a entrada na lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4048">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful obtained the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4049">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4049">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4050">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4050">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4051">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4051">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4052">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4052">Example</span></span>

```C
INT current_index_entry;

/* Get the list entry at the current index of horizontal list “my_list”. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get(&my_list,
    &current_index_entry);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_index_entry” contains the current list selection index. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_selected_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4061">gx_horizontal_list_selected_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4061">gx_horizontal_list_selected_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4062">Atribuir a entrada selecionada numa lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4062">Assign the selected entry in a horizontal list</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_selected_set(
    GX_HORIZONATAL_LIST *horizontal_list,
    INT index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4064">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4064">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4065">Este serviço atribui a entrada selecionada numa lista horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4065">This service assigns the selected entry in a horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4066">Se necessário, a lista horizontal deslocar-se-á para tornar visível a entrada selecionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4066">If required, the horizontal list will scroll to make the selected entry visible.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4069">**índice** Posição baseada no índice da entrada de nova lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4069">**index** Index based position of new list entry</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4070">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4070">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4071">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir com sucesso a entrada da lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4071">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4072">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Index não está na gama inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4072">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Index is not in invalid range</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4073">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4073">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4074">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4074">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4075">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4075">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4076">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4076">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4077">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4077">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4078">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4078">Example</span></span>

```C

status = gx_horizontal_list_selected_set(&my_list, 12);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the list entry of “my_list” has been successfully set to 12. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4087">gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4087">gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4088">Obtenha a entrada selecionada da lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4088">Get selected entry from horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4089">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4089">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get(
    GX_horizobntal_LIST *horizontal_list,
    GX_WIDGET **return_list_entry);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4090">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4090">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4091">Este serviço devolve a inscrição da lista selecionada da lista horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4091">This service returns the selected list entry of the horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4092">Note que se a lista horizontal tiver mais linhas do que widgets infantis, e a entrada selecionada tiver sido deslocada da vista, esta API voltará GX_NULL porque os widgets para crianças são reutilizados à medida que o conteúdo da lista é deslocalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4092">Note that if the horizontal list has more rows than child widgets, and the selected entry has been scrolled from view, this API will return GX_NULL because the child widgets are re-used as the list content is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4093">A função gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get devolverá de forma fiável o índice do item selecionado, mesmo que esse item tenha sido deslocalizado da vista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4093">The gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get function will reliably return the index of the selected item, even if that item has been scrolled from view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4094">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4094">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4095">**horizontal_list** Bloco de controlo widget de lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4095">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4096">**return_list_entry** Destino para widget de entrada na lista de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4096">**return_list_entry** Destination for return list entry widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4097">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4097">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4098">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Com sucesso obteve a entrada na lista horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4098">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful obtained the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4099">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) O widget selecionado foi percalizado de vista numa lista com mais linhas do que crianças clientes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4099">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Selected widget has been scrolled from view in a list with more rows than client children.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4100">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4100">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4101">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4101">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4102">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4102">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4103">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4103">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4104">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4104">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the list entry at the current index of horizontal list “my_list”. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get(&my_list, &current_list_entry);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_list_entry” contains a pointer to the currently selected widget. */

    
```

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4117">Este serviço atribui o número total de colunas a visualizar pela lista horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4117">This service assigns the total number of columns to be displayed by the horizontal list.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4137">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4137">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4138">Criar barra de deslocação horizontal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4138">Create horizontal scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4139">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4139">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4140">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4140">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4141">Este serviço cria uma barra de deslocação horizontal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4141">This service creates a horizontal scrollbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4142">O ID para uma barra de deslocamento horizontal é pré-definido (porque uma janela tem de saber como apanhar eventos a partir dele), e o tamanho é automático (porque tem de preencher a largura do cliente da janela dos pais).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4142">The ID for a horizontal scrollbar is pre-defined (because a window has to know how to catch events from it), and the size is automatic (because it has to fill the parent window’s client width).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4143">Se decidirmos permitir as barras de deslocamento da área do cliente, teremos de adicionar outra função de criação com os parâmetros de id e tamanho.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4143">If we decide to allow client area scrollbars, we will need to add another create function with the id and size parameters.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4144">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4144">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4145">**barra de scroll** Bloco de controlo widget de barra de rolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4145">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4146">**nome** Nome da barra de pergaminho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4146">**name** Name of scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4147">**pai** Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4147">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4148">**aparência** A estrutura de aparência define o aparecimento da barra de pergaminho.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4148">**appearance** The appearance structure defines the appearance of the scroll bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4149">Se este valor for GX_NULL, a barra de deslocação utilizará a aparência padrão da barra de deslocação definida por gx_system_scroll_appearance_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4149">If this value is GX_NULL, the scrollbar will use the default scrollbar appearance defined by gx_system_scroll_appearance_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4150">Consulte o **Apêndice I** para a definição da estrutura GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4150">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4151">**Estilo** Estilo de widget de barra de rolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4151">**Style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4152">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4152">**Appendix D** contains pre- defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4153">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4153">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4154">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Barra de deslocação horizontal bem sucedida criar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4154">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful horizontal scrollbar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4155">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4155">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4156">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4156">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4157">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4157">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4158">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4158">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4159">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4159">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4160">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4160">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4161">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4161">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */
status = gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(&my_scrollbar,
    “my_horizontal_scrollbar”, &my_parent, GX_NULL,
    GX_STYLE_SCROLLBAR_END_BUTTONS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been created. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4165">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4165">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4166">gx_scrollbar_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4166">gx_scrollbar_reset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4167">gx_vertical_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4167">gx_vertical_scrollbar_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_icon_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4168">gx_icon_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4168">gx_icon_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4169">Criar botão de ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4169">Create icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4170">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4170">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_button_create(
    GX_ICON_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID icon_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT icon_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4171">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4171">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4172">Este serviço cria o widget de botão de ícone especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4172">This service creates the specified icon button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4173">GX_ICON_BUTTON é derivado de GX_BUTTON e suporta todos os gx_button serviços da API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4173">GX_ICON_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4174">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4174">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4175">**botão** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões de ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4175">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4176">**nome** Nome lógico do widget do botão do ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4176">**name** Logical name of icon button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4177">**pai** Ponteiro para o widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4177">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4178">**icon_id** ID de recurso do ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4178">**icon_id** Resource ID of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4179">**estilo** Estilo de ícone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4179">**style** Style of icon.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4180">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4180">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4181">**icon_button_id** ID definido pela aplicação do botão de ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4181">**icon_button_id** Application-defined ID of icon button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4182">**tamanho** Dimensões do botão de ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4182">**size** Dimensions of icon button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4183">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4183">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4184">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) criou com sucesso o botão de ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4184">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created icon button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4185">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4185">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4186">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4186">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4187">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4187">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4188">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4188">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4189">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4189">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4190">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4190">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4191">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4191">Example</span></span>

```C

status = gx_icon_button_create(&my_icon_button, “my_icon_button”,
    &my_parent,
    MY_ICON_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_ICON_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the icon button “my_icon_button” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4208">gx_icon_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4208">gx_icon_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4209">Desenhe um botão de ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4209">Draw an icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4210">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4210">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_button_draw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4211">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4211">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4212">Este serviço desenha o botão de ícone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4212">This service draws the icon button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4213">Esta função é normalmente chamada internamente pelo GUIX como parte de uma operação de atualização de tela, mas também exposta à aplicação que pode querer fornecer uma função de desenho personalizado e invocar o desenho do botão de ícone padrão como base de desenho personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4213">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4214">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4214">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4215">**botão** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões de ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4215">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4216">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4216">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4217">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4217">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4218">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4218">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4219">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4219">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4220">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4220">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_icon_button_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4237">gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4237">gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4238">Desajuste do pixelmap ao widget do botão do ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4238">Set pixelmap to the icon button widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4239">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4239">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_ICON_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID icon_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4240">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4240">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4241">Este serviço atribui um novo pixelmap ao widget do botão de ícone.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4241">This service assigns a new pixelmap to the icon button widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4242">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4242">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4243">**botão** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões de ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4243">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4244">**icon_id** ID de recursos de pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4244">**icon_id** Resource ID of pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4245">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4245">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4246">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir com sucesso o pixelmap do botão do ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4246">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set icon button pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4247">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4248">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4249">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4249">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4250">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4250">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4251">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4251">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap for “my_icon_button”. */
status = gx_icon_button_pixelmap_set(&my_icon_button,
    GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ICON);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap of the icon button “my_icon_button” has been set. */
```
