## <a name="gx_icon_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4268">gx_icon_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4268">gx_icon_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4269">Desenhar fundo de ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4269">Draw icon background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4270">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4270">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_background_draw(GX_ICON *icon);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4271">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4271">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4272">Este serviço desenha o fundo do widget de ícone especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4272">This service draws background of the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4273">Este serviço é normalmente chamado internamente pela função gx_icon_button_draw, mas está exposto à aplicação para ajudar a escrever funções de desenho personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4273">This service is normally called internally by the gx_icon_button_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4274">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4274">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4275">**ícone** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo widget de ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4275">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4276">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4276">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4277">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4277">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4278">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4278">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4279">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4279">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4280">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4280">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON *icon)
{
    /* Call icon background draw. */
    gx_icon_background_draw(icon);

    /* Add custom drawing here */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw(icon);
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4286">gx_icon_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4286">gx_icon_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4287">ícone Criar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4287">Create icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4288">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4288">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_create(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT icon_id, 
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4289">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4289">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4290">Este serviço cria o widget de ícone especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4290">This service creates the specified icon widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4291">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4291">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4292">**ícone** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de ícones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4292">**icon** Pointer to icon control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4293">**nome** Nome lógico do widget de ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4293">**name** Logical name of icon widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4294">**pai** Ponteiro para o widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4294">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4295">**pixelmap_id** ID de recursos de pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4295">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4296">**estilo** Estilo de ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4296">**style** Style of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4297">**icon_id** ID definido pela aplicação do ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4297">**icon_id** Application-defined ID of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4298">**x** Posição de coordenação x inicial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4298">**x** Starting x-coordinate position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4299">**y posição** de arranque y-coordenada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4299">**y** Starting y-coordinate position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4300">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4300">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4301">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ícone de sucesso criar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4301">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful icon create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4302">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4302">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4303">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4303">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4304">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4304">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4305">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4305">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4306">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4306">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4307">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4307">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4308">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4308">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_icon”. */
status = gx_icon_create(&my_icon, “my_icon”, &my_parent,
    MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_ICON_ID,
    5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the icon “my_icon” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4313">gx_icon_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4313">gx_icon_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4314">Desenhar ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4314">Draw icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4315">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4315">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_draw(GX_ICON *icon);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4316">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4316">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4317">Este serviço desenha o widget de ícone especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4317">This service draws the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4318">Este serviço é normalmente chamado internamente pelo GUIX como parte de uma operação de atualização de tela, mas também exposto à aplicação que pode querer fornecer uma função de desenho personalizado e invocar o desenho de ícone padrão como base de desenho personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4318">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4319">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4319">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4320">**ícone** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo widget de ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4320">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4321">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4321">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4322">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4322">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4323">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4323">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4324">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4324">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4325">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4325">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon drawing function. */

VOID my_icon_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default icon draw. */
    gx_icon_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4330">gx_icon_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4330">gx_icon_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4331">Processamento de eventos de widget de ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4331">Icon widget event processing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4332">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4332">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_event_process(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4333">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4333">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4334">Este serviço trata dos eventos enviados para um widget GX_ICON.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4334">This service handles events sent to a GX_ICON widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4335">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4335">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4336">**ícone** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo widget de ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4336">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4337">**event_ptr** Ponteiro para GX_EVENT estrutura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4337">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4338">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Evento de ícone processado bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4339">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful processed icon event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4341">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4342">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4342">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4343">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4343">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4344">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4344">Example</span></span>

```C
switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
{
case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
    /* Do default handling. */
    status = gx_icon_event_process(icon, event_ptr);

    /* add your own handling here */
    break;
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4349">gx_icon_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4349">gx_icon_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4350">Definir pixelmap para ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4350">Set pixelmap for icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4351">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4351">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_pixelmap_set(
    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4352">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4352">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4353">Este serviço define o mapa de pixels para o widget de ícone especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4353">This service sets the pixelmap for the specified icon widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4354">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4354">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4355">**ícone** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo widget de ícone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4355">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4356">**normal_id** ID de recursos do estado normal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4356">**normal_id** Normal state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4357">**selected_id** ID de recursos do estado selecionado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4357">**selected_id** Selected state Resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4358">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4358">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4359">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de pixels de ícone de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4359">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful icon pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4360">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4360">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4361">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4361">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4362">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4362">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4363">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4363">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4364">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4364">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap for “my_icon”. */
status = gx_icon_pixelmap_set(&my_icon,
    MY_NOT_SELECTED_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_SELECTED_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the icon “my_icon” has a pixelmap set. */
```

## <a name="gx_image_reader_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4369">gx_image_reader_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4369">gx_image_reader_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4370">Criar exemplo de módulo de leitor de imagem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4370">Create image reader module instance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4371">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4371">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_create(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader,
    GX_CONST GX_UBYTE *data, 
    INT data_size,
    GX_UBYTE color_format, 
    GX_UBYTE mode);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4372">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4372">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4373">Esta função cria um leitor de imagem/descodificador de imagem em bruto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4373">This function creates a runtime raw image reader / decoder.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4374">Atualmente apenas os tipos de imagem em bruto jpeg e png são suportados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4374">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4375">Este serviço requer GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT para ser definido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4375">This service requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4376">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4376">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4377">**image_reader** Bloco de controlo do leitor de imagem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4377">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4378">**dados** Ponteiro para dados de entrada bruta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4378">**data** Pointer to raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4379">**data_size** Tamanho dos dados brutos de entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4379">**data_size** Size of raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4380">**color_format** O formato de cor de saída solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4380">**color_format** The requested output color format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4381">**modo** Compress, dither e alfa modes bandeiras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4381">**mode** Compress, dither and alpha modes flags.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4382">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4382">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4383">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Leitor de imagem bem sucedido cria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4383">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image reader create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4384">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4384">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4385">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Tamanho dos dados inválidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4385">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid data size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4386">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4386">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4387">Inicialização e Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4387">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4388">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4388">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;

“color format” could be set to:
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_24RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_565RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_8BIT_PALETTE

/* Create image reader “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_create(&my_image_reader, decoder_data,
    decoder_data_size,
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB,
    GX_IMAGE_READER_MODE_COMPRESS)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_image_reader” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_image_reader_palette_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4392">gx_image_reader_palette_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4392">gx_image_reader_palette_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4393">Definir paleta de leitor de imagem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4393">Define image reader palette</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4394">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4394">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_palette_set(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader,
    GX_COLOR *pal,
    UINT palsize);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4395">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4395">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4396">Este serviço define paleta para o bloco de controlo do leitor de imagem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4396">This service sets palette for image reader control block.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4397">Este serviço requer GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT para ser definido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4397">This service requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4398">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4398">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4399">**image_reader** Bloco de controlo do leitor de imagem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4399">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4400">**amigo** Ponteiro para paleta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4400">**pal** Pointer to palette</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4401">**palesize** O tamanho da paleta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4401">**palsize** The size of the palette</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4402">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4402">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4403">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de paleta de leitor de imagem bem-sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4403">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image reader palette set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4404">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4404">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4405">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Tamanho da paleta inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4405">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid palette size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4406">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4406">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4407">Inicialização e Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4407">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4408">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4408">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set “my_palette” as the palette of “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_palette_set(&my_image_reader, my_palette,
    my_palette_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the palette of “my_image_reader” has been set to “my_palette”. */
```

## <a name="gx_image_reader_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4412">gx_image_reader_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4412">gx_image_reader_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4413">Inicie o processo de descompressão e conversão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4413">Start the decompress and conversion process</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4414">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4414">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_start(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *outmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4415">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4415">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4416">Este serviço descodifica uma imagem em bruto para um formato de cor especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4416">This service decodes a raw image to a specified color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4417">Atualmente apenas os tipos de imagem em bruto jpeg e png são suportados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4417">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4418">Isto requer que GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT sejam definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4418">This requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4419">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4419">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4420">**image_reader** Bloco de controlo do leitor de imagem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4420">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4421">**pixelmap** Pixelmap de saída</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4421">**pixelmap** Output pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4422">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4422">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4423">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Descodição de imagem bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4423">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image decoding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4424">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) O alocador de memória não está definido ou a atribuição de memória falhou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4424">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4425">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) O tipo de imagem de entrada ou o formato de cor de saída não são suportados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4425">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Input image type or output color format is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4428">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4428">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4429">Inicialização e Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4429">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4430">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4430">Example</span></span>


## <a name="gx_line_chart_axis_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4434">gx_line_chart_axis_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4434">gx_line_chart_axis_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4435">Desenhar gráfico de linha x,y eixo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4435">Draw line chart x,y axis</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4436">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4436">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_line_chart_axis_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4437">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4437">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4438">Este serviço desenha o eixo x,y de um gráfico de linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4438">This service draws the x,y axis of a line chart.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4439">As cores do eixo e os parâmetros de largura da linha são recuperados a partir da estrutura de informação do gráfico de linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4439">The axis colors and line width parameters are retrieved from the line chart information structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4440">Este serviço é normalmente chamado internamente pela função gx_line_chart_draw, mas está exposto à aplicação para ajudar a escrever funções de desenho personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4440">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4441">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4441">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4442">**gráfico** Bloco de controlo de gráficos de linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4442">**chart** Line chart control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4443">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4443">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4444">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4444">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4445">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4445">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4446">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4446">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4447">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4447">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Draw the data line */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4457">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4457">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4458">Este serviço cria uma janela de gráfico de linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4458">This service creates a line chart window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4459">Os parâmetros de desenho do gráfico e os dados do gráfico são transmitidos através da estrutura GX_LINE_CHART_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4459">The chart drawing parameters and chart data are passed in via the GX_LINE_CHART_INFO structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4460">GX_LINE_CHART baseia-se em GX_WINDOW e apoia todas as APIs GX_WINDOW.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4460">GX_LINE_CHART is based on GX_WINDOW, and supports all of the GX_WINDOW APIs.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4461">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4461">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4462">**gráfico** Ponteiro para o GX_LINE_CHART bloco de controlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4462">**chart** Pointer to the GX_LINE_CHART control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4463">**nome** Nome de gráfico de linha opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4463">**name** Optional line chart name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4464">**pai** Widget dos pais, ou GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4464">**parent** Parent widget, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4465">**informação** Estrutura definindo parâmetros de desenho de gráfico de linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4465">**info** Structure defining line chart drawing parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4466">**O apêndice I** contém definição para GX_LINE_CHART_INFO estrutura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4466">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_LINE_CHART_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4467">**estilo** Bandeiras de estilo Widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4467">**style** Widget style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4468">**chart_id** Valor de ID lógico gráfico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4468">**chart_id** Chart logical ID value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4469">**tamanho** Retângulo de encadernamento de janela de gráfico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4469">**size** Chart window bounding rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4470">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4470">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Gráfico de linha bem sucedido criar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful line chart create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4474">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4474">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4475">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4475">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4476">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4476">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4477">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4477">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4478">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4478">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create a line chart */
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
GX_RECTANGLE chart_size;
GX_LINE_CHART_INFO gx_chart_info;
GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window;

chart_size = root_window->gx_widget_size;

/* Initialize params for the GUIX base chart. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_min_val = DATA_MIN_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_val = DATA_MAX_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_data_count = MAX_DATA_COUNT;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_active_data_count = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_line_width = AXIS_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data_line_width = DATA_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data = chart_data;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_line_color = GX_COLOR_ID_DATA_LINE;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_color = GX_COLOR_ID_AXIS_LINE;

/* Leave room for labels on bottom and right. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_left_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_top_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_right_margin = 80;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_bottom_margin = 32;

status = gx_line_chart_create(&chart, “Line Chart”, root_window,
    &gx_chart_info, GX_STYLE_NONE, &chart_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “chart” has been successfully created. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4530">**data_count** Tamanho da matriz de dados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4530">**data_count** Size of the data array</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4534">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4534">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4543">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4543">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4544">Calcular o valor de escala do eixo de ponto fixo y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4544">Calculate fixed-point y axis scaling value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4545">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4545">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate(
    GX_LINE_CHART *chart,
    INT *return_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4546">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4546">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4547">Este serviço calcula o valor de escala de ponto fixo utilizado para traçar valores de dados no eixo Y do gráfico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4547">This service calculates the fixed-point scaling value used to plot data values on the chart Y axis.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4548">Os parâmetros chart_info e o retângulo de delimitação de gráficos são usados para calcular este valor de escala.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4548">The chart_info parameters and chart bounding rectangle are used to calculate this scaling value.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4550">**gráfico** Bloco de controlo de gráfico de linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4550">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4551">**return_val** Endereço de valor para manter o valor de retorno de ponto fixo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4551">**return_val** Address of value to hold fixed-point return value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4552">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4552">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4555">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4555">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_menu_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4563">gx_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4563">gx_menu_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4564">Criar um menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4564">Create a menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4565">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4565">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_create(
    GX_MENU *menu,GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_id, 
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT menu_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4566">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4566">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4567">Este serviço cria um menu conforme especificado e associa o menu ao widget dos pais fornecidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4567">This service creates a menu as specified and associates the menu with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4568">Aceita todos os tipos de widget como item do menu infantil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4568">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4569">Para inserir um widget como um item de menu infantil, ligue **para gx_menu_insert**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4569">To insert a widget as a child menu item, call **gx_menu_insert**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4570">GX_MENU é derivado de GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT e suporta todos os serviços gx_pixelmap_prompt API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4570">GX_MENU is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4571">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4571">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4572">**menu** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo do menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4572">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4573">**nome** Nome do menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4573">**name** Name of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4574">**pai** Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4574">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4575">**text_id** ID de recursos de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4575">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4576">**fill_id** ID de recursos de preenchimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4576">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4577">**estilo** Estilo do widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4577">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4578">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4578">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4579">**menu_id** ID definido pela aplicação do menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4579">**menu_id** Application-defined ID of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4580">**tamanho** Tamanho do menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4580">**size** Size of the menu</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4581">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4581">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4582">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Criação de menu bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4582">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful menu creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4583">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4583">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4584">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4584">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4585">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4585">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4586">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4586">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4587">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4587">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
GX_MENU my_menu;

/* Create “my_menu”. */
status = gx_menu_create(&my_menu, “my_menu”, parent, MY_TEXT_ID,
    MY_FILL_ID, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, MY_MENU_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the menu was successfully created. */
```


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4605">Este serviço desenha o menu especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4605">This service draws the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4606">Esta função é normalmente chamada internamente pelo mecanismo de atualização de lona GUIX, mas está exposta à aplicação para ajudar na implementação de funções de desenho personalizado para widgets de menu personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4606">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4628">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4628">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4629">Este serviço processa um evento para o menu especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4629">This service processes an event for the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4630">Este serviço deve ser chamado como o manipulador de eventos predefinido por quaisquer funções de processamento de eventos de menu personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4630">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom menu event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4631">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4631">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4633">**event_ptr** Ponteiro para o evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4633">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4635">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo de evento de menu bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4635">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful menu event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4636">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4636">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4637">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4637">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4638">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4638">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4639">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4639">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4640">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4640">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4641">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4641">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic menu event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_menu_event_process(GX_MENU *menu, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */

        /* Call default event process if this is a system event such as GX_EVENT_SHOW. */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default menu
           event processing */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}

```

## <a name="gx_menu_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4701">gx_menu_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4701">gx_menu_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4702">Desenhar texto do menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4702">Draw menu text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4703">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4703">Prototype</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4704">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4704">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4705">Este serviço desenha o texto de um menu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4705">This service draws the text of a menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4706">Esta função é normalmente chamada internamente pelo mecanismo de atualização de lona GUIX, mas está exposta à aplicação para ajudar na implementação de funções de desenho personalizado para widgets de menu personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4706">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4707">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4708">**menu** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo do menu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4708">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4709">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4709">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4710">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4710">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4711">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4711">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4712">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4712">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4713">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4713">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu background draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_background_draw(
                            (GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *)menu);

    /* Draw menu text. */
    gx_menu_text_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4752">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4752">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4753">Criar botão de texto de várias linhas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4753">Create multi line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4754">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4754">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4755">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4755">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4756">Este serviço cria um widget de botão de texto multi-linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4756">This service creates a multi-line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4757">Um botão de texto multi-linha exibe o texto do botão sobre linhas de 1-n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4757">A multi-line text button displays the button text over 1-n lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4758">O número máximo de linhas é definido pela GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES constante, que não chega a 4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4758">The maximum number of lines is defined by the constant GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES, which defaults to 4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4759">As quebras de linha são definidas por retorno de transporte e/ou retorno de transporte + pares de alimentação de linha dentro da cadeia de texto atribuída ao botão de texto multi-linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4759">The line breaks are set by carriage return and/or carriage return + line feed pairs within the text string assigned to the multi-line text button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4760">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON é derivado de GX_TEXT_BUTTON e suporta todos os gx_text_button serviços da API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4760">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON and supports all gx_text_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4761">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4761">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4762">**text_button** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4762">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4763">**nome** Nome lógico do botão de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4763">**name** Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4764">**pai** Ponteiro para o widget dos pais do botão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4764">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4765">**text_id** ID de recursos de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4765">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4766">**estilo** Estilo de botão de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4766">**style** Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4767">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4767">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4768">**text_button_id** ID definido pela aplicação do botão de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4768">**text_button_id** Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4769">**tamanho** Tamanho do botão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4769">**size** Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4770">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4770">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4771">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Botão de texto multi-linha bem sucedido criar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4771">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4772">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4772">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4773">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4773">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4774">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4774">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4775">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4775">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4776">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4776">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4777">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4777">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4778">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4778">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the multi-line text button “my_text_button” was created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4786">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4786">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4787">Desenhar botão de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4787">Draw multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4788">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4788">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4789">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4789">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4790">Este serviço desenha o botão de texto multi-linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4790">This service draws the multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4791">Esta função é normalmente chamada internamente pelo GUIX como parte de uma operação de atualização de tela, mas também exposta à aplicação que pode querer fornecer uma função de desenho personalizado e invocar o desenho de botão de texto multi-linha padrão como base de desenho personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4791">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default multi-line text button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4792">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4792">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4793">**botão** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4793">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4794">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4794">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4795">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4795">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4796">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4796">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4797">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4797">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4798">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4798">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw the text button “my_text_button”. */
void MyButtonDraw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(&my_text_button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4806">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4806">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4807">Tratamento de evento predefinido para botão de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4807">Default event handling for multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4808">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4808">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4809">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4809">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4810">Este serviço é a função de tratamento de eventos predefinido para o widget de botão de texto multi linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4810">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4811">Esta função é tornada acessível a aplicações que pretendam fornecer o manuseamento personalizado de eventos para um widget de botão de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4811">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a text button widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4812">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4812">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4813">**botão** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4813">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4814">**event_ptr** Evento a ser processado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4814">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4815">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4815">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4816">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) com sucesso do evento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4816">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4817">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4817">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4818">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4818">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4819">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4819">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4820">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4820">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4821">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4821">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        /* add custom actions here */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4829">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4829">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4830">Função de suporte de desenho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4830">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4831">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4831">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4832">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4832">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4833">Esta função de suporte desenha a parte de texto de um botão de texto multi-linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4833">This support function draws the text portion of a multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4834">Esta função é chamada internamente por gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(), e é fornecida como uma API separada como uma conveniência para aplicações que definem uma função de desenho de botão de texto multi-linha personalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4834">This function is called internally by gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom multi-line text button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4835">As aplicações que pretendem personalizar o desenho de fundo do botão podem fornecer a sua função de desenho personalizado e invocar o serviço de multi_line_text_button_text_draw como parte do seu desenho personalizado para desenhar o texto do botão sobre o fundo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4835">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the multi_line_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4836">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4836">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4837">**text_button** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4837">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4838">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4838">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4839">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4839">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4840">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4840">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4841">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4841">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4842">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4842">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* insert code here to draw button background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4853">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4853">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4854">Este serviço define o ID de recurso de cadeia especificado para o botão de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4854">This service sets the specified string resource ID to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4855">A cadeia pode conter caracteres newline que atuam para exibir o texto em várias linhas dentro da área do botão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4855">The string may contain newline characters which act to display the text on multiple lines within the button area.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4858">**string_id** ID de recurso da cadeia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4858">**string_id** Resource ID of the string</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4861">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4861">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4862">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4862">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4863">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4863">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string ID ”MY_STRING_ID” to the text button “my_text_button”. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4873">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4873">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4874">Atribuir texto ao botão de texto (precotado)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4874">Assign text to the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4875">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4875">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_button_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4876">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4876">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4877">Este serviço é precotado a favor de gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4877">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4878">Este serviço atribui a cadeia especificada ao botão de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4878">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4879">Se o widget text_button foi criado com GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY de estilo, o widget cria uma cópia privada da cadeia de texto atribuída, pelo que a API gx_system_memmory_allocate_set deve ser invocada uma vez antes deste serviço ser solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4879">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4880">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY não estiver ativa, o widget não faz uma cópia privada da cadeia de entrada, pelo que a cadeia deve ser atribuída estática ou globalmente, ou seja, pode não ser uma variável automática ou temporária.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4880">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4881">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4881">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4882">**text_button** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4882">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4883">ponteiro de **texto** para a cadeia terminada NU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4883">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4884">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4884">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4885">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir o texto com sucesso para o botão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4885">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4886">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4886">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4887">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4887">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4888">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Alocador de memória não está definido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4888">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4889">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Comprimento da corda inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4889">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4890">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4890">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4891">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4891">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4892">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4892">Example</span></span>

```C
static GX_CHAR text[] = “myrstring”;

/* Set text to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set(&my_text_button, text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text of “my_text_button” was set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4900">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4900">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4903">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4903">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4904">Este serviço atribui a cadeia especificada ao botão de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4904">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4905">Se o widget text_button foi criado com GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY de estilo, o widget cria uma cópia privada da cadeia de texto atribuída, pelo que a API gx_system_memmory_allocate_set deve ser invocada uma vez antes deste serviço ser solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4905">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4906">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY não estiver ativa, o widget não faz uma cópia privada da cadeia de entrada, pelo que a cadeia deve ser atribuída estática ou globalmente, ou seja, pode não ser uma variável automática ou temporária.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4906">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4907">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4907">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4908">**text_button** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4908">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4909">ponteiro **de cordas** para GX_STRING variável</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4909">**string** pointer to GX_STRING variable</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4910">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4910">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4911">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir o texto com sucesso para o botão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4911">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4912">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4912">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4913">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4913">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4914">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Alocador de memória não está definido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4914">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4915">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Comprimento da corda inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4915">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4916">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4916">Allowed From</span></span>
