### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4918">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4918">Example</span></span>

```C
static GX_CHAR text[] = “myrstring”;
GX_STRING string;

string.gx_string_ptr = text;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(text);

/* Set text to the text button “my_text_button”. */

```

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4925">Elimine um personagem antes da posição do cursor de entrada de texto de várias linhas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4925">Delete a character before multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4926">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4926">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_backspace(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4927">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4927">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4928">Este serviço elimina o carácter antes da posição do cursor de entrada de texto de várias linhas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4928">This service deletes the character before multi line text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4929">Este serviço é chamado internamente quando um evento de chave de backspace para baixo é recebido, mas também pode ser invocado pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4929">This service is called internally when a backspace key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4932">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4932">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4933">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Backspace de entrada de texto multi-linha bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4933">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input backspace</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4934">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4934">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4935">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4935">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-4937">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Fonte inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4937">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4938">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-4939">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4939">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Delete a character before the cursor of “my_text_input”. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-4974">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-4974">Prototype</span></span>


## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5017">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5017">gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5018">Recupera informações tampão do widget de entrada de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5018">Retrieves buffer information of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5019">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5019">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_buffer_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    GX_CHAR **buffer_address,
    UINT *content_size, 
    UINT *buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5020">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5020">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5021">Este serviço obtém informações tampão de um widget de entrada de texto de várias linhas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5021">This service retrieves buffer information of a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5065">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5065">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5066">Insira uma cadeia de caracteres na posição atual do cursor de entrada de texto multi linha (precotado)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5066">Insert a character string at current multi line text input cursor position (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5067">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5067">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5068">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5068">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5069">Esta API é depreciada e substituída por gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5069">This API is deprecated and replaced by gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5070">Este serviço insere uma cadeia de caracteres no tampão de cadeia de entrada de texto multi linha na posição atual do cursor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5070">This service inserts a character string into the multi line text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5071">Este serviço é chamado internamente quando o evento chave para baixo específico é recebido, mas também pode ser invocado pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5071">This service is called internally when specific key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5072">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5072">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5073">**text_input** Bloco de controlo widget de entrada de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5073">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5074">**insert_str** Cadeia de caracteres de formato UTF-8 a ser inserida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5074">**insert_str** UTF-8 format character string to be inserted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5075">**insert_size** Contagem de byte a ser inserida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5075">**insert_size** Byte count to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5076">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5076">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5077">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Inseriu com sucesso a cadeia de caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5077">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5078">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5078">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5079">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5079">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5080">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5080">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5081">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Tamanho da corda inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5081">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid string size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5082">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Fonte inválida ou fora do tamanho do tampão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5082">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or out of buffer size</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */
GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(&my_text_input,
    insert_text,
    GX_STRLEN(insert_text));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input widget has successfully insert the string. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5139">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5139">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5140">Criar entrada de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5140">Create multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5141">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5141">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    ULONG style, USHORT text_input_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5142">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5142">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5143">Este serviço cria um widget de entrada de texto multi-line.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5143">This service creates a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5144">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT é derivado de GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW e apoia todos os serviços gx_multi_line_text_view.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5144">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW and supports all gx_multi_line_text_view services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5145">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5145">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5146">**text_input** Bloco de controlo widget de entrada de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5146">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5147">**nome** Nome do widget de entrada de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5147">**name** Name of text input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5148">**pai** Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5148">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5149">**input_buffer** Ponteiro para tampão de entrada de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5149">**input_buffer** Pointer to text input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5150">**buffer_size** Tamanho do tampão de entrada de texto em bytes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5150">**buffer_size** Size of text input buffer in bytes</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5151">**estilo** Estilo de widget de entrada de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5151">**style** Style of text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5152">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5152">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5153">**text_input_id** ID definido pela aplicação da entrada de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5153">**text_input_id** Application-defined ID of text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5154">**tamanho** Dimensões do widget de entrada de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5154">**size** Dimensions of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5155">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5155">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5156">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entrada de texto multi-linha bem sucedida cria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5156">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5157">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5157">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5158">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5158">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5159">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5159">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5160">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget dos pais não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5160">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5161">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5161">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5162">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5162">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5163">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5163">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5164">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5164">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
GX_CHAR my_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 100, 200);

/* Create multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
    “my_text_input”, &my_parent,
    my_buffer, 100, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_INPUT_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input “my_text_input” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5196">gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5196">gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5197">Recupere a posição do cursor de entrada de texto de várias linhas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5197">Retrieve multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5198">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5198">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_POINT cursor_pos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5199">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5199">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5200">Este serviço recupera a posição do cursor de entrada de texto de linha de mult.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5200">This service retrieves the mult-line text input cursor position.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5201">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5201">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5202">**text_input** Bloco de controlo widget de entrada de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5202">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5203">**cursor_pos** Posição do cursor recuperado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5203">**cursor_pos** Retrieved cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5204">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5204">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5205">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) recuperou com sucesso a posição do cursor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5205">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved cursor position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5206">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5206">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5207">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5207">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5208">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5208">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5209">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5209">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5210">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5210">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve the cursor position of “my_text_input”. */
GX_POINT cursor_pos;
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_cursor_pos_get(&my_text_input,
    &cursor_pos);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor position has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5243">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5243">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5244">Elimine o carácter na posição do cursor de entrada de texto multi linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5244">Delete the character at the multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5245">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5245">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_delete(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5246">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5246">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5247">Este serviço elimina o carácter após a posição do cursor de entrada de texto multi linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5247">This service deletes the character after the multi line text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5248">Este serviço é chamado internamente quando um evento de eliminação de chave para baixo é recebido, mas também pode ser invocado pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5248">This service is called internally when a delete key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5249">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5249">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5250">**text_input** Bloco de controlo widget de entrada de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5250">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5251">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5251">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5252">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) elimine com sucesso um personagem após o cursor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5252">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully delete a character after the cursor</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5253">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5253">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5254">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5254">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5255">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5255">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5256">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Fonte inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5256">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5257">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5257">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5258">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5258">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5259">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5259">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Delete the character after the cursor of “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_delete(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the character after the cursor has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5291">gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5291">gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5292">Mova o cursor de entrada de texto de várias linhas para a linha seguinte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5292">Move the multi line text input cursor to the next line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5293">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5293">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5294">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5294">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5295">Este serviço posiciona o cursor de widget de entrada de texto multi linha para a linha seguinte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5295">This service positions the multi line text input widget cursor to the next line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5296">Este serviço é chamado internamente quando um evento de tecla de seta para baixo é recebido, mas também pode ser invocado pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5296">This service is called internally when a down arrow key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5297">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5297">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5298">**text_input** Bloco de controlo widget de entrada de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5298">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5299">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5299">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5300">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) moveu com sucesso o cursor de entrada de texto para a linha seguinte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5300">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved text input cursor to the next line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5301">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5301">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5302">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5302">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5303">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5303">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5304">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Fonte inválida ou altura da linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5304">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or line height</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5305">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5305">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5306">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5306">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5307">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5307">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move input cursor to the next line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, text text input cursor has been moved to the next line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_end"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5339">gx_multi_line_text_input_end</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5339">gx_multi_line_text_input_end</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5340">Mova o cursor de entrada de texto de várias linhas para o fim da linha atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5340">Move the multi line text input cursor to the end of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5341">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5341">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_end(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5342">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5342">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5343">Este serviço posiciona o cursor de widget de entrada de texto multi linha até ao fim da linha de corda atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5343">This service positions the multi line text input widget cursor to the end of the current string line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5344">Este serviço é chamado internamente quando um evento de chave final para baixo é recebido, mas também pode ser invocado pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5344">This service is called internally when an end key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5345">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5345">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5346">**text_input** Bloco de controlo widget de entrada de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5346">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5347">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5347">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5348">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) moveu com sucesso o cursor de entrada de texto para o fim da linha atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5348">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved text input cursor to end of the current line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5349">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5349">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5350">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5350">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5351">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5351">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5352">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5352">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5353">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5353">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5354">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5354">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move input cursor to the end of current line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_end(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the multi line text input cursor has been moved to the end of the current line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5386">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5386">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5387">Tratamento de eventos predefinidos para entrada de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5387">Default event handling for multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5388">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5388">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5389">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5389">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5390">Este serviço é a função de tratamento de eventos predefinido para o widget de entrada de texto de várias linhas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5390">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5391">Esta função é disponibilizada a aplicações que pretendam fornecer o manuseamento personalizado de eventos para um widget de entrada de texto de várias linhas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5391">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a multi line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5392">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5392">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5393">**botão** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de entrada de texto de várias linhas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5393">**button** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5394">**event_ptr** Evento a ser processado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5394">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5395">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5395">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5396">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) com sucesso do evento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5396">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5397">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5397">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5398">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5398">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5399">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget dos pais não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5399">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5400">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5400">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5401">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5401">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5402">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5402">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic multi line text
            input event processing */
        gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(input, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5434">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5434">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5435">Definir a cor de fundo de fundo de entrada de texto multi linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5435">Set multi line text input background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5436">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5436">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5437">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5437">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5438">Este serviço atribui cores de preenchimento para o widget de entrada de texto multi-linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5438">This service assigns fill colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5439">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5439">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5440">**text_input** Bloco de controlo widget de entrada de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5440">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5441">**normal_fill_color_id** ID de recurso da cor de preenchimento normal que foi usada em estado normal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5441">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal fill color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5442">**selected_fill_color_id** ID de recurso da cor de preenchimento selecionada que usou quando o widget ganha o foco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5442">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the selected fill color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5443">**disabled_fill_color_id** ID de recursos da cor de preenchimento desativado que foi usado quando GX_STYLE_ENABLED não está ativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5443">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled fill color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5444">**readonly_fill_color_id** ID de recurso da leitura apenas preencha a cor que é usada quando GX_STYLE_ENABLED e GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY estão ativas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5444">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the read only fill color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY are active.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5445">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5445">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5446">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir com sucesso cores para a entrada de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5446">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5447">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5447">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5448">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5448">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5449">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5449">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5450">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5450">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5451">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5451">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5483">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5483">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5484">Mova o cursor de entrada de texto para o início da linha atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5484">Move the text input cursor to the start of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5485">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5485">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_home(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5486">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5486">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5487">Este serviço move a posição do cursor de entrada de texto para o início da linha atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5487">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the current line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5488">Este serviço é chamado internamente quando um evento de home key down é recebido, mas também pode ser invocado pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5488">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5489">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5489">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5490">**text_input** Bloco de controlo widget de entrada de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5490">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5491">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5491">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5492">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) moveu com sucesso o cursor para o início da linha atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5492">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to start of the current line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5493">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5493">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5494">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5494">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5495">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5495">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5496">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5496">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5497">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5497">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5498">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5498">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor to the start of the current line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_home(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor has been moved to the start of the current line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5530">gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5530">gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5531">Mover cursor de entrada de texto multi linha um personagem para a esquerda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5531">Move multi line text input cursor one character to the left</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5532">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5532">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5533">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5533">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5534">Este serviço move o cursor de entrada de texto de várias linhas um caracter para a esquerda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5534">This service moves the multi line text input cursor one character to the left.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5535">Este serviço é chamado internamente quando um evento de chave esquerda para baixo é recebido, mas também pode ser invocado pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5535">This service is called internally when a left key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5536">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5536">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5537">**text_input** Bloco de controlo widget de entrada de texto de linha única</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5537">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5538">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5538">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5539">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) moveu com sucesso o cursor para a esquerda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5539">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the left</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5540">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5540">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5541">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5541">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5542">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5542">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5543">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Fonte inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5543">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5544">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5544">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Move the cursor one character to the left. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_left_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input cursor has been moved one character to the left. */

```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5625">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5625">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5626">Adicionar estilos de entrada de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5626">Add multi line text input styles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5627">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5627">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5628">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5628">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5629">Este serviço adiciona estilos a um widget de entrada de texto multi-line.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5629">This service adds styles to a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5630">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5630">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5631">**text_input** Bloco de controlo widget de entrada de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5631">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5632">**estilo** Estilos a adicionar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5632">**style** Styles to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5633">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5633">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5634">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5634">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5635">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Bem sucedido estilo de entrada de texto multi-linha adicionar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5635">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input style add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5636">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5636">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5637">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5637">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5638">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5638">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5639">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5639">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5640">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5640">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add style GX_STYTLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS to multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add(&my_text_input,
    GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the style GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS has been successfully added. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_style_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5672">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5672">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_remove</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5673">Remover estilos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5673">Remove styles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5674">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5674">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_remove(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5675">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5675">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5676">Este serviço remove os estilos especificados do widget de entrada de texto multi-line.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5676">This service removes the specified styles from the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5677">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5677">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5678">**text_input** Bloco de controlo widget de entrada de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5678">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5679">**estilo** Estilos para remover.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5679">**style** Styles to remove.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5680">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5680">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5682">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entrada de texto multi-linha bem sucedida cria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5682">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5683">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5683">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5684">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5684">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5685">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5685">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5686">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5686">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5687">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5687">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove style GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS from text input widget “my_text_input”. */

    GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the style GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS has been successfully removed. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5719">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5719">gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5720">Definir estilos de entrada de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5720">Set multi line text input styles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5721">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5721">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5722">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5722">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5723">Este serviço define os estilos para um widget de entrada de texto multi-line.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5723">This service sets styles for a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5724">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5724">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5725">**text_input** Bloco de controlo widget de entrada de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5725">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5726">**estilo** Estilos para definir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5726">**style** Styles to set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5727">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5727">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5728">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5728">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5729">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de estilo de entrada de texto multi-linha bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5729">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5730">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5730">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5731">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5731">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5732">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5733">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5733">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5734">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5734">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set style GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS for text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_style_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input style has been set */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5766">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5766">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5767">Definir a cor do texto de entrada de texto de texto de várias linhas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5767">Set multi line text input text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5768">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5768">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5769">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5769">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5770">Este serviço atribui cores de texto para o widget de entrada de texto multi-linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5770">This service assigns text colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5771">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5771">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5772">**text_input** Bloco de controlo widget de entrada de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5772">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5773">**normal_fill_color_id** ID de recurso da cor de texto normal que foi usado em estado normal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5773">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5774">**selected_text_color_id** ID de recurso da cor de texto selecionada que usou quando o widget ganha o foco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5774">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5775">**disabled_text_color_id** ID de recursos da cor de texto desativada que foi utilizada quando GX_STYLE_ENABLED não está ativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5775">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5776">**readonly_text_color_id** ID de recurso da cor de texto de leitura única que usada quando tanto GX_STYLE_ENABLED como GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY estão ativas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5776">**readonly_text_color_id** Resource ID of the read only text color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY are active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5777">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5777">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5778">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir com sucesso cores para a entrada de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5778">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5779">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5779">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5780">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5780">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5781">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5781">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5782">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5782">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5783">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5783">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill colors of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5815">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5815">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5816">Selecione texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5816">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5817">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5817">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5818">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5818">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5819">Este serviço seleciona o texto de entrada de texto de várias linhas com o índice de marca de início e de marca final especificado e destaca o texto selecionado com as cores de preenchimento e texto selecionados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5819">This service selects multi line text input text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5820">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5820">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5821">**text_input** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de entrada de texto de várias linhas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5821">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5822">**start_index** Índice do primeiro caráter selecionado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5822">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5823">**end_index** Índice do último caráter selecionado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5823">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5824">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5824">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5825">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Seleção de texto de entrada de texto multi-linha bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5825">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5826">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5826">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5827">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5827">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5828">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5828">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5829">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valor do índice não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5829">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Index value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5830">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5830">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5831">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5831">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5832">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5832">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select text between index [0, 9]. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(&my_text_input,
    0,9);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text between 
    index [0, 9] “my_text_input” was selected. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5864">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5864">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5865">Atribuir texto à entrada de texto (precotado)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5865">Assign text to the text input (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5866">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5866">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_input_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5867">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5867">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5868">Esta API é depreciada e substitua por gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5868">This API is deprecated and replace by gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5869">Este serviço atribui o fio especificado à entrada de texto de várias linhas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5869">This service assigns the specified string to the multi line text input.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5870">Se o tamanho do tampão de entrada do widget multi_line_text_input for menor do que o comprimento da corda, a corda será truncada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5870">If the multi_line_text_input widget’s input buffer size is smaller than string length, the string will be truncated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5871">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5871">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5872">**text_input** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de entrada de texto de várias linhas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5872">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5873">ponteiro de **texto** para a cadeia terminada NU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5873">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5874">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5874">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5875">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir o texto com sucesso para a entrada de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5875">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the multi line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5876">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5876">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5877">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5877">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5878">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Comprimento da corda inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5878">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5879">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5879">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5880">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5880">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5881">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5881">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string “my string” to the text button “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set(&my_text_input,
    “myrstring”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the content of “my_text_input” bas been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5884">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5884">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5885">Atribuir texto à entrada de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5885">Assign text to the text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5886">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5886">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_input_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5887">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5887">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5888">Este serviço atribui o fio especificado à entrada de texto de várias linhas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5888">This service assigns the specified string to the multi line text input.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5889">Se o tamanho do tampão de entrada do widget multi_line_text_input for menor do que o comprimento da corda, a corda será truncada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5889">If the multi_line_text_input widget’s input buffer size is smaller than string length, the string will be truncated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5890">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5890">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5891">**text_input** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de entrada de texto de várias linhas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5891">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5892">ponteiro **de cordas** para GX_STRING para atribuir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5892">**string** pointer to GX_STRING to assign</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5893">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5893">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5894">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir o texto com sucesso para a entrada de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5894">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the multi line text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5895">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5895">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5896">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5896">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5897">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Comprimento da corda inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5897">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5898">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5898">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5899">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5899">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5900">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5900">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string “my string” to the text button “my_text_input”. */
GX_STRING string;
string.gx_string_ptr = “myrstring”;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(string.gx_string_ptr);

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set_ext(&my_text_input,
    &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the content of “my_text_input” bas been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5932">gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5932">gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5933">Mova o cursor de entrada de texto de várias linhas para a linha anterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5933">Move multi line text input cursor to the previous line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5934">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5934">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5935">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5935">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5936">Este serviço move o cursor de entrada de texto de várias linhas para a linha de texto anterior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5936">This service moves the multi line text input cursor to the previous line of text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5937">Este serviço é chamado internamente quando um evento de tecla de seta para cima é recebido, mas também pode ser invocado pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5937">This service is called internally when an up arrow key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5938">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5938">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5939">**text_input** Bloco de controlo widget de entrada de texto de linha única</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5939">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5940">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5940">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5941">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) mudou com sucesso o cursor para a linha anterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5941">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the previous line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5942">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5942">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5943">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5943">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5944">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5944">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5945">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5945">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5946">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5946">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5947">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5947">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move the cursor to the previous line. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_up_arrow(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input cursor has been moved to the previous line. */

```
