## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5979">gx_multi_line_text_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5979">gx_multi_line_text_view_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5980">Criar vista de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5980">Create multi-line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5981">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5981">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WINDOW *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT text_view_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5982">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5982">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-5983">Este serviço cria um widget GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5983">This service creates a GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5984">Este tipo de widget é derivado de GX_WINDOW, e, portanto, todos os gx_window serviços de API também podem ser utilizados com este tipo de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5984">This widget type is derived from GX_WINDOW, and therefore all gx_window API services may also be utilized with this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5985">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5985">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5986">**text_view** Bloco de controlo widget de visualização de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5986">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5987">**nome** Nome do widget de visualização de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5987">**name** Name of the text view widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5988">**pai** Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5988">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5989">**text_id** ID de recurso da cadeia de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5989">**text_id** Resource ID of the text string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5990">**estilo** Estilo de widget de vista de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5990">**style** Style of text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5991">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5991">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5992">**text_view_id** ID definido pela aplicação da visão de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5992">**text_view_id** Application-defined ID of text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5993">**tamanho** Dimensões do widget de visualização de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5993">**size** Dimensions of text view widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-5994">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5994">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5995">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) criou com sucesso widget de visualização de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5995">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created multi-line text view widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5996">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5996">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5997">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5997">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5998">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5998">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-5999">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-5999">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6000">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6000">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_create(&my_text_view,
    “my_text_view”, &my_parent,

    MY_TEXT_VIEW_ID, &size);

```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6034">gx_multi_line_text_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6034">gx_multi_line_text_view_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6035">Desenhe um widget de visualização de texto de várias linhas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6035">Draw a multi line text view widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6036">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6036">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_view_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW * text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6037">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6037">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6038">Este serviço desenha um widget de visualização de texto de várias linhas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6038">This service draws a multi line text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6039">Este serviço é normalmente chamado internamente durante a atualização de tela, mas também pode ser chamado de funções de desenho de visão de texto multi-linha personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6039">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom multi line text view drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6040">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6040">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6041">**text_view** Bloco de controlo widget de visualização de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6041">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6042">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6042">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6043">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6043">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6044">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6044">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6045">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6045">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6046">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6046">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom multi line text view drawing function. */

VOID my_multi_line_text_view_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *view)
{
    /* Call default multi line text view draw. */
    gx_multi_line_text_view_draw(view);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6078">gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6078">gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6079">Evento de visualização de texto multi-linha de processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6079">Process multi-line text view event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6080">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6080">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6081">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6081">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6082">Este serviço processa um evento para um widget de visualização de texto multi-line.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6082">This service processes an event for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6083">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6083">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6084">**text_view** Bloco de controlo widget de visualização de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6084">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6085">**evento** Ponteiro para o evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6085">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6086">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6086">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6087">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo de evento de visualização de texto multi-linha bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6087">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text view event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6088">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6088">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6089">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6089">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6090">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6090">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6091">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6091">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6092">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6092">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6093">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6093">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event handler. */
UINT my_event_handler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *view, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(view, event_ptr);
        /* Add custom actions here. */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process (view, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6125">gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6125">gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6126">Definir fonte usada na vista de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6126">Set font used in multi-line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6127">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6127">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6128">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6128">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6129">Este serviço define a fonte de um widget de visualização de texto multi-linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6129">This service sets the font of a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6130">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6130">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6131">**text_view** Bloco de controlo widget de visualização de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6131">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6132">**font_id** ID de recurso para o tipo de letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6132">**font_id** Resource ID for the font</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6133">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6133">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6134">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Definir com sucesso a fonte para a vista de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6134">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set font for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6135">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6135">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6136">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6136">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6137">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6137">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6138">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6138">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6139">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6139">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set font ID FONT_ID to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_font_set(&my_text_view, FONT_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text view “my_text_view” will use the specified font to display its text. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6171">gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6171">gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6172">Definir espaço de linha de vista de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6172">Set multi-line text view line space</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6173">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6173">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_BYTE line_space);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6174">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6174">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6175">Este serviço define o espaçamento entre linhas de texto para o widget de visualização de texto multi-linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6175">This service sets the spacing between lines of text for the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6176">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6176">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6177">**ver** Bloco de controlo widget de visualização de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6177">**view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6178">**line_space** Valor a definir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6178">**line_space** Value to set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6179">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6179">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6180">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir com sucesso o valor do espaço da linha para a vista de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6180">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set line space value for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6181">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6181">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6182">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6182">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6183">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6183">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6184">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6184">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Set line space of “my_text_view” to 2. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set(&my_text_view, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the line space of “my_text_view” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6216">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6216">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6217">Obtenha informações de pergaminho de visão de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6217">Get multi-line text view scroll info</span></span>


### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6218">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6218">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6219">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6219">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6220">Este serviço obtém a informação de visualização de texto multi-linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6220">This service gets the multi-line text view scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6221">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6221">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6222">**text_view** Bloco de controlo widget de visualização de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6222">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6223">**Estilo** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL ou GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6223">**Style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6224">**Informação** Ponteiro para destino para informações de pergaminho.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6224">**Info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6225">**O apêndice I** contém definição para GX_SCROLL_INFO estrutura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6225">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6226">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6226">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6227">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) recuperou com sucesso a informação do pergaminho da vista de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6227">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved text view scroll info</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6228">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget não é visível ou o id de fonte de vista de texto não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6228">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget is not visible or text view font id is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6229">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6229">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6230">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6230">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6231">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6231">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6232">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6232">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_INFO scroll_info;

/* Get scroll information for multi-line text view “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(&my_text_view,
    &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for multi-line text view “my_text_view”. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6264">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6264">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6265">Desafase a cor do texto para a vista de texto multi linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6265">Set the text color for the multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6266">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6266">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCe_ID disabled_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6267">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6268">Este serviço atribui a cor de texto ao widget de visualização de texto multi-linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6268">This service assigns text color to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6269">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6269">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6270">**text_view** Bloco de controlo widget de visualização de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6270">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6271">**normal_text_color_id** ID de recurso da cor de texto normal que foi usado em estado normal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6271">**normal_text_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6272">**selected_text_color_id** ID de recurso da cor de texto selecionada que usou quando o widget ganha o foco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6272">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6273">**disabled_text_color_id** ID de recursos da cor de texto desativada que usou GX_STYLE_ENABLED não está ativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6273">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6274">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6274">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6275">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir com sucesso cores para a vista de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6275">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6276">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6276">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6277">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6277">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6278">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6278">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6279">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6279">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6280">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6280">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set(&my_text_view,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6312">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6312">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6313">Definir cadeia de texto do sistema na vista de texto de várias linhas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6313">Set system text string in multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6314">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6314">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6315">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6315">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6316">Este serviço define o ID de recurso de uma cadeia para o widget de visualização de texto multi-line.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6316">This service sets the resource ID of a string to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6317">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6317">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6318">**text_view** Bloco de controlo widget de visualização de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6318">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6319">**text_id** ID de recurso para a cadeia de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6319">**text_id** Resource ID for the text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6320">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6320">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6321">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Definir com sucesso o id de corda para a vista de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6321">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set string id for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6322">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6322">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6323">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6323">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6324">**ID** de recursos inválidos de GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6324">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6325">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6325">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6326">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6326">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6327">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6327">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set string ID STRING_ID to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(&my_text_view, STRING_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text id of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6359">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6359">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6360">Definir a cadeia definida pelo utilizador na vista de texto de várias linhas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6360">Set user-defined string in multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6361">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6361">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6362">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6362">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6363">Este serviço atribui uma cadeia de texto ao widget de visualização de texto multi-linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6363">This service assigns a text string to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6364">Se o widget text_view foi criado com GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY de estilo, o widget cria uma cópia privada da cadeia de texto atribuída, pelo que a API gx_system_memory_allocate_set deve ser invocada uma vez antes deste serviço ser solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6364">If the text_view widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6365">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY não estiver ativa, o widget não faz uma cópia privada da cadeia de entrada, pelo que a cadeia atribuída deve ser estática ou globalmente atribuída, ou seja, pode não ser uma variável automática ou temporária.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6365">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the assigned string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6366">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6366">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6367">**text_view** Bloco de controlo widget de visualização de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6367">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6368">**texto** Cadeia de texto terminada nulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6368">**text** NULL-terminated text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6369">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6369">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6370">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Definir com sucesso a cadeia para a vista de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6370">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set string for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6371">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) O alocador de memória não está definido ou a atribuição de memória falhou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6371">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6372">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6372">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6373">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6373">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6374">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6374">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6375">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6375">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6376">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6376">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set string “my string” to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set(&my_text_view, “my string”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6408">gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6408">gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6409">Definir visão de texto multi-linhas espaço em branco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6409">Set multi-line text view whitespace</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6410">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6410">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_UBYTE whitespace);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6411">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6411">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6412">Este serviço define o espaçamento entre os contornos do widget e a área do cliente para um widget de visualização de texto multi-line.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6412">This service sets spacing between widget outlines and client area for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6413">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6413">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6414">**text_view** Bloco de controlo widget de visualização de texto multi-line</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6414">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6415">**espaço branco** Largura de margem entre text_view widget e o texto apresentado, em pixels.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6415">**whitespace** Width of margin between text_view widget and the displayed text, in pixels.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6416">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6416">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir com sucesso o espaço em branco para a vista de texto multi-linha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set whitespace for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6419">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6419">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6420">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6420">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6421">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6421">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6422">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6422">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set whitespace of “my_text_view” to 2. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set(&my_text_view, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the whitespace of “my_text_view” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6454">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6454">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6455">Criar pedido de pixelmap numérico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6455">Create numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6456">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6456">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create(
    GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_id,
    ULONG style, USHORT pixelmap_prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6457">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6457">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6458">Este serviço cria um widget de pixelmap numérico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6458">This service creates a numeric pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6459">Um numeric_pixelmap_prompt é apenas um pixelmap_prompt que mantém o seu próprio tampão e fornece uma API gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_value_set(INT), o tamanho do tampão é definido pelo GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE constante, que não chega a 16.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6459">A numeric_pixelmap_prompt is just a pixelmap_prompt that keeps its own buffer and provides a gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_value_set(INT) API, the buffer size is defined by the constant GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, which defaults to 16.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6460">GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT é derivado de GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT e suporta todos os gx_pixelmap_prompt serviços da API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6460">GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6461">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6461">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6462">**rápido** Bloco de controlo de solicitação de pixelmap numérico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6462">**prompt** Numeric pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6463">**nome** Nome da solicitação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6463">**name** Name of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6464">**pai** Bloco de controlo widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6464">**parent** Parent widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6465">**text_id** Id de cadeia de recursos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6465">**text_id** Resource string id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6466">**fill_id** Pixelmap id para área de enchimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6466">**fill_id** Pixelmap id for fill area</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6467">**estilo** Estilo de pixelmap numérico, **o apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6467">**style** Style of numeric pixelmap prompt, **Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6468">**pixelmap_prompt_id** ID definido pela aplicação de solicitação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6468">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Application-defined ID of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6469">**tamanho** Dimensões do pedido de pixelmap numérico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6469">**size** Dimensions of numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6470">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6470">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Crie com sucesso uma pixlemap numérica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6471">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully create numeric pixlemap prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6473">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6474">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6474">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6475">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6475">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6476">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6476">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6477">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6477">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6478">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6478">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_numeric_pix_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create(&my_numeric_pix_prompt,
    “my_numeric_pix_prompt”, &my_parent,
    MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, MY_FEEL_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the numeric pixelmap prompt “my_numeric_pix_prompt” has been created. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6483">Função de formato de substituição do pixelmap numérico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6483">Override format function of numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6485">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6485">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6486">Este serviço substitui a função de formato predefinido do widget de pixlemap numérico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6486">This service overrides the default format function of the numeric pixlemap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6487">A função de formato predefinido converte o valor de pedido de pixelmap numérico para uma cadeia e armazena-o no tampão privado do widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6487">The default format function converts the numeric pixelmap prompt value to a string and stores it in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6488">Este serviço permite que a aplicação defina a sua própria função de formato e armazene o valor de solicitação numérica do pixelmap no tampão privado do widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6488">This service allows the application to define its own format function to format and store the numeric pixelmap prompt value in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6489">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6489">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6490">**rápido** Bloco de controlo de solicitação de pixelmap numérico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6490">**prompt** Numeric pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6491">**format_func** Função de formato a definir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6491">**format_func** Format function to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6492">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6492">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6494">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6494">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6496">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6496">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6497">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6497">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define my numeric pixelmap format function. */
VOID my_format_function(GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    INT value)
{
    /* If the value is “1234”, the new format will be “12.34”. */

    INT length;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value / 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_ BUFFER_SIZE);
    Length = GX_STRLEN(prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer);
    prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer[length++] = ‘.’;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value % 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer + length,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE - length);
}

/* Override default format function of “my_numeric_pix_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set(
    &my_numeric_pix_prompt,
    my_format_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the format function of “my_numeric_pix_prompt” has been override. */
```

```C
    GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6522">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6522">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6523">Este serviço cria um widget numérico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6523">This service creates a numeric prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6524">Um numeric_ é apenas uma solicitação que mantém o seu próprio tampão e fornece uma API gx_numeric_ prompt_value_set(INT), o tamanho do tampão é definido pela GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE constante, que não chega a 16.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6524">A numeric_ prompt is just a prompt that keeps its own buffer and provides a gx_numeric_ prompt_value_set(INT) API, the buffer size is defined by the constant GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, which defaults to 16.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6525">GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT é derivado de GX_PROMPT e suporta todos os gx_prompt serviços da API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6525">GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT is derived from GX_PROMPT and supports all gx_prompt API services.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6530">**text_id** Id de cadeia de recursos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6530">**text_id** Resource string id</span></span>

```C
/* Define my numeric format function. */
VOID my_format_function(GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *prompt, INT value)
{
    /* If the value is “1234”, the new format will be “12.34”. */

    INT length;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value / 100, prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_ BUFFER_SIZE);
    Length = GX_STRLEN(prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer);
    prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer[length++] = ‘.’;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value % 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer + length,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE - length);
}

/* Override the default format function of “my_numeric_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set(&my_numeric_prompt,
    my_format_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the format function of “my_numeric_prompt” has been override. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6583">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6583">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6584">Criar roda de pergaminho numérico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6584">Create numeric scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6585">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6585">Prototype</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6586">UINT gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create, GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL \*roda, GX_CONST GX_CHAR \*nome, GX_WIDGET \*pai, INT start_val, INT end_val, estilo ULONG, USHORT wheel_id, GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE \*tamanho);</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6586">UINT gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create( GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL \*wheel, GX_CONST GX_CHAR \*name, GX_WIDGET \*parent, INT start_val, INT end_val, ULONG style, USHORT wheel_id, GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE \*size);</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6587">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6587">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6588">Este serviço cria um widget de roda de deslocal numérico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6588">This service creates a numeric scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6589">Uma roda de deslocamento numérico é um tipo de widget de roda de deslocamento que é especificamente utilizado para exibir uma gama de números.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6589">A numeric scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is specifically used for displaying a range of numbers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6590">Outros tipos de widgets de roda de deslocação também estão disponíveis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6590">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6591">Consulte a API gx_scroll_wheel_create para obter mais informações sobre a hierarquia do widget da roda de deslocação, os tipos de widgets e a derivação do widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6591">Refer to the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API for more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6592">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL é derivado de GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL e apoia todos os serviços gx_text_scroll_wheel e gx_scroll_wheel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6592">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL and supports all gx_text_scroll_wheel and gx_scroll_wheel services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6593">Todos os tipos de rodas de deslocação geram eventos GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT para os seus pais quando a roda de deslocação é deslocalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6593">All scroll wheel types generate GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT events to their parent when the scroll wheel is scrolled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6594">Uma roda de deslocação numérica não terá abdominais (end_val – start_val) + 1 linhas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6594">A numeric scroll wheel will default to having abs(end_val – start_val) + 1 rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6595">Por outras palavras, a roda de deslocação mostrará todos os valores entre start_val e end_val, incrementando ou diminuindo por 1 a cada linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6595">In other words, the scroll wheel will display every value between start_val and end_val, incrementing or decrementing by 1 with each row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6596">Note que start_val pode ser maior ou inferior a end_val, dependendo da forma como a aplicação quer que o intervalo apareça.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6596">Note that start_val can be greater or less than end_val, depending on which way the application wants the range to appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6597">Se a aplicação quiser alterar o incremento da linha, pode fazê-lo chamando gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() depois de criar a roda de deslocamento numérico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6597">If the application wants to change the row increment, it can do this by calling gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() after creating the numeric scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6598">Por exemplo, uma aplicação que pretenda criar uma roda de deslocação que apresente os valores anos 1980-2020, incrementando por 5, pode fazê-lo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6598">For example, an application wanting to create a scroll wheel that displays the values years 1980 to 2020, incrementing by 5, might do this:</span></span>

```C
gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, GX_NULL, parent, 1980,
    2020, style, id, &size);

/* the years 1980 through 2020, inclusive, incrementing by 5 years,
yields 9 total rows */

gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(&wheel, 9);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6600">**roda** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo da roda de deslocação numérica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6600">**wheel** Pointer to numeric scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6601">**nome** Nome lógico do widget do botão pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6601">**name** Logical name of pixelmap button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6602">**pai** Ponteiro para o widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6602">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6603">**start_val** Valor numérico inicial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6603">**start_val** Starting numeric value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6604">**end_val** Fim do valor numérico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6604">**end_val** Ending numeric value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6605">**estilo** Estilo de caixa de verificação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6605">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6606">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6606">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6607">**wheel_id** ID definido pela aplicação da roda de pergaminho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6607">**wheel_id** Application-defined ID of scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6608">**tamanho** Dimensões do widget da roda de pergaminho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6608">**size** Dimensions of scroll wheel widget</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) criou com sucesso uma roda de pergaminho numérico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created numeric scroll wheel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6612">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6612">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6614">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6614">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6617">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6617">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “year_wheel”. */
status = gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create(&year_wheel,
    “year_selector””, &parent,
    1980, 2040,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER |
    GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT | GX_STYLE_WRAP |
    GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND,
    YEAR_WHEEL_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel “year_wheel” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6635">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6635">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6636">Atribua gama de valor da roda de pergaminho numérico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6636">Assign value range of numeric scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6637">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6637">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT
gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT start_val, INT end_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6638">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6638">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6639">Este serviço modifica a gama de valores permitidos e exibidos por um widget de roda de deslocação numérica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6639">This service modifies the range of values allowed and displayed by a numeric scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6640">Uma roda de deslocamento numérico é um tipo de widget de roda de deslocamento que é especificamente utilizado para exibir uma gama de números.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6640">A numeric scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is specifically used for displaying a range of numbers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6641">Outros tipos de widgets de roda de deslocação também estão disponíveis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6641">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6642">Consulte a API gx_scroll_wheel_create para obter mais informações sobre a hierarquia do widget da roda de deslocação, os tipos de widgets e a derivação do widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6642">Refer to the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API for more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6643">Invocando esta API, a roda de deslocação volta a abdómen (end_val – start_val) + 1, o que significa que a roda de deslocação irá aumentar em 1 para cada linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6643">Invoking this API resets the scroll wheel total rows to abs(end_val – start_val) + 1, meaning the scroll wheel will increment by 1 for each row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6644">Para alterar isto, a aplicação pode chamar gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() para alterar o número total de linhas, alterando efetivamente o incremento de valor entre linhas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6644">To change this, the application can call gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() to change the total number of row, effectively changing the value increment between rows.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6645">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6645">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6646">**roda** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo da roda de deslocação numérica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6646">**wheel** Pointer to numeric scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6647">**start_val** Valor numérico inicial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6647">**start_val** Starting numeric value</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6648">**end_val** Fim do valor numérico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6648">**end_val** Ending numeric value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6649">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6649">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6650">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir com sucesso a gama de rodas de deslocal numérico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6650">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric scroll wheel range</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6651">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6651">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6652">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6652">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6653">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6653">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6654">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6654">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
status = gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set(&year_wheel, 0, 200);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel range has been modified. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6674">gx_pixelmap_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6674">gx_pixelmap_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6675">Criar botão pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6675">Create pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6676">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6676">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6677">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6677">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6678">Este serviço cria um widget de botão pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6678">This service creates a pixelmap button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6679">GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON é derivado de GX_BUTTON e apoia todos os serviços gx_button.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6679">GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6680">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6680">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6681">**botão** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6681">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6682">**nome** Nome lógico do widget do botão pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6682">**name** Logical name of pixelmap button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6683">**pai** Ponteiro para o widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6683">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6684">**normal_id** ID de recursos do estado normal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6684">**normal_id** Normal state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6685">**selected_id** ID de recursos do estado selecionado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6685">**selected_id** Selected state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6686">**disabled_id** ID de recursos do estado desativado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6686">**disabled_id** Disabled state Resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6687">**estilo** Estilo de caixa de verificação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6687">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6688">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6688">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6689">**pixelmap_button_id** ID definido pela aplicação do botão pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6689">**pixelmap_button_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6690">**tamanho** Dimensões do botão pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6690">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6691">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6691">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6692">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) criou com sucesso o botão pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6692">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created pixelmap button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6693">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6693">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6694">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6694">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6695">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6695">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6696">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6696">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6699">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6699">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_button_create(&my_pixelmap_button,
    “my_pixelmap_button”, &my_parent,
    MY_NORMAL_RESOURCE_ID, MY_SELECTED_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_DESELECTED_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_PIXELMAP_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap button “my_pixelmap_button” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6721">gx_pixelmap_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6721">gx_pixelmap_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6722">Desenhe o botão pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6722">Draw pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6723">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6723">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6724">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6724">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6725">Este serviço desenha um widget de botão pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6725">This service draws a pixelmap button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6726">Esta função é normalmente chamada internamente pelo mecanismo de atualização de lona GUIX, mas está exposta à aplicação para ajudar na implementação de funções de desenho personalizado para widgets de botões pixelmap personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6726">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap button widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6727">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6727">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6728">**botão** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6728">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6729">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6729">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6730">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6730">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6731">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6731">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6732">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6732">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6733">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6733">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap button drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap button draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_button_draw(button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6791">gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6791">gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6792">Atribuir pixelmaps ao botão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6792">Assign pixelmaps to button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6793">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6793">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6794">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6794">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6795">Este serviço define pixelmaps para o botão pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6795">This service sets pixelmaps to the pixelmap button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6796">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6796">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6797">**botão** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6797">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6798">**normal_id** ID de recursos do pixelmap para ser usado como estado normal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6798">**normal_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6799">**selected_id** ID de recursos do pixelmap a ser usado quando o botão é selecionado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6799">**selected_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used when the button is selected</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6800">**disabled_id** ID de recursos do pixelmap a ser usado quando o botão é desativado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6800">**disabled_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used when the button is disabled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6801">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6801">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6802">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) O sucesso define o pixelmap para o botão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6802">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6803">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6803">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6804">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6804">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6805">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6805">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6806">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6806">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6807">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6807">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set (&my_pixelmap_button,
    NORMAL_ID, SELECTED_ID,
    DISABLED_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap button is properly configured with the specified pixelmaps. */
```
