## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6829">gx_pixelmap_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6829">gx_pixelmap_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6830">Criar pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6830">Create pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6831">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6831">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_prompt_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_pixelmap_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6832">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6832">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6833">Este serviço cria um widget de solicitação pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6833">This service creates a pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6834">Uma solicitação de pixelmap difere de um GX_PROMPT padrão na medida em que pinta o fundo da solicitação usando pixelmaps.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6834">A pixelmap prompt differs from a standard GX_PROMPT in that it paints the background of the prompt using pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6835">A função de criação aceita um id pixelmap, o mapa de pixels de preenchimento de estado normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6835">The create function accepts one pixelmap id, the normal state fill pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6836">Até seis pixelmaps podem ser atribuídos à solicitação pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6836">Up to six pixelmaps may be assigned to the pixelmap prompt.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6837">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6838">**rápido** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de solicitação pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6838">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6839">**nome** Nome lógico do widget de solicitação pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6839">**name** Logical name of pixelmap prompt widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6840">**pai** Ponteiro para o widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6840">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6841">**text_id** ID de recursos de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6841">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6842">**fill_id** ID de recursos de preenchimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6842">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6843">**estilo** Estilo de caixa de verificação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6843">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6844">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6844">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6845">**pixelmap_prompt_id** ID definido pela aplicação do pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6845">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6846">**tamanho** Dimensões do pixelmap prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6846">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6847">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6847">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Criação de pedido de pixelmap bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6849">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6850">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6850">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6851">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6851">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6852">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6852">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6853">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6853">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6854">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6854">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6855">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6855">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_pixelmap_prompt”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_prompt_create(&my_pixelmap_prompt,
    “my_pixelmap_prompt”, &my_parent,
    MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, MY_LEFT_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_FILL_RESOURCE_ID, MY_RIGHT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_PIXELMAP_PROMPT_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap prompt “my_pixelmap_prompt” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6871">gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6871">gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6872">Desenhe o pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6872">Draw pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6873">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6873">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6874">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6874">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6875">Este serviço desenha um widget de solicitação pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6875">This service draws a pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6876">Esta função é normalmente chamada internamente pelo mecanismo de atualização de lona GUIX, mas está exposta à aplicação para ajudar na implementação de funções de desenho personalizado para widgets de pixelmap personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6876">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap prompt widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6877">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6877">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6878">**rápido** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de solicitação pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6878">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6899">gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6899">gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6900">Atribuir pixelmaps para solicitar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6900">Assign pixelmaps to prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6901">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6901">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_left_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_right_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_left_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_right_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6902">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6903">Este serviço atribui ids pixelmap à solicitação pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6903">This service assigns pixelmap ids to the pixelmap prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6904">Os ids pixelmap esquerdo, preenchido e direito são usados para permitir que a aplicação use um conjunto de pixelmaps para solicitações de várias larguras, mas uma altura comum para economizar nos requisitos de armazenamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6904">The left, fill, and right pixelmap ids are used to allow the application to use one set of pixelmaps for prompts of various widths but a common height to save on storage requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6905">Se os IDs esquerdo e direito não forem utilizados, devem ser definidos para 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6905">If the left and right IDs are not used, they should be set to 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6906">Se a solicitação se desenergem de forma diferente quando ganha o foco de entrada, os ids pixelmap selecionados são utilizados para o efeito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6906">If the prompt should draw itself differently when it gains input focus, the selected pixelmap ids are used for that purpose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6907">Se os ids selecionados não forem utilizados ou forem os mesmos que os ids normais, desa coloca-os em 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6907">If the selected ids are not used or are the same as the normal ids, set them to 0.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6908">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6908">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6909">**rápido** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de solicitação pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6909">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6910">**normal_left_id** ID de recursos do pixelmap a ser usado no lado esquerdo no estado normal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6910">**normal_left_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the left side in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6911">**normal_fill_id** ID de recursos do mapa de pixels para ser usado como um enchimento de azulejos no estado normal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6911">**normal_fill_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as a tiled fill in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6912">**normal_right_id** ID de recursos do pixelmap a ser usado no lado direito no estado normal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6912">**normal_right_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the right side in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6913">**selected_left_id** ID de recursos do pixelmap a ser usado no lado esquerdo no estado selecionado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6913">**selected_left_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the left side in the selected state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6914">**selected_fill_id** ID de recursos do pixelmap para ser usado como um preenchimento de azulejos no estado selecionado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6914">**selected_fill_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as a tiled fill in the selected state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6915">**selected_right_id** ID de recursos do pixelmap a ser usado no lado direito no estado selecionado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6915">**selected_right_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the right side in the selected state</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6916">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6916">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6917">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) O sucesso define o pixelmap ao pedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6917">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6918">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6918">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6919">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6919">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6920">**ID** de recursos GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID (0x33) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6920">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Resource ID not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6921">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6921">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6922">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6922">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6923">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6923">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign pixelmap IDs to “my_prompt”. Only the normal state pixelmaps are used in this case */
status = gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set (&my_prompt,
    normal_left_id, normal_fill_id,
    normal_right_id, 0, 0, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap prompt is properly configured with pixelmaps. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6945">gx_pixelmap_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6945">gx_pixelmap_slider_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6946">Criar slider de mapas de pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6946">Create pixelmap slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6947">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6947">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO *pixelmap_info, ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_slider_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6948">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6948">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6949">Este serviço cria um widget de slider pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6949">This service creates a pixelmap slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6950">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6950">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6951">**slider** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo do slider pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6951">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6952">**nome** Nome lógico do widget de slider pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6952">**name** Logical name of pixelmap slider widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6953">**pai** Ponteiro para o widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6953">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6954">**informação** Ponteiro para uma estrutura GX_SLIDER_INFO que contenha valores que definam o valor mínimo do deslizador, o valor máximo, o valor atual e os limites da agulha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6954">**info** Pointer to a GX_SLIDER_INFO structure which contains values defining the slider minimum value, maximum value, current value, and needle limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6955">**O apêndice I** contém definição para GX_SLIDER_INFO estrutura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6955">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6956">**pixelmap_info** Ponteiro para uma estrutura GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO que define as pixelmaps utilizadas para desenhar o fundo e a agulha deslizantes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6956">**pixelmap_info** Pointer to a GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure which defines the pixelmaps used to draw the slider background and needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6957">**O apêndice I** contém definição para GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO estrutura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6957">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6958">O fundo do slider pode usar uma ou duas pixelmaps.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6958">The slider background can use one or two pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6959">Se um, o fundo não muda à medida que a agulha se move.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6959">If one, the background does not change as the needle moves.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6960">Se forem definidos dois fundos, o fundo antes da agulha usa o primeiro mapa de pixels de fundo, e o fundo após a agulha usa o segundo pixelmap de fundo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6960">If two backgrounds are defined, the background before the needle uses the first background pixelmap, and the background after the needle uses the second background pixelmap.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6961">**estilo** Estilo de slider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6961">**style** Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6962">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6962">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6963">**pixelmap_slider_id** ID definido pela aplicação do slider pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6963">**pixelmap_slider_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6964">**tamanho** Dimensões do pixelmap prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6964">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6965">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6965">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6966">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) criou com sucesso o slider pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6966">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created pixelmap slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6967">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6967">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6968">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6968">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6969">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6969">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6970">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6970">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6971">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6971">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6972">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6972">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6973">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6973">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO pixelmap_info;

/* Initiate slider information structure. */
info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_max_tralvel = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset;

/* Initiate pixelmap slider information structure. */
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_lower_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ORANGE;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_upper_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_EMPTY;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_needle_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_pixelmap_slider”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_slider_create(&my_pixelmap_slider,
                            “my_pixelmap_slider”, &my_parent,
                            &info, &pixelmap_info,
                            GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                            MY_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap slider “my_pixelmap_slider” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6993">gx_pixelmap_slider_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6993">gx_pixelmap_slider_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6994">Desenhe o slider do pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6994">Draw pixelmap slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6995">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6995">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_slider_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6996">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6996">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-6997">Este serviço desenha um widget de slider pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6997">This service draws a pixelmap slider widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-6998">Esta função é normalmente chamada internamente pelo mecanismo de atualização de lona GUIX, mas está exposta à aplicação para ajudar na implementação de funções de desenho personalizado para widgets de slider de pixelmap personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6998">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap slider widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-6999">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-6999">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7000">**slider** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo do slider pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7000">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7001">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7001">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7002">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7002">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7003">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7003">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7004">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7004">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7005">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7005">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap slider drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_slider_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *pixelmap_slider)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap slider draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_slider_draw(pixelmap_slider);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7026">gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7026">gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7027">Evento de slider de pixelmap de processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7027">Process pixelmap slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7028">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7028">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7029">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7029">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7030">Este serviço processa um evento para o widget de slider pixelmap especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7030">This service processes an event for the specified pixelmap slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7031">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7031">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7032">**slider** Ponteiro para pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7032">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7033">**slider** controlo evento ponto para evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7033">**slider** control block event Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7034">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7034">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7035">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo de evento de slider de pixelmap bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7035">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7036">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7036">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7037">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7037">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7038">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7038">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7039">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7039">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7040">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7040">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7041">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7041">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */
UINT my_event_hanlder(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *pixelmap_slider, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(pixelmap_slider,
                                                    event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(pixelmap_slider,
                                                  event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7062">gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7062">gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7063">Atribuir pixelmaps para slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7063">Assign pixelmaps to slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7064">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7064">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO *pixinfo);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7065">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7065">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7066">Este serviço define pixelmaps para o slider pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7066">This service sets pixelmaps to the pixelmap slider.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7067">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7067">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7068">**slider** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo do slider pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7068">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7069">**pixinfo** Ponteiro para uma estrutura GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO que define as pixelmaps utilizadas para desenhar o fundo e a agulha deslizantes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7069">**pixinfo** Pointer to a GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure which defines the pixelmaps used to draw the slider background and needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7070">**O apêndice I** contém definição para GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO estrutura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7070">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7071">O fundo do slider pode usar uma ou duas pixelmaps.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7071">The slider background can use one or two pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7072">Se um, o fundo não muda à medida que a agulha se move.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7072">If one, the background does not change as the needle moves.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7073">Se forem definidos dois fundos, o fundo antes da agulha usa o primeiro mapa de pixels de fundo, e o fundo após a agulha usa o segundo pixelmap de fundo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7073">If two backgrounds are defined, the background before the needle uses the first background pixelmap, and the background after the needle uses the second background pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7074">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7074">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7075">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) O sucesso define o pixelmap para o slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7075">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7076">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7076">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7077">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7077">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7080">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7080">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO pixelmap_info;

/* Initiate pixelmap slider information structure. */
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_lower_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ORANGE;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_upper_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_EMPTY;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_needle_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Draw “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_slider _pixelmap_set (&my_pixelmap_slider,
                                &pixelmap_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap slider is properly configured with “pixelmap_info”. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7102">gx_progress_bar_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7102">gx_progress_bar_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7103">Desenhar fundo de barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7103">Draw progress bar background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7104">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7104">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_background_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7105">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7105">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7106">Este serviço desenha o pano de fundo da barra de progresso especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7106">This service draws the background of the specified progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7107">Esta função é chamada internamente como parte do gx_progress_bar_draw,, mas está exposta à aplicação de suporte aos casos em que a aplicação define uma função de desenho de barra de progresso personalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7107">This function is called internally as part of the gx_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7108">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7108">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7109">**barra de progresso** Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo da barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7109">**progress bar** Pointer to progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7110">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7110">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7111">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7111">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7112">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7112">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7113">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7113">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7114">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7114">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar background draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_background_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Call default progress bar text draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_text_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7125">gx_progress_bar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7125">gx_progress_bar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7126">Criar uma barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7126">Create a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7127">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7127">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_create(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *progress_bar_info,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT progress_bar_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7128">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7128">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7129">Este serviço cria um widget de barra de progresso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7129">This service creates a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7130">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7130">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7131">**progress_bar** Bloco de controlo da barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7131">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7132">**nome** Nome lógico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7132">**name** Logical name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7133">**pai** Ponteiro para o widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7133">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7134">**progress_bar_info** Ponteiro para uma estrutura GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7134">**progress_bar_info** Pointer to a GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7135">**O apêndice I** contém definição para GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO estrutura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7135">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7136">**estilo** Estilo de barra de progresso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7136">**style** Style of progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7137">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7137">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7138">**progress_bar_id** ID definido pela aplicação da barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7138">**progress_bar_id** Application-defined ID of progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7139">**tamanho** Dimensões da barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7139">**size** Dimensions of progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7140">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7140">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7141">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Barra de progresso bem sucedida criar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7141">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful progress bar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7142">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7142">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7143">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7143">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7144">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7144">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7145">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7145">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7146">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget dos pais não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7146">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7147">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7147">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7148">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7148">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7149">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7149">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

info.gx_progress_bar_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_current_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM_FONT;
info.gx_progress_bar_normal_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_WHITE;
info.gx_progress_bar_selected_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_BLUE;
info.gx_progress_bar_fill_pixelmap = 0;

size.gx_rectangle_left = 10;
size.gx_rectangle_top = 10;
size.gx_rectangle_right = 110;
size.gx_rectangle_bottom = 140;

/* Create a progress bar with the specified information. */
status = gx_progress_bar_create(&my_progress_bar, GX_NULL, GX_NULL,
                        &info, GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN,
                        0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCSESS the progress bar “my_progress_bar” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7160">gx_progress_bar_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7160">gx_progress_bar_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7161">Desenhar uma barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7161">Draw a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7162">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7162">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7163">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7163">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7164">Este serviço desenha um widget de barra de progresso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7164">This service draws a progress bar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7165">Esta função é normalmente chamada internamente pelo mecanismo de atualização de lona GUIX, mas está exposta à aplicação para ajudar na implementação de funções de desenho personalizado para widgets de barras de progresso personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7165">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom progress bar widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7166">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7166">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7167">**progress_bar** Bloco de controlo da barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7167">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7168">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7168">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7169">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7169">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7170">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7170">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7171">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7171">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7172">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7172">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7184">Progredir num evento de barras de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7184">Progress a progress bar event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7185">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7185">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_event_process(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7186">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7186">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7187">Este serviço processa um evento de barras de progresso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7187">This service processes a progress bar event.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7188">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7188">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7189">**progress_bar** Bloco de controlo da barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7189">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7190">**event_ptr** Ponteiro para GX_EVENT estrutura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7190">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7191">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7191">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7192">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Criação rápida bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7192">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7193">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7193">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7194">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7194">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7195">**widget** GX_INVALID_WIDGET (0x12) Inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7195">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7196">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7196">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7197">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7197">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7198">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7198">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_progress_bar_event_process(progress_bar,
                                                event_ptr);
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_progress_bar_event_process(progress_bar,
                                                event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7237">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7237">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7238">Este serviço repõe a estrutura de informação de um widget de barra de progresso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7238">This service resets the information structure of a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7239">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7239">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7240">**progress_bar** Bloco de controlo da barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7240">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7241">**informação** Ponteiro para uma estrutura GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7241">**info** Pointer to a GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7242">**O apêndice I** contém definição para GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO estrutura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7242">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7243">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7243">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) reiniciam com sucesso a informação da barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully reset progress bar info</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7245">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7245">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7247">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7247">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7248">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7248">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7249">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7249">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_progress_bar_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_current_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM_FONT;
info.gx_progress_bar_normal_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_WHITE;
info.gx_progress_bar_selected_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_BLUE;
info.gx_progress_bar_fill_pixelmap = 0;

status = gx_progress_bar_info_set(&progress_bar, &info);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the progress bar info was re-assigned. */
```

```C
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    INT min_value, 
    INT max_value);
```

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7289">Este serviço define a gama de valor da barra de progresso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7289">This service sets the progress bar value range.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7297">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7297">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7311">gx_progress_bar_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7311">gx_progress_bar_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7312">Definir a cor de texto de uma barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7312">Set the text color of a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7313">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7313">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_text_color_set(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7314">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7314">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7315">Este serviço define a cor de texto de um widget de barra de progresso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7315">This service sets the text color of a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7316">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7316">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7317">**progress_bar** Bloco de controlo da barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7317">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7318">**normal_text_color** ID de recurso da cor de texto normal que usado em estado normal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7318">**normal_text_color** Resource ID of normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7319">**selected_text_color** ID de recurso da cor de texto selecionada que usou quando o widget ganha o foco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7319">**selected_text_color** Resource ID of selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7320">**disabled_text_color** ID de recursos da cor de texto desativada que foi usada quando GX_STYLE_ENABLED não está ativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7320">**disabled_text_color** Resource ID of disabled text color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7321">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7321">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7322">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de cores de texto de barra de progresso bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7322">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful progress bar text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7323">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7323">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7324">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7324">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7325">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7325">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7326">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7326">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7327">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7327">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the progress bar “my_progress_bar”*/
UINT status = gx_progress_bar_text_color_set(&my_progress_bar,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* if status is GX_SUCCESS, the progress bar text colors were successfully assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7338">gx_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7338">gx_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7339">Desenhar texto de barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7339">Draw progress bar text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7340">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7340">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_text_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7341">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7341">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7342">Este serviço desenha o texto da barra de progresso especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7342">This service draws the text of specified progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7343">Esta função é chamada internamente como parte do gx_progress_bar_draw,, mas está exposta à aplicação de suporte aos casos em que a aplicação define uma função de desenho de barra de progresso personalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7343">This function is called internally as part of the gx_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7344">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7344">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7345">**barra de progresso** Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo da barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7345">**progress bar** Pointer to progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7346">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7346">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7347">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7347">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7348">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7348">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7349">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7349">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7350">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7350">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar background draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_background_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Call default progress bar text draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_text_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7361">gx_progress_bar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7361">gx_progress_bar_value_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7362">Definir o valor atual de uma barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7362">Set current value of a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7363">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7363">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    INT value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7364">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7364">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7365">Este serviço atribui o valor atual da barra de progresso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7365">This service assigns the progress bar current value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7366">O widget da barra de progresso invalida-se automaticamente e redesenhar-se-á quando o valor da barra de progresso for alterado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7366">The progress bar widget will automatically invalidate and redraw itself when the progress bar value is changed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7367">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7367">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7368">**progress_bar** Bloco de controlo da barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7368">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7369">**valor** Valor atual da barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7369">**value** Progress bar current value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7370">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7370">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7371">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto bem sucedido o valor da barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7371">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set the value of the progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7372">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7372">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7373">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7373">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7374">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7374">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the progress bar value was successfully assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7387">gx_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7387">gx_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7388">Criar o pedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7388">Create prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7389">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7389">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_create(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7390">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7390">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7391">Este serviço cria um widget rápido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7391">This service creates a prompt widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7392">GX_PROMPT é derivado de GX_WIDGET e apoia todos os serviços gx_widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7392">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7393">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7393">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7394">**Ponteiro** para o widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7394">**Pointer** to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7395">**text_id** ID de recursos de texto rápido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7395">**text_id** Resource ID of prompt text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7396">**estilo** Estilo de rapidão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7396">**style** Style of prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7397">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7397">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7398">**prompt_id** ID definido pela aplicação de solicitação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7398">**prompt_id** Application-defined ID of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7399">**tamanho** Dimensões da rapidão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7399">**size** Dimensions of prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7400">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7400">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7401">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Criação rápida bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7401">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7402">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7402">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7403">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7403">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7404">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7404">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7405">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7405">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7406">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7406">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7407">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7407">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7408">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7408">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_create(&my_prompt, “my_promPt”, &my_parent,
                    MY_PROMPT_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_PROPMT_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the prompt “my_prompt” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7420">gx_prompt_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7420">gx_prompt_draw</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7422">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7422">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7423">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7423">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7424">Este serviço desenha um widget rápido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7424">This service draws a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7425">Este serviço é chamado internamente pelo GUIX durante a atualização de lona, mas também pode ser chamado por funções de desenho personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7425">This service is called internally by GUIX during canvas refresh, but can also be called by custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7426">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7426">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7428">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7428">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7429">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7429">**None**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7431">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7431">Threads</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom prompt drawing function. */

    /* Call default prompt draw. */
    gx_prompt_draw(prompt);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7444">gx_prompt_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7444">gx_prompt_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7445">Evento de solicitação de processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7445">Process prompt event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7446">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7446">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_event_process(GX_PROMPT *prompt, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7447">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7447">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7448">Este serviço processa um evento para a solicitação especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7448">This service processes an event for the specified prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7449">Este serviço deve ser chamado como o manipulador de eventos predefinido por quaisquer funções de processamento de eventos de solicitação personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7449">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom prompt event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7450">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7450">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7451">**rápido** Ponteiro para bloquear o controlo rápido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7451">**prompt** Pointer to prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7452">**event_ptr** Ponteiro para o evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7452">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7453">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7453">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7454">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo de evento rápido de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7454">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7455">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7455">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7456">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7456">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7457">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7457">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7458">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7458">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7459">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7459">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7460">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7460">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic prompt event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_prompt_event_process(GX_PROMPT *prompt, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default prompt event processing */
        status = gx_prompt_event_process(prompt, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7487">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7487">Example</span></span>

```C

status = gx_prompt_font_set(&my_prompt, MY_PROMPT_FONT_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font for prompt “my_prompt” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7499">gx_prompt_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7499">gx_prompt_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7500">Definir a cor do texto do pedido de aviso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7500">Set prompt text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7501">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7501">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_color_set(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7502">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7502">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7503">Este serviço define a cor de texto de um widget rápido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7503">This service sets the text color of a prompt widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7504">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7504">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7505">**rápido** Ponteiro para o bloqueio de controlo de widgets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7505">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7506">**normal_color** Identificação de recursos de cor para texto normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7506">**normal_color** Resource ID of color for normal text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7507">**O apêndice A** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7507">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7508">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7508">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7509">**selected_color** ID de cor de recurso para texto selecionado, usado quando o widget ganha foco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7509">**selected_color** Resource ID of color for selected text, used when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7510">**O apêndice A** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7510">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7511">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7511">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7512">**disabled_color** ID de cor de recurso para texto desativado, utilizado quando GX_STYLE_ENABLED não está ativo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7512">**disabled_color** Resource ID of color for disabled text, used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7513">**O apêndice A** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7513">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7514">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7514">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7515">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7515">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7516">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de cores de texto de pronta pronta bem-sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7516">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7518">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7518">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7519">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET_SIZE** (0x14) Tamanho do widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7519">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET_SIZE** (0x14) Invalid widget size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7520">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7520">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7521">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7521">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7522">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7522">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the text color of “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_color_set(&my_prompt,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_BLACK,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_LIGHTGRAY,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color for prompt “my_prompt” has been set. */
```
