## <a name="gx_prompt_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7534">gx_prompt_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7534">gx_prompt_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7535">Função de suporte de desenho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7535">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7536">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7536">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_prompt_text_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7537">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7537">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7538">Esta função de suporte desenha a parte de texto de um pedido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7538">This support function draws the text portion of a prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7539">Esta função é chamada internamente por gx_prompt_draw(), e é fornecida como uma API separada como uma conveniência para aplicações que definem uma função de desenho rápido personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7539">This function is called internally by gx_prompt_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom prompt drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7540">As aplicações que pretendam personalizar o desenho de fundo rápido podem fornecer a sua função de desenho personalizado, e invocar o serviço de gx_prompt_text_draw como parte do seu desenho personalizado para desenhar o texto rápido sobre o fundo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7540">Applications that want to customize the prompt background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_prompt_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the prompt text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7541">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7541">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7542">**rápido** Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo de solicitação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7542">**prompt** Pointer to the prompt control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7543">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7543">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7544">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7544">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7545">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7545">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7546">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7546">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7547">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7547">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* insert code here to draw prompt background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_prompt_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) prompt);
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7560">Obtenha texto rápido (precotado)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7560">Get prompt text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7561">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7561">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_get(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CHAR **return_text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7562">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7562">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7563">Este serviço é prevadido a favor de gx_prompt_text_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7563">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_prompt_text_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7564">Este serviço obtém o texto de um widget rápido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7564">This service gets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7565">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7565">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7566">**rápido** Ponteiro para o bloqueio de controlo de widgets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7566">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7567">**return_text** Ponteiro para destino para texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7567">**return_text** Pointer to destination for text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7568">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7568">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7569">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Texto rápido bem sucedido obter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7569">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7570">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7570">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7571">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7571">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7572">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7572">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7573">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7573">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7574">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7574">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROMPT my_prompt;
GX_CHAR *my_prompt_text;

/* Get the text of “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_get(&my_prompt, &my_prompt_text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pointer “my_prompt_text” points to the text displayed by “my_prompt”. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7586">gx_prompt_text_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7586">gx_prompt_text_get_ext</span></span>

```C
    GX_PROMPT *prompt,

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7589">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7589">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7590">Este serviço obtém a sequência de um widget rápido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7590">This service gets the string of a prompt widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7591">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7591">Parameters</span></span>

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7639">gx_prompt_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7639">gx_prompt_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7640">Definir texto de solicitação (precotado)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7640">Set prompt text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7641">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7641">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_set(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7642">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7642">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7643">Este serviço foi prevadido a favor de gx_prompt_text_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7643">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_prompt_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7644">Este serviço define o texto de um widget rápido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7644">This service sets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7645">Se o widget rápido foi criado com GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY de estilo, o widget cria uma cópia privada da cadeia de texto atribuída.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7645">If the prompt widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7646">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY não estiver ativa, o widget não faz uma cópia privada da cadeia de entrada, pelo que a cadeia deve ser atribuída estática ou globalmente, ou seja, pode não ser uma variável automática ou temporária.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7646">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7647">GX_PROMPT é derivado de GX_WIDGET e, portanto, todos os serviços gx_widget API podem ser utilizados com GX_PROMPT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7647">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_PROMPT.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7648">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7648">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7649">**rápido** Ponteiro para o bloqueio de controlo de widgets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7649">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7650">**texto** Ponteiro para texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7650">**text** Pointer to text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7651">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7651">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7652">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de texto rápido de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7652">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7653">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7653">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7655">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) A função de atribuição de memória não está definida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7655">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocate function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7656">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Comprimento da corda inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7656">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7657">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7657">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7658">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7658">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7659">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7659">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the text of “my_prompt” to “my_text”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_set(&my_prompt, “my_text”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text for “my_prompt” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7671">gx_prompt_text_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7671">gx_prompt_text_set_ext</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_set_ext(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7674">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7674">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7675">Este serviço define o texto de um widget rápido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7675">This service sets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7676">Se o widget rápido foi criado com GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY de estilo, o widget cria uma cópia privada da cadeia de texto atribuída.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7676">If the prompt widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7677">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY não estiver ativa, o widget não faz uma cópia privada da cadeia de entrada, pelo que a cadeia deve ser atribuída estática ou globalmente, ou seja, pode não ser uma variável automática ou temporária.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7677">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7678">GX_PROMPT é derivado de GX_WIDGET e, portanto, todos os serviços gx_widget API podem ser utilizados com GX_PROMPT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7678">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_PROMPT.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7681">**texto** Ponteiro para texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7681">**text** Pointer to text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7682">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7682">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7683">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de texto rápido de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7683">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7684">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7684">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7685">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7685">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7687">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Comprimento da corda inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7687">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7688">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7688">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7689">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7689">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7690">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7690">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING new_string;
new_string.gx_string_ptr = “my_text”;
new_string.gx_string_length = strlen(new_string.gx_string_ptr);

/* Set the text of “my_prompt” to “new_string”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_set(&my_prompt, &new_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text for “my_prompt” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7702">gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7702">gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7703">Definir ângulo de partida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7703">Set starting angle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7704">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7704">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, 
    GX_VALUE angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7705">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7705">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7706">Este serviço define o ângulo de partida para a barra de progresso radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7706">This service sets the starting angle for radial progress bar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7707">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7708">**barra de progresso** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de barra de progresso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7708">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7709">**ângulo** Ângulo inicial do arco circular</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7709">**angle** Starting angle of the circular arc</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7710">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7710">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7711">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de âncora de barra de progresso radial bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7711">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar anchor set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7712">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7712">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7713">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7713">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7714">**widget** GX_INVALID_WIDGET (0x12) Inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7714">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7715">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7715">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7717">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7717">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE start_angle = 90;

/* Set the start angle of “my_progress_bar” to 90 degree. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_anchor_set(&my_progress_bar, start_angle);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor value of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7728">gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7728">gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7729">Desenhar fundo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7729">Draw background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7730">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7730">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7731">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7731">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7732">Este serviço desenha um fundo de barra de progresso radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7732">This service draws a radial progress bar background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7733">Este serviço é referenciado internamente pela função gx_radial_progress_bar_draw, mas está exposto para utilização pela aplicação nos casos em que a aplicação define uma função de desenho de barra de progresso radial personalizado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7733">This service is internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress bar drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7734">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7734">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7735">**barra de progresso** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de barras de progresso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7735">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7736">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7736">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7737">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7737">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7738">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7738">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7739">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7739">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7740">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7740">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Call default radial progress bar background draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7751">gx_radial_progress_bar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7751">gx_radial_progress_bar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7752">Criar barra de progresso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7752">Create radial progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7753">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7753">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_create(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *info,
    ULONG style
    USHORT id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7754">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7754">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7755">Este serviço cria uma barra de progresso radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7755">This service creates a radial progress bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7756">Se o estilo widget GX_STYLE_ENABLED for aplicado na barra de progresso, a barra de progresso aceitará pen_down, pen_drag e pen_up entrada para modificar o valor atual da barra de progresso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7756">If the widget style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is applied to the progress bar, the progress bar will accept pen_down, pen_drag, and pen_up input to modify the progress bar current value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7757">O estilo widget GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW pode ser usado para permitir desenhar o valor da barra de progresso como texto dentro da área da barra de progresso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7757">The widget style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW can be used to enable drawing the progress bar value as text within the progress bar area.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7758">Se este estilo for utilizado em combinação com o estilo GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_PERCENT, o valor da barra de progresso é apresentado em percentagem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7758">If this style is used in combination with the style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_PERCENT, the progress bar value is displayed as a percentage.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7759">Caso contrário, o valor da barra de progresso é apresentado como o valor angular atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7759">Otherwise the progress bar value is displayed as the current angular value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7760">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7760">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7761">**barra de progresso** Ponteiro para o controlo da barra de progresso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7761">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7762">**barra de progresso** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de barra de progresso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7762">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7763">**nome** Nome da barra de progresso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7763">**name** Name of radial progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7764">**pai** Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7764">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7765">**informação** Ponteiro para uma estrutura GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7765">**info** Pointer to a GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7766">**O apêndice I** contém definição para GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR estrutura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7766">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7767">**estilo** Estilo da barra de progresso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7767">**style** Style of radial progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7768">**Id ID** definido aplicação de barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7768">**id** Application-defined ID of progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7769">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7769">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7770">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Barra de progresso radial bem sucedida criar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7770">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7771">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7771">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7772">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7772">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7773">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7773">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7774">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget parental inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7774">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7775">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7775">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7776">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7776">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7777">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7777">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RAIDAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_xcenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_ycenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_radius = 100;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_current_angle = 180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_anchor_val = -180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_normal_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_disabled_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Create a radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_create(&my_progress_bar,
                    “my_progress_bar”, parent, &info,
                    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT |
                    GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW,
                    ID_MY_RADIAL_PROGRESS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial progress bar “my_progress_bar” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7788">gx_radial_progress_bar_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7788">gx_radial_progress_bar_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7789">Desenhe uma barra de progresso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7789">Draw a radial progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7790">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7790">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7791">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7791">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7792">Este serviço desenha uma barra de progresso radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7792">This service draws a radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7793">Este serviço é utilizado internamente referenciado pela função gx_radial_progress_bar_create, mas está exposto para utilização pela aplicação nos casos em que a aplicação define uma função de desenho de barra de progresso radial personalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7793">This service is used internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7794">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7794">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7795">**barra de progresso** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de barras de progresso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7795">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7796">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7796">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7797">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7797">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7798">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7798">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7799">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7799">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7800">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7800">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Call default radial progress bar draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7812">gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7812">gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7813">Evento de barra de progresso radial de processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7813">Process radial progress bar event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7814">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7814">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7815">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7815">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7816">Este serviço processa um evento radial progress bar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7816">This service processes a radial progress bar event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7817">Esta função é referenciada internamente pela função gx_radial_progress_bar_create, mas está exposta para utilização pela aplicação nos casos em que a aplicação define uma função de processamento de eventos de progresso radial personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7817">This function is internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7818">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7818">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7819">**barra de progresso** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de barra de progresso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7819">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7820">**event_ptr** Ponteiro para o evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7820">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7821">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7821">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7822">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo de evento de barras de progresso radial bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7822">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7823">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7823">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7824">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7824">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7825">**widget** GX_INVALID_WIDGET (0x12) Inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7825">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7826">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7826">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7827">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7827">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7828">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7828">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
        case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
                            radial_progress, event_ptr);
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
                            radial_progress, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
GX_RAIDAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_xcenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_ycenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_radius = 100;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_current_angle = 180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_anchor_val = -180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_normal_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_disabled_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Set appearance information for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set(&my_progress_bar, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the appearance information of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7893">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7893">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7894">Definir cor de texto de barra de progresso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7894">Set radial progress bar text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7895">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7895">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7896">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7896">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7897">Este serviço define a cor de texto da barra de progresso radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7897">This service sets the text color of radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7898">Este valor só é utilizado se o estilo GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW estiver definido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7898">This value is only used if the style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW is set.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7900">**barra de progresso** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de barra de progresso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7900">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7901">**normal_color** Identificação de recurso da cor do texto em estado normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7901">**normal_color** Resource ID of text color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7902">**O apêndice A** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7902">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7903">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7903">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7904">**selected_color** ID de recurso da cor do texto quando o widget ganha foco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7904">**selected_color** Resource ID of text color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7905">**O apêndice A** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7905">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7906">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7906">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7907">**disabled_color** ID de recurso de cor de texto quando o estilo GX_STYLE_ENABLED não está definido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7907">**disabled_color** Resource ID of text color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7908">**O apêndice A** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7908">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7909">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7909">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7912">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7912">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7913">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7913">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7914">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Verificação de widgets inválidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7914">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget check</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7928">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7928">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7929">Desenhar texto de barra de progresso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7929">Draw radial progress bar text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7930">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7930">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7931">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7931">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7932">Este serviço desenha o texto da barra de progresso radial especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7932">This service draws the text of specified radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7933">Esta função é chamada internamente como parte do gx_radial_progress_bar_draw,, mas está exposta à aplicação de suporte aos casos em que a aplicação define uma função de desenho de barra de progresso personalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7933">This function is called internally as part of the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7934">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7934">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7935">**barra de progresso** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de barras de progresso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7935">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7936">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7936">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7937">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7937">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7938">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7939">Inicialização e Threads</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7939">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7940">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7940">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw (&my_progress_bar);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_progress_bar” has been drawn. */

/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */
VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default radial progress bar text draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7951">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7951">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7952">Definir valor da barra de progresso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7952">Set radial progress bar value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7953">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7953">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, 
    GX_VALUE value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7954">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7954">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7955">Este serviço define o valor da barra de progresso radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7955">This service sets radial progress bar value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7956">O valor atribuído limita-se ao intervalo [-360, 360], definindo a possível gama de valores angulares para a localização atual da barra de progresso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7956">The assigned value is limited to the range [-360, 360], defining the possible range of angular values for the progress bar current location.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7957">A aplicação deve escalar o valor real indicado para atribuir um valor angular ao widget da barra de progresso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7957">The application must scale the real-world value being indicated to assign an angular value to the progress bar widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7958">A barra de progresso é desenhada de modo a que o valor atual indique o delta angular entre a posição da âncora e o ponto final do arco superior. Os valores negativos fazem com que o arco seja desenhado no sentido dos ponteiros do relógio, a partir da posição de ancoragem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7958">The progress bar is drawn such that the current value indicates the angular delta between the anchor position and the end point of the upper arc. Negative values cause the arc to be drawn in a clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7959">O valor de corrente positivo faz com que o arco seja desenhado no sentido contrário ao dos ponteiros do relógio, a partir da posição de âncora.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7959">Positive current value causes the arc to be drawn in a counter-clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7960">Por exemplo, desenhar um arco a partir do topo do arco (posição das 12 horas) e terminar à direita (posição das três horas), atribua um valor de âncora de 90 graus e um valor atual de -90 graus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7960">For example, to draw an arc starting at the top of the arc (12 o’clock position) and ending at the right (three o’clock position), assign an anchor value of 90 degrees and a current value of -90 degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7961">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7961">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7962">**barra de progresso** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de barra de progresso radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7962">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7963">**valor** Novo valor da barra de progresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7963">**value** New progress bar value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7964">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7964">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7965">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de valor da barra de progresso radial bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7965">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7966">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7966">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7967">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiros inválidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7967">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7968">**widget** GX_INVALID_WIDGET (0x12) Inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7968">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7969">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7969">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7970">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7970">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C

/* Set value for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */

                                        new_value);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7982">gx_radio_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7982">gx_radio_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7983">Criar botão de rádio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7983">Create radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7984">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7984">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_create(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, ULONG style,
    USHORT radio_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7985">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7985">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-7986">Este serviço cria um widget de botão de rádio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7986">This service creates a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7987">GX_RADIO_BUTTON é derivado de GX_TEXT_BUTTON, pelo que todos os serviços gx_text_button também são suportados por este tipo de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7987">GX_RADIO_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and therefore all gx_text_button services are also supported by this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7988">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7988">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7989">**botão** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões de rádio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7989">**button** Pointer to radio button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7990">**nome** Nome lógico do widget de botão de rádio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7990">**name** Logical name of radio button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7991">**pai** Ponteiro para o widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7991">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7992">**text_id** ID de recurso do botão de rádio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7992">**text_id** Resource ID of radio button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7993">**estilo** Estilo de botão de rádio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7993">**style** Style of radio button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7994">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7994">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7995">**radio_button_id** ID definido pela aplicação do botão de rádio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7995">**radio_button_id** Application-defined ID of radio button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7996">**tamanho** Dimensões do botão de rádio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7996">**size** Dimensions of radio button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-7997">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7997">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7998">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Botão de rádio bem sucedido criar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7998">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-7999">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-7999">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8000">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8000">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8001">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8001">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8002">**GX_INVALID_** TAMANHO (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8002">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8003">**ID** de recursos inválidos de GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8003">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8004">**widget** GX_INVALID_WIDGET (0x12) Inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8004">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8005">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8005">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8006">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8006">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8007">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8007">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_radio_button”. */
status = gx_radio_button_create(&my_radio_button, “my_radio_button”, &my_parent,
                    MY_RADIO_BUTTON_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_RADIO_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radio button “my_radio_button” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8022">gx_radio_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8022">gx_radio_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8023">Desenhe botão de rádio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8023">Draw radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8024">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8024">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8025">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8025">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8026">Este serviço desenha um widget de botão de rádio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8026">This service draws a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8027">Este serviço é chamado internamente pela atualização de tela GUIX, mas também pode ser chamado por funções de desenho overridden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8027">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8028">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8028">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8029">**botão** Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo widget de botão de rádio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8029">**button** Pointer to radio button widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8030">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8030">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8031">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8031">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8032">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8032">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8033">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8033">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8034">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8034">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radio button drawing function. */

VOID my_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *radio_button)
{
    /* Call default radio button draw. */
    gx_radio_button_draw(radio_button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radio_button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8049">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8049">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8050">Definir pixelmaps para botão de rádio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8050">Set pixelmaps for radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8051">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8051">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_disabled_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8052">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8052">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8053">Este serviço atribui as pixelmaps a serem exibidas pelo botão de rádio especificado para cada estado de botão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8053">This service assigns the pixelmaps to be displayed by the specified radio button for each button state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8054">Os IDs de recursos podem ser duplicados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8054">The resource IDs can be duplicated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8055">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8055">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8056">**off_id** Pixelmap usado para botão de rádio fora do estado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8056">**off_id** Pixelmap used for radio button off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8057">**on_id** Pixelmap usado para botão de rádio no estado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8057">**on_id** Pixelmap used for radio button on state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8058">**off_disabled_id** Pixelmap usado para botão de rádio desativado e fora do estado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8058">**off_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8059">**on_disabled_id** Pixelmap utilizado para botão de rádio desativado e no estado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8059">**on_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and on state</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8060">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8060">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8061">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de pixelmaps de botão de rádio bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8061">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button pixelmaps set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8062">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8062">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8063">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8063">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8064">**widget** GX_INVALID_WIDGET (0x12) Inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8064">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8065">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8065">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8066">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8066">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8067">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8067">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap for “my_radio_button”. */
status = gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(&my_radio_button,
                                MY_OFF_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_OFF_DISABLED_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_DISABLED_PIXELMAP);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmaps for radio button “my_radio_button” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8082">gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8082">gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8083">Definir lista de âncora de slider radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8083">Set radial slider anchor list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8084">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8084">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE *anchor_angles, 
    USHORT anchor_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8085">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8085">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8086">Este serviço define ângulos de ancoragem para o deslizador radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8086">This service sets anchor angles for radial slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8087">Se a lista de ângulos de ancoragem estiver definida, o ângulo do deslizador radial será um dos ângulos de ancoragem definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8087">If anchor angle list is set, the radial slider angle will be one of defined anchor angles.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8088">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8088">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8089">**slider** Bloco de controlo do deslizador radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8089">**slider** Radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8090">**anchor_angles** Lista de ângulo para definir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8090">**anchor_angles** Angle list to set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8091">**anchor_count** Contagem dos ângulos de âncora</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8091">**anchor_count** Count of the anchor angles</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8092">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8092">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8093">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de ângulos de âncora bem sucedidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8093">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful anchor angles set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8094">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8094">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8095">**widget** GX_INVALID_WIDGET (0x12) Inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8095">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8096">**lista de** âncora inválida GX_INVALID_VALUE (0x22)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8096">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid anchor list</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8097">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8097">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8098">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8098">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8099">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8099">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE anchor_angles[]={0, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180};
USHORT anchor_count = 7;

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                anchor_angles, anchor_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been set for “my_radial_slider”. */

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                GX_NULL, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been removed from “my_radial_slider”. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_angle_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8110">gx_radial_slider_angle_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8110">gx_radial_slider_angle_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8111">Definir ângulo de slider radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8111">Set radial slider angle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8112">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8112">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_angle_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE new_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8113">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8113">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8114">Este serviço define um novo valor de ângulo para o deslizador radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8114">This service sets new angle value for radial slider.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8115">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8115">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8116">**slider** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de deslizador radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8116">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8117">**new_angle** Novo valor de ângulo a definir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8117">**new_angle** New angle value to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8118">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8118">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8119">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de ângulo de deslizamento radial bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8119">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider angle set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8120">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8120">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8121">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8121">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8122">**widget** GX_INVALID_WIDGET (0x12) Inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8122">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8123">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8123">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8124">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8124">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8125">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8125">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set “my_radial_slider” angle to 0 degree(3 o’clock position). */
status = gx_radial_slider_angle_set(&my_radial_slider, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of “my_radial_slider” has been set to 0 degree. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_animation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8136">gx_radial_slider_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8136">gx_radial_slider_animation_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8138">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8138">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_animation_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    USHORT steps, USHORT delay, 
    USHORT animation_style,
    VOID (*animation_update_callback)(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider));
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8142">**slider** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de deslizador radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8142">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8143">**passos** Passos totais para uma animação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8143">**steps** Total steps for one animation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8144">**atraso** Atraso no tempo para cada passo de animação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8144">**delay** Delay time for each animation step</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8145">**animation_style** Tipo de função de flexibilização, inclui:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8145">**animation_style** Easing function type, includes:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8146">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8146">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8148">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8148">GX_ANIMATION_BACK_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8149">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8149">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8150">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8150">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8151">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8151">GX_ANIMATION_BOUNCE_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8152">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8152">GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8171">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8171">GX_ANIMATION_QUINT_EASE_OUT</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8174">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8174">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_OUT</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8175">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN_OUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8175">GX_ANIMATION_SINE_EASE_IN_OUT</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8179">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8179">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8180">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8180">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8181">**widget** GX_INVALID_WIDGET (0x12) Inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8181">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8182">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8182">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8183">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8183">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8184">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8184">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID animation_callback(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* This function will be called after each animation step,
    add custom code here. */
}

/* Set animation info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 15, 2,
                                GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT,
                                animation_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move with specified animation. */

/* Disable animation for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 0, 0,
                                        0, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move without animation. */
```
