## <a name="gx_radial_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8221">gx_radial_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8221">gx_radial_slider_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8222">Criar slider radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8222">Create radial slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8223">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8223">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_create(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT slider_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8224">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8224">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8225">Este serviço cria um widget de slider radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8225">This service creates a radial slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8226">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8226">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8227">**slider** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de deslizador radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8227">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8228">**nome** Nome lógico do widget de slider radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8228">**name** Logical name of radial slider widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8229">**pai** Ponteiro para o widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8229">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8230">**informação** Definição de aparência de slider radial, **apêndice I** contém definição para GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8230">**info** Radial slider appearance definition, **Appendix I** contains definition to GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8231">**estilo** Estilo de botão de rádio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8231">**style** Style of radio button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8232">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8232">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8233">**radio_button_id** ID definido pela aplicação do deslizador radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8233">**radio_button_id** Application-defined ID of radial slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8234">**tamanho** Dimensões do deslizador radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8234">**size** Dimensions of radial slider</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8235">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8235">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8236">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Slider radial de sucesso criar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8236">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8237">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8237">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8238">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8238">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8239">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8239">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8240">**GX_INVALID_** TAMANHO (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8240">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8241">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget parental inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8241">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8242">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8243">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8243">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8244">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8244">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 200, 200);

/* Create “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_create(&my_radial_slider,
                                “my_radial_slider”, &my_parent,
                                &info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                MY_RADIAL_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider “my_radial_slider” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8279">gx_radial_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8279">gx_radial_slider_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8280">Evento de slider radial de processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8280">Process radial slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8281">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8281">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_event_process(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8282">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8282">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8283">Este serviço processa um evento de slider radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8283">This service processes a radial slider event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8284">Este serviço deve ser chamado como o manipulador de eventos predefinido por quaisquer funções de processamento de eventos de slider radiais personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8284">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom radial slider event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8285">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8285">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8286">**slider** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de deslizador radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8286">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8287">**event_ptr** Ponteiro para o evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8287">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8288">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8288">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo de evento de deslizamento radial bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8290">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8290">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8292">**widget** GX_INVALID_WIDGET (0x12) Inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8292">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8293">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8293">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8294">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8294">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8295">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8295">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
                    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8335">Este serviço define informações de deslizamento radial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8335">This service sets radial slider information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8336">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8336">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8337">**slider** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de deslizador radial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8337">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8338">**informação** Informação de slider radial para definir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8338">**info** Radial slider information to set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8339">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8339">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8341">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8341">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8342">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8342">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8343">**widget** GX_INVALID_WIDGET (0x12) Inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8343">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8344">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8344">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8345">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8345">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8346">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8346">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Reset radial slider info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_info_set(&my_radial_slider, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider info of “my_radial_slider” has been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8384">gx_rich_text_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8384">gx_rich_text_view_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8385">Criar uma rica vista de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8385">Create a rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8386">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8386">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_rich_text_view_create(
    GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS *fonts,
    USHORT id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8387">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8387">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8388">Este serviço cria uma visão de texto rica como especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8388">This service creates a rich text view as specified.</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8389">**As etiquetas de formatação são utilizadas para exibir tipos especiais para texto:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8389">**Formatting tags are used to display special types for text:**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8390">**\<b>\</b>** Definir fonte de texto com id de fonte em negrito especificado pelo utilizador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8390">**\<b>\</b>** Set text font with user specified bold font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8391">**\<i>\</i>** Definir fonte de texto com id de fonte itálica especificado do utilizador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8391">**\<i>\</i>** Set text font with user specified italic font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8392">**\<u>\</u>** Permitir o sublinhado de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8392">**\<u>\</u>** Enable text underline</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8393">**\<f GX_FONT_ID>\</f>** Definir fonte de texto com id de fonte especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8393">**\<f GX_FONT_ID>\</f>** Set text font with specified font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8394">**\<c GX_COLOR_ID>\</c>** Definir fonte de texto com id de cor especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8394">**\<c GX_COLOR_ID>\</c>** Set text font with specified color id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8395">**\<hc GX_COLOR_ID>\</hc>** Definir texto realçar a cor especificada id de cor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8395">**\<hc GX_COLOR_ID>\</hc>** Set text highlight color specified color id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8396">**\<align left/right/center>\</align>** Definir alinhamento de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8396">**\<align left/right/center>\</align>** Set text alignment</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8397">**Exemplos de utilização da etiqueta de formatação:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8397">**Examples of formatting tag usage:**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8398">\<b>Este é um texto arrojado<\b></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8398">\<b>This is bold text<\b></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8399">\<i>Este é o texto itálico<\i></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8399">\<i>This is italic text<\i></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8400">\<u>Este é um texto com sublinhado<\u></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8400">\<u>This is text with underline<\u></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8401">\<f 0>Este id de fonte de texto está definido para 0<\f></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8401">\<f 0>This text font id is set to 0<\f></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8402">\<c 1>Este id de cor de texto está definido para 1<\c></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8402">\<c 1>This text color id is set to 1<\c></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8403">\<hc 2>Este id de cor de destaque de texto está definido para 2<\hc></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8403">\<hc 2>This text highlight color id is set to 2<\hc></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8404">\<align left> Este texto é deixado alinhado<\alinhar></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8404">\<align left> This text is left aligned<\align></span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8405">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8405">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8406">**text_view** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de vista de texto rico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8406">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8407">**nome** Nome da rica vista de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8407">**name** Name of the rich text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8408">**pai** Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8408">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8409">**text_id** ID de recurso da cadeia de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8409">**text_id** Resource ID of the text string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8410">**fontes** Ponteiro para a informação de fonte de vista de texto rico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8410">**fonts** Pointer to the rich text view font information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8411">**Apendix I** contém definição para GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS estrutura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8411">**Apendix I** contains definition to GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8412">**estilo** Estilo do widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8412">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8413">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8413">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8414">**ID ID** definido por aplicação da vista de texto rico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8414">**id** Application-defined ID of the rich text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8415">**tamanho** Tamanho da rica vista de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8415">**size** Size of the rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8416">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8416">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Criação de visão de texto rica e bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful rich text view creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8419">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8419">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8420">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8420">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8421">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8421">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8422">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8422">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8423">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8423">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8424">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8424">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW rich_view;
GX_RCIH_TEXT_FONTS fonts;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Defined widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 100, 100, 300, 150);

/* Define font information. */
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_normal_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;

/* Create rich text view widget. */
status = gx_rich_text_view_create(&rich_view, “my_rich_view”,
                                  parent, GX_STRING_ID_TEST_STRING,
                                  &fonts,
                                  GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                  MY_RICH_VIEW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the rich text view was successfully created. */

```

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8425">A aplicação de demonstração demo_guix_widget_types, fornecida como parte da instalação do GUIX Studio, fornece um exemplo completo de utilização do widget de visualização de texto rico.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8425">The demo application demo_guix_widget_types, provided as part of the GUIX Studio installation, provides a complete example of using the rich text view widget.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8430">gx_rich_text_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8430">gx_rich_text_view_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8431">Desenhar vista de texto rica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8431">Draw rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8432">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8432">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8433">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8433">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8434">Este serviço desenha o widget de visualização de texto rico especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8434">This service draws the specified rich text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8435">Este serviço é normalmente chamado internamente pelo GUIX como parte de uma operação de atualização de tela, mas também exposto à aplicação que pode querer fornecer uma função de desenho personalizado e invocar o desenho de visão de texto rico padrão como base de desenho personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8435">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default rich text view drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8436">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8436">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8437">**text_view** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo widget de vista de texto rico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8437">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8438">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8438">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8439">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8439">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8440">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8441">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8441">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8442">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8442">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Call default rich text view draw. */
    gx_rich_text_view_draw(text_view);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8460">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8460">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8462">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8462">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8463">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8463">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RICH_TEXT_FONTS fonts;

/* Replace the font ids as needed. */
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_normal_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;

/* Set the font of “my_rich_view”. */
status = gx_rich_text_view_fonts_set(&my_rich_view, &fonts);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font for rich text view “my_rich_view” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8468">gx_rich_text_view_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8468">gx_rich_text_view_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8469">Desenhar texto de vista de texto rico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8469">Draw rich text view text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8470">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8470">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_rich_text_view_text_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8471">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8471">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8472">Esta função de suporte desenha a parte de texto de uma visão de texto rica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8472">This support function draws the text portion of a rich text view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8473">Esta função é chamada internamente por gx_rich_text_view_draw(), e é fornecida como uma API separada como uma conveniência para aplicações que definem uma função de desenho de visão de texto rico personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8473">This function is called internally by gx_rich_text_view_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom rich text view drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8474">As aplicações que pretendem personalizar o desenho de fundo de vista de texto rico podem fornecer a sua função de desenho personalizado, e invocar o serviço de gx_rich_text_view_text_draw como parte do seu desenho personalizado para desenhar o rico texto de vista de texto sobre o fundo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8474">Applications that want to customize the rich text view background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_rich_text_view_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the rich text view text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8475">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8475">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8476">**text_view** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo widget de vista de texto rico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8476">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8477">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8477">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8478">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8478">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8479">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8479">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8480">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8480">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8481">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8481">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw rich text view background. */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing. */
    gx_rich_text_view_text_draw();

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) rich_text_view);
}
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8486">gx_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8486">gx_screen_stack_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8487">Inicialize uma pilha de tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8487">Initialize a screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8488">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8488">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_create(
    GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control,
    GX_WIDGET **memory_buffer, 
    INT buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8489">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8489">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8490">Este serviço inicializa uma pilha de ecrã.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8490">This service initializes a screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8491">A aplicação deve definir o bloco de memória e o tamanho do tampão utilizados para implementar a função de pilha de ecrã.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8491">The application must define the memory block and buffer size used to implement the screen stack feature.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8492">*Esta API é obsoleta e é substituída por gx_system_screen_stack_create(). Esta versão está prevista apenas para retrocompatibilidade com versões anteriores da biblioteca..*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8492">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_create(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8493">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8493">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8494">**controlo** Bloco de controlo de pilha de tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8494">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8495">**memory_buffer** Ponteiro para um tampão de memória que usado como uma pilha de tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8495">**memory_buffer** Pointer to a memory buffer that used as a screen stack</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8496">**buffer_size** Tamanho da memória em bytes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8496">**buffer_size** Memory size in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8497">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8497">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8498">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pilha de ecrã bem sucedida criar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8498">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8499">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8499">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8500">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Tamanho do tampão inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8500">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8501">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8501">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8502">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8502">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8503">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8503">Example</span></span>

```C
#define SCREEN_STACK_SIZE 10

GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL my_stack_control;
GX_WIDGET *screen_stack[SCREEN_STACK_SIZE];

/* Initialize “my_stack_control”. */
status = gx_screen_stack_create(&my_stack_control, screen_stack,
                        SCREEN_STACK_SIZE * sizeof(GX_WIDGET *));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen control block “my_stack control” has been initialized. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8504">Consulte também</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8504">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_pop"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8508">gx_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8508">gx_screen_stack_pop</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8509">Remova a entrada mais alta da pilha de ecrã</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8509">Remove the topmost entry from the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8510">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8510">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_pop(GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8511">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8511">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8512">Este serviço remove a entrada mais alta da pilha de ecrã e liga o ecrã estalado ao seu progenitor anterior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8512">This service removes the topmost entry from the screen stack, and attaches the popped screen to its previous parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8513">Esta API também separa quaisquer crianças existentes do progenitor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8513">This API also detaches any existing children from the parent.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8514">*Esta API é obsoleta e é substituída por gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). Esta versão está prevista apenas para retrocompatibilidade com versões anteriores da biblioteca..*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8514">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8515">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8515">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8516">**controlo** Bloco de controlo de pilha de tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8516">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8517">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8517">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pop de pilha de ecrã bem-sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8519">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8519">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8520">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8520">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8521">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8521">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8522">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8522">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8523">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8523">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove the topmost entry from the screen stack. */
status = gx_screen_stack_pop(&my_stack_control);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the topmost entry has been removed from the screen stack, 
    and the popped screen has been attached to its parent. */
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_push"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8528">gx_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8528">gx_screen_stack_push</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8529">Push screen e seus pais para empilhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8529">Push screen and its parents to stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8530">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8530">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_push(
    GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control,
    GX_WIDGET *screen,
    GX_WIDGET *new_screen);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8531">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8531">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8532">Este serviço separa o ecrã do seu progenitor e empurra o ponteiro do ecrã e o ponteiro dos pais para a pilha de ecrã.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8532">This service detaches screen from its parent, and pushes the screen pointer and the parent pointer onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8533">O novo ponteiro de ecrã é então ligado ao progenitor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8533">The new screen pointer is then attached to the parent.</span></span>


> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8534">*Esta API é obsoleta e é substituída por gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). Esta versão está prevista apenas para retrocompatibilidade com versões anteriores da biblioteca..*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8534">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8535">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8535">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8536">**controlo** Bloco de controlo de pilha de tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8536">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8537">**tela** Ponteiro de tela para empurrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8537">**screen** Screen pointer to push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8538">**new_screen** Ponteiro do novo ecrã</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8538">**new_screen** Pointer of the new screen</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8539">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8539">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8540">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Push de pilha de tela bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8540">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8541">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8542">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8543">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8543">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8544">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8544">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8545">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8545">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Push “screen” and its parent to screen stack, Dettach “screen” from its parent, and attach “new screen” to the parent. */
status = gx_screen_stack_push(&my_stack_control,
                                screen, new_screen);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “screen” and its parent have been pushed to screen stack, “screen” has been detached from its parent, “new_screen” has been attached to the parent. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8546">Consulte também</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8546">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8547">gx_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8547">gx_screen_stack_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8548">gx_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8548">gx_screen_stack_push</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8554">Este serviço remove todas as entradas da pilha de ecrã.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8554">This service removes all entries from the screen stack.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scroll_thumb_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8568">gx_scroll_thumb_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8568">gx_scroll_thumb_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8569">Criar polegar de pergaminho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8569">Create scroll thumb</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8570">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8570">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_thumb_create(
    GX_SCROLL_THUMB *scroll_thumb,
    GX_SCROLLBAR *parent, ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8571">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8571">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8572">Este serviço cria uma roda de polegar de deslocal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8572">This service creates a scroll thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8573">Este serviço é normalmente chamado internamente quando um GX_SCROLLBAR é criado, mas é tornado público de forma a permitir implementações personalizadas de barra de deslocamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8573">This service is normally called internally when a GX_SCROLLBAR is created, but is made public in order to allow custom scrollbar implementations.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8574">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8574">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8575">**scroll_thumb** Bloqueie o bloco de controlo do widget do polegar do polegar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8575">**scroll_thumb** Scroll thumb widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8576">**pai** Ponteiro para a barra de pergaminho dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8576">**parent** Pointer to parent scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8577">**estilo** Estilo de widget de barra de rolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8577">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8578">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8578">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8579">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8579">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8580">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Cria o polegar de pergaminho bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8580">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scroll thumb create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8581">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8581">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8582">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8582">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8583">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8583">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8584">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8584">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8585">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget dos pais não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8585">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8586">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8586">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8587">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8587">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8588">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8588">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_THUMB my_scroll_thumb;

/* Create scroll thumb “my_scroll_thumb”. */
status = gx_scroll_thumb_create(&my_scroll_thumb, &my_scrollbar,
                                GX_STYLE_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll thumb “my_scroll_thumb” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_thumb_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8592">gx_scroll_thumb_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8592">gx_scroll_thumb_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8593">Desenhe o polegar do pergaminho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8593">Draw scroll thumb</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8594">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8594">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_scroll_thumb_draw(GX_SCROLL_THUMB *scroll_thumb);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8595">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8595">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8596">Este serviço desenha uma roda de polegar de deslocal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8596">This service draws a scroll thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8597">Este serviço é chamado internamente pela atualização de tela GUIX, mas também pode ser chamado por funções de desenho overridden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8597">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8598">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8598">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8599">**scroll_thumb** Bloqueie o bloco de controlo do widget do polegar do polegar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8599">**scroll_thumb** Scroll thumb widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8600">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8600">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8601">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8601">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8602">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8602">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8603">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8603">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8604">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8604">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom scroll thumb drawing function. */

VOID my_scroll_thumb_draw(GX_SCROLL_THUMB *thumb)
{
    /* Call default scroll thumb draw. */
    gx_scroll_thumb_draw(thumb);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_thumb_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8608">gx_scroll_thumb_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8608">gx_scroll_thumb_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8609">Evento de polegar de pergaminho de processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8609">Process scroll thumb event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8610">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8610">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(
    GX_SCROLL_THUMB *scroll_thumb,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8611">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8611">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8612">Este serviço trata dos eventos enviados para uma roda de polegar de uma barra de deslocação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8612">This service handles events sent to a scrollbar thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8613">Este serviço é normalmente utilizado internamente pelo GUIX, mas é tornado público para ajudar na implementação de comportamentos personalizados da barra de deslocamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8613">This service is normally used internally by GUIX, but is made public to assist with implementing custom scrollbar behaviors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8614">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8614">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8615">**scroll_thumb** Bloqueie o bloco de controlo do widget do polegar do polegar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8615">**scroll_thumb** Scroll thumb widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8616">**evento** Ponteiro para o evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8616">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8617">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8617">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo de evento de polegar de pergaminho bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scroll thumb event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8621">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8621">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8622">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8622">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8623">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8623">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8624">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8624">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_SCROLL_THUMB *thumb, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(thumb, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(thumb, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8628">gx_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8628">gx_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8629">Criar um widget de roda de rolo base</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8629">Create a base scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8630">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8630">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_create( 
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8631">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8631">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8632">Este serviço cria um widget genérico de roda de deslocação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8632">This service creates a generic scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8633">Uma roda de deslocação genérica é o widget base para todos os tipos de widgets de roda de deslocação, incluindo o *gx_text_scroll_wheel*\*\* que é a base para widgets *gx_numeric_scroll_wheel*\*\* e *gx_string_ scroll_wheel\*\*.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8633">A generic scroll wheel is the base widget for all scroll wheel widget types, including the *gx_text_scroll_wheel*\*\* which is the base for *gx_numeric_scroll_wheel*\*\* and *gx_string_ scroll_wheel*\*\* widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8634">O widget da roda de deslocação base fornece manuseamento de eventos, animação de deslocação e cálculo de linha selecionado para todos os tipos de widgets de roda de deslocamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8634">The base scroll wheel widget provides event handling, scrolling animation, and selected row calculation for all scroll wheel widget types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8635">As aplicações normalmente não criariam um exemplo de um widget genérico da roda de deslocação, uma vez que este tipo de widget não fornece nenhuma função de desenho.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8635">Applications would not normally create an instance of a generic scroll wheel widget, since this widget type provides no drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8636">No entanto, o acesso a esta API é fornecido para ajudar aplicações que precisam de criar um tipo de widget de roda de deslocação personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8636">However access to this API is provided to assist applications which need to create a custom scroll wheel widget type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8637">GX_SCROLL_WHEEL baseia-se em GX_WINDOW e, portanto, todas as APIs GX_WINDOW podem ser utilizadas com GX_SCROLL_WHEEL e widgets derivados de GX_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8637">GX_SCROLL_WHEEL is based on GX_WINDOW, and therefore all GX_WINDOW APIs may be used with GX_SCROLL_WHEEL and widgets derived from GX_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8638">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8638">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8639">**roda** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo genérico da roda de deslocamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8639">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8640">**nome** Nome do widget atribuído à aplicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8640">**name** Application assigned widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8641">**pai** Widget dos pais, ou GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8641">**parent** Parent widget, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8642">**total_rows** Total de linhas disponíveis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8642">**total_rows** Total available rows</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8643">**estilo** Bandeiras de estilo Widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8643">**style** Widget style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8644">**Id** Aplicação atribuída widget ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8644">**id** Application assigned widget ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8645">**tamanho** Retângulo definindo o tamanho inicial do widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8645">**size** Rectangle defining initial widget size.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8646">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8646">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8647">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) criou com sucesso a roda de pergaminho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8647">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8648">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8648">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8649">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8649">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8650">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8650">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid control block size</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8655">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8655">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic create function during custom widget createl. */

UINT custom_scroll_wheel_create(CUSTOM_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
                    GX_WIDGET *parent,
                    INT total_rows, ULONG style,
                    USHORT id,
                    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* create base widget as part of custom create */
    status = gx_scroll_wheel_create(wheel, name, parent,
                            total_rows, style, id, size);

    /* If status is GX_SUCCESS the base scroll wheel has been created. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8675">gx_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8675">gx_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8676">Função de processamento de eventos para widget de roda de deslocamento genérico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8676">Event processing function for generic scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8677">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8677">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_event_process(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8678">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8678">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8679">Este serviço fornece o manuseamento básico do evento de entrada para todos os tipos de widgets de roda de deslocação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8679">This service provides the basic input event handling for all scroll wheel widget types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8680">Esta função está exposta ao software de aplicação para ajudar com aplicações que precisam de criar um tipo de widget de roda de deslocação personalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8680">This function is exposed to the application software to assist with applications which need to create a custom scroll wheel widget type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8681">As aplicações muitas vezes forneceriam a sua própria função de processamento de eventos, mas invocam o processamento genérico de eventos para widgets de rodas para eventos que não precisam de personalizar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8681">Applications would often provide their own event processing function, but invoke the generic event processing for wheel widgets for events that they do not need to customize.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8682">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8682">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8683">**roda** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo genérico da roda de deslocamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8683">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8684">**evento** ponteiro GX_EVENT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8684">**event** GX_EVENT pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8685">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8685">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8686">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo de evento de roda de deslocação com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8686">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8687">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8687">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8688">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8688">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8689">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8689">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8690">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8690">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8691">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8691">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8692">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8692">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic scroll wheel event processing 
    as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scroll_wheel_event_process(CUSTOM_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scroll wheel
            event processing */
        gx_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8712">gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8712">gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8713">Atribuir valores alfa de gradiente para gradiente de sobreposição opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8713">Assign gradient alpha values for optional overlay gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8714">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8714">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha,
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8715">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8715">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8716">Este serviço define os valores alfa inicial e final para uma sobreposição opcional do gradiente do widget da roda de deslocamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8716">This service defines the starting and ending alpha values for an optional gradient overlay of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8717">Todos os widgets da roda de deslocação suportam um efeito "desvanecimento" das linhas das rodas de deslocamento, à medida que as filas se aproximam da borda superior e inferior do widget da roda de deslocamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8717">All scroll wheel widgets support a “fade” effect of the scroll wheel rows as the rows near the top and bottom edge of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8718">Este efeito de desvanecimento é conseguido desenhando um pixelmap gradiente sobre as linhas das rodas de deslocamento, que fazem com que as linhas pareçam desaparecer à medida que as linhas são desenhadas perto da parte superior e inferior do widget da roda de deslocamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8718">This fade effect is accomplished by drawing a gradient pixelmap over the scroll wheel rows, which make the rows appear to fade out as the rows are drawn near the top and bottom of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8719">Este serviço API permite que a aplicação modifique a intensidade do efeito de desvanecimento, ou desative totalmente este efeito, definindo os valores alfa de início e fim para 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8719">This API service allows the application to modify the fading effect intensity, or disable this effect entirely by setting the start and end alpha values to 0.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8720">O mapa de pixels gradiente é criado em tempo de execução quando a roda de deslocação se torna inicialmente visível.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8720">The gradient pixelmap is created at runtime when the scroll wheel initially becomes visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8721">Isto requer que tenha sido definido um serviço de atribuição de memória em tempo de execução utilizando _gx_system_memory_allocator_set().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8721">This requires that a runtime memory allocation service has been defined using _gx_system_memory_allocator_set().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8722">Se não tiver sido definida nenhuma função de alocador de memória, a imagem de gradiente não será criada e nenhum efeito de desvanecimento estará disponível.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8722">If no memory allocator function has been defined, the gradient image will not be created and no fade effect will be available.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8723">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8723">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8724">**roda** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo genérico da roda de deslocamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8724">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8725">**start_alpha** O gradiente sobreposto que inicia o valor alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8725">**start_alpha** The overlay gradient starting alpha value.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8726">**end_alpha** O gradiente sobreposto que termina o valor alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8726">**end_alpha** The overlay gradient ending alpha value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8727">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8727">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8728">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir com sucesso o alfa de gradiente de roda de roda de deslocação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8728">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the scroll wheel gradient alpha</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8729">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8729">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8730">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8730">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8731">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8731">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8732">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8732">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8733">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8733">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8734">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8734">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set(&wheel, 240, 0);
/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the wheel gradient alpha values were
Successfully assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8754">gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8754">gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8755">Atribua a altura da linha para cada linha de roda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8755">Assign the row height for each wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8756">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8756">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_VALUE row_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8757">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8757">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8758">Este serviço atribui a altura da linha para cada linha da roda de deslocação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8758">This service assigns the row height for each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8759">Note que se a roda de deslocação tiver GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND de estilo, a altura da linha passa através de uma transformação que reduz eficazmente a altura da linha à medida que a linha se aproxima da borda superior ou inferior da roda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8759">Note that if the scroll wheel has style GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND, the row height passes through a transform which effectively reduces the row height as the row nears the top or bottom edge of the wheel.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8760">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8760">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8761">**roda** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo genérico da roda de deslocamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8761">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8762">**row_height** Valor da altura da linha, em pixels.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8762">**row_height** Row height value, in pixels.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8763">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8763">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8764">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir com sucesso a altura da roda do pergaminho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8764">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8765">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8765">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8766">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8766">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8767">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8767">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8768">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8768">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8769">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8769">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8770">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8770">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set(&wheel, 40);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the wheel row height has been set to 40
pixels. */
```
