## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8790">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8790">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8791">Atribuir imagem de fundo para a linha selecionada da roda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8791">Assign background image for wheel selected row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8792">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8792">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL*wheel, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID image_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8793">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8793">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8794">Este serviço atribui um ID de pixelmap opcional que é desenhado atrás da linha selecionada da roda de deslocação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8794">This service assigns an optional pixelmap ID that is drawn behind the selected row of the scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8795">Isto pode ser usado para destacar a linha selecionada para que o utilizador possa facilmente distinguir qual a linha da roda de deslocação selecionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8795">This can be used to highlight the selected row so that the user can easily distinguish which row of the scroll wheel is selected.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8796">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8796">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8797">**roda** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo genérico da roda de deslocamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8797">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8798">**image_id** Pixelmap ID para usar como a imagem de fundo de linha selecionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8798">**image_id** Pixelmap ID to use as the selected row background image.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8799">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8799">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8800">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir com sucesso o fundo da roda do pergaminho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8800">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel background</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8801">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8801">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8802">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8802">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8803">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8803">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8804">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8804">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8805">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8805">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8806">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8806">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set(&wheel,
GX_PIXELMAP_ID_SELECTED_ROW);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the background image has been
assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8826">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8826">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8827">Recupere a linha de rodas atualmente selecionada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8827">Retrieve the currently selected wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8828">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8828">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT *row);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8829">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8829">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8830">Este serviço irá consultar a roda de deslocação para recuperar a linha atualmente selecionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8830">This service will query the scroll wheel to retrieve the currently selected row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8831">O chamador deve passar o local para devolver o índice de linha selecionado como o segundo parâmetro para esta função.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8831">The caller must pass the location to return the selected row index as the second parameter to this function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8832">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8832">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8833">**roda** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo genérico da roda de deslocamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8833">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8834">**linha** Local no qual o valor de linha selecionado será devolvido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8834">**row** Location in which selected row value will be returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8835">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8835">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) recuperou com sucesso a linha de rodas selecionada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved selected wheel row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8837">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8837">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8838">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8838">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8839">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x19) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8839">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x19) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8840">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8840">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8841">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8841">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8842">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8842">Example</span></span>

```C
INT row;
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get(&wheel, &row);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the selected row has been returned in
the row variable. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8862">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8862">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8863">Atribuir linha de roda de deslocação selecionada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8863">Assign selected scroll wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8864">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8864">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT row);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8865">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8865">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8866">Este serviço atribui a linha de roda de deslocal já selecionada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8866">This service assigns the currently selected scroll wheel row.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8867">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8867">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8868">**roda** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo genérico da roda de deslocamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8868">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8869">**linha** Linha da roda de deslocação a selecionar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8869">**row** Row of the scroll wheel to be selected.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8870">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8870">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8871">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir com sucesso a linha de rodas selecionada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8871">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the selected wheel row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8872">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8872">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8873">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8873">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8874">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8874">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8875">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8875">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8876">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8876">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8877">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8877">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_set(&wheel, 20);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel has been set to select
row 20 */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8897">gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8897">gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8898">Atribuir velocidade de deslocamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8898">Assign scrolling speed</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8899">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8899">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_FIXED_VAL start_speed_rate,
    GX_FIXED_VAL end_speed_rate,
    GX_VALUE max_steps,
    GX_VALUE delay);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8900">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8900">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8901">Este serviço atribui a velocidade de deslocação para o widget da roda de deslocamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8901">This service assigns the scrolling speed for the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8902">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8902">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8903">**roda** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo genérico da roda de deslocamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8903">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8904">**start_speed_rate** A velocidade de deslocamento da velocidade de início para a velocidade do movimento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8904">**start_speed_rate** The rate of scrolling start speed to flick speed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8905">**end_speed_rate** A velocidade de roer velocidade final para a velocidade do movimento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8905">**end_speed_rate** The rate of scrolling end speed to flick speed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8906">**max_steps** Passos max para rolar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8906">**max_steps** Max steps for scrolling.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8907">**atraso** Atrase o tempo de cada passo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8907">**delay** Delay time of each step.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8908">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8908">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8909">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir com sucesso a velocidade da roda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8909">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set wheel speed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8910">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8910">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8911">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8911">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8912">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8912">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8913">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valor inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8913">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8914">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8914">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8915">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8915">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8916">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8916">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set(&wheel, GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(2),
                                GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2, 10, 2);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel speed has been
successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8936">gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8936">gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8937">Atribua o total de linhas de roda de deslocação disponíveis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8937">Assign the total scroll wheel rows available</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8938">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8938">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT total_rows);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8939">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8939">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8940">Este serviço atribui o número de linhas disponíveis na roda de deslocação indicada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8940">This service assigns the number of rows available in the indicated scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8941">O widget da roda de deslocação geralmente recebe o conteúdo da linha da aplicação sob a forma de uma matriz de cordas ou dados de cadeia fornecidos pelo utilizador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8941">The scroll wheel widget usually receives the row content from the application in the form of an array of strings or user supplied string data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8942">Esta API informa a roda de deslocação do número total de linhas que devem ser apresentadas ao utilizador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8942">This API informs the scroll wheel of the total number of rows that should be presented to the user.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8943">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8943">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8944">**roda** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo genérico da roda de deslocamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8944">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8945">**total_rows** Número total de linhas de roda para apresentar ao utilizador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8945">**total_rows** Total number of wheel rows to present to the user.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8946">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8946">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir com sucesso a roda de deslocalismo linha total</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel total row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8948">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8948">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8949">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8949">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8973">gx_scrollbar_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8973">gx_scrollbar_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8974">Desenhar barra de deslocal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8974">Draw scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8975">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8975">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_scrollbar_draw(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8976">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8976">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8977">Este serviço desenha uma barra de deslocação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8977">This service draws a scrollbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8978">Uma função de desenho comum é utilizada para widgets verticais e horizontais da barra de deslocamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8978">A common drawing function is used for both vertical and horizontal scrollbar widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8979">Este serviço é chamado internamente pela atualização de tela GUIX, mas também pode ser chamado por funções de desenho overridden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8979">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8980">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8980">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8981">**barra de scroll** Widget de barra de rolo para desenhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8981">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8982">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8982">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8983">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8983">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8984">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8984">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8985">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8985">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8986">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8986">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom scrollbar drawing function. */

VOID my_scrollbar_draw(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar)
{
    /* Call default scrollbar draw. */
    gx_scrollbar_draw(thumb);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8993">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8993">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8994">Evento de barra de pergaminho de processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8994">Process scrollbar event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8995">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8995">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_event_process(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8996">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8996">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-8997">Este serviço processa um evento de barra de deslocamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8997">This service processes a scrollbar event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-8998">Uma função comum de manuseamento de eventos utilizada para widgets verticais e horizontais da barra de deslocamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8998">A common event handling function used for both vertical and horizontal scrollbar widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-8999">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-8999">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9000">**barra de scroll** Bloco de controlo widget de barra de rolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9000">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9001">**evento** Ponteiro para o evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9001">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9002">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9002">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9003">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo de evento de scrollbar bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9003">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9004">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9004">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9005">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9005">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9006">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9006">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9007">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9007">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9008">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9008">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9009">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9009">Example</span></span>

```C
Call generic scrollbar event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scrollbar_event_process(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
                                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scrollbar
            event processing */
        gx_scrollbar_event_process(scrollbar, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_limit_check"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9016">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9016">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9017">Verifique o limite da barra de deslocação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9017">Check scrollbar limit</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9018">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9018">Prototype</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9019">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9019">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9020">Este serviço verifica o limite da barra de deslocação e impede que a roda do polegar da barra de deslocação viaje para além dos limites predefinidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9020">This service checks the limit of the scrollbar and prevents the scrollbar thumbwheel from traveling beyond the predefined limits.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9021">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9021">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9022">**barra de scroll** Bloco de controlo widget de barra de rolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9022">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9023">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9023">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9024">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Verificação de limites de barra de deslocação bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9024">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar limit check</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9025">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9025">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9026">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9026">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9027">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9027">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9028">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9028">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9029">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9029">Initialization and threads</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9037">gx_scrollbar_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9037">gx_scrollbar_reset</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9038">Barra de deslocamento de reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9038">Reset scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9039">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9039">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_reset(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9040">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9040">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9041">Este serviço reinicia a barra de deslocação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9041">This service resets the scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9042">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9042">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9043">**barra de scroll** Bloco de controlo widget de barra de rolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9043">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9044">**informação** Ponteiro para GX_SCROLL_INFO estrutura que define os limites da barra de deslocamento, valor atual e passo ou incremento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9044">**info** Pointer to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure that defines the scrollbar limits, current value, and step or increment.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9045">**O apêndice I** contém definição para GX_SCROLL_INFO estrutura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9045">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9046">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9046">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9047">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Reset da barra de deslocamento bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9047">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar reset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9048">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9048">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9049">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9049">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9050">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9050">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9051">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Informações de deslocação não válidas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9051">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9052">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9052">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9053">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9053">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9054">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9054">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Reset scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */

GX_SCROLL_INFO my_info;

my_info.gx_scroll_value = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_minimum = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_maximum = 100;
my_info.gx_scroll_visible = 10;
my_info.gx_scroll_increment = 1;

status = gx_scrollbar_reset(&my_scrollbar, &my_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9061">gx_scrollbar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9061">gx_scrollbar_value_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9062">Atribuir valor da barra de deslocação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9062">Assign scrollbar value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9063">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9063">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_value_set(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    INT value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9064">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9064">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9065">Este serviço atribui o valor atual da barra de deslocação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9065">This service assigns the current scrollbar value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9066">Um evento GX_EVENT_VERTICAL_SCROLL ou GX_EVENT_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL será gerado para a janela dos pais.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9066">A GX_EVENT_VERTICAL_SCROLL or GX_EVENT_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL event will be generated to the parent window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9067">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9067">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9068">**barra de scroll** Bloco de controlo widget de barra de rolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9068">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9069">**valor** Novo valor da barra de deslocação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9069">**value** New scrollbar value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9070">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9070">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9071">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo de evento de scrollbar bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9071">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9072">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9072">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9073">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9073">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9074">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9074">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9075">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) O valor do pergaminho não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9075">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll value is not valid</span></span>


## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_backspace"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9085">gx_single_line_text_input_backspace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9085">gx_single_line_text_input_backspace</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_backspace(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9089">Este serviço elimina o carácter antes da posição do cursor de entrada de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9089">This service deletes the character before text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9090">Este serviço é chamado internamente quando um evento de chave de backspace para baixo é recebido, mas também pode ser invocado pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9090">This service is called internally when a backspace key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9097">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9097">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>

```C

```

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9200">Este serviço elimina o carácter após a posição do cursor de entrada de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9200">This service deletes the character after the text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9201">Este serviço é chamado internamente quando um evento de eliminação de chave para baixo é recebido, mas também pode ser invocado pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9201">This service is called internally when a delete key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9234">gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9234">gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9236">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9236">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9237">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9237">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9238">Este serviço insere uma cadeia de caracteres no tampão de cadeia de entrada de texto na posição atual do cursor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9238">This service inserts a character string into the text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9239">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9239">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9240">**text_input** Bloco de controlo widget de entrada de texto de linha única</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9240">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9241">**insert_str** Cadeia de caracteres a ser inserida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9241">**insert_str** Character string to be inserted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9242">**insert_size** Contagem de byte a ser inserida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9242">**insert_size** Byte count to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9243">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9243">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Inseriu com sucesso o personagem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9245">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9245">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9247">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9247">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9248">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9248">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9249">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9249">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9250">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9250">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */

GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
status = gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert(&my_text_input,
                                            insert_text,
                                            GX_STRLEN(insert_text));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget has successfully insert the string. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9272">gx_single_line_text_input_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9272">gx_single_line_text_input_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9273">Criar um widget de entrada de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9273">Create a text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9274">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9274">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_create(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    UINT style, USHORT text_input_id, GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9275">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9275">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9276">Este serviço cria um widget de entrada de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9276">This service creates a text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9277">O chamador deve fornecer armazenamento para a cadeia de entrada e indicar o comprimento máximo da corda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9277">The caller must provide storage for the input string and indicate the maximum length of the string.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9278">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT é derivado de GX_PROMPT e, portanto, todos os serviços gx_prompt podem ser utilizados com widgets GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9278">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_PROMPT and therefore all gx_prompt services may be used with GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9279">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9279">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9280">**text_input** Bloco de controlo widget de entrada de texto de linha única</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9280">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9281">**nome** Nome lógico de widget opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9281">**name** Optional widget logical name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9282">**pai** Widget parental opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9282">**parent** Optional parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9283">**input_buffer** Armazenamento para cadeia de entrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9283">**input_buffer** Storage for input string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9284">**buffer_size** Tamanho da área de armazenamento de cordas de entrada, em bytes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9284">**buffer_size** Size of input string storage area, in bytes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9285">**estilo** Bandeiras de estilo de entrada de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9285">**style** Text input style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9286">**text_input_id** ID opcional do widget de entrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9286">**text_input_id** Optional ID of the input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9287">**tamanho** Retângulo definindo o tamanho inicial do widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9287">**size** Rectangle defining initial widget size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9288">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9288">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Entrada de texto de linha única bem sucedida cria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9289">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9290">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9290">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9292">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9292">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9293">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9293">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9294">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9294">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9295">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9295">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9296">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9296">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9297">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9297">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
static GX_CHAR           text_input_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE             size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 110, 40);

/* Create single-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
                        “text_input”, GX_NULL, text_input_buffer, 100,
                        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, 0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input widget has been created. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9320">Desenhe um widget de entrada de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9320">Draw a text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9321">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9321">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_single_line_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9322">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9322">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9323">Este serviço desenha um widget de entrada de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9323">This service draws a text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9324">Este serviço é normalmente chamado internamente durante a atualização de lona, mas também pode ser chamado de funções de desenho de entrada de texto personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9324">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom text input drawing functions.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9326">**text_input** Bloco de controlo widget de entrada de texto de linha única</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9326">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9327">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9327">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9328">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9328">**None**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9330">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9330">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9331">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9331">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom single line text input draw function. */

VOID my_sl_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input)
{
    /* Call default single line text input draw. */
    gx_single_line_text_input_draw(input);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

```C
/* Write a custom single line text input draw function. */

VOID my_sl_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input)
{
GX_VALUE xpos;
GX_VALUE ypos;

    /* Draw background. */
    gx_widget_border_draw(input, border_color, upper_fill_color,
                          lower_fill_color, GX_TRUE);

    /* Retrieve text draw start position. */
    gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get(input, xpos,
                                                ypos);

    /* Add your text drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9426">gx_single_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9426">gx_single_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9427">Função de processamento de evento widget de entrada de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9427">Text input widget event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9428">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9428">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9429">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9429">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9430">Este serviço processa um evento de entrada de texto de uma única linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9430">This service processes a single line text input event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9431">Esta função é referenciada internamente pela função gx_single_line_text_input_create, mas está exposta para utilização pela aplicação nos casos em que a aplicação define uma função de processamento de evento de entrada de texto de linha única personalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9431">This function is internally referenced by the gx_single_line_text_input_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom single line text input event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9432">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9432">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9433">**text_input** Bloco de controlo widget de entrada de texto de linha única</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9433">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9434">**event_ptr** Ponteiro para GX_EVENT estrutura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9434">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9435">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9435">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Evento de entrada de texto processado com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed text input event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9437">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9437">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9439">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9439">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9440">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9441">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9441">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9442">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9442">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic single line text input event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_sl_text_input_event_process(
                                GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
                                GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default single line
            text input event processing */
        status =
        gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(input, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9464">gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9464">gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9465">Definir cor de fundo de fundo de entrada de texto de linha única</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9465">Set single line text input background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9466">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9466">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9467">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9467">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9468">Este serviço define a cor de preenchimento da entrada de texto de linha única.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9468">This service sets the fill color of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9469">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9469">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9470">**text_input** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de entrada de texto de linha única</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9470">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9471">**normal_fill_color_id** Identificação de recursos do widget preencha a cor em estado normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9471">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9472">**O apêndice A** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9472">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9473">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9473">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9474">**selected_fill_color_id** ID de recurso da cor de preenchimento do widget quando o widget ganhar foco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9474">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9475">**O apêndice A** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9475">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9476">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9476">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9477">**disabled_fill_color_id** ID de recurso da cor de preenchimento do widget quando o estilo GX_STYLE_ENABLED não está definido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9477">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9478">**O apêndice A** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9478">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9479">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9479">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9480">**readonly_fill_color_id** ID de recurso da cor de preenchimento do widget quando ambos os GX_STYLE_ENABLED de estilo e GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY estão definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9480">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when both style GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY are set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9481">**O apêndice A** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9481">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9482">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9482">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9483">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9483">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9484">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de cores de preenchimento de texto de linha única bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9484">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9485">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9485">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9486">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9486">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9487">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9487">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9488">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9488">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9489">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9489">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9490">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9490">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” was
set. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9512">gx_single_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9512">gx_single_line_text_input_home</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9513">Mova o cursor de entrada de texto para a posição de casa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9513">Move the text input cursor to the home position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9514">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9514">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_home(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9515">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9515">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9516">Este serviço move a posição do cursor de entrada de texto para o início da cadeia de entrada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9516">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the input string.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9517">Este serviço é chamado internamente quando um evento de home key down é recebido, mas também pode ser invocado pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9517">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9518">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9518">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9519">**text_input** Bloco de controlo widget de entrada de texto de linha única</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9519">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9520">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9520">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9521">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) mudou com sucesso cursor para a posição da casa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9521">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the home position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9522">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9522">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9523">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9523">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9524">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9524">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9525">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9525">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9526">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9526">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9527">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9527">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move cursor to the start of the input text. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_home(&my_text_input);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor has been moved to the home position */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9586">gx_single_line_text_input_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9586">gx_single_line_text_input_position_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9587">Mover cursor para a posição de pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9587">Move cursor to pixel position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9588">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9588">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_position_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    INT pixel_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9589">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9589">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9590">Este serviço posiciona o cursor de entrada de texto com base na posição de pixel solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9590">This service positions the text input cursor based on the requested pixel position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9591">O índice de cursor de entrada de texto será calculado com base no valor x da posição do pixel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9591">The text input cursor index will be calculated based on the x value of the pixel position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9592">Este serviço é chamado internamente quando um evento pen down é recebido, mas também pode ser invocado pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9592">This service is called internally when a pen down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9593">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9593">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9594">**text_input** Bloco de controlo widget de entrada de texto de linha única</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9594">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9595">**pixel_position** Valor X da posição do pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9595">**pixel_position** X value of pixel position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9596">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9596">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9597">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir com sucesso o cursor para a posição solicitada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9597">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the cursor to requested position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9598">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9598">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9599">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9599">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9600">**widget** GX_INVALID_WIDGET (0x12) Inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9600">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9601">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9601">Allowed From</span></span>

```C

status = gx_single_line_text_input_position_get(&my_text_input,
                                                100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget cursor has been positioned */
```

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_style_add(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9664">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9665">Este serviço adiciona o(s) estilo especificado ao widget de entrada de texto de linha única.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9665">This service adds the specified style(s) to the single line text input widget.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9769">gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9769">gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9770">Definir a cor do texto de entrada de texto de linha única</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9770">Set single line text input text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9771">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9771">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9772">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9772">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9773">Este serviço define a cor de texto da entrada de texto de linha única.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9773">This service sets the text color of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9774">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9774">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9775">**text_input** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de entrada de texto de linha única</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9775">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9776">**normal_text_color_id** Identificação de recursos da cor do texto em estado normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9776">**normal_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9777">**O apêndice A** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9777">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9778">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9778">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9779">**selected_text_color_id** ID de recurso da cor do texto quando o widget ganhar foco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9779">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9780">**O apêndice A** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9780">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9781">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9781">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9782">**disabled_text_color_id** ID de recurso da cor do texto quando o estilo GX_STYLE_ENABLED não está definido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9782">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9783">**O apêndice A** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9783">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9784">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9784">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9785">**readonly_text_color_id** ID de recurso da cor do texto quando ambos os GX_STYLE_ENABLED de estilo e GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY são definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9785">**readonly_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when both style GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READONLY are set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9786">**O apêndice A** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9786">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9787">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9787">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9788">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9788">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9789">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de cores de texto de entrada de texto de linha única bem-sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9789">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9790">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9790">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9791">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9791">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9792">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9792">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9793">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9793">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9794">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9794">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9795">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9795">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(&my_text_input,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT,
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text color “my_text_input” was set. */
```
