## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9817">gx_single_line_text_input_text_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9817">gx_single_line_text_input_text_select</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9818">Selecione texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9818">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9819">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9819">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9820">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9820">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9821">Este serviço seleciona texto com índice de marca de início e de marca final especificado e destaca o texto selecionado com as cores de preenchimento e texto selecionados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9821">This service selects text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9822">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9822">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9823">**text_input** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de entrada de texto de linha única</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9823">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9824">**start_index** Índice do primeiro caráter selecionado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9824">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9825">**end_index** Índice do último caráter selecionado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9825">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9826">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9826">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9827">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Seleção de texto de entrada de texto de linha única bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9827">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9828">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9828">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9829">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9829">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9830">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9830">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9831">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Valor do índice não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9831">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Index value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9832">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9832">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9833">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9833">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9834">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9834">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select text between index [0, 9]. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_select(&my_text_input,
                                                0,9);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text between index [0, 9] “my_text_input” was selected. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9855">gx_single_line_text_input_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9855">gx_single_line_text_input_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9856">Definir texto de entrada de texto de linha única (precotado)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9856">Set single line text input text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9857">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9857">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9858">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9858">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9859">Este serviço foi precotado a favor de gx_single_line_text_input_text_set_ext()</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9859">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_single_line_text_input_text_set_ext()</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9860">Este serviço define o texto da entrada de texto de linha única.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9860">This service sets the text of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9861">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9861">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9862">**text_input** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de entrada de texto de linha única</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9862">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9863">**texto** Cadeia de texto terminada nulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9863">**text** NULL-terminated text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9864">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9864">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9865">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de cores de texto de entrada de texto de linha única bem-sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9865">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9866">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9866">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9867">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9867">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9868">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9868">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9869">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Comprimento da corda inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9869">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9870">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9870">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9871">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9871">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9872">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9872">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR new_text = “Set Single Line Text Input Text”;

/* Set text for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_text_set(&my_text_input,
                                        new_text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text of “my_text_input” was set. */
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9891">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9891">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING new_string;
new_string.gx_string_ptr = “Set Single Line Text Input Text”;
new_string.gx_string_length = strlen(new_string.gx_string_ptr);

/* Set text for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9912">gx_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9912">gx_slider_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9913">Criar slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9913">Create slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9914">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9914">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_create(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, INT tick_count,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *slider_info,
    ULONG style, USHORT slider_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9915">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9915">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9916">Este serviço cria um widget de slider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9916">This service creates a slider widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9917">GX_SLIDER é derivado de GX_WIDGET, pelo que todos os serviços gx_widget API podem ser utilizados com widgets GX_SLIDER tipo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9917">GX_SLIDER is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_SLIDER type widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9918">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9918">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9919">**slider**: Bloco de controlo de widget slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9919">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9920">**nome**: Nome do deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9920">**name**: Name of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9921">**pai**: Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9921">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9922">**tick_count**: Número de carraças deslizantes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9922">**tick_count**: Number of slider ticks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9923">**slider_info**: Ponteiro para deslizar informação que é uma estrutura usada para passar os limites de valor do deslizador, o tamanho e posição da agulha deslizante e outros parâmetros de slider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9923">**slider_info**: Pointer to slider info which is a structure used to pass the slider value limits, slider needle size and position, and other slider parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9924">**O apêndice I** contém definição para GX_SLIDER_INFO estrutura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9924">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9925">**estilo**: Estilo de slider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9925">**style**: Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9926">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais predefinidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos do widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9926">**Appendix D** contains predefined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9927">**slider_id**: ID definido por aplicação de slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9927">**slider_id**: Application-defined ID of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9928">**tamanho**: Dimensões do deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9928">**size**: Dimensions of slider</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9929">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9929">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9930">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Criação de slider bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9930">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9931">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9931">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9932">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9932">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9933">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9933">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9934">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9934">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9935">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget parental não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9935">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9937">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9937">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9938">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9938">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create slider “my_slider”. */

GX_SLIDER my_slider;
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;

info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

status = gx_slider_create(&my_slider, “my_slider”,
    &my_parent, 10, info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SLIDER, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the slider “my_slider” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9953">gx_slider_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9953">gx_slider_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9954">Desenhe o slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9954">Draw slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9955">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9955">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9956">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9956">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9957">Este serviço desenha um slider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9957">This service draws a slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9958">Este serviço é utilizado internamente pela função gx_slider_create, mas também é exposto para utilização pela aplicação nesses casos quando é definida uma função de desenho de slider personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9958">This service is used internally by the gx_slider_create function, but is also exposed for use by the application in those instances when a custom slider drawing function is defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9959">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9959">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9960">**slider**: Bloco de controlo de widget slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9960">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9961">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9961">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9962">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9962">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9963">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9963">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9964">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9964">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9965">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9965">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Call default slider draw. */
    gx_slider_draw(slider);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9980">gx_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9980">gx_slider_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9981">Evento de slider de processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9981">Process slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9982">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9982">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_event_process(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9983">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9983">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9984">Este serviço processa um evento de slider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9984">This service processes a slider event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9985">Esta função é referenciada internamente pela função gx_slider_create, mas está exposta para utilização pela aplicação nos casos em que a aplicação define uma função de processamento de eventos de slider personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9985">This function is internally referenced by the gx_slider_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom slider event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9986">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9986">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9987">**slider**: Bloco de controlo de widget slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9987">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9988">**evento**: Ponteiro para evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9988">**event**: Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9989">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9989">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9990">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Processo de evento de slider bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9990">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9991">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9991">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9992">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9992">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-9993">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9993">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9994">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9994">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-9995">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9995">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-9996">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-9996">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic slider event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_slider_event_process(GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default slider event processing */
            status = gx_slider_event_process(slider, event);
            break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10011">gx_slider_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10011">gx_slider_info_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10013">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10013">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_info_set(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10014">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10014">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10015">Este serviço atribui as informações de slider especificadas, tais como o mínimo de slider, o máximo de deslizamento e o valor de corrente do slider para o deslizador indicado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10015">This service assigns the specified slider information such as slider minimum, slider maximum, and slider current value to the indicated slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10016">O slider atualizará a posição da agulha e redesenhará com base nas novas informações de slider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10016">The slider will update the needle position and redraw based on the new slider information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10017">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10017">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10018">**slider**: Bloco de controlo de widget slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10018">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10019">**informação**: Ponteiro para a estrutura de informação do slider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10019">**info**: Pointer to the slider information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10020">**O apêndice I** contém definição para GX_SLIDER_INFO estrutura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10020">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10021">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10022">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Definir com sucesso informações de slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10022">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set slider information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10024">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10024">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10026">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10026">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10028">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10028">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SLIDER_INFO my_slider_info;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;

my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

/* Set slider information for slider “my_slider”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_slider” is configured with my_slider_info. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_needle_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10043">gx_slider_needle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10043">gx_slider_needle_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10044">Desenhe a agulha de slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10044">Draw slider needle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10045">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10045">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_needle_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10046">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10046">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10047">Este serviço desenha uma agulha deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10047">This service draws a slider needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10048">Este serviço é automaticamente chamado pela função gx_slider_draw, mas também pode ser invocado pela aplicação como parte de uma função de desenho de slider personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10048">This service is automatically called by the gx_slider_draw function, but may also be invoked by the application as part of a customized slider drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10049">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10049">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10050">**slider**: Bloco de controlo de widget slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10050">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10051">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10051">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10052">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10052">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10053">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10053">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10054">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10054">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10055">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10055">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default tickmarks draw. */
    gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(slider);

    /* Call default slider needle draw. */
    gx_slider_needle_draw(slider);
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_needle_position_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10070">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10070">gx_slider_needle_position_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10071">Obtenha a posição da agulha deslizante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10071">Get slider needle position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10072">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10072">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_needle_position_get(
    GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *slider_info,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10073">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10073">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10074">Este serviço calcula a posição da agulha deslizante com base no valor atual do slider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10074">This service computes the slider needle position based on the current slider value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10075">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10075">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10076">**slider**: Bloco de controlo de widget slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10076">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10077">**slider_info**: Ponteiro para deslizar estrutura de informação que define os limites do deslizador, tamanho da agulha e offset, e outros parâmetros de slider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10077">**slider_info**: Pointer to slider information structure defining the slider limits, needle size and offset, and other slider parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10078">**O apêndice I** contém definição para GX_SLIDER_INFO estrutura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10078">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10079">**return_position**: Ponter para o destino para a posição da agulha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10079">**return_position**: Pointer to destination for needle position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10080">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10080">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10081">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Posição de agulha de slider bem sucedida obter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10081">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider needle position get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10082">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10082">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10083">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10083">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10084">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10084">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10085">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Informações de slider não válidas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10085">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10086">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10086">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10087">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10087">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10088">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10088">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE needle_position;

/* Get the needle position for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_needle_posistion_get(&my_slider, &slider_info,
    &needle_position);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the needle position for slider “my_slider” has been retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_tickmarks_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10103">gx_slider_tickmarks_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10103">gx_slider_tickmarks_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10104">Desenhe marcas de carraças de slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10104">Draw slider tickmarks</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10105">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10105">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10106">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10106">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10107">Este serviço desenha as marcas de carraças deslizantes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10107">This service draws the slider tickmarks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10108">Esta função é chamada internamente pela função gx_slider_draw, mas é exposta para utilização por aplicações que podem implementar uma função de desenho de slider personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10108">This function is called internally by the gx_slider_draw function, but is exposed for use by applications that might implement a custom slider drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10109">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10109">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10110">**slider**: Bloco de controlo de widget slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10110">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10111">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10111">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10112">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10112">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10113">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10113">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10114">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10114">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10115">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10115">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default tickmarks draw. */
    gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(slider);

    /* Call default slider needle draw. */
    gx_slider_needle_draw(slider);
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_travel_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10130">gx_slider_travel_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10130">gx_slider_travel_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10131">Obtenha viagens de slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10131">Get slider travel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10132">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10132">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_travel_get(
    GX_SLIDER *widget,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    INT *return_min_travel, 
    INT *return_max_travel);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10133">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10133">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10134">Este serviço faz com que o slider viaje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10134">This service gets the slider travel.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10135">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10135">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10136">**slider**: Bloco de controlo de widget slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10136">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10137">**informação**: Ponteiro para slider estrutura de informação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10137">**info**: Pointer to slider info structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10138">**O apêndice I** contém definição para GX_SLIDER_INFO estrutura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10138">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10139">**return_min_travel**: Ponter para destino para o valor mínimo da viagem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10139">**return_min_travel**: Pointer to destination for minimum travel value</span></span></td>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10140">**return_max_travell**: Ponter para o destino para o valor máximo da viagem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10140">**return_max_travell**: Pointer to destination for maximum travel value</span></span></td>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10146">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Informações de slider não válidas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10146">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_slider_value_calculate"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10164">gx_slider_value_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10164">gx_slider_value_calculate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10165">Calcular o valor do slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10165">Calculate slider value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10166">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10166">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_value_calculate(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    INT new_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10167">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10167">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10168">Este serviço calcula o valor do deslizador com base na posição da agulha deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10168">This service calculates the slider value based on the slider needle position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10169">Esta função é chamada internamente pelo GUIX quando o utilizador move a agulha de slider, mas também pode ser invocada pela aplicação ao implementar um widget de slider personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10169">This function is called internally by GUIX when the user moves the slider needle, but can also be invoked by the application when implementing a custom slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10170">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10170">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10171">**slider**: Bloco de controlo de widget slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10171">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10172">**informações**: Ponteiro para informação de slider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10172">**info**: Pointer to slider info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10173">**O apêndice I** contém definição para GX_LISDER_INFO estrutura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10173">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_LISDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10174">**new_position**: Nova posição de slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10174">**new_position**: New slider position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10175">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10175">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10176">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Calcular o valor do slider bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10176">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider value calculate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10177">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10177">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10178">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10178">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10180">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Informações de slider não válidas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10180">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10181">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10181">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10182">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10182">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10183">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10183">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Calculate new value for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_value_calculate(&my_slider,
    &my_slider.gx_slider_info, new_slider_position);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the slider value of “my_slider” has been calculated. */

```

## <a name="gx_slider_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10198">gx_slider_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10198">gx_slider_value_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10199">Definir valor de slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10199">Set slider value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10200">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10200">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_value_set(
    GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info, 
    INT new_value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10201">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10201">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10202">Este serviço define o valor do slider.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10202">This service sets the slider value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10203">Esta API pode ser chamada pela aplicação para mover uma agulha de slider sob controlo do programa, ignorando a necessidade de entrada do utilizador para arrastar a agulha deslizante.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10203">This API can be called by the application to move a slider needle under program control, bypassing the need for user input to drag the slider needle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10204">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10204">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10205">**slider**: Bloco de controlo de widget slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10205">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10206">**informação**: Ponteiro para slider estrutura de informação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10206">**info**: Pointer to slider info structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10207">**Apêndice I** contém definição para GX_SLIDER_INFO estrutura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10207">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10208">**new_value**: Novo valor de slider</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10208">**new_value**: New slider value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10209">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10209">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10210">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Conjunto de valor de slider bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10210">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10211">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10211">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10212">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10212">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10213">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10213">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10214">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10214">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10215">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10215">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10216">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10216">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set new value for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_value_set(&my_slider,
    &my_slider.gx_slider_info, new_value);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new value has been set for slider “my_slider”. */
```

##  <a name="gx_sprite_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10231">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10231">gx_sprite_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10232">Criar um widget sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10232">Create a sprite widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10233">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10233">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_create(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_SPRITE_FRAME *frame_list,
    USHORT frame_count,
    ULONG style, USHORT sprite_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10234">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10235">Este serviço cria um widget GX_SPRITE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10235">This service creates a GX_SPRITE widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10236">Um sprite é usado para exibir uma sequência de pixelmaps como em uma animação, ou pode ser usado como um widget de exibição de pixelmap multi-estado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10236">A sprite is used to display a sequence of pixelmaps as in an animation, or can be used as a multi-state pixelmap display widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10237">GX_SPRITE é derivado de GX_WIDGET e suporta todos os gx_widget serviços da API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10237">GX_SPRITE is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10238">O widget GX_SPRITE requer uma variedade de estruturas GX_SPRITE_FRAME para definir a animação sprite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10238">The GX_SPRITE widget requires an array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures to define the sprite animation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10239">**O apêndice I** contém definição para GX_PRITE_FRAME estrutura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10239">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_PRITE_FRAME structure.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10240">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10240">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10241">**sprite**: Bloco de controlo de widget sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10241">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10242">**nome**: Nome de sprite opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10242">**name**: Optional sprite name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10243">**pai**: Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10243">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10244">**frame_list**: Uma variedade de estruturas GX_SPRITE_FRAME</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10244">**frame_list**: An array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10245">**frame_count**: especifica o número de entradas na matriz da lista de quadros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10245">**frame_count**: specifies the number of entries in the frame list array</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10246">**estilo**: Estilo de sprite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10246">**style**: Style of sprite.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10247">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais predefinidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos do widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10247">**Appendix D** contains predefined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10248">**sprite_id**: ID definido pela aplicação de sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10248">**sprite_id**: Application-defined ID of sprite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10249">**tamanho**: Dimensões do sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10249">**size**: Dimensions of sprite</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10250">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10250">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10251">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Criação de sprite bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10251">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful sprite create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10252">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10252">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10253">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10253">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10254">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10254">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10255">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget parental não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10255">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10256">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10256">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10257">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10257">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10258">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10258">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create sprite “my_sprite”. */

status = gx_sprite_create(&my_sprite, “my_sprite”,
    &my_parent,
    sprite_frame_list, frame_count,
    GX_STYLE_SPRITE_AUTO|GX_STYLE_SPRITE_LOOP,
    ID_MY_SPRITE, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_sprite_current_frame_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10264">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10264">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10265">Atribuir quadro sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10265">Assign sprite frame</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10266">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10266">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_current_frame_set(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, 
    USHORT frame);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10267">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10268">Este serviço atribui a estrutura de sprite atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10268">This service assigns the current sprite frame.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10269">Se um widget GX_SPRITE não estiver a funcionar automaticamente, pode ser utilizado como uma luz de estado controlada por programa, exibindo o mapa pixelmap de quadro comandado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10269">If a GX_SPRITE widget is not auto-running, it can be used as a program controlled state light, displaying the commanded frame pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10270">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10270">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10271">**sprite**: Bloco de controlo de widget sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10271">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10272">**quadro**: Quadro sprite para exibir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10272">**frame**: Sprite frame to display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10273">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10273">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10274">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10274">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10275">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10275">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10276">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10276">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10277">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10277">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10278">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10278">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10279">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10279">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10280">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10280">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign frame number 3 as the current sprite frame */
status = gx_sprite_current_frame_set(&my_sprite, 3);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” will display frame index 3. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10281">Consulte também</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10281">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10285">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10285">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_sprite_frame_list_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10286">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10286">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10287">Atribuir ou alterar uma lista de quadros de sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10287">Assign or alter a sprite frame list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10288">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10288">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_frame_list_set(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite,
    GX_SPRITE_FRAME *frame_list,
    USHORT frame_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10289">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10289">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10290">Este serviço pode ser usado para atribuir ou reatribuir a lista de quadros utilizada por um widget sprite após a criação do widget sprite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10290">This service can be used to assign or re-assign the frame list used by a sprite widget after the sprite widget has been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10291">Para obter informações sobre o conteúdo de uma lista de quadros de sprite, consulte a documentação gx_sprite_create API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10291">For information about the contents of a sprite frame list, refer to the gx_sprite_create API documentation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10292">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10292">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10293">**sprite**: Bloco de controlo de widget sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10293">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10294">**frame_list**: Conjunto de estruturas de GX_SPRITE_FRAME ou GX_NULL se não houver lista de quadros.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10294">**frame_list**: Array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures or GX_NULL if no frame list.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10295">**frame_count**: Número de quadros na matriz da lista de quadros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10295">**frame_count**: Number of frames in frame list array</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10296">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10296">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10297">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Conjunto de quadros de sprite bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10297">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful sprite frame list set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10298">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10298">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10299">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10299">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10300">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10300">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10301">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10301">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10302">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10302">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10303">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10303">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign framelist_1, which has 10 frames, to my_sprite */
status = gx_sprite_frame_list_set(&my_sprite, framelist_1, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new frame list is now associated with this sprite */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10304">Consulte também</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10304">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10307">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10307">gx_sprite_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10308">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10308">gx_sprite_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_sprite_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10309">gx_sprite_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10309">gx_sprite_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10310">Inicie uma sequência de corrida sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10310">Start a sprite run sequence</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10311">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10311">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_start(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, 
    USHORT frame);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10312">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10312">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10313">Este serviço inicia uma sequência de funcionação automática.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10313">This service starts a sprite auto-run sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10314">O widget sprite irá pedalar através dos quadros do sprite até que o último quadro seja atingido, ou funcionará continuamente se o estilo GX_SPRITE_LOOP estiver definido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10314">The sprite widget will cycle through the sprite frames until the last frame is reached, or will run continuously if the GX_SPRITE_LOOP style is set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10315">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10315">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10316">**sprite**: Bloco de controlo de widget sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10316">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10317">**quadro**: Quadro inicial de sprite para exibir, geralmente quadro 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10317">**frame**: Initial sprite frame to display, usually frame 0</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10318">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10318">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10319">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Começou com sucesso a corrida de sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10319">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully started sprite run</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10320">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10320">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10321">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10321">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10322">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10322">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10323">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10323">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10324">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10324">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10325">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10325">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start the sprite “my_sprite” */
status = gx_sprite_start(&my_sprite, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” will start running */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10326">Consulte também</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10326">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10329">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10329">gx_sprite_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10330">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10330">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_sprite_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10331">gx_sprite_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10331">gx_sprite_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10332">Pare uma sequência de corrida sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10332">Stop a sprite run sequence</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10333">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10333">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_stop(GX_SPRITE *sprite);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10334">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10334">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10335">Este serviço para uma sequência de funcionação automática.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10335">This service stops a sprite auto-run sequence.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10336">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10336">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10337">**sprite**: Bloco de controlo de widget sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10337">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10338">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10338">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10339">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Com sucesso parou a corrida de sprite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10339">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully stopped sprite run</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10340">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10341">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10341">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10342">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10342">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10351">gx_string_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10351">gx_string_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10352">Criar uma roda de pergaminho tipo de corda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10352">Create a string type scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10353">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10353">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string_list, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT Id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10354">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10354">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10355">Este serviço cria uma roda de deslocação tipo de corda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10355">This service creates a string type scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10356">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL é derivado de GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL, e, portanto, todas as funções gx_text_scroll_wheel API talvez sejam usadas com widgets GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10356">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL, and therefore all gx_text_scroll_wheel API functions maybe be used with GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL widgets.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10357">A aplicação pode passar numa simples matriz de cordas para a função de criar que define as cordas que serão exibidas pela roda de deslocação, ou a aplicação pode passar GX_NULL como parâmetro string_list e chamar a `gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set()` API para fornecer uma matriz de IDs de corda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10357">The application can pass in a simple string array to the create function which defines the strings that will be displayed by the scroll wheel, or the application can pass GX_NULL as the string_list parameter and call the `gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set()` API to provide an array of String IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10358">Se este último método for utilizado, a roda de deslocação de cordas mudará automaticamente as cordas visualizadas se o idioma de aplicação ativo for modificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10358">If the latter method is used the string scroll wheel will automatically switch the displayed strings if the active application language is modified.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10359">Como alternativa, se as cordas a exibir não estiverem estáticas definidas ou não souberem no momento em que a roda de deslocação é criada, a aplicação pode passar GX_NULL como parâmetro da lista de cordas, e chamar a função API gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set() para definir uma função de retorno que fornecerá as cordas a serem exibidas em tempo real como necessário..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10359">As an alternative, if the strings to be displayed are not statically defined or not know at the time the scroll wheel is created, the application can pass GX_NULL as the string list parameter, and call the API function gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set() to define a callback function which will provide the strings to be displayed in a real-time as-needed basis..</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10360">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10360">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10361">**roda**: Endereço do bloco de controlo da roda de roda de roda de fio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10361">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10362">**nome**: Nome de widget definido por aplicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10362">**name**: Application defined widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10363">**pai**: Mãe da roda ou GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10363">**parent**: Wheel parent or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10364">**total_rows**: Filas totais a apresentar ao utilizador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10364">**total_rows**: Total rows to be presented to user</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10365">**string_list**: Array de cordas estáticamente definido, ou GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10365">**string_list**: Statically defined string array, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10366">**estilo**: Bandeiras de estilo desejadas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10366">**style**: Desired style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10367">**Id**: Aplicação definida bandeiras de estilo roda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10367">**Id**: Application defined wheel style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10368">**tamanho**: Tamanho inicial da roda de deslocação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10368">**size**: Initial scroll wheel size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10369">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10369">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10370">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Roda de pergaminho de corda criada com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10370">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully created string scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10371">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10371">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10372">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10372">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10373">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10373">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10374">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10374">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10375">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10375">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10376">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10376">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10377">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10377">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *days[] = {
    “Sunday”,
    “Monday”,
    “Tuesday”,
    “Wednesday”,
    “Thursday”,
    “Friday”,
    “Saturday”
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* Create the string scroll wheel. */

status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “Day Wheel”,
    root, 7, days,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND,
    ID_SCROLL_WHEEL_DAY, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string scroll wheel has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10396">gx_string_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10396">gx_string_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>

```C
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_RESOURCE_ID *string_id_list, 
    INT id_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10399">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10399">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10400">Este serviço processa um evento para a roda de deslocação de cordas especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10400">This service processes an event for the specified string scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10401">Este serviço deve ser chamado como o manipulador de eventos predefinido por quaisquer funções de processamento de eventos de roda de roda de roda de fio personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10401">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom string scroll wheel event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10402">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10402">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10403">**roda** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo da roda de roda de roda de roda de cadeia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10403">**wheel** Pointer to string scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10404">**event_ptr** Ponteiro para o evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10404">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10405">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10405">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10406">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo de evento de roda de roda de roda de roda de corda bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10406">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful string scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10407">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10407">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10408">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10408">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10409">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10409">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10410">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10410">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10411">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10411">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10412">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10412">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic string scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_string_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default string scroll wheel event processing */
        status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```
