### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10434">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10434">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10435">Este serviço atribui uma variedade de IDs de corda a um widget de roda de roda de roda de fio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10435">This service assigns an array of string IDs to a string scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10436">Este método de atribuição de cordas a uma roda de deslocamento de cordas é recomendado se as cordas estiverem estáticas definidas e o widget funcionar em várias línguas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10436">This method of assigning strings to a string scroll wheel is recommended if the strings are statically defined and the widget must operate in multiple languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10437">Se esta API for utilizada, o widget da roda de deslocação deve ser criado primeiro com uma lista de cordas GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10437">If this API is to be used, the scroll wheel widget should first be created with a GX_NULL string list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10438">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10438">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10439">**roda**: Endereço do bloco de controlo da roda de roda de roda de fio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10439">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10440">**string_id_list**: Matriz de IDs de cordas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10440">**string_id_list**: Array of String IDs</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10441">**id_count:** Tamanho da lista de identificação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10441">**id_count**: Size of the ID list.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10442">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10442">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10443">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) definir com sucesso a matriz de ID de corda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10443">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set string ID array</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10444">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10444">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10445">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10445">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10446">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10446">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10447">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: 0x22) Tamanho da lista de ID inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10447">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: 0x22) Invalid ID list size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10448">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10448">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10450">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10450">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST RESOURCE_ID wheel_ids[] = {
    GX_STRING_ID_SUNDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_MONDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_TUESDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_WEDNESDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_THURSDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_FRIDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_SATURDAY
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* Stop the sprite sequence */

status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set(&wheel, wheel_ids, 7);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the ID list has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10469">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10469">gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10470">Atribuir matriz de cordas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10470">Assign array of strings</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10471">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10471">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string_list, 
    INT string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10472">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10472">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10473">Isto atribui uma variedade de cordas a um widget de roda de roda de roda de roda de fio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10473">This assigns an array of strings to a string scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10474">Isto pode ser usado para modificar as cordas apresentadas após a criação do widget inicialmente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10474">This can be used to modify the strings displayed after the widget has initially been created.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10475">Note que string_scroll_wheel não suporta GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, pelo que a matriz de cordas passadas nesta função deve ser definida estáticamente pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10475">Note that string_scroll_wheel does not support GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, and therefore the array of strings passed into this function should be statically defined by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10476">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10476">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10477">**roda**: Endereço do bloco de controlo da roda de roda de roda de fio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10477">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10478">**string_list**: Conjunto de ponteiros de cordas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10478">**string_list**: Array of string pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10479">**string_count:** Tamanho da matriz de cordas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10479">**string_count**: Size of the string array.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10480">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10480">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10481">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Mudou com sucesso as cordas para roda de deslocação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10481">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully changed strings for scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10482">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10482">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10483">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10483">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10484">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10484">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10485">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Tamanho da lista de cordas inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10485">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Invalid string list size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10486">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10486">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10487">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10487">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10488">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10488">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *days[] = {
    “Sunday”,
    “Monday”,
    “Tuesday”,
    “Wednesday”,
    “Thursday”,
    “Friday”,
    “Saturday”
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* Set the array of strings to the scroll wheel. */

status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set(&wheel, days, 7);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string array has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_studio_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10507">gx_studio_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10507">gx_studio_widget_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10508">Criar widget definido no arquivo de especificações gerados pelo Studio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10508">Create widget defined in Studio generated specifications file</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10509">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10509">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *gx_studio_widget_create(
    GX_BYTE *control,
    GX_CONST GX_STUDIO_WIDGET *definition, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10510">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10510">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10511">Este serviço cria um widget e os filhos do widget usando uma especificação widget definida dentro do ficheiro de especificações geradas pelo ESTÚDIO GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10511">This service creates a widget and the widget’s children using a widget specification defined within the GUIX Studio generated specifications file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10512">Esta função evita o aspeto "por nome" da função semelhante `gx_studio_named_widget_create()` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10512">This function avoids the “by name” lookup of the similar function `gx_studio_named_widget_create()`.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10513">A estrutura GX_STUDIO_WIDGET é definida no ficheiro cabeçalho de especificações de aplicação gerado pelo GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10513">The GX_STUDIO_WIDGET structure is defined in the application specifications header file generated by GUIX Studio.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10514">Para widgets atribuídos estáticamente, o bloco de controlo widget é definido nas especificações geradas.c ficheiro, e dado o nome widget definido dentro do GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10514">For statically allocated widgets, the widget control block is defined in the generated specifications.c file, and given the widget name defined within GUIX Studio.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10515">Para widgets dinamicamente atribuídos, a aplicação deve passar GX_NULL como o endereço do bloco de controlo widget e a função tentará alocar dinamicamente o bloco de controlo widget utilizando a `gx_system_memory_allocate()` função, que também é definida e fornecida pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10515">For dynamically allocated widgets, the application should pass GX_NULL as the widget control block address and the function will attempt to dynamically allocate the widget control block using the `gx_system_memory_allocate()` function, which is also defined by and provided by the application.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10516">Para uma aplicação para referenciar diretamente a definição widget do GUIX Studio dentro do ficheiro de especificações geradas, é necessário seguir a convenção de nomeação utilizada pelo gerador de código GUI Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10516">For an application to directly reference the GUIX Studio widget definition within the generated specifications file, it is necessary to follow the naming convention utilized by the GUI Studio code generator.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10517">A estrutura GX_STUDIO_WIDGET gerada dentro das especificações.c ficheiro é sempre nomeado de acordo com esta convenção: <widget_name>_define, onde o campo <widget_name> pode ser repetido várias vezes se o widget for filho de um widget infantil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10517">The GX_STUDIO_WIDGET structure generated within the specifications.c file is always named according to this convention: <widget_name>_define, where the <widget_name> field may be repeated multiple times if the widget is child of a child widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10518">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10518">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10519">**controlo** Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo do widget, ou GX_NULL se for atribuído de forma dinâmica.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10519">**control** Pointer to widget control block, or GX_NULL if dynamically allocated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10520">**definição** Estrutura de definição de widget gerada por estúdio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10520">**definition** Studio generated widget definition structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10521">**ponteiro dos pais** para o progenitor widget, se houver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10521">**parent** pointer to the widget parent, if any</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10522">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10522">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10523">O ponteiro para o bloco de controlo widget criado, ou GX_NULL se a criação não foi bem sucedida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10523">Pointer to the created widget control block, or GX_NULL if the creation was not successful.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10524">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10524">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10525">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10525">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10526">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10526">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget “playlist_screen”, which is statically allocated. */

widget = gx_studio_widget_create(&playlist_screen,
    &playlist_screen_define,
    root_window);

/* If widget != GX_NULL the widget was created. */

/* create the widget “songs_screen”, which is dynamically allocated */

widget = gx_studio_widget_create(GX_NULL,
    &songs_screen_define, root_window);
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10527">Consulte também</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10527">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10528">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10528">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_studio_named_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10529">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10529">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10530">Criar widget definido no arquivo de especificações gerados pelo Studio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10530">Create widget defined in Studio generated specifications file</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10531">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10531">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT *gx_studio_named_widget_create(
    char *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **new_widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10532">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10532">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10533">Este serviço cria um widget e os filhos do widget usando uma especificação widget definida dentro do ficheiro de especificações geradas pelo ESTÚDIO GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10533">This service creates a widget and the widget’s children using a widget specification defined within the GUIX Studio generated specifications file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10534">Esta função API é utilizada para criar ecrãs de alto nível utilizando o nome do ecrã especificado na aplicação GUIX Studio como identificador de definição de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10534">This API function is used to create top-level screens using the screen name specified within the GUIX Studio application as the widget definition identifier.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10535">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10535">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10536">**nome**: Nome do ecrã definido na aplicação GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10536">**name**: Screen name as defined within GUIX Studio application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10537">**pai**: ponteiro para o progenitor widget, se houver</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10537">**parent**: pointer to the widget parent, if any</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10538">**new_widget:** localização para devolver o ponteiro widget criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10538">**new_widget**: location to return created widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10539">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10539">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10540">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10540">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10541">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) Widget nomeado não foi encontrado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10541">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) Named widget could not be found</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10542">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10542">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10543">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10543">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10544">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10544">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget named “child_popup”,
   which is a child of the top-level screen “main_screen”. */

GX_WIDGET *menu_screen;

status = gx_studio_named_widget_create(“main_menu”,
    &root_window, &menu_screen);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the screen was created
   and linked to the root window. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10546">gx_studio_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10546">gx_studio_widget_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_studio_display_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10547">gx_studio_display_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10547">gx_studio_display_configure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10548">Configure exposição definida no projeto GUIX Studio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10548">Configure display defined in GUIX Studio project</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10549">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10549">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT *gx_studio_display_configure(
    USHORT display,
    UINT (*driver)(GX_DISPLAY *),
    USHORT language, 
    USHORT theme,
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT **return_root);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10550">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10550">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10551">Este serviço inicializa uma GX_DISPLAY para que esteja pronto a ser utilizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10551">This service initializes a GX_DISPLAY so that it is ready for use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10552">Esta função consolida as funções para inicializar um bloco de controlo GX_DISPLAY, criar uma tela para encaixar no visor e criar uma janela de raiz para a tela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10552">This function consolidates the functions to initialize a GX_DISPLAY control block, create a canvas to fit the display, and create a root window for the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10553">Esta função também instala o tema do idioma e recurso solicitado após a inicial do visor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10553">This function also installs the language and resource theme requested after the display has been initialized.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10554">Esta função consolida o esforço de programação mais necessário para preparar um visor para utilização.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10554">This function consolidates the programming effort most commonly required to prepare a display for use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10555">A função invoca as funções gx_display_create(), gx_display_color_table_set, gx_display_font_table_set, gx_display_pixelmap_table_set, gx_system_language_table_set, gx_system_ative_language_set, gx_system_scroll_appearance_set, gx_canvas_create e gx_window_root_create funções, todas ou algumas das quais seriam exigidas pelo programa de candidatura.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10555">The function invokes the gx_display_create(), gx_display_color_table_set, gx_display_font_table_set, gx_display_pixelmap_table_set, gx_system_language_table_set, gx_system_active_language_set, gx_system_scroll_appearance_set, gx_canvas_create, and gx_window_root_create functions, all or some of which would otherwise be required by the application program.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10556">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10556">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10557">**display**: Índice na tabela de exibição, que corresponde às definições de visualização no ficheiro do projeto Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10557">**display**: Index into the display table, which corresponds to the display definitions in the Studio project file.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10558">**controlador**: ponteiro para visualizar a função de inicialização do controlador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10558">**driver**: pointer to display driver initialization function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10559">Esta função é invocada para inicializar os ponteiros de função indireta do bloco de controlo GX_DISPLAY, bem como executar qualquer configuração de hardware necessária.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10559">This function is invoked to initialize the indirect function pointers of the GX_DISPLAY control block, as well as perform any required hardware setup.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10560">**linguagem**: índice de tabela de linguagem inicial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10560">**language**: initial language table index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10561">**linguagem**: índice temático inicial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10561">**language**: initial theme index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10562">**raiz**: ponteiro para variável em que devolver o endereço da janela raiz, ou GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10562">**root**: pointer to variable in which to return root window address, or GX_NULL.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10563">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10563">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10564">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10564">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10565">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) O ecrã não pôde ser inicializado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10565">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) Display could not be initialized</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10566">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10566">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10567">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10567">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10568">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10568">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget named “child_popup”, which is a child of the
   top-level screen “main_screen”. */

GX_WIDGET *menu_screen;

status = gx_studio_display_configure(MAIN_DISPLAY,
    my_driver_setup, LANGUAGE_ENGLISH, DEFAULT_THEME, GX_NULL);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the display was initialized, a canvas was
created for the display, a root window was created for the canvas, and
the requested language and theme have been installed.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_system_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10579">gx_system_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10579">gx_system_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10580">Definir linguagem ativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10580">Set active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10581">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10581">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_active_language_set(GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10582">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10582">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10583">Este serviço define o idioma atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10583">This service set the current language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10584">O índice linguístico deve ser inferior ao número de colunas na tabela de cordas de aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10584">The language index must be less than the number of columns in the application string table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10585">Esta função foi depreciada a favor de gx_display_ative_language_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10585">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_active_language_set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10586">Todas as novas aplicações devem ser utilizadas gx_display_ative_langauge_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10586">All new applications should use gx_display_active_langauge_set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10587">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10587">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10588">**linguagem**: Índice de linguagem, definido no ficheiro cabeçalho de recursos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10588">**language**: Language index, defined in resource header file.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10589">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10589">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10590">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Definir com sucesso a linguagem ativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10590">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set active language</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10591">\*\*GX_CALLER_ERROR:\*\*\*\* (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10591">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: \*\* (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10592">\*\*GX_PTR_ERROR:\*\*\*\* (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10592">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: \*\* (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10593">\*\*GX_INVALID_VALUE:\*\*\*\* (0x22) Índice linguístico inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10593">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: \*\* (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10594">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10594">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10595">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10595">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10596">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10596">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set active language and mark widget canvas as dirty. */
status = gx_system_active_language_set(ID_LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_animation_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10601">gx_system_animation_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10601">gx_system_animation_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10602">Obtenha o bloco de controlo de animação a partir da piscina do sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10602">Obtain animation control block from system pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10603">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10603">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_animation_get(GX_ANIMATION **animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10604">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10604">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10605">Este serviço pode ser utilizado para obter um bloco de controlo de animação a partir de um conjunto de tais blocos de controlo mantidos pelo componente gx_system.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10605">This service can be used to obtain an animation control block from a pool of such control blocks maintained by the gx_system component.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10606">O conjunto de blocos de controlo de animação e os serviços API relacionados só são fornecidos se o GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE constante for definido com um valor 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10606">The animation control block pool and related API services are only provided if the constant GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE is defined with a value 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10607">A definição padrão para este valor é 6, o que significa que o conjunto de blocos de controlo de animação do sistema contém tamanho GX_ANIMATION bloco de controlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10607">The default setting for this value is 6, meaning that the system animation control block pool contains size GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10608">Um bloco de controlo de animação atribuído usando esta API é automaticamente devolvido à piscina gratuita se a animação correr até ao fim.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10608">An animation control block allocated using this API is automatically returned to the free pool if the animation runs to completion.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10609">Se a animação for interrompida usando gx_animation_stop, ou não for iniciada devido a algum erro devolvido, o bloco de controlo de animação deve ser devolvido à piscina gratuita pela aplicação utilizando gx_system_animation_free.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10609">If the animation is stopped using gx_animation_stop, or fails to be started due to some returned error, the animation control block should be returned to the free pool by the application using gx_system_animation_free.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10610">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10611">**animação**: Endereço do ponteiro para receber GX_ANIMATION ponteiro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10611">**animation**: Address of pointer to receive GX_ANIMATION pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10612">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10612">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10613">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Bloco de controlo de animação obtido com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10613">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully obtained animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10614">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10614">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10615">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ponteiro de animação inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10615">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid animation pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10616">**GX_OUT_OF_ANIMATIONS**: (0x31) Piscina de animação do sistema esgotada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10616">**GX_OUT_OF_ANIMATIONS**: (0x31) System animation pool exhausted</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10617">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10617">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10618">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10618">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10619">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10619">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

UINT status = gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    gx_animation_start(animation, animation_info);
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10620">Consulte também</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10620">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_animation_free"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10625">gx_system_animation_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10625">gx_system_animation_free</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10626">Devolva um bloco de controlo de animação à piscina do sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10626">Return an animation control block to the system pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10627">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10627">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_animation_free(GX_ANIMATION *animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10628">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10628">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10629">Este serviço pode ser utilizado para devolver um bloco de controlo de animação à piscina do sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10629">This service can be used to return an animation control block to the system pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10630">O conjunto de blocos de controlo de animação e os serviços API relacionados só são fornecidos se o GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE constante for definido com um valor 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10630">The animation control block pool and related API services are only provided if the constant GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE is defined with a value 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10631">A definição padrão para este valor é 6, o que significa que o conjunto de blocos de controlo de animação do sistema contém tamanho GX_ANIMATION bloco de controlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10631">The default setting for this value is 6, meaning that the system animation control block pool contains size GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10632">Um bloco de controlo de animação atribuído com gx_system_animation_get() é automaticamente devolvido à piscina gratuita se a animação correr até ao fim.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10632">An animation control block allocated using gx_system_animation_get() is automatically returned to the free pool if the animation runs to completion.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10633">Tentar devolver um bloco de controlo de animação à piscina gratuita que já foi devolvida à piscina gratuita não tem efeito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10633">Attempting to return an animation control block to the free pool that has already been returned to the free pool has no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10634">Se a animação for interrompida com gx_animation_stop, ou não for iniciada devido a algum erro devolvido, o bloco de controlo de animação obtido com gx_system_animation_get() deve ser devolvido à piscina gratuita pela aplicação utilizando gx_system_animation_free).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10634">If the animation is stopped using gx_animation_stop, or fails to be started due to some returned error, the animation control block that has been obtained using gx_system_animation_get() should be returned to the free pool by the application using gx_system_animation_free().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10635">Uma animação deve estar no estado de IDLE antes de poder ser devolvida à piscina gratuita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10635">An animation must be in IDLE state before it can be returned to the free pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10636">Uma animação está no estado de OCIO quando não foi iniciada, quando é interrompida, ou quando termina.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10636">An animation is in the IDLE state when it has not been started, when it is stopped, or when it runs to completion.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10637">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10637">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10638">**animação**: Ponteiro para o GX_ANIMATION bloco de controlo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10638">**animation**: Pointer to the GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10639">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10639">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10640">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) bloco de animação lançado com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10640">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) uccessfully released animation block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10641">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10641">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10642">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ponteiro de animação inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10642">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid animation pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10643">**GX_INVALID_ANIMATION:**(0x32) A animação não é OCD, ou não foi atribuída a partir do pool do sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10643">**GX_INVALID_ANIMATION**: (0x32) The animation is not IDLE, or it has not been allocated from the system pool</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10644">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10644">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10645">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10645">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10646">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10646">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

UINT status = gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    status = gx_animation_start(animation, animation_info);

    if (status != GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* animation did not start, return it to the free pool */
        gx_system_animation_free(animation);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_system_bidi_text_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10652">gx_system_bidi_text_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10652">gx_system_bidi_text_disable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10653">Desativar suporte de texto bidirecional dinâmico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10653">Disable dynamic bi-directional text support</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10654">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10654">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_bidi_text_disable(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10655">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10655">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10656">Este serviço desativa suporte dinâmico de texto bidirecional.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10656">This service disables dynamic bi-directional text support.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10657">Este serviço requer GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT a ser definido na construção da biblioteca GUIX, e só é necessário se for necessário reordenar os dados de cadeias BiDi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10657">This service requires GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT to be defined when building the GUIX library, and is only required if runtime reordering of BiDi string data is needed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10658">A maioria das aplicações utiliza o GUIX Studio para produzir cordas de texto BiDi reordenada corretamente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10658">Most applications utilize GUIX Studio to produce correctly reorderd BiDi text strings.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10659">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10659">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10660">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10660">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10661">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10661">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10662">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Suporte de texto bidi com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10662">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully disabled bidi text support</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10663">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10663">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10664">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10664">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10665">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10665">Example</span></span>

```C
/* GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT is defined. */

/* Diable bidi text support. */
status = gx_system_bidi_text_disable();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, bidi text support was disabled. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10672">Este serviço permite suporte dinâmico de texto bidis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10672">This service enables dynamic bi-directional text support.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10673">Este serviço requer GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT a ser definido na construção da biblioteca GUIX, e só é necessário se for necessário reordenar os dados de cadeias BiDi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10673">This service requires GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT to be defined when building the GUIX library, and is only required if runtime reordering of BiDi string data is needed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10674">A maioria das aplicações utiliza o GUIX Studio para produzir cordas de texto BiDi corretamente reordenadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10674">Most applications utilize GUIX Studio to produce correctly reordered BiDi text strings.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10679">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10679">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_canvas_refresh"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10684">gx_system_canvas_refresh</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10684">gx_system_canvas_refresh</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10686">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10686">Prototype</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10687">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10687">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10688">Este serviço força uma redeensar imediata de todos os widgets sujos e telas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10688">This service forces an immediate redrawing of all dirty widgets and canvases.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10689">Este serviço é normalmente invocado internamente pelo componente do sistema GUIX, mas pode ser chamado pela aplicação para forçar uma operação de redesenhar o sistema imediato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10689">This service is normally invoked internally by the GUIX system component, but can be called by the application to force an immediate system redrawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10690">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10690">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10691">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10691">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10692">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10692">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10693">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Bloco de animação lançado com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10693">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully released animation block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10694">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**: (0x20) Nenhuma tela criada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10694">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**: (0x20) No canvas created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10695">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10695">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, canvas has been redraw. */

## <a name="gx_system_dirty_mark"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10723">gx_system_dirty_mark</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10723">gx_system_dirty_mark</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10724">Área de marca suja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10724">Mark area dirty</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10725">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10725">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_dirty_mark(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10726">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10726">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10727">Este serviço marca a área deste widget como sujo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10727">This service marks the area of this widget as dirty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10728">Isto faz fila efetivamente com o widget para redesenhar quando o processamento do evento do sistema estiver concluído.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10728">This effectively queues the widget for redrawing when the system event processing has been completed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10729">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10729">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10730">**widget**: Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10730">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10731">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10731">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10732">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Widget com sucesso marcado sujo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10732">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully marked widget dirty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10733">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10733">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10734">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10734">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10735">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10735">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10736">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10736">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10737">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10737">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10738">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10738">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Mark widget “my_widget” as dirty. */
status = gx_system_dirty_mark(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the area associated
   with “my_widget” has been marked as dirty. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_dirty_partial_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10763">gx_system_dirty_partial_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10763">gx_system_dirty_partial_add</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10764">Marque área parcial suja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10764">Mark partial area dirty</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10765">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10765">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_dirty_partial_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10766">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10766">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10767">Este serviço marca a área parcial deste widget como sujo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10767">This service marks the partial area of this widget as dirty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10768">Isto faz fila com o widget para redesenhar a operação de atualização de lona GUIX quando o processamento do evento do sistema estiver concluído.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10768">This queues the widget for redrawing by the GUIX canvas refresh operation when the system event processing has been completed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10769">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10769">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10770">**widget**: Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10770">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10771">**dirty_area**: Área suja de widget para marcar sujo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10771">**dirty_area**: Dirty area of widget to mark dirty</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10772">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10772">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10773">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Marca de área parcial suja parcial bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10773">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful partial dirty area mark</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10774">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10774">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10775">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10775">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10776">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10776">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10777">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Tamanho inválido de área suja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10777">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid size of dirty area</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10778">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10778">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10779">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10779">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10780">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10780">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Mark widget “my_widget” partial area as dirty. */

status = gx_system_dirty_partial_add(&my_widget,
    &partial_area);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the partial area “partial_area”
associated with “my_widget” has been marked as dirty. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_draw_context_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10805">gx_system_draw_context_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10805">gx_system_draw_context_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10806">Obtenha contexto de desenho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10806">Get drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10807">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10807">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_draw_context_get(GX_DRAW_CONTEXT **current_context);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10808">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10808">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10809">Este serviço devolve um ponteiro ao contexto de desenho atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10809">This service returns a pointer to the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10810">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10810">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10811">**current_context**: Ponteiro para destino para ponteiro de contexto de desenho atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10811">**current_context**: Pointer to destination for current drawing context pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10812">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10812">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10813">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) O contexto atual bem sucedido obtém</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10813">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful current context get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10814">**GX_PTR_ERROR**:0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10814">**GX_PTR_ERROR**:0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10815">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10815">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10816">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10816">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10817">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10817">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DRAW_CONTEXT *current_context;

/* Get current drawing context. */

status = gx_system_draw_context_get(&current_context);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the current drawing context
   is contained in “current_context”. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_event_fold"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10842">gx_system_event_fold</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10842">gx_system_event_fold</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10843">Enviar evento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10843">Send event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10844">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10844">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_event_fold(GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10845">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10845">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10846">Este serviço procura a fila do evento GUIX para um evento do mesmo tipo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10846">This service searches the GUIX event queue for an event of the same type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10847">Se existir um evento do mesmo tipo, a carga útil do evento é atualizada para corresponder ao novo evento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10847">If an event of the same type exists, the event payload is updated to match the new event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10848">Se não for encontrado nenhum evento correspondente, a função gx_system_event_send é chamada para adicionar o novo evento ao final da fila do evento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10848">If no matching event is found, the gx_system_event_send function is called to add the new event to the end of the event queue.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10849">Esta função é comumente utilizada por controladores de entrada de toque rápido para evitar que preencha a fila do evento com vários eventos PEN_DRAG.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10849">This function is commonly used by fast touch input drivers to prevent filling the event queue with multiple PEN_DRAG events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10850">Esta função também pode ser chamada pela aplicação para evitar que vários eventos do mesmo tipo sejam adicionados à fila do evento GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10850">This function can also be called by the application to prevent multiple events of the same type from being added to the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10851">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10851">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10852">**evento**: Ponteiro para o evento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10852">**event**: Pointer to event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10853">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10853">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10854">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Envio de eventos de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10854">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful event send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10855">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10855">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10856">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10856">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10857">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10857">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10858">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10858">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10859">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10859">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_EVENT my_event;

memset(&my_event, 0, sizeof(GX_EVENT));

my_event.gx_event_type = GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN;

my_event.gx_event_payload.gx_event_pointdata.gx_point_x = 100;
my_event.gx_event_payload.gx_event_pointdata.gx_point_y = 200;

/* Send “my_event” for processing. */
status = gx_system_event_fold(&my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been sent for processing. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_event_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10884">gx_system_event_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10884">gx_system_event_send</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10885">Enviar evento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10885">Send event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10886">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10886">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_event_send(GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10887">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10887">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10888">Este serviço envia o evento especificado para a fila de eventos do sistema GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10888">This service sends the specified event into the GUIX system event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10889">O novo evento é colocado no final da fila.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10889">The new event is placed at the end of the queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10890">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10890">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10891">**evento**: Ponteiro para o evento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10891">**event**: Pointer to event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10892">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10892">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10893">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Envio de eventos de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10893">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful event send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10894">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10894">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10895">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10895">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10896">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10896">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10897">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10897">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10898">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10898">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Send “new_event” for processing. */

GX_EVENT new_event;

new_event.gx_event_target = widget ->gx_widget_parent;
new_event.gx_event_type = MY_EVENT_TYPE;

/* Set optional param. */
new_event.gx_event_payload.xxxx = yyyy
new_event.gx_event_sender = widget->gx_widget_id;

/* Push the event to event pool. */
status = gx_system_event_send(&new_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been sent for processing. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_focus_claim"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10923">gx_system_focus_claim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10923">gx_system_focus_claim</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10924">Foco de reclamação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10924">Claim focus</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10925">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10925">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_focus_claim(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10926">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10926">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10927">Este serviço reivindica o foco para o widget especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10927">This service claims the focus for the specified widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10928">Se o widget não tiver tido foco anteriormente, receberá um evento GX_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10928">If the widget did no previously have focus, it will receive a GX_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED event.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10929">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10929">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10930">**widget**: Ponteiro para widget control block para reivindicar foco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10930">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block to claim focus</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10931">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10931">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10932">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Reivindicação de foco bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10932">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful focus claim</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10933">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10933">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10934">**GX_NO_CHANGE**: (0x08) Widget já detém o foco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10934">**GX_NO_CHANGE**: (0x08) Widget already owns focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10935">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10935">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10936">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12 Widget não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10936">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12 Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_initialize"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10964">gx_system_initialize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10964">gx_system_initialize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10965">Inicializar GUIX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10965">Initialize GUIX</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10966">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10966">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_initialize(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10967">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10967">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10968">Este serviço inicializa o GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10968">This service initializes GUIX.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10969">Este serviço deve ser invocado antes de qualquer outro serviço API GUIX, e só deve ser invocado uma vez no arranque do sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10969">This service must be invoked before any other GUIX API service, and should only be invoked once at system startup.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10970">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10970">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10971">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10971">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10972">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10972">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10973">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Inicialização do sistema de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10973">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful system initialize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10974">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR**: (0xFE) O tamanho do bloco de controlo GX_EVENT inválido ou a fila de eventos/mutex/thread criaram falhas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10974">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR**: (0xFE) Invalid GX_EVENT control block size or event queue/mutex/thread create failed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-10975">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10975">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10976">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10976">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-10977">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10977">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-10978">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-10978">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Initialize GUIX. */
status = gx_system_initialize();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, GUIX has been initialized. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_language_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11003">gx_system_language_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11003">gx_system_language_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11004">Recuperar tabela de linguagem ativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11004">Retrieve active language table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11005">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11005">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_language_table_get( 
    GX_CHAR ****language_table,
    GX_UBYTE *languages_count, 
    UINT *string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11006">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11006">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11007">Este serviço recupera a tabela de linguagem ativa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11007">This service retrieves the active language table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11008">Esta função é depreciada a favor de gx_display_language_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11008">This function is deprecated in favor of gx_display_language_table_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11009">Todas as novas aplicações devem ser utilizadas gx_display_language_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11009">All new applications should use gx_display_language_table_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11010">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11010">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11011">**language_table**: Endereço do ponteiro para a mesa de devolução da língua.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11011">**language_table**: Address of pointer to return language table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11012">**languages_count**: Endereço de variável para devolver colunas de tabela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11012">**languages_count**: Address of variable to return table columns.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11013">**string_count**: Endereço do ponteiro para retornar as filas de tabelas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11013">**string_count**: Address of pointer to return table rows.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11014">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11014">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11015">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) recuperou com sucesso a tabela de linguagem ativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11015">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieved active language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11016">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11016">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11017">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11017">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11018">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11018">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11019">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11019">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11020">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11020">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR ***language_table;

GX_UBYTE language_count;

UINT string_count;

/* Retrieve the language table */

status = gx_system_language_table_get(&language_table,
    &language_count, &string_count);
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11021">Consulte também</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11021">See Also</span></span>
