## <a name="gx_system_language_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11024">gx_system_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11024">gx_system_language_table_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11025">Atribuir tabela de linguagem ativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11025">Assign active language table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11026">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11026">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_language_table_set(
    GX_CHAR ***language_table,
    GX_UBYTE languages_count, 
    UINT string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11027">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11027">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11028">Este serviço instala a tabela de linguagem ativa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11028">This service installs the active language table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11029">Esta função foi depreciada a favor de gx_display_language_table_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11029">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_language_table_set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11030">Todas as novas aplicações devem ser utilizadas gx_display_language_table_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11030">All new applications should use gx_display_language_table_set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11031">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11031">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11032">**language_table**: Ponteiro para a mesa de idiomas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11032">**language_table**: Pointer to language table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11033">**languages_count**: Número de línguas em tabela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11033">**languages_count**: Number of languages in table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11034">**string_count**: Número de filas de mesa de cordas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11034">**string_count**: Number of string table rows.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11035">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11035">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11036">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Definir com sucesso a tabela linguística</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11036">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11037">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11037">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11038">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11038">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11039">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11039">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11040">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11040">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11041">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11041">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve the language table */

status = gx_system_language_table_set(language_table,
    language_count, string_count);
```

## <a name="gx_system_memory_allocator_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11046">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11046">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11047">Atribuir funções para alocação de memória, desalocação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11047">Assign functions for memory allocation, de-allocation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11048">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11048">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_memory_allocator_set(VOID *(allocate)(ULONG size),
    VOID(*release)(VOID *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11049">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11049">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11050">Este serviço atribui a função de retorno fornecido à aplicação para alocação dinâmica de memória e desalocação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11050">This service assigns the application supplied callback function for dynamic memory allocation and de-allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11051">Se não for necessário um serviço GUIX que utilize uma alocação dinâmica de memória, este serviço não precisa de ser chamado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11051">If no GUIX service that uses dynamic memory allocation is needed by the application, this service does not need to be called.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11052">Se utilizado, este serviço deve ser chamado após gx_system_initialize() que limpa os ponteiros de serviço GUIX, e antes de qualquer serviço GUIX que exija a utilização de uma alocação dinâmica de memória.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11052">If used, this service should be called after gx_system_initialize() which clears the GUIX service pointers, and before any GUIX service that requires use of dynamical memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11053">Os serviços GUIX que requerem uma atribuição de memória em tempo de execução e um serviço de desatribuição incluem:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11053">GUIX services which require a runtime memory allocation and de-allocation service include:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11054">Carregamento de recursos binários do armazenamento externo para o ambiente de tempo de execução GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11054">Loading binary resources from external storage into the GUIX runtime environment.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11055">O software executar o descodificador de imagem JPEG.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11055">The software runtime jpeg image decoder.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11056">O descodificador de imagem de png de execução de software.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11056">The software runtime png image decoder.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11057">Utilizar widgets de texto com GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11057">Using text widgets with GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11058">Funcionamento pixemap redimensionar e rotação funções de utilidade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11058">Runtime pixemap resize and rotation utility functions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11059">Tela de execução e alocação de bloco de controlo widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11059">Runtime screen and widget control block allocation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11060">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11060">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11061">**alocador**: Função de alocador de memória</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11061">**allocator**: Memory allocator function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11062">**lançamento**: Função sem memória</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11062">**release**: Memory free function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11063">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11063">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11064">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Função de atribuição de memória com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11064">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully assigned memory allocate function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11065">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11065">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11066">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11066">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11067">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11067">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11068">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11068">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11069">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11069">Example</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11070">O exemplo a seguir utiliza um pool de byte ThreadX para implementar um serviço de alocação de memória dinâmica threadsafe e de desatribuição de memória.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11070">The following example utilizes a ThreadX byte pool to implement a threadsafe dynamic memory allocation and memory de-allocation service.</span></span>

```C
TX_BYTE_POOL memory_pool;

#define SCRATCHPAD_SIZE (1024 * 4)

ULONG scratchpad[SCRATCHPAD_SIZE];

/* define memory allocation service */

VOID *memory_allocate(ULONG size)
{
    VOID *memptr;

    if (tx_byte_allocate(&memory_pool, &memptr, size, TX_NO_WAIT) == TX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return memptr;
    }
    return NULL;
}

/* define memory de-allocation service */
void memory_free(VOID *mem)
{
    tx_byte_release(mem);
}

/* create byte pool and install our dynamic memory services with GUIX
*/

VOID tx_application_define(void *first_unused_memory)
{
    /* create byte pool for GUIX to use */
    tx_byte_pool_create(&memory_pool, "scratchpad", scratchpad,
        SCRATCHPAD_SIZE * sizeof(ULONG));

    guix_setup();

    /* install our memory allocator and de-allocator */
    gx_system_memory_allocator_set(memory_allocate, memory_free);
}
```

## <a name="gx_system_pen_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11095">gx_system_pen_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11095">gx_system_pen_configure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11096">Configuração da caneta definida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11096">Set pen configuration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11097">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11097">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_pen_configure(GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION *pen_configuration);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11098">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11098">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11099">Este serviço define a configuração da caneta para controlar os parâmetros de velocidade e distância da caneta utilizados para desencadear a geração de GX_EVENT_FLICK tipos de eventos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11099">This service sets pen configuration to control the pen speed and distance parameters used to trigger the generation of GX_EVENT_FLICK event types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11100">O gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist membro da GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION é um tipo de dados de ponto fixo, e deve usar GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(valor) para converter de INT para GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11100">The gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist member of GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION is a fixed point data type, and you should use GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(value) to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11101">Por exemplo, se pretender definir a distância mínima de arrasto para 0,5 pixels por carrapato, tem de definir o gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist para `GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11101">For example, if you want to set minimum drag distance to 0.5 pixel per tick, you have to set the gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist to `GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2`.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11102">Nos lançamentos GUIX 5.4.0 ou mais, o membro gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist do GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION era do tipo (INT << 8) em vez de GX_FIXED_VAL tipo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11102">In GUIX releases 5.4.0 and older, the gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist member of GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION was of (INT << 8) type rather than GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11103">Se o seu projeto com a versão 5.4.0 da biblioteca GUIX estiver a utilizar esta API, terá de modificar o parâmetro min_drag_dist ou #define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY ao construir a biblioteca GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11103">If your project with 5.4.0 version GUIX library is using this API, you will need to modify the min_drag_dist parameter or #define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY when building the GUIX library.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11104">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11104">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11105">**pen_configuration** Ponteiro para a estrutura de configuração da caneta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11105">**pen_configuration** Pointer to pen configuration structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11106">**Apêndice I** contém definição para GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION estrutura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11106">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11107">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11107">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11108">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Configuração da caneta com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11108">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set pen configuration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11109">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11109">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11110">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11110">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11111">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11111">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11112">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11112">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define pen configuration, set minimum drag distance to 0.5 pixel
per tick, maximum pen speed to 10 ticks. That means GUIX will trigger
a vertical or horizontal flick event if the drag time is smaller than
10 ticks and the drag distance is bigger than 0.5 * drag_ticks. */

GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION pen_configuration;

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
Pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist = (1 << 8)/ 2;
#else
pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_max_pen_speed_ticks = 10;

/* Set the pen configuration. */
status = gx_system_pen_configure(&pen_configuration);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the touch configure has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11113">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11113">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11114">Criar e inicializar a pilha de ecrã do sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11114">Create and initialize the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11115">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11115">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_create(
    GX_WIDGET **memory, 
    INT size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11116">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11116">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11117">Este serviço define um conjunto de memórias para ser usado para a pilha de ecrã do sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11117">This service defines a memory pool to be used for the system screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11118">A pilha de ecrã do sistema é uma funcionalidade opcional que pode ser usada pela aplicação para gerir a aparência do fluxo de ecrã de aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11118">The system screen stack is an optional feature that can be used by the application to manage application screen flow appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11119">Se a aplicação pretender utilizar os serviços de pilha de ecrã, a função gx_system_screen_stack_create deve ser chamada primeiro para configurar a região de memória da pilha de ecrã.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11119">If the application intends to utilize the screen stack services, the gx_system_screen_stack_create function must first be called to setup the screen stack memory region.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11120">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11120">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11121">**memória**: Ponteiro para o bloco de memória reservado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11121">**memory**: Pointer to the reserved memory block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11122">**tamanho,** em bytes, do bloco de memória reservado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11122">**size**: Size, in bytes, of the reserved memory block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11123">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11123">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11124">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Criação com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11124">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11125">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11125">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11126">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11126">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11127">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11127">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11128">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11128">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11129">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11129">Example</span></span>

```C
#define SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH 8
GX_WIDGET *screen_stack[SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH * 2];

UINT status;

/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */

status = gx_system_screen_stack_create(screen_stack,
    sizeof(GX_WIDGET *) * SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH * 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the system screen stack is initialized
and ready for use. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11135">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11135">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11136">Coloque os ponteiros mais altos da pilha de ecrã</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11136">Pop the topmost screen stack pointers</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11137">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11137">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_get(
    GX_WIDGET **popped_parent,
    GX_WIDGET **popped_screen);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11138">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11138">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11139">Esta função coloca os ponteiros mais altos da pilha de ecrã e devolve esses ponteiros ao ouvinte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11139">This function pops the topmost screen stack pointers and returns those pointers to the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11140">Esta função difere de gx_system_screen_stack_pop na medida em que o ecrã estalado não é automaticamente religado ao progenitor anterior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11140">This function differs from gx_system_screen_stack_pop() in that the popped screen is not automatically reattached to the previous parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11141">Em vez disso, os ponteiros são retirados da pilha e devolvidos ao autor da chamada, permitindo que o chamador anexe o ecrã ou descarte o ecrã devolvido conforme desejado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11141">Instead, the pointers are popped from the stack and returned to the caller, allowing the caller to attach the or discard the returned screen as desired.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11142">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11142">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11143">**popped_parent**: Localização para armazenar o ponteiro widget dos pais.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11143">**popped_parent**: Location to store the parent widget pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11144">**popped_screen**: Localização para armazenar o ponteiro do ecrã estalado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11144">**popped_screen**: Location to store the popped screen pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11145">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11145">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11146">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Recuperação com sucesso dos ponteiros da pilha de ecrã</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11146">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieval of screen stack pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11147">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11147">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11148">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11148">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11149">**GX_FAILURE:**(0x10) Pilha de tela inválida ou vazia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11149">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Invalid or empty screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11150">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11150">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11151">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11151">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11152">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11152">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_WIDGET *parent_screen;

GX_WIDGET *popped_screen;

/* Pop a screen stack entry. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_get(&parent_screen, &popped_screen);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, parent_screen and
popped_screen hold the topmost screen stack pointers. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11153">Consulte também</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11153">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11154">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11154">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11155">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11155">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11156">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11156">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11157">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11157">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_pop"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11158">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11158">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11159">Pop a entrada mais alta da pilha de ecrã do sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11159">Pop the topmost entry from the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11160">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11160">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_pop();
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11161">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11161">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11162">Esta função coloca a entrada mais alta na pilha de ecrã e liga automaticamente o ecrã estalado ao widget dos pais.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11162">This function pops the topmost entry fo the screen stack and automatically attaches the popped screen to the popped parent widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11163">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11163">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11164">**nenhum**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11164">**none**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11165">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11165">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11166">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Recuperação bem sucedida dos ponteiros da pilha de ecrã</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11166">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfull retrieval of screen stack pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11167">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11167">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11168">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11168">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11169">**GX_FAILURE:**(0x10) Pilha de tela inválida ou vazia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11169">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Invalid or empty screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11170">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11170">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11171">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11171">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11172">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11172">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Pop a screen stack entry. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_pop();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the topmost screen stack entry has been
popped from the stack and re-attached to the previous parent. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11173">Consulte também</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11173">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11176">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11176">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11177">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11177">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_push"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11178">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11178">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11179">Empurre um widget e um ponteiro dos pais para a pilha de ecrã</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11179">Push a widget and parent pointer to the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11180">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11180">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_push(GX_WIDGET *screen)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11181">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11181">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11182">Este serviço coloca um ponteiro para o widget indicado, que normalmente é um ecrã de nível superior, na pilha de ecrã.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11182">This service places a pointer to the indicated widget, which is usually a top-level screen, onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11183">Se o widget tem um pai, é separado do progenitor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11183">If the widget has a parent it is detached from the parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11184">O ponteiro widget dos pais também é empurrado para a pilha de ecrã.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11184">The parent widget pointer is also pushed to the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11185">O widget principal pode ser NU, o que significa que um ecrã que não seja visível ou ligado a qualquer progenitor pode ser empurrado para a pilha de ecrã.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11185">The parent widget may be NULL, meaning a screen that is not visible or attached to any parent may be pushed onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11186">Se um widget sem pai for empurrado para a pilha de ecrã, a API de screen_stack_get() deve ser usada para recuperar o ponteiro de ecrã empurrado, em vez de utilizar a API screen_stack_pop,que tenta recolocar o widget estalado ao seu progenitor anterior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11186">If a widget with no parent is pushed to the screen stack, the screen_stack_get() API should be used to retrieve the pushed screen pointer, rather than using the screen_stack_pop() API, which attempts to reattached the popped widget to its previous parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11187">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11187">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11188">**ecrã**: Ponteiro para o widget a ser empurrado para a pilha de ecrã.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11188">**screen**: Pointer to the widget to be pushed to the screen stack.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11189">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11189">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11190">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Obter com sucesso a aparência da barra de scroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11190">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11191">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11191">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11192">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11192">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11193">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11193">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11194">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11194">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11195">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11195">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_push(window);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the widget pointed to by “window” has
been pushed to the screen stack, along with the widget’s parent
ponter. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11196">Consulte também</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11196">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11197">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11197">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11198">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11198">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11199">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11199">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11200">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11200">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11201">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11201">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11202">Redefinir a pilha de ecrã do sistema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11202">Reset the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11203">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11203">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_reset();
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11204">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11204">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11205">Esta função remove todas as entradas da pilha de ecrã do sistema.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11205">This function removes all entries from the system screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11206">Se os ecrãs saltarem da pilha tiverem blocos de controlo atribuídos dinamicamente atribuídos pelo GUIX Studio, a memória desses blocos de controlo é libertada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11206">If the screens popped from the stack have dynamically allocated control blocks allocated by GUIX Studio, the memory for those control blocks is freed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11207">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11207">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11208">**nenhum**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11208">**none**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11209">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11209">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11210">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Obter com sucesso a aparência da barra de scroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11210">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11211">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11211">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11212">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11212">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11213">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11213">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11214">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11214">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11215">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11215">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_reset();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the system screen stack has been cleared
of entries. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11220">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11220">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_scroll_appearance_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11221">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11221">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11222">Obtenha aparência de pergaminho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11222">Get scroll appearance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11223">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11223">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_scroll_appearance_get(
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *return_appearance);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11224">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11224">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11225">Este serviço obtém a aparência da barra de pergaminho.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11225">This service gets the scrollbar appearance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11226">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11226">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11227">**estilo**: Estilo barra de rolo: `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` ou `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11227">**style**: Scrollbar style: `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` or `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11228">**return_appearance**: Ponteiro para destino para a aparência.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11228">**return_appearance**: Pointer to destination for appearance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11229">**O apêndice I** contém definição para GX_SCROLLBAR_APPERANCE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11229">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLLBAR_APPERANCE</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11230">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11230">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11231">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Obter com sucesso a aparência da barra de scroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11231">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11232">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11232">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11233">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11233">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_scroll_appearance_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11261">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11261">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11262">Definir aparência de pergaminho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11262">Set scroll appearance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11263">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11263">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11264">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11264">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11265">Este serviço define a aparência de pergaminho predefinido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11265">This service sets the default scroll appearance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11266">Quando um pergaminho é criado, esta estrutura de aparência é usada a menos que a aplicação forneça uma versão personalizada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11266">When a scroll is created, this appearance structure is used unless the application provides a custom version.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11267">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11267">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11268">**estilo**: Estilo de `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` deslocalidade ou `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11268">**style**: Scroll style `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` or `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11269">**aparência**: Ponteiro para a estrutura de aparência inicializada com vários atributos de aparência scrollbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11269">**appearance**: Pointer to appearance structure initialized with various scrollbar appearance attributes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11270">Consulte o **Apêndice I** para a definição da estrutura GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11270">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11271">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11271">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11272">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) definir com sucesso o conjunto de aparência do pergaminho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11272">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set scroll appearance set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11273">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11273">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11274">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11274">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11275">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11275">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11276">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11276">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11277">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11277">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE my_appearance;

memset(&my_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

my_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;

my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style = GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

/* Set the scroll appearance. */

status = gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL, &my_appearance);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll appearance has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11301">gx_system_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11301">gx_system_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11302">Iniciar GUIX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11302">Start GUIX</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11303">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11303">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_start(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11304">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11304">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11305">Este serviço inicia o processamento DO GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11305">This service starts GUIX processing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11306">Em circunstâncias normais, esta função nunca volta, mas em vez disso começa a processar a fila do evento GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11306">Under normal circumstances this function never returns, but instead begins processing the GUIX event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11307">Quando a fila do evento GUIX está vazia, este serviço suspende o fio de chamada até que novos eventos cheguem na fila do evento GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11307">When the GUIX event queue is empty, this service suspends the calling thread until new events arrive in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11308">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11308">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11309">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11309">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11310">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11310">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11311">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Início do sistema de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11311">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful system start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11312">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11312">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11313">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11313">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11314">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11314">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11315">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11315">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start GUIX. */
status = gx_system_start();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . GUIX has been started. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11340">gx_system_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11340">gx_system_string_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11341">Obter corda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11341">Get string</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11342">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11342">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CHAR **return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11343">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11343">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11344">Este serviço obtém a cadeia para o ID de recursos especificado, utilizando o primeiro visor definido e o idioma atualmente ativo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11344">This service gets the string for the specified resource ID, using the first defined display and the currently active language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11345">Esta função foi depreciada a favor de gx_display_string_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11345">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_string_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11346">Todas as novas aplicações devem ser utilizadas gx_display_string_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11346">All new applications should use gx_display_string_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11347">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11347">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11348">**string_id**: ID de recursos de corda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11348">**string_id**: String resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11349">**return_string**: Ponteiro para ponteiro de destino de cordas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11349">**return_string**: Pointer to string destination pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11350">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11350">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11351">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Cadeia de sucesso obter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11351">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11352">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11352">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11353">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11353">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11354">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID:**(0x33) ID de recurso inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11354">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**: (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11355">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11355">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11356">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11356">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11357">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11357">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the string associated with MY_STRING_ID. */

status = gx_system_string_get(MY_STRING_RESOURCE_ID, &my_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string is contained in “my_string”.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11362">gx_system_string_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11362">gx_system_string_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11363">Recupera a mesa de cordas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11363">Retrieves the string table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11364">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11364">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_table_get(
    GX_UBYTE language,
    GX_CHAR ***string_table,
    UINT *get_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11365">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11365">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11366">Este serviço recupera a tabela de cordas para o idioma solicitado a partir do primeiro visor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11366">This service retrieves the string table for the requested language from the first display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11367">Esta função foi depreciada a favor de gx_display_string_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11367">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_string_table_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11368">Todas as novas aplicações devem ser utilizadas gx_display_string_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11368">All new applications should use gx_display_string_table_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11369">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11369">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11370">**linguagem**: Índice de línguas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11370">**language**: Language index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11371">**string_table**: Ponter para o espaço de armazenamento do ponteiro da mesa de cordas, ou NULO se o chamador não precisar de levar o ponteiro para a mesa de cordas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11371">**string_table**: Pointer to storage space of the string table pointer, or NULL if the caller does not need to get the pointer to the string table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11372">**get_size**: Pontear para o armazenamento para o número de cordas na mesa de cordas, ou NULO se o chamador não precisar de obter o número de cordas na tabela de cordas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11372">**get_size**: Pointer to the storage for the number of strings in string table, or NULL if the caller does not need to get the number of strings in the string table.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11373">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11373">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11374">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Tabela de cordas bem sucedida obter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11374">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string table get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11375">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11375">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11376">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11376">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11377">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11377">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11378">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11378">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the string table. */

CHAR **my_string_table; UINT table_size;

status = gx_system_string_table_get(LANGUAGE_ID_ENGLISH,
    &my_string_table, &table_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the pointer to the string table has
been obtained. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11384">gx_system_string_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11384">gx_system_string_width_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11385">Obtenha a largura da corda (depreciada)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11385">Get string width (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11386">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11386">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_width_get(
    GX_FONT *font, GX_CHAR *string,
    INT string_length,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11387">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11387">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11388">Este serviço é precotado a favor de gx_system_string_width_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11388">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_system_string_width_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11389">Este serviço calcula a largura de visualização da cadeia fornecida em pixels utilizando o tipo de letra especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11389">This service computes the display width of the supplied string in pixels using the specified font.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11390">Se o parâmetro string_length for >= 0, apenas a contagem de pedidos de caracteres está incluída no cálculo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11390">If the string_length parameter is >= 0, only the request count of characters are included in the calculation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11391">Se o parâmetro string_length for -1, toda a cadeia até ao exterminador NUR é utilizada no cálculo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11391">If the string_length parameter is -1, the entire string up to the NULL terminator is used in the calculation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11392">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11392">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11393">**fonte**: Ponteiro para o tipo de letra da corda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11393">**font**: Pointer to string’s font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11394">**string**: Ponteiro para corda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11394">**string**: Pointer to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11395">**string_length**: Comprimento da corda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11395">**string_length**: Length of string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11396">**return_width**: Destino para largura de corda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11396">**return_width**: Destination for width of string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11397">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11397">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11398">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Largura de corda bem sucedida obter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11398">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11399">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11399">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11400">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11400">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11401">**GX_INVALID_FONT:**(0x16) Fonte inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11401">**GX_INVALID_FONT**: (0x16) Invalid font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11402">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH:**(0x34) Comprimento da corda inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11402">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11403">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11403">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11404">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11404">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11405">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11405">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the string width of “my_string”. */

status = gx_system_string_width_get(&my_font, &my_string,
    strlen(my_string), &my_width);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . “my_width” contains the string width.
*/
```

```C
    GX_FONT *font,
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11414">**fonte**: Ponteiro para o tipo de letra da corda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11414">**font**: Pointer to string’s font</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11418">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Largura de corda bem sucedida obter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11418">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11419">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11419">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11420">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: 0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11420">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: 0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11421">**GX_INVALID_FONT:**(0x16) Fonte inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11421">**GX_INVALID_FONT**: (0x16) Invalid font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11422">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH:**(0x34) Comprimento da corda inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11422">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11423">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11423">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING my_string; my_string.gx_string_ptr = “Monday”;

my_string.gx_string_length = strlen(my_string.gx_string_ptr);
```

## <a name="gx_system_timer_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11443">gx_system_timer_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11443">gx_system_timer_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11444">Temporizador de início</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11444">Start timer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11445">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11445">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_timer_start(
    GX_WIDGET *owner, 
    UINT timer_id,
    UINT initial_ticks,
    UINT reschedule_ticks);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11446">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11446">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11447">Este serviço inicia um temporizador para o widget especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11447">This service starts a timer for the specified widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11448">Os GX_MAX_ATIVE_TIMERS constantes definiram os temporizadores máximos ativos suportados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11448">The constant GX_MAX_ACTIVE_TIMERS defined the maximum active timers supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11449">A definição predefinida para este valor é de 32.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11449">The default setting for this value is 32.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11450">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11450">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11451">**proprietário**: Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11451">**owner**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11452">**timer_id**: ID do temporizador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11452">**timer_id**: ID of timer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11453">**initial_ticks:** tiques de expiração iniciais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11453">**initial_ticks**: initial expiration ticks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11454">**reschedule_ticks**: Tiques de expiração periódica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11454">**reschedule_ticks**: Periodic expiration ticks</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11455">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11455">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11456">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Início do temporizador de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11456">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful timer start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11457">**GX_OUT_OF_TIMERS**: (0x04) Sem mais temporizadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11457">**GX_OUT_OF_TIMERS**: (0x04) No more timers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11458">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11458">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11459">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11459">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11460">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11460">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11461">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Valor do temporizador não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11461">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Timer value(s) not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11462">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11462">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11463">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11463">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11464">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11464">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start a periodic timer for the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_timer_start(&my_widget, MY_TIMER_ID, 10, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the timer for “my_widget” has been
started. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_timer_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11482">gx_system_timer_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11482">gx_system_timer_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11483">Parar o temporizador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11483">Stop timer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11484">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11484">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_timer_stop(
    GW_WIDGET *owner, 
    UINT timer_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11485">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11485">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11486">Este serviço para o temporizador com o timer_id especificado associado ao widget de chamada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11486">This service stops the timer with the specified timer_id associated with the calling widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11487">Para parar todos os temporizadores ligados a um widget específico, a aplicação pode passar o valor timer_id de 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11487">To stop all timers linked to a particular widget, the application can pass the timer_id value of 0.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11488">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11488">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11489">**proprietário**: Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11489">**owner**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11490">**timer_id**: ID do temporizador, ou 0 para todos os temporizadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11490">**timer_id**: ID of timer, or 0 for all timers</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11491">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11491">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11492">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Paragem do temporizador de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11492">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful timer stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11493">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) ID do temporizador não encontrado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11493">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Timer ID not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11494">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11494">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11495">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11495">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11496">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11496">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11497">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11497">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11498">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11498">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11499">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11499">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Stop the periodic timer for the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_system_timer_stop(&my_widget, MY_TIMER_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the timer for “my_widget” has been
stopped. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11571">gx_system_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11571">gx_system_widget_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11572">Encontre widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11572">Find widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11573">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11573">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_widget_find(
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_level, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_search_result);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11574">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11574">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11575">Este serviço procura o ID widget especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11575">This service searches for the specified widget ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11576">Ao contrário gx_widget_find(), esta função procura as crianças de todas as janelas de raiz definidas no sistema, o que significa que esta é uma pesquisa exaustiva de todos os widgets visíveis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11576">Unlike gx_widget_find(), this function searches the children of all root windows defined in the system, meaning this is an exhaustive search of all visible widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11577">Se conhece o progenitor do widget que procura, use gx_widget_find() em vez disso.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11577">If you know the parent of the widget you are searching for, use gx_widget_find() instead.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11578">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11578">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11579">**widget_id**: Widget ID para procurar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11579">**widget_id**: Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11580">**search_level**: Define o nível de nidificação recursivo em que os widgets infantis são pesquisados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11580">**search_level**: Defines the recursive nesting level into which child widgets are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11581">Se este valor for 0, apenas crianças imediatas de cada janela raiz são revistadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11581">If this value is 0, only immediate children of each root window are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11582">Se este valor for GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, a função se enquadra em todas as crianças que procuram o widget ID solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11582">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, the function nests down into all children searching for the requested widget ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11583">Para qualquer outro valor > 0, o nível de pesquisa define o quão profundamente aninhada esta função irá procurar o ID widget solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11583">For any other value > 0, the search level defines how deeply nested this function will go searching for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11584">**return_search_result**: Ponteiro para destino para widget encontrado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11584">**return_search_result**: Pointer to destination for widget found</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11585">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11585">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11586">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Pesquisa de widgets bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11586">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful widget search</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11587">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Widget ID não encontrado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11587">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Widget ID not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11588">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11588">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11589">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11589">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11590">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11590">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11591">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11591">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Search recursively from the top level widget for the widget with
ID of MY_WIDGET_ID. */

status = gx_system_widget_find(MY_WIDGET_ID,
    GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE,
    &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the search was successful and
“my_widget” contains the pointer to the widget. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11607">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11607">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span></span>
