## <a name="gx_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11616">gx_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11616">gx_text_button_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11617">Criar botão de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11617">Create text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11618">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11618">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_create(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11619">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11619">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11620">Este serviço cria um widget de botão de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11620">This service creates a text button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11621">GX_TEXT_BUTTON é derivado de GX_BUTTON e suporta todos os gx_button serviços da API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11621">GX_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11622">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11622">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11623">**text_button**: Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo de botões de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11623">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11624">**nome**: Nome lógico do botão de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11624">**name**: Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11625">**pai**: Ponteiro para o widget dos pais do botão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11625">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11626">**text_id**: ID de recursos de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11626">**text_id**: Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11627">**estilo**: Estilo de botão de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11627">**style**: Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11628">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11628">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11629">**text_button_id**: ID definido por aplicação do botão de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11629">**text_button_id**: Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11630">**tamanho**: Tamanho do botão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11630">**size**: Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11631">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11631">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11632">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Cria um botão de texto bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11632">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11633">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11633">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11634">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11634">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11635">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11635">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11636">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11636">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11637">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget parental não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11637">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11638">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11638">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11639">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11639">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11640">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11640">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_BUTTON my_text_button;

GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Create text button “my_text_button”. */

status = gx_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text button “my_text_button” was
created. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11658">gx_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11658">gx_text_button_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11659">Desenhe botão de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11659">Draw text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11660">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11660">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11661">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11661">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11662">Este serviço desenha o botão de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11662">This service draws the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11663">Este serviço é normalmente chamado internamente durante a atualização de lona, mas também pode ser chamado de funções de desenho de botões de texto personalizados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11663">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom text button drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11664">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11664">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11665">**botão**: Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11665">**button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11666">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11666">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11667">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11667">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11668">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11668">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11669">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11669">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11670">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11670">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom text button draw function. */

VOID my_text_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button)
{
    /* Call default text button draw. */
    gx_text_button_draw(text_button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11688">gx_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11688">gx_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11689">Evento de botão de texto do processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11689">Process text button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11690">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11690">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11691">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11691">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11692">Este serviço processa um evento para o botão de texto especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11692">This service processes an event for the specified text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11693">Este serviço deve ser chamado como o manipulador de eventos predefinido por quaisquer funções de processamento de eventos de botão de texto personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11693">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom text button event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11694">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11694">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11695">**text_button** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11695">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11696">**event_ptr** Ponteiro para o evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11696">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11697">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11697">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11698">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo de evento de botão de texto bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11698">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text button event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11699">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11699">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11700">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11700">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11701">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11701">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11702">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11702">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11703">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11703">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11704">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11704">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text button event processing */
        status = gx_text_button_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11722">gx_text_button_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11722">gx_text_button_font_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11723">Desa estação de fonte para botão de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11723">Set the font to text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11724">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11724">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11725">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11725">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11726">Este serviço atribui um tipo de letra ao botão especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11726">This service assigns a font to the specified button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11727">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11727">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11728">**botão**: Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de botões de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11728">**button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11729">**font_id**: ID de recursos fo a fonte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11729">**font_id**: Resource ID fo the font</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11732">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11732">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11733">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11733">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11734">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11734">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11735">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11735">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11755">gx_text_button_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11755">gx_text_button_text_color_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11757">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11757">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11758">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11758">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11759">Este serviço define a cor do botão de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11759">This service sets the color of the text button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11760">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11760">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11761">**text_button**: Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo de botões de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11761">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11762">**normal_text_color_id**: Identificação de recursos do texto normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11762">**normal_text_color_id**: Resource ID of normal text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11763">**O apêndice A** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11763">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11764">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11764">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11765">**selected_text_color_id**: ID de recursos de texto selecionado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11765">**selected_text_color_id**: Resource ID of selected text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11766">**O apêndice A** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11766">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11767">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11767">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11768">**disabled_text_color_id**: ID de cor de recurso para texto desativado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11768">**disabled_text_color_id**: Resource ID of color for disabled text.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11769">**O apêndice A** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11769">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11770">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11770">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11771">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11771">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11772">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Conjunto de cores de botão de texto bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11772">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful text button color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11773">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11773">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11774">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11774">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11775">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11775">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11776">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11776">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11778">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11778">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the color of the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_text_button_text_color_set(&my_text_button,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text color of “my_text_button” was
set. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11795">gx_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11795">gx_text_button_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11796">Função de suporte para desenhar texto de botão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11796">Support function to draw button text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11797">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11797">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_text_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11798">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11798">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11799">Esta função de suporte desenha a parte de texto de um botão de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11799">This support function draws the text portion of a text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11800">Esta função é chamada internamente por gx_text_button_draw, e é fornecida como uma API separada como uma conveniência para aplicações que definem uma função de desenho de botão personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11800">This function is called internally by gx_text_button_draw, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11801">As aplicações que pretendem personalizar o desenho de fundo do botão podem fornecer a sua função de desenho personalizado e invocar o serviço de gx_text_button_text_draw como parte do seu desenho personalizado para desenhar o texto do botão sobre o fundo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11801">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11802">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11802">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11803">**text_button**: Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo de botões de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11803">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11804">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11804">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11805">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11805">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11806">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11806">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11807">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11807">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11808">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11808">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */

VOID my_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw button background */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_text_button_text_draw(button);

    /* Draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11825">gx_text_button_text_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11825">gx_text_button_text_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11826">Obtenha texto do botão de texto (precotado)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11826">Get text from the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11827">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11827">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_get(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR **return_text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11828">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11828">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11829">Este serviço é prevadido a favor de gx_text_button_text_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11829">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_button_text_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11830">Este serviço recupera a cadeia especificada do botão de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11830">This service retrieves the specified string from the text button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11831">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11831">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11832">**text_button**: Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo de botões de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11832">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11833">**return_text**: Ponteiro para a corda recuperada do botão de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11833">**return_text**: Pointer to the string retrieved from the text button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11834">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11834">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11835">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Obtenha com sucesso o texto do botão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11835">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get the text from the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11836">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11836">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11837">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11837">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11839">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11839">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11840">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11840">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11841">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11841">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *string;

/* Get the string from the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_text_button_text_get(&my_text_button, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string pointer from
“my_text_button” is retrieved and stored in string. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_id_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11876">gx_text_button_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11876">gx_text_button_text_id_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11877">Definir iD de recursos de texto para o botão de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11877">Set text resource ID to the text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11878">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11878">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_id_set(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    RESOURCE_ID string_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11879">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11879">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11880">Este serviço define o ID de recurso de cadeia especificado para o botão de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11880">This service sets the specified string resource ID to the text button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11881">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11881">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11882">**text_button**: Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo de botões de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11882">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11883">**string_id**: ID de recursos da cadeia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11883">**string_id**: Resource ID of the string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11884">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11884">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11885">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) definir com sucesso o ID do recurso de corda para o botão de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11885">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the string resource ID to the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11886">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11886">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11887">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11887">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11888">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11888">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11889">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID:**(0x33) ID de corda não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11889">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID**: (0x33) String ID not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11890">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11890">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11891">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11891">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11892">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11892">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string ID ”MY_STRING_ID” to the text button
“my_text_button”. */

status = gx_text_button_text_id_set(&my_text_button,
    MY_STRING_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string ID MY_STRING_ID was set to
“my_text_button”. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11908">gx_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11908">gx_text_button_text_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11909">Atribuir texto ao botão de texto (precotado)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11909">Assign text to the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11910">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11910">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_set(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11911">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11911">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11912">Este serviço é precotado a favor de gx_text_button_text_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11912">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11913">Este serviço atribui a cadeia especificada ao botão de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11913">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11914">Se o widget text_button foi criado com GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY de estilo, o widget cria uma cópia privada da cadeia de texto atribuída.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11914">If the text_button widget was created with style  GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11915">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY não estiver ativa, o widget não faz uma cópia privada da cadeia de entrada, pelo que a cadeia deve ser atribuída estática ou globalmente, ou seja, pode não ser uma variável automática ou temporária.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11915">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11916">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11916">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11917">**text_button**: Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo de botões de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11917">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11918">**texto**: ponteiro para a cadeia terminada nulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11918">**text**: pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11919">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11919">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11920">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) definir o texto com sucesso para o botão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11920">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11921">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11921">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11922">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11922">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11923">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11923">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11924">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) O alocador de memória não definido ou a atribuição de memória falhou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11924">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11925">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH:**(0x34) Comprimento da corda inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11925">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11926">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11926">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11927">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11927">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11928">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11928">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string “my string” to the text button “my_text_button”.
*/

status = gx_text_button_text_set(&my_text_button, “my string”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string “my_text_button” was set.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11933">gx_text_button_text_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11933">gx_text_button_text_set_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11934">Atribuir texto ao botão de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11934">Assign text to the text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11935">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11935">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_text_set_ext(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11936">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11936">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11937">Este serviço atribui a cadeia especificada ao botão de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11937">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11938">Se o widget text_button foi criado com GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY de estilo, o widget cria uma cópia privada da cadeia de texto atribuída.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11938">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11939">Se GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY não estiver ativa, o widget não faz uma cópia privada da cadeia de entrada, pelo que a cadeia deve ser atribuída estática ou globalmente, ou seja, pode não ser uma variável automática ou temporária.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11939">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11940">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11940">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11941">**text_button**: Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo de botões de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11941">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11942">**corda:** ponteiro para a variável GX_STRING</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11942">**string**: pointer to the GX_STRING variable</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11943">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11943">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11944">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) definir o texto com sucesso para o botão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11944">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11945">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11945">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11946">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11946">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11947">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11947">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11948">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) O alocador de memória não definido ou a atribuição de memória falhou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11948">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11949">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH:**(0x34) Comprimento da corda inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11949">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11950">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11950">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11951">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11951">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11952">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11952">Example</span></span>

```C

new_string.gx_string_length = strlen(new_string.gx_string_ptr);

/* Assign the string “new_string” to the text button
“my_text_button”. */

status = gx_text_button_text_set_ext(&my_text_button, &new_string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string “my_text_button” was set.
*/
```

```C

    GX_TEXT_INPUT_CURSOR *cursor_input,
    GX_UBYTE blink_interval);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11972">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11972">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-11973">Este serviço define o valor do intervalo intermitente do cursor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11973">This service sets blink interval value of the cursor.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11974">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11974">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11975">**cursor_input** Bloco de controlo do cursor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11975">**cursor_input** Cursor control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11976">**blink_interval** Valor a definir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11976">**blink_interval** Value to be set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11978">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Definir com sucesso o intervalo de piscar do cursor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11978">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the cursor blink interval</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11979">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11979">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-11980">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Valor de intervalo intermitente não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11980">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Blink interval value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11981">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11981">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-11983">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-11983">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_INPUT_CURSOR *input_cursor;

/* Pointer the input cursor to the cursor instance of single/multi
line text input widget. */

input_cursor = &sl_input.gx_single_line_text_input_cursor_instance;

/* Set the blink interval value of “input_cursor” to 2. */
status = gx_text_input_cursor_blink_interval_set(input_cursor, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the blink interval value of
“input_cursor” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12023">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12023">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12024">Atribuir a função de retorno da roda de deslocamento do tipo de texto (precotado)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12024">Assign the callback function of text type scroll wheel (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12025">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12025">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *(*callback)(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *, int));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12026">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12026">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12027">Este serviço é prevadido a favor de gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12027">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12028">Este serviço atribui a função de retorno que uma roda de deslocação do tipo de texto invocará para determinar o fio de texto a ser apresentado em cada linha da roda de deslocação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12028">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12029">Para GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL e GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, são fornecidas funções de retorno predefinidos e a aplicação não precisa de fazer quaisquer alterações para utilizar estas implementações padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12029">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12030">Esta API é fornecida para permitir que a aplicação personalize a formatação ou outros parâmetros da cadeia que é exibida em cada linha do widget da roda de deslocamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12030">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12031">A função de retorno receberá como entrada um ponteiro para o bloco de controlo da roda de deslocação e o número de linha que está sendo apresentado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12031">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12032">A função deve devolver um ponteiro a uma cadeia de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12032">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12033">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12033">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12034">**roda** Endereço do bloco de controlo da roda de roda de roda de cadeia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12034">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12035">**callback** Função de retorno do ponteiro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12035">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12036">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12036">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12037">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Configurar com sucesso o retorno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12037">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12038">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12038">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12039">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12039">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12040">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12040">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12041">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12041">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12042">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12042">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

GX_CHAR *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
    }
    else
    {
        return(“Invalid”);
    }
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12059">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12059">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12060">Atribua a função de retorno da roda de deslocamento do tipo de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12060">Assign the callback function of text type scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12061">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12061">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    UINT *(*callback)(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *, int, GX_STRING *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12062">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12062">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12063">Este serviço atribui a função de retorno que uma roda de deslocação do tipo de texto invocará para determinar o fio de texto a ser apresentado em cada linha da roda de deslocação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12063">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12064">Para GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL e GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, são fornecidas funções de retorno predefinidos e a aplicação não precisa de fazer quaisquer alterações para utilizar estas implementações padrão.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12064">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12065">Esta API é fornecida para permitir que a aplicação personalize a formatação ou outros parâmetros da cadeia que é exibida em cada linha do widget da roda de deslocamento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12065">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12066">A função de retorno receberá como entrada um ponteiro para o bloco de controlo da roda de deslocação e o número de linha que está sendo apresentado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12066">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12067">A função deve devolver um ponteiro a uma cadeia de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12067">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12068">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12068">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12069">**roda** Endereço do bloco de controlo da roda de roda de roda de cadeia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12069">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12070">**callback** Função de retorno do ponteiro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12070">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12071">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12071">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12072">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Configurar com sucesso o retorno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12072">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12073">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12073">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12074">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12074">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12075">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12075">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12076">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12076">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12077">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12077">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

UINT *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row,
    GX_STRING *return_string)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = string_buffer;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(string_buffer);
    }
    else
    {
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = “Invalid”;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(“Invalid”);
    }

    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12094">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12094">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12095">Criar uma roda de pergaminho de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12095">Create a text scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12096">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12096">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT Id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12097">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12097">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12098">Este serviço cria uma roda de deslocação de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12098">This service creates a text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12099">A roda de deslocação de texto é um widget base para os widgets GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL e GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL tipo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12099">The text scroll wheel is a base widget for the GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL type widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12100">Esta função é chamada internamente por gx_string_scroll_wheel_create e gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create, e é fornecida como uma API separada como uma conveniência para aplicações que definem um widget de roda de deslocal personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12100">This function is called internally by gx_string_scroll_wheel_create and gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12101">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12101">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12102">**roda**: Endereço do bloco de controlo da roda de deslocação de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12102">**wheel**: Text scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12103">**nome**: Nome de widget definido por aplicação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12103">**name**: Application defined widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12104">**pai**: Mãe da roda ou GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12104">**parent**: Wheel parent or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12105">**total_rows**: Filas totais a apresentar ao utilizador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12105">**total_rows**: Total rows to be presented to user</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12106">**estilo**: Bandeiras de estilo desejadas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12106">**style**: Desired style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12107">**Id**: Aplicação definida bandeiras de estilo roda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12107">**Id**: Application defined wheel style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12108">**tamanho**: Tamanho inicial da roda de deslocação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12108">**size**: Initial scroll wheel size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12109">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12109">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12110">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Roda de pergaminho de texto criada com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12110">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully created text scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12111">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12111">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12112">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12112">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12113">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12113">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12115">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12115">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12116">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12116">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12117">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12117">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom scroll wheel widget. */
typedef MY_SCROLL_WHEEL_STRUCT
{
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL text_scroll_wheel;

    /* Add custom members here. */

} MY_SCROLL_WHEEL;

MY_SCROLL_WHEEL my_scroll_wheel;

UINT my_scroll_wheel_create(MY_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, ULONG style, USHORT Id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* Call base creation. */
    status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
        &wheel.text_scroll_wheel,
        ”my_text_scroll_wheel”, GX_NULL, 7,
        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SCROLL_WHEEL, &size);

    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Add custom initialization here. */
        if(parent)
        {
            gx_widget_link(parent, (GX_WIDGET *)wheel);
        }
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12136">gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12136">gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12137">Desenhe uma roda de rolo de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12137">Draw a text scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12138">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12138">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_scroll_wheel_draw(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12139">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12139">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12140">Esta é a função de desenho predefinido para todos os tipos de rodas com base em GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12140">This is the default drawing function for all wheel types based on GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12141">Esta função pode ser ultrapassada por aplicações que requerem a personalização da aparência de desenho da roda de rolo de texto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12141">This function can be overridden by applications that require customization of the text scroll wheel drawing appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12142">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL e GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL são baseados ou derivados de GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12142">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL are both based on or derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12143">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12143">Parameters</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12166">gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12166">gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12167">Evento de roda de pergaminho de texto do processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12167">Process text scroll wheel event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12168">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12168">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12169">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12169">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12170">Este serviço processa um evento para a roda de deslocação de texto especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12170">This service processes an event for the specified text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12171">Este serviço deve ser chamado como o manipulador de eventos predefinido por quaisquer funções de processamento de eventos de roda de rolo de texto personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12171">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom text scroll wheel event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12172">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12172">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12173">**roda** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo da roda de deslocação de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12173">**wheel** Pointer to text scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12174">**event_ptr** Ponteiro para o evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12174">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12175">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12175">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12176">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processo de evento de roda de rolo de texto bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12176">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12177">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12177">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12178">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12178">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12179">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12180">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12180">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12181">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12181">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12182">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12182">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text scroll wheel event processing */
        status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12264">gx_tree_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12264">gx_tree_view_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12265">Criar uma vista de árvore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12265">Create a tree view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12266">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12266">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_create(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT tree_view_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12267">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12267">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12268">Este serviço cria uma vista de árvore conforme especificado e associa a vista da árvore com o widget progenitor fornecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12268">This service creates a tree view as specified and associates the tree view with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12269">Aceita todos os tipos de widget como item do menu infantil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12269">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12270">Recomenda-se a utilização de GX_MENU widget tipo como item do menu infantil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12270">It’s recommended to use GX_MENU type widget as its child menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12271">GX_TREE_VIEW é derivado de GX_WINDOW e suporta todos os gx_window serviços da API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12271">GX_TREE_VIEW is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12272">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12272">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12273">**árvore**: Ponteiro para bloco de controlo da vista da árvore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12273">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12274">**nome**: Nome da vista para a árvore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12274">**name**: Name of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12275">**pai**: Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12275">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12276">**estilo**: Estilo do widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12276">**style**: Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12277">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12277">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12278">**menu_id**: ID definido pela aplicação da vista da árvore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12278">**menu_id**: Application-defined ID of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12279">**tamanho** da vista da árvore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12279">**size**: Size of the tree view</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12280">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12280">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12281">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Criação de visão de árvore bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12281">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful tree view creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12282">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12282">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12283">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12283">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12284">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12284">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12285">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12285">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12286">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12286">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12287">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12287">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12288">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12288">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
status = gx_tree_view_create(&my_tree_view,
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12304">gx_tree_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12304">gx_tree_view_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12305">Desenhar vista de árvore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12305">Draw tree view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12306">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12306">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12307">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12307">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12308">Este serviço desenha a vista de árvores especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12308">This service draws the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12309">Esta função é normalmente chamada internamente pelo mecanismo de atualização de lona GUIX, mas está exposta à aplicação para ajudar na implementação de funções de desenho personalizado para widgets de vista personalizados para a visão de árvore.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12309">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom tree view widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12310">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12310">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12312">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12312">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12313">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12313">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12314">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12314">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12316">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12316">Example</span></span>

```C

{
    /* Perform default drawing */
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12331">gx_tree_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12331">gx_tree_view_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12332">Evento de visão de árvore de processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12332">Process tree view event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12333">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12333">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_event_process(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree, 
    GX_EVENT event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12334">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12334">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12335">Este serviço processa um evento para a vista de árvores especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12335">This service processes an event for the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12336">Este serviço deve ser chamado como o manipulador de eventos predefinido por quaisquer funções de processamento de eventos de visualização de árvores personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12336">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom tree view event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12337">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12337">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12338">**árvore**: Ponteiro para bloco de controlo da vista da árvore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12338">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12339">**event_ptr**: Ponteiro para o evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12339">**event_ptr**: Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12340">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12340">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12341">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Evento de visualização de árvores de processo bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12341">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful process tree view event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12342">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12342">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12343">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12343">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12344">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12344">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12345">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12345">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12346">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12346">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12347">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12347">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic tree view event processing as part of custom event
    processing function. */

UINT custom_tree_view_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
                event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
    }
}
return status;
```
