## <a name="gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12540">gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12540">gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12541">Converter memorando de lona em bitmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12541">Convert canvas memort to bitmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12542">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12542">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *rect,
    UINT (*write_data)(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12543">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12543">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12544">Este serviço converte a memória de tela em ficheiro bitmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12544">This service converts canvas memory to bitmap file.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12545">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12545">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12546">**tela**: Ponteiro do bloco de controlo de lona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12546">**canvas**: Canvas control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12547">**rect**: Retângulo para converter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12547">**rect**: Rectangle to convert</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12548">**write_data**: Ponteiro da função Callback para escrever dados para</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12548">**write_data**: Callback function pointer to write data to</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12549">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12549">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12550">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Valor inteiro convertido com sucesso em corda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12550">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully converted integer value to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12551">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro tampão de retorno inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12551">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return buffer pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12552">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Tamanho do tampão de retorno inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12552">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid return buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12553">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12553">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12554">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12554">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12555">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12555">Example</span></span>

```C
FILE *fp = GX_NULL;

/* define call back function of how to write the data read from
canvas memory. */

UINT write_data_callback(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count)
{
    if (fp)
    {
        fwrite(byte_data, 1, data_count, fp);
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

VOID scroll_wheel_screen_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{
    UINT status;

    GX_RECTANGLE size = {31,31,610,450};
    gx_window_draw(window);
    if (screenshot)
    {
        fp = fopen("../screenshot.bmp", "wb");
        /* Convert canvas memory to bitmap format.
           Status GX_SUCCESS means operation succeed. */
        status = gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp(root->gx_window_root_canvas,
            &size, write_data_callback);

        fclose(fp);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_circle_point_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12571">gx_utility_circle_point_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12571">gx_utility_circle_point_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12572">Calcular ponto num círculo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12572">Calculate point on a circle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12573">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12573">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_circle_point_get(
    INT xCenter, 
    INT yCenter,
    UINT radius, 
    INT angle, 
    GX_POINT *point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12574">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12574">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12575">Este serviço calcula o ponto num círculo dado o centro do círculo, raio e ângulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12575">This service calculates point on a circle given the circle center, radius, and angle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12576">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12576">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12577">**xCenter**: x coordenada do centro do círculo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12577">**xCenter**: x coordinate of circle center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12578">**yCenter**: y coordenada do centro de círculos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12578">**yCenter**: y coordinate of circle center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12579">**raio**: Raio de círculo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12579">**radius**: Circle radius</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12580">**ângulo**: Ângulo para calcular o ponto do perímetro do círculo, em graus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12580">**angle**: Angle at which to calculate circle perimeter point, in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12581">**ponto**: Endereço de GX_POINT variável para armazenar a coordenada x,y calculada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12581">**point**: Address of GX_POINT variable at which to store calculated x,y coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12582">**end_alpha**: Fim do valor alfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12582">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12583">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12583">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12584">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Gradiente foi criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12584">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12585">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Endereço de ponto de retorno inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12585">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return point address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12586">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Parâmetro de raio inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12586">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Invalid radius parameter</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12587">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12587">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12588">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12588">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12589">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12589">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point;
    UINT status;

        status = gx_utility_circle_point_get(100, 100,
20, 45,
&point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of point is the x,y coordinate of a point on the circle perimeter at an angle of 45 degrees, where the circle is centered at (100, 100), has a radius of 20 pixels */

```

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12607">gx_utility_gradient_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12607">gx_utility_gradient_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12608">Criar um mapa de pixel gradiente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12608">Create a gradient pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12609">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12609">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_create(
    GX_GRADIENT *gradient,
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height,
    UCHAR type, 
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha, 
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12610">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12610">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12611">Este serviço cria um mapa de pixels gradiente no tempo de funcionação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12611">This service creates a gradient pixelmap at runtime.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12612">Uma imagem de gradiente pode ser usada para realizar efeitos de desvanecimento e outras mudanças visuais interessantes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12612">A gradient image can be used to accomplish fade effects and other interesting visual changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12613">A largura e a altura do gradiente solicitado não podem ser inferiores a 2x2 pixels.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12613">The width and height of the requested gradient can be no less than 2x2 pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12614">O GUIX mantém internamente uma lista de gradientes criados, e esta função procurará primeiro a lista de gradientes para encontrar um pixelmap de gradiente correspondente antes de criar um novo pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12614">GUIX internally maintains a list of created gradients, and this function will first search the gradient list to find a matching gradient pixelmap before creating a new pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12615">Por outras palavras, o mesmo pixelmap gradiente é necessário várias vezes, apenas um pixelmap é realmente criado, e cada gradiente que requer este pixelmap partilha o pixelmap criado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12615">In other words,  the same gradient pixelmap is needed multiple times, only one pixelmap is actually created, and each gradient that requires this pixelmap shares the created pixelmap.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12616">Esta API requer que seja definida a função gx_system_memory_allocator para permitir a atribuição de memória em tempo de execução.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12616">This API requires the gx_system_memory_allocator function be defined to allow runtime memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12617">As bandeiras do tipo gradiente incluem GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA e GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12617">The gradient type flags include GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA and GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12618">Apenas GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA gradientes do tipo estão atualmente suportados (isto é, esta bandeira do tipo deve ser definida).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12618">Only  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA type gradients are currently supported (i.e. this type flag must be set).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12619">A bandeira GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR é opcional, e quando definida instrui a lógica de criação de gradiente para criar um gradiente que muda de start_alpha para end_alpha e de volta para start_alpha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12619">The  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR flag is optional, and when set  instructs the gradient creation logic to create a gradient that changes from start_alpha to end_alpha and back to start_alpha.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12620">Caso contrário, é criado um gradiente linear.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12620">Otherwise a linear gradient is created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12621">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12621">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12622">**gradiente**: Ponteiro para estrutura do bloco de controlo de gradiente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12622">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12623">**largura**: Largura de pixelmap solicitada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12623">**width**: Requested pixelmap width</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12624">**altura**: Altura de pixelmap solicitada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12624">**height**: Requested pixelmap height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12625">**tipo**: Tipo de gradiente solicitado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12625">**type**: Requested gradient type</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12626">**start_alpha**: Valor alfa inicial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12626">**start_alpha**: Starting alpha value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12627">**end_alpha**: Fim do valor alfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12627">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12628">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12628">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12629">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Gradiente foi criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12629">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12630">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Gradiente não é pelo menos 2x2 pixels</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12630">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Gradient is not at least 2x2 pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12631">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED:**(0x28) Gradiente não é do tipo GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12631">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Gradient is not type GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12632">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) O alocador de memória não está definido ou a atribuição de memória é falhada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12632">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12633">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12633">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12634">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ponteiro gradiente não válido<</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12634">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer not valid<</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12635">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) O valor de largura e altura não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12635">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width and height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12636">**GX_INVALID_TYPE:**(0x1B) Tipo gradiente não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12636">**GX_INVALID_TYPE**: (0x1B) Gradient type not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12637">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12637">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12638">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12638">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12639">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12639">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_GRADIENT gradient;

UINT status;

status = gx_utiity_gradient_create(&gradient, 3, 40,
    GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA, 240, 0);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the gradient pixelmap has been created */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12657">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12657">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12658">Eliminar um gradiente previamente criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12658">Delete a previously created gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12659">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12659">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_delete(GX_GRADIENT *gradient);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12660">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12660">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12661">Este serviço elimina um gradiente previamente criado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12661">This service deletes a previously created gradient.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12662">Se o pixelmap associado a este gradiente não for utilizado por outros gradientes, os dados do pixelmap também serão eliminados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12662">If the pixelmap associated with this gradient is not in use by any other gradients, the pixelmap data will also be deleted.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12663">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12663">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12664">**gradiente**: Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de gradiente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12664">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12665">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12665">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12667">**GX_CALLER_ERROR:**(0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12667">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12668">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) O ponteiro gradiente não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12668">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer is not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_ltoa"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12689">gx_utility_ltoa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12689">gx_utility_ltoa</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12690">Converter inteiros longos para ASCII</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12690">Convert long integer to ASCII</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12691">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12691">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_itoa(
    LONG value, 
    GX_CHAR *return_buffer,
    UINT seturn_buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12692">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12692">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12693">Este serviço converte um valor inteiro longo numa cadeia ASCII.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12693">This service converts a long integer value into an ASCII string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12694">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12694">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12695">**valor**: Valor inteiro longo para converter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12695">**value**: Long integer value to convert</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12696">**return_buffer**: Tampão de destino para a corda ASCII</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12696">**return_buffer**: Destination buffer for ASCII string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12697">**return_buffer_size**: Tamanho do tampão de destino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12697">**return_buffer_size**: Size of destination buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12698">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12698">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12699">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Valor inteiro convertido com sucesso em corda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12699">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully converted integer value to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12700">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro tampão de retorno inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12700">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return buffer pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12701">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Tamanho do tampão de retorno inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12701">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid return buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12702">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12702">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12703">Todos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12703">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12704">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12704">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_value = 200;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[10];

UINT status;

/* Convert “my_value” into an ASCII string. */
status = gx_utility_ltoa(my_value, string_buffer, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “string_buffer” contains the ASCII
representation of “my_value”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_acos"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12720">gx_utility_math_acos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12720">gx_utility_math_acos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12721">Cosine do arco compute</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12721">Compute arc cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12722">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12722">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_acos(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12723">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12723">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12724">Este serviço calcula o valor angular do arco cosine x.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12724">This service computes the angle value of the arc cosine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12725">O valor de entrada é um tipo de dado de ponto fixo, chamada GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE para converter de INT para GX_FIXED_VAL tipo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12725">The input value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12726">Por exemplo, se quiser calcular o cosseto de arco de 0,5, faça a entrada como GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12726">For example, if you want to calculate the arc cosine of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12727">Na versão 5.4.0 ou versão inferior GUIX, o tipo de valor de entrada desta função é INT, e o valor é limitado ao intervalo [-256, 256].</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12727">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value type of this function is INT, and the value is limited to the range [-256, 256].</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12728">A aplicação deve escalar o valor de intervalo [-1, 1] para intervalo [-256, 256] antes de invocar este serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12728">The application must scale the value from range [-1, 1] to range [-256, 256] before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12729">Se o seu projeto com versão GUIX igual ou inferior a 5.4.0 tiver referência a esta API, e pretende atualizar o seu projeto com a mais recente biblioteca guix.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12729">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0 has reference to this API, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12730">Tem duas opções.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12730">You have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12731">Corrija o valor de entrada desta chamada API para utilizar GX_FIXED_VAL valor do tipo de dados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12731">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12732">Defina GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12732">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12733">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12733">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12734">**x**: Valor cujo arco cosine é calculado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12734">**x**: Value whose arc cosine is computed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12735">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12735">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12736">**ângulo**: Valor angular do arco cosine x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12736">**angle**: Angle value of arc cosine x</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12737">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12737">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12738">Todos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12738">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12739">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12739">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc cosine of “0.5”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    x = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_acos(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc cosine “x”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_asin"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12757">gx_utility_math_asin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12757">gx_utility_math_asin</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12758">Sine arco compute</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12758">Compute arc sine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12759">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12759">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_asin(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12760">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12760">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12761">Este serviço calcula o valor angular do arco sine x.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12761">This service computes the angle value of the arc sine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12762">O valor de entrada é um tipo de dado de ponto fixo, chamada GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE para converter de INT para GX_FIXED_VAL tipo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12762">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL  type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12763">Por exemplo, se quiser calcular o pecado do arco de 0,5, faça a entrada como GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12763">For example, if you want to calculate the arc sin of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12768">Corrija o valor de entrada desta chamada API para utilizar GX_FIXED_VAL valor do tipo de dados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12768">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12773">**ângulo**: Valor angular do arco sine x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12773">**angle**: Angle value of arc sine x</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12776">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12776">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc sine of “x”. */

#if defined GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    X = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_asin(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc sine “x”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_cos"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12794">gx_utility_math_cos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12794">gx_utility_math_cos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12795">Cosine computacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12795">Compute cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12796">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12796">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_FIXED_VAL gx_utility_math_cos(GX_FIXED_VAL angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12797">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12797">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12798">Este serviço calcula o cosine do ângulo fornecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12798">This service computes the cosine of the supplied angle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12799">O valor de entrada é um tipo de dado de ponto fixo, chamada GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE para converter de INT para GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12799">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12800">Por exemplo, se quiser calcular o cosseno de 90 graus, faça a entrada como GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12800">For example, if you want to calculate the cosine of 90 degree, make input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12801">O valor de devolução é um tipo de dado de ponto fixo, chamada GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT para converter de GX_FIXED_VAL para INT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12801">The return value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT to convert from GX_FIXED_VAL to INT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12802">Na versão GUIX da versão 5.4.0 ou versão inferior, o valor de entrada e o valor de retorno deste serviço é INT, o valor de entrada e o valor de retorno são ampliados em 256.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12802">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX version, the input value and return value type of this service is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12803">E, portanto, a aplicação deve escalar o valor do ângulo em 256 antes de invocar este serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12803">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12804">Se o seu projeto com versão GUIX for igual ou inferior a 5.4.0, e quiser atualizar o seu projeto com a mais recente biblioteca guix, tem duas opções.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12804">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12805">Fixar o valor de entrada e o manuseamento ao valor de retorno desta chamada API para utilizar GX_FIXED_VAL valor do tipo data.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12805">Fix the input value and the handling to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL date type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12806">Defina GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12806">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12807">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12807">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12808">**ângulo**: Ângulo para calcular o cosseno de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12808">**angle**: Angle to compute cosine of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12809">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12809">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12810">**cosina**: Cosine de ângulo fornecido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12810">**cosine**: Cosine of supplied angle</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12811">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12811">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12812">Todos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12812">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12813">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12813">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute cosine of 90 degree. */

INT angle = 90;

#if defined (GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL scaled_angle = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(angle);
#endif

my_angle_cosine = gx_utility_math_cos(scaled_angle);

/* “my_angle_cosine” contains the cosine of “my_angle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12831">gx_utility_math_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12831">gx_utility_math_sin</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12835">Este serviço calcula o seno do ângulo fornecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12835">This service computes the sine of the supplied angle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12836">O valor de entrada é um tipo de dado de ponto fixo, chamada GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE para converter de INT para GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12836">The input value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12837">Por exemplo, se quiser calcular a seno de 90 graus, faça a entrada como GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12837">For example, if you want to calculate the sine of 90 degree, make input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12838">O valor de devolução é um tipo de dado de ponto fixo, chamada GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT para converter de GX_FIXED_VAL para INT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12838">The return value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT to convert from GX_FIXED_VAL to INT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12839">Na versão 5.4.0 ou menor GUIX, o valor de entrada e o valor de retorno é INT, o valor de entrada e o valor de retorno são ampliados em 256.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12839">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value and return value type is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12840">E, portanto, a aplicação deve escalar o valor do ângulo em 256 antes de invocar este serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12840">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12841">Se o seu projeto com versão GUIX for igual ou inferior a 5.4.0, e quiser atualizar o seu projeto com a mais recente biblioteca guix, tem duas opções.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12841">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12842">Fixar o valor de entrada e a entrega ao valor de retorno desta chamada API para utilizar GX_FIXED_VAL valor do tipo de dados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12842">Fix the input value and the handing to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12843">Defina GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12843">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12844">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12844">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12845">**ângulo**: Ângulo para calcular sena de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12845">**angle**: Angle to compute sine of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12846">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12846">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12847">**sine**: Sine de ângulo fornecido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12847">**sine**: Sine of supplied angle</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12848">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12848">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12849">Todos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12849">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12850">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12850">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_angle = 80;

/* Compute sine of “my_angle”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = my_angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(my_angle);

my_angle_sine = gx_utility_math_sin(scaled_angle);
```

## <a name="gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12895">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12895">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12896">Reencomendar o texto BiDi na sua ordem de exibição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12896">Reorder BiDi text into its display order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12897">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12897">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO *input_info, 
                                       GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO **resolved_info_head)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12898">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12898">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12899">Este serviço reencomenda o texto BiDi na sua ordem de exibição.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12899">This service reorders BiDi text into its display order.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12900">Se o tipo de letra de desenho de texto e a largura do visor forem fornecidos, a rutura da linha será aplicada primeiro, o processo de reordenamento será aplicado com base em cada linha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12900">If text draw font and display width are provided, line breaking will be applied first, reordering process will be applied based on each line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12901">Se o texto fornecido contiver mais de um parágrafo, o serviço quebrará o texto em parágrafos, o resultado de rutura e reordenamento de cada parágrafo será ligado como uma lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12901">If the provided text contains more than one paragraph, the service will break the text into paragraphs, the line breaking and reordering result of each paragraph will be linked as a list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12902">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12902">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12903">**input_info**: Ponteir para as informações para quebra de linhas e reordenamento de texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12903">**input_info**: Pointer to the information for line breaking and text reordering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12904">**resolved_info_head**: Ponteiro para a lista ligada que contém resultados de rutura de linha e reordenamento de cada parágrafo do texto fornecido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12904">**resolved_info_head**: Pointer to the linked list that contains line breaking and reordering results of each paragraph of the the provided text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12905">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12905">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12906">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Reencomenda de textos bidi bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12906">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful bidi text reorder</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12907">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiros de entrada inválidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12907">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12908">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) O alocador de memória não está definido ou a atribuição de memória é falhada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12908">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12909">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12909">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12910">Todos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12910">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12911">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12911">Example</span></span>
#### <a name="draw-single-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12912">Desenhe texto bidi de linha única para tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12912">Draw single line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Single Line String";
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = GX_NULL;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = -1;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_left,
                                widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_top,
                                resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text);

        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```
#### <a name="draw-multi-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12913">Desenhe texto bidi de várias linhas para tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12913">Draw multi line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Line BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        for(index = 0; index < resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
        {
            gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
        
            ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

#### <a name="draw-multi-paragraph-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12914">Desenhe texto bidi de vários parágrafos para tela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12914">Draw multi paragraph bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *next;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Paragraph\r BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        next = resolved_info;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        while(next)
        {
            for(index = 0; index < next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
            {
                gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
            
                ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
            }
            
            next = next->gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_next;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12933">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12933">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12934">Redimensionar pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12934">Resize pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12935">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12935">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_resize(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination, 
    INT width, 
    INT height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12936">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12936">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12937">Este serviço redimensiona um mapa pixel e devolve um ponteiro a um novo mapa pixel, que é o resultado do redimensionar o pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12937">This service resizes a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap resize.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12938">Este serviço requer a utilização prévia de gx_system_memory_allocator_set, para permitir a atribuição de memória para reter os dados de pixelmap redimensionados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12938">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the resized pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12939">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12939">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12940">**src**: Ponter para o mapa de pixels para redimensionar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12940">**src**: Pointer to the pixelmap to resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12941">**destino**: Tampão de destino para o pixelmap resultante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12941">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12942">**largura**: Largura do mapa pixel resultante, em pixels</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12942">**width**: Width of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12943">**altura**: Hieght do mapa pixel resultante, em pixels</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12943">**height**: Hieght of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12944">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12944">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12945">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Redimensionar o pixelmap com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12945">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12946">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro de pixelmap de origem ou destino inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12946">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12947">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Largura ou valor de altura não válidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12947">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width or height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12948">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) O pixelmap de origem é um formato comprimido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12948">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12949">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) O alocador de memória não está definido ou a atribuição de memória é falhada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12949">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12950">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12950">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12951">Todos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12951">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12952">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12952">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXLEMAP *des_pixelmap;

/* Resize “src_pixelmap” with specifiy width and height. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_resize(src_pixelmap,
    &des_pixelmap, 100, 200);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of resize. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12969">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12969">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12970">Pixelmap rotativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12970">Rotate pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12971">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12971">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src, INT angle,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination,
    UINT *rot_cx, 
    UINT *rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12972">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12972">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12973">Este serviço gira um pixelmap e devolve um ponteiro a um novo mapa pixel, que é o resultado da rotação do pixelmap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12973">This service rotates a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12974">Para rodar um mapa de pixels diretamente para a tela, utilize gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate).).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12974">To rotate a pixelmap directly to the canvas, use gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12975">Este serviço requer a utilização prévia de gx_system_memory_allocator_set, para permitir a atribuição de memória para conter os dados de pixelmap rotativos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12975">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the rotated pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12976">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12976">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12977">**src**: O mapa de pixels para rodar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12977">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12978">**ângulo**: Ângulo de rotação em graus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12978">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12979">**destino**: Tampão de destino para o pixelmap resultante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12979">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12980">**rot_cx**: Recuperado x coordenada do centro de rotação no que diz respeito ao pixelmap de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12980">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12981">Deve ser iniciado com a coordenada x do centro de rotação no que diz respeito ao pixelmap de origem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12981">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12982">Se rot_cx for GX_NULL, o valor não será recuperado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12982">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12983">**rot_cy**: Recuperado y coordenada do centro de rotação no que diz respeito ao pixelmap de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12983">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12984">Deve ser iniciado com a coordenada y do centro de rotação no que diz respeito ao pixelmap de origem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12984">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12985">Se rot_cy for GX_NULL, o valor não será recuperado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12985">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12986">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12986">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12987">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Rotação de pixels bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12987">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12988">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro de pixelmap de origem ou destino inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12988">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12989">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) O valor do ângulo é 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12989">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12990">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) O pixelmap de origem é um formato comprimido, que não é suportado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12990">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-12991">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) O alocador de memória não está definido ou a atribuição de memória é falhada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12991">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12992">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12992">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-12993">Todos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12993">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-12994">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-12994">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 30 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(src_pixelmap, 30,
    &des_pixelmap, &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13011">gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13011">gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate(

    UINT *rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13014">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13014">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13019">**destino**: Tampão de destino para o pixelmap resultante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13019">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13020">**rot_cx**: Recuperado x coordenada do centro de rotação no que diz respeito ao pixelmap de destino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13020">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13021">Deve ser iniciado com a coordenada x do centro de rotação no que diz respeito ao pixelmap de origem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13021">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13022">Se rot_cx for GX_NULL, o valor não será recuperado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13022">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13026">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13026">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13028">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro de pixelmap de origem ou destino inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13028">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13029">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) O valor do ângulo é 0 ou não um ângulo simples como 90, 180, 270</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13029">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0 or not a simple angle like 90, 180, 270</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13030">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) O pixelmap de origem é um formato comprimido, que não é suportado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13030">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13031">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) O alocador de memória não está definido ou a atribuição de memória é falhada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13031">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**:  (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13032">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13032">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13033">Todos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13033">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13034">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13034">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 90 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate(src_pixelmap, 90,
    &des_pixelmap,
    &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13050">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13050">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13051">Retângulo central dentro de outro retângulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13051">Center rectangle within another rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13052">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13052">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *within_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13053">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13053">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13054">Este serviço centra o retângulo dentro de outro retângulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13054">This service centers the rectangle within another rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13055">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13055">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13056">**retângulo**: Retângulo ao centro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13056">**rectangle**: Rectangle to center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13057">**within_rectangle**: Retângulo para o centro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13057">**within_rectangle**: Rectangle to center within</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13058">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13058">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13059">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Centrado com sucesso no retângulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13059">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully centered the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13060">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ponteiro de retângulo de entrada inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13060">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13061">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Tamanho do retângulo inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13061">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13062">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13062">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13063">Todos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13063">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13064">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13064">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Center “my_inner_rectangle” inside of “my_outer_rectangle”.*/
status = gx_utility_rectangle_center(&my_inner_rectangle,
    &my_outer_rectangle);

/* Is status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_inner_rectangle” is centered
within “my_other_rectangle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13080">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13080">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13081">Encontre o centro do retângulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13081">Find center of rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13082">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13082">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT *return_center);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13083">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13083">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13084">Este serviço encontra o centro do retângulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13084">This service finds the center of the rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13085">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13085">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13086">**retângulo**: Retângulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13086">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13087">**return_center**: Ponte para o centro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13087">**return_center**: Pointer to center point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13088">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13088">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13089">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Encontrou com sucesso o centro do retângulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13089">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully found the center of the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13090">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro de entrada inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13090">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13091">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Tamanho do retângulo inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13091">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13092">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13092">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13093">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13093">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13094">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13094">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_center_point;

gx_utility_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Find center of “my_rectangle””. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(&my_rectangle,
    &my_center_point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_center_point” is the center point
of “my_rectangle” (50, 50). */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_combine"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13110">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13110">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13111">Combine dois retângulos em primeiro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13111">Combine two rectangles into first</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13112">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13112">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_combine(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13113">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13113">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13114">Este serviço combina o primeiro e o segundo retângulo no primeiro retângulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13114">This service combines the first and second rectangle into the first rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13115">O primeiro retângulo é expandido para incluir o segundo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13115">The first rectangle is expanded to include the second.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13116">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13116">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13117">**first_rectangle**: Primeiro retângulo e retângulo combinado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13117">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle and combined rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13118">**second_rectangle**: Segundo retângulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13118">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13119">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13119">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13120">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Combinou com sucesso dois retângulos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13120">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully combined two rectangles</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13121">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro de entrada inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13121">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13122">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13122">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13123">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13123">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13124">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13124">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_a;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_b;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_a, 0, 0, 100, 100);
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_b, 50, 50, 200, 200);

/* Combine “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_combine(&rect_a, &rect_b);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “rect_a” is (0, 0, 200, 200) the merger
of the original “rect_a” and “rect_b”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_compare"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13140">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13140">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13141">Compare dois retângulos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13141">Compare two rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13142">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13142">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_compare( 
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13143">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13143">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13144">Este serviço compara o primeiro e o segundo retângulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13144">This service compares the first and second rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13145">Se forem iguais, o valor da GX_TRUE é devolvido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13145">If they are equal, a value of GX_TRUE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13146">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13146">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13147">**first_rectangle**: Primeiro retângulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13147">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13148">**second_rectangle**: Segundo retângulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13148">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13149">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13149">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13150">**resultado**: GX_TRUE se os retângulos forem iguais, caso contrário GX_FALSE é devolvido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13150">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles are equal, otherwise GX_FALSE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13151">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13151">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13152">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13152">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13153">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13153">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compare “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_compare(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, the two rectangles are equal. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13169">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13169">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13170">Defina um retângulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13170">Define a rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13171">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13171">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_define(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE left,
    GX_VALUE top, 
    GX_VALUE right, 
    GX_VALUE bottom);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13172">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13172">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13173">Este serviço define um retângulo conforme especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13173">This service defines a rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13174">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13174">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13175">**retângulo**: Bloco de controlo do retângulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13175">**rectangle**: Rectangle control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13176">**esquerda**: Esquerda mais coordenada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13176">**left**: Left most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13177">**top**: Top mais coordenada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13177">**top**: Top most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13178">**direito**: A maioria das coordenadas da direita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13178">**right**: Right most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13179">**fundo**: Parte inferior da coordenada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13179">**bottom**: Bottom most coordinate</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13180">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13180">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13181">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Definiu com sucesso um retângulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13181">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully defined a rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13182">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro de retângulo inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13182">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13183">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13183">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13184">Todos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13184">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13185">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13185">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rect;

/* Define “my_rect”. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rect, 10, 5, 200, 100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rect” is defined. */
```
