## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13201">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13201">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13202">Detetar sobreposição de retângulos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13202">Detect overlap of rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13203">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13203">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_overlap_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13204">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13204">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13205">Este serviço deteta qualquer sobreposição dos retângulos fornecidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13205">This service detects any overlap of the supplied rectangles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13206">Se for encontrada sobreposição, o serviço devolve GX_TRUE e o retângulo sobreposto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13206">If overlap is found, the service returns GX_TRUE and the overlapping rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13207">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13207">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13208">**first_rectangle**: Primeiro retângulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13208">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13209">**second_rectangle**: Segundo retângulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13209">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13210">**return_overlap_area**: Área de retângulo sobreposto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13210">**return_overlap_area**: Overlapping rectangle area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13211">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13211">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13212">**resultado**: GX_TRUE se os retângulos se sobrepõem, caso contrário GX_FALSE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13212">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles overlap, otherwise GX_FALSE.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13213">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13213">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13214">Todos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13214">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13215">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13215">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Detect overlap of “my_rectangle_a” and “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b,
    &my_overlap_area);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_overlap_area” specifies the area the
rectangles overlap. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13231">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13231">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13232">Detetar se o ponto reside no retângulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13232">Detect if point resides in rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13233">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13233">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13234">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13235">Este serviço deteta se o ponto especificado reside no retângulo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13235">This service detects if the specified point resides in the rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13236">Se o ponto residir no retângulo, o serviço devolve-GX_TRUE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13236">If the point does reside in the rectangle, the service returns  GX_TRUE.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13237">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13237">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13238">**retângulo**: Retângulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13238">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13239">**ponto**: Ponto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13239">**point**: Point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13240">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13240">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13241">**resultado**: GX_TRUE se o ponto residir no retângulo, caso contrário GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13241">**result**: GX_TRUE if point resides in rectangle, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13242">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13242">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13243">Todos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13243">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13244">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13244">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_point;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

my_point.gx_point_x = 20; my_point.gx_point_y = 20;

/* Detect if point “my_point” is within “my_rectangle””. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(&my_rectangle,
    &my_point);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_point” resides in the rectangle. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13260">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13260">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13261">Crescer retângulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13261">Grow rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13262">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13262">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_resize(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE adjust);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13263">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13263">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13264">Este serviço aumenta o tamanho do retângulo conforme especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13264">This service increases the size of the rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13265">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13265">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13266">**retângulo**: Ponteiro para retângulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13266">**rectangle**: Pointer to rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13267">**ajustar**: Montante para ajustar o retângulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13267">**adjust**: Amount to adjust the rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13268">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13268">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13269">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Redimensionou com sucesso o retângulo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13269">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully resized the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13270">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ponteiro de retângulo de entrada inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13270">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13271">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13271">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13272">Todos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13272">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13273">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13273">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Adjust “my_rectangle” by increasing 20 pixels on four sides */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_resize(&my_rectangle, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rectangle” is 20 pixels larger. */
```

```C
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13292">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13292">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13293">Este serviço desloca o retângulo pelos valores especificados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13293">This service shifts the rectangle by the specified values.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13295">**retângulo**: Retângulo para deslocar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13295">**rectangle**: Rectangle to shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13296">**x_shif**: Número de pixéis a deslocar-se no eixo x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13296">**x_shif**: Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13300">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ponteiro de retângulo de entrada inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13300">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13301">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13301">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13302">Todos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13302">All</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_string_to_alphamap"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13319">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13319">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13320">Renderização de cadeia a um pixelmap do tipo alfamap de 8bpp (precotado)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13320">Render string to an 8bpp alphamap type pixelmap (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13321">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13321">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(
    const GX_CHAR *text, const
    GX_FONT *font, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13322">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13322">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13323">Este serviço foi prevadido a favor de gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13323">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13324">Este serviço torna uma cadeia de texto para um mapa alfa, que é uma forma especial de pixelmap de 8bpp contendo apenas valores alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13324">This service renders a text string to an alphamap, which is a special form of 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13325">Este serviço é normalmente utilizado juntamente com gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate e gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw para desenhar texto rotativo para a tela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13325">This service is typically used along with gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw to draw rotated text to the canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13326">Este serviço calcula o tamanho da memória necessária para o mapa alfa resultante e invoca a função gx_system_memory_allocator definida pela aplicação para alocar dinamicamente a memória.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13326">This service calculates the memory size needed for the resulting alphamap, and invokes the gx_system_memory_allocator() function defined by the application to dynamically allocate memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13327">A aplicação deve ligar para gx_system_memory_allocator_set() em algum momento, geralmente durante o arranque do programa, antes de usar este serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13327">The application must call gx_system_memory_allocator_set() at some point, usually during program startup, prior to using this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13328">Se uma cadeia de texto for rodada e atraída para a tela apenas uma vez, o serviço gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() é fornecido como um suplente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13328">If a text string is to be rotated and drawn to the canvas just once, the service gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() is provided as an alternate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13329">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() chamará gx_utility_string_to_alphamap gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate e gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() para tornar o texto rotativo numa única operação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13329">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() will call gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() to render the rotated text in one operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13330">No entanto, se o mesmo texto for desenhado várias vezes rodado em vários ângulos, é mais eficiente criar o mapa alfa uma vez que utilize a API gx_utility_string_to_alphmap e, em seguida, rode o mapa alfa resultante várias vezes conforme necessário.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13330">However if the same text will be drawn multiple times rotated at various angles, it is more efficient to create the alphamap once using the gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, then rotate the resulting alphamap multiple times as needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13331">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13331">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13332">**texto**: Cadeia de texto para renderizar à alfamap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13332">**text**: Text string to render to alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13333">**fonte**: O tipo de letra a ser para renderizar o texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13333">**font**: The font to be to render the text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13334">**return_map**: Ponter para o GX_PIXELMAP ser devolvido ao chamador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13334">**return_map**: Pointer to the GX_PIXELMAP to be returned to the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13335">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13335">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13336">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Com sucesso, tornou uma cadeia de texto num mapa alfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13336">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully rendered a text string to an alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13337">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro de entrada inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13337">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13338">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) A atribuição de memória/função livre não está definida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13338">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocation/free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13339">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH:**(0x34) Comprimento da corda inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13339">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13340">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13340">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13341">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13341">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13342">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13342">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

gx_widget_font_get(widget, GX_FONT_ID_SCREEN_LABEL, &font);

/* render string to alphamap once */

gx_utility_string_to_alphamap("Hello World", font, &alphamap);

/* rotate and render the alphmap at multiple angles */

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 45, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 135, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13344">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13344">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13345">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13345">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13346">Rendereia a corda a um pixelmap do tipo alfamap de 8bpp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13346">Render string to an 8bpp alphamap type pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13347">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13347">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext(
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string,
    GX_CONST GX_FONT *font, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13348">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13348">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13349">Este serviço torna uma cadeia de texto para um mapa alfa, que é uma forma especial de pixelmap de 8bpp contendo apenas valores alfa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13349">This service renders a text string to an alphamap, which is a special form of 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13350">Este serviço é normalmente utilizado juntamente com gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate e gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw para desenhar texto rotativo para a tela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13350">This service is typically used along with gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw to draw rotated text to the canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13351">Este serviço calcula o tamanho da memória necessária para o mapa alfa resultante e invoca a função gx_system_memory_allocator definida pela aplicação para alocar dinamicamente a memória.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13351">This service calculates the memory size needed for the resulting alphamap, and invokes the gx_system_memory_allocator() function defined by the application to dynamically allocate memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13352">A aplicação deve ligar para gx_system_memory_allocator_set() em algum momento, geralmente durante o arranque do programa, antes de usar este serviço.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13352">The application must call gx_system_memory_allocator_set() at some point, usually during program startup, prior to using this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13353">Se uma cadeia de texto for rodada e atraída para a tela apenas uma vez, o serviço gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() é fornecido como um suplente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13353">If a text string is to be rotated and drawn to the canvas just once, the service gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() is provided as an alternate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13354">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() chamará gx_utility_string_to_alphamap gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate e gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() para tornar o texto rotativo numa única operação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13354">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() will call gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() to render the rotated text in one operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13355">No entanto, se o mesmo texto for desenhado várias vezes rodado em vários ângulos, é mais eficiente criar o mapa alfa uma vez que utilize a API gx_utility_string_to_alphmap e, em seguida, rode o mapa alfa resultante várias vezes conforme necessário.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13355">However if the same text will be drawn multiple times rotated at various angles, it is more efficient to create the alphamap once using the gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, then rotate the resulting alphamap multiple times as needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13356">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13356">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13357">**string**: Cadeia de texto para renderizar para alfamap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13357">**string**: Text string to render to alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13358">**fonte**: O tipo de letra a ser para renderizar o texto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13358">**font**: The font to be to render the text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13359">**return_map**: Ponter para o GX_PIXELMAP ser devolvido ao chamador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13359">**return_map**: Pointer to the GX_PIXELMAP to be returned to the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13360">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13360">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13361">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Com sucesso, tornou uma cadeia de texto num mapa alfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13361">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully rendered a text string to an alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13362">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Ponteiro de entrada inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13362">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13363">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) A atribuição de memória/função livre não está definida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13363">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocation/free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13364">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH:**(0x34) Comprimento da corda inválida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13364">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13367">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13367">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING string;

GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

gx_widget_font_get(widget, GX_FONT_ID_SCREEN_LABEL, &font);

string.gx_string_ptr = “Hello World”;

string.gx_string_length = strlen(string.gx_string_ptr);

/* render string to alphamap once */
gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext(&string, font, &alphamap);

/* rotate and render the alphmap at multiple angles */
gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 45, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 135, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13407">gx_vertical_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13407">gx_vertical_list_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13408">Criar lista vertical</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13408">Create vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13409">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13409">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_create(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *, GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, USHORT vertical_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13410">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13410">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13411">Este serviço cria uma lista vertical.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13411">This service creates a vertical list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13412">GX_VERTICAL_LIST é derivado de GX_WINDOW e suporta todos os serviços gx_window API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13412">GX_VERTICAL_LIST is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13413">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13413">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13414">**vertical_list** Bloco de controlo widget de lista vertical</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13414">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13415">**nome** Nome da lista vertical</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13415">**name** Name of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13416">**pai** Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13416">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13417">**total_rows** Número total de linhas na lista vertical</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13417">**total_rows** Total number of rows in vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13418">**callback** Uma função que será chamada pela lista vertical quando a lista for percorrida.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13418">**callback** A function that will be called by the vertical list when the list is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13419">O chamador deve inicialmente criar GX_WIDGET crianças suficientes para preencher as filas de listas visíveis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13419">The caller should initially create enough GX_WIDGET based children to fill the visible list rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13420">À medida que a lista é percorrida, esta função é chamada a recriar a lista de crianças correspondentes ao índice de lista fornecido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13420">As the list is scrolled, this function is called to re-create the list children corresponding to the supplied list index</span></span>

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13542">gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13542">gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-selected-widget-from-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13543">Obtenha widget selecionado da lista vertical</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13543">Get selected widget from vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13544">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13544">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_WIDGET **return_list_entry);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13545">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13545">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13546">Este serviço devolve o widget selecionado da lista vertical.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13546">This service returns the selected widget of the vertical list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13547">Note que se a lista contiver mais linhas do que widgets infantis, e o widget para crianças selecionados tiver sido deslocalizado da vista, esta função voltará GX_NULL como ponteiro GX_WIDGET, uma vez que o widget foi reutilizado para apresentar uma nova entrada de lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13547">Note that if the list contains more rows than child widgets, and the selected child widget has been scrolled from view, this function will return GX_NULL as the GX_WIDGET pointer, since the widget has been reused to display a new list entry.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13548">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13548">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13549">**vertical_list** Bloco de controlo widget de lista vertical</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13549">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13550">**return_list_entry** Destino para widget de entrada na lista de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13550">**return_list_entry** Destination for return list entry widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13551">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13551">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13552">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) obtenha com sucesso a entrada na lista vertical</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13552">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully get the vertical list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13553">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) O widget selecionado foi deslocalizado da vista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13553">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) The selected widget has been scrolled from view.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13555">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13555">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13556">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13556">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13557">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13557">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13558">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13558">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *current_selected_widget;

/* Get the list entry at the current index of vertical list “my_list”. */
status = gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get(&my_list, &current_selected_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_list_entry” contains a pointer to the currently selected widget. */
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_scrollbar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13592">gx_vertical_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13592">gx_vertical_scrollbar_create</span></span>

```C

    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance,
    ULONG style);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13595">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13595">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13596">Este serviço cria uma barra de deslocação vertical.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13596">This service creates a vertical scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13597">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13597">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13598">**barra de scroll** Bloco de controlo widget de barra de rolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13598">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13599">**nome** Nome da barra de pergaminho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13599">**name** Name of scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13600">**pai** Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13600">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13601">**aparência** Aparência do widget vertical da barra de rolo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13601">**appearance** Appearance of vertical scrollbar widget.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13602">**estilo** Estilo da barra de pergaminho.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13602">**style** Style of the scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13603">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13603">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13605">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13605">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13606">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13606">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13607">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13607">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13608">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13608">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13609">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget dos pais não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13609">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

```C
                          “my_vertical_scrollbar”,
                          &my_parent, &scrollbar_appearance,
                          GX_STYLE_ENABLED);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13622">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13622">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13623">Este serviço atribui dinamicamente um bloco de controlo widget, chamando a função de atribuição de memória definida pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13623">This service dynamically allocates a widget control block, by calling the application defined memory allocation function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13624">Este serviço é usado principalmente pelas funções geradas pelo GUIX Studio para alocar dinamicamente o bloco de controlo quando a propriedade "Dynamic Allocation" é selecionada na vista de propriedades do GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13624">This service is primarily used by the functions generated by GUIX Studio to dynamically allocate control block when the “Dynamic Allocation” property is selected in the GUIX Studio properties view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13625">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13625">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13626">**control_block** Ponteiro para devolver ponteiro do bloco de controlo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13626">**control_block** Pointer to returned control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13627">**memsize** Tamanho do bloco de controlo, em bytes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13627">**memsize** Control block size, in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13628">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13628">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13629">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Alocado widget bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13629">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget allocate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13630">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) O alocador de memória não está definido ou a atribuição de memória falhou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13630">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13631">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13631">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13632">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) Tamanho da memória não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13632">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) Memory size not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13633">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13633">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13634">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13634">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13635">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13635">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button;

/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_allocate(&button, sizeof(GX_TEXT_BUTTON));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the button widget control block is allocated. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13673">gx_widget_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13673">gx_widget_attach</span></span>
### <a name="attach-widget-to-its-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13674">Anexar widget ao seu progenitor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13674">Attach widget to its parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13675">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13675">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_attach(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13676">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13676">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13677">Este serviço anexa o widget ao progenitor especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13677">This service attaches the widget to the specified parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13678">Se o widget já estiver ligado a outro progenitor, é primeiro destacado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13678">If the widget is already attached to another parent, it is first detached.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13679">Se o widget já estiver ligado ao mesmo progenitor, a função não faz nada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13679">If the widget is already attached to the same parent, the function does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13680">O widget torna-se o filho mais frontal do seu progenitor em termos de pedidos de z.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13680">The widget becomes the front-most child of its parent in terms of z ordering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13681">Se os widgets irmãos se sobrepõem, este widget é desenhado em cima de irmãos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13681">If sibling widgets overlap, this widget is drawn on top of siblings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13682">Para colocar o novo widget na parte de trás da ordem z, use gx_widget_back_attach ou gx_widget_back_move.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13682">To put the new widget in the back of the z-order, use gx_widget_back_attach or gx_widget_back_move.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13683">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13683">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13684">**pai** Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13684">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13685">**widget** Ponteiro para widget infantil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13685">**widget** Pointer to child widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13686">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13686">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13687">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Widget attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13687">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget attach</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13688">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13688">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13689">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13689">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13690">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pai ou widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13690">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13691">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13691">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13692">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13692">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13693">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13693">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_attach(&my_parent, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is attached to “my_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13731">gx_widget_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13731">gx_widget_background_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-a-widget-background"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13732">Desenhe um fundo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13732">Draw a widget background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13733">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13733">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_background_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13734">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13734">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13735">Este serviço executa um preenchimento de cor sólida de um fundo widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13735">This service performs a solid color fill of a widget background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13736">Este serviço é automaticamente chamado pela função gx_widget_draw, mas também pode ser invocado pela aplicação como parte de uma função de desenho de widget personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13736">This service is automatically called by the gx_widget_draw function, but may also be invoked by the application as part of a customized widget drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13737">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13737">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13738">**widget** Ponteiro para widget a ser desenhado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13738">**widget** Pointer to widget to be drawn</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13739">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13739">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13740">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13740">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13741">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13741">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13742">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13742">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13743">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13743">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
    /* Call default widget background draw. */
    gx_widget_background_draw(widget);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_back_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13781">gx_widget_back_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13781">gx_widget_back_attach</span></span>
### <a name="attach-widget-to-its-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13782">Anexar widget ao seu progenitor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13782">Attach widget to its parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13783">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13783">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_back_attach(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13784">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13784">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13785">Este serviço anexa o widget ao progenitor especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13785">This service attaches the widget to the specified parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13786">Se o widget já estiver ligado a outro progenitor, é primeiro destacado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13786">If the widget is already attached to another parent, it is first detached.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13787">Se o widget já estiver ligado ao mesmo progenitor, a função não faz nada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13787">If the widget is already attached to the same parent, the function does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13788">O widget torna-se o filho mais atrasado do seu progenitor em termos de pedidos de z.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13788">The widget becomes the back-most child of its parent in terms of z ordering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13789">Se os widgets irmãos se sobrepõem, este widget é desenhado atrás desses irmãos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13789">If sibling widgets overlap, this widget is drawn behind those siblings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13790">Para colocar o novo widget na frente da ordem z, use gx_widget_attach ou gx_widget_front_move.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13790">To put the new widget in the front of the z-order, use gx_widget_attach or gx_widget_front_move.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13791">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13791">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13792">**pai** Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13792">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13793">**widget** Ponteiro para widget infantil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13793">**widget** Pointer to child widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13794">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13794">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13795">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Widget attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13795">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget attach</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13796">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13796">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13797">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13797">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13798">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Pai ou widget não válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13798">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13799">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13799">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13800">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13800">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13801">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13801">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */
status = gx_widget_back_attach(&my_parent, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is attached to “my_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_back_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13839">gx_widget_back_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13839">gx_widget_back_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-back"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13840">Mova o widget para trás</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13840">Move widget to back</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13841">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13841">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_back_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_BOOL *return_widget_moved);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13842">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13842">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13843">Este serviço move o widget para trás na ordem Z dos widgets infantis dos pais.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13843">This service moves the widget to the back in the parent's Z-order of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13844">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13844">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13845">**pai** Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13845">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13846">**return_widget_moved** Ponteiro para destino para bandeira indicando que o widget foi movido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13846">**return_widget_moved** Pointer to destination for flag indicating the widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13847">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13847">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Widget bem sucedido move-se para trás</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13848">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to the back</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_block_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13892">gx_widget_block_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13892">gx_widget_block_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-a-rectangular-block-of-pixels"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13893">Mova um bloco retangular de pixéis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13893">Move a rectangular block of pixels</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13894">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13894">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_block_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RECTANGLE *block,
    INT xshift, INT yshift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13895">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13895">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13896">Este serviço move um bloco retangular de pixéis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13896">This service moves a rectangular block of pixels.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13897">Este serviço é mais utilizado para implementar deslocamento rápido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13897">This service is most often used to implement fast scrolling.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13898">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13898">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13899">**widget** Ponteiro para widget solicitando movimento de bloco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13899">**widget** Pointer to widget requesting block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13900">**bloco** Bloco de delimitação de retângulos para se mover</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13900">**block** Rectangle bounding block to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13901">**xshift** A quantidade de x mudança em pixels</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13901">**xshift** The x shift amount in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13902">**yshift** A quantidade de mudança y em pixels</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13902">**yshift** The y shift amount in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13903">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13903">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13904">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Widget bem sucedido move-se para trás</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13904">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to the back</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13905">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) tela widget não encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13905">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13906">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13906">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13907">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13907">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13908">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13908">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13909">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13909">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13910">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13910">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13911">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13911">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move a block of pixels 20 pixels to the right. */
status = gx_widget_block_move(&my_widget, &size, 20, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the block of pixels was moved. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13948">gx_widget_border_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13948">gx_widget_border_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget-border"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13949">Desenhar a fronteira do widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13949">Draw widget border</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13950">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13950">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_border_draw(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_COLOR border_color,
    GX_COLOR upper_fill, 
    GX_COLOR lower_fill, 
    GX_BOOL fill);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13951">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13951">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-13952">Este serviço traça a fronteira widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13952">This service draws the widget border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13953">Este serviço é normalmente invocado como parte de uma função de desenho widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13953">This service is normally invoked as part of a widget drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13954">Este serviço interpreta as bandeiras de estilo fronteiriço widget para não desenhar nenhuma fronteira, uma fronteira fina, uma fronteira elevada, uma fronteira embutida, ou uma fronteira espessa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13954">This service interprets the widget border style flags to draw no border, a thin border, a raised border, a recessed border, or a thick border.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13955">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13955">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13956">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13956">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13957">**border_color** Cor da borda.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13957">**border_color** Color of border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13958">**O apêndice A** contém cores pré-definidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13958">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13959">Note que a aplicação também pode adicionar cores personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13959">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13960">**upper_fill** Cor de preenchimento superior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13960">**upper_fill** Color of upper fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13961">**O apêndice A** contém cores pré-definidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13961">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13962">Note que a aplicação também pode adicionar cores personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13962">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13963">**lower_fill** Cor de preenchimento inferior.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13963">**lower_fill** Color of lower fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13964">**O apêndice A** contém cores pré-definidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13964">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13965">Note que a aplicação também pode adicionar cores personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13965">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13966">**encher** Esta bandeira booleana indica se a área do widget deve ou não ser preenchida com as cores de enchimento fornecidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13966">**fill** This boolean flag indicates whether or not the widget area should be filled with the supplied fill colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-13967">Se este valor for GX_FALSE, apenas a fronteira widget é desenhada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13967">If this value is GX_FALSE, only the widget border is drawn.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-13972">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-13972">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
      /* Call widget border draw. */
      gx_widget_border_draw(widget, GX_COLOR_BLACK,
                            GX_COLOR_GREEN, GX_COLOR_BLUE,
                            GX_TRUE);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */

      /* Draw child widgets. */
      Gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14009">gx_widget_border_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14009">gx_widget_border_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-border-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14010">Definir estilo de fronteira widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14010">Set widget border style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14011">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14011">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_border_style_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14012">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14012">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14013">Este serviço define o estilo de fronteira widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14013">This service sets the widget border style.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14014">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14014">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14015">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14015">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14016">**estilo** Estilo de fronteira.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14016">**style** Style of border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14017">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14017">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14018">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14018">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14019">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de estilo de fronteira widget bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14019">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget border style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14020">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14020">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14021">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14021">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14022">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14022">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14023">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14023">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14024">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14024">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14025">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14025">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set border style of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_border_style_set(&my_widget,
                                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” border style has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14062">gx_widget_border_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14062">gx_widget_border_width_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-border-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14063">Obtenha largura de fronteira widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14063">Get widget border width</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14064">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14064">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_border_width_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14065">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14065">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14066">Este serviço obtém a largura da fronteira widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14066">This service gets the widget border width.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14067">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14067">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14068">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14068">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14069">**return_width** Ponteiro para destino para largura de fronteira widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14069">**return_width** Pointer to destination for widget border width</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14071">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) recuperou com sucesso a largura da fronteira</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14071">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved border width</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_canvas_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14113">gx_widget_canvas_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14113">gx_widget_canvas_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14114">Obtenha tela widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14114">Get widget canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14115">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14115">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_canvas_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_CANVAS **return_canvas)
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14116">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14116">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14117">Este serviço devolve um ponteiro à tela sobre a qual este widget é renderizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14117">This service returns a pointer to the canvas onto which this widget is rendered.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14118">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14118">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14119">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14119">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14120">**return_canvas** Ponteiro para destino para tela widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14120">**return_canvas** Pointer to destination for widget’s canvas</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14121">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14121">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14122">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lona widget bem sucedida obter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14122">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget canvas get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14123">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) tela widget não encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14123">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget canvas not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14124">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14124">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14125">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14125">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14126">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14126">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14127">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14127">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14128">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14128">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get canvas associated with “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_canvas_get(&my_widget, &my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_canvas” contains the canvas of the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_child_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14166">gx_widget_child_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14166">gx_widget_child_detect</span></span>
### <a name="detect-widget-child"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14167">Detetar criança widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14167">Detect widget child</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14168">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14168">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_child_detect(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *child,
    GX_BOOL *return_detect);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14169">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14169">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14170">Este serviço deteta se o widget é uma criança do widget dos pais.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14170">This service detects if the widget is a child of the parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14171">Este serviço nidifica para procurar crianças de crianças, e retorna TRUE se o widget dos pais estiver em qualquer nível um ancestral do widget da criança.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14171">This service nests to search children of children, and returns TRUE if the parent widget is at any level an ancestor of the child widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14172">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14172">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14173">**pai** Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14173">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14174">**criança** Ponteiro para widget infantil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14174">**child** Pointer to child widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14175">**return_detect** Ponteiro para destino para deteção</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14175">**return_detect** Pointer to destination for detection</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14176">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14176">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14177">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Deteção bem sucedida de crianças widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14177">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget child detection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14178">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14178">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget parental ou infantil não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14179">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or child widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14180">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14180">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14181">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14181">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14182">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14182">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL detected;

/* Determine if “my_child” is a child of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_child_detect(&my_widget, &my_child, &detected);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “detected” is GX_TRUE, “my_child” is a child of widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_children_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14219">gx_widget_children_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14219">gx_widget_children_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget-children"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14220">Desenhe crianças widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14220">Draw widget children</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14221">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14221">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_children_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14222">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14222">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14223">Este serviço atrai todas as crianças do widget dos pais.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14223">This service draws all children of the parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14224">Este serviço é normalmente invocado por todas as funções padrão de desenho de widgets para desenhar quaisquer widgets infantis existentes, e deve ser invocado por quaisquer funções de desenho personalizado para permitir que widgets infantis sejam ligados ao seu tipo de widget parental personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14224">This service is normally invoked by all standard widget drawing functions to draw any existing child widgets, and should be invoked by any custom drawing functions to allow child widgets to be attached to your custom parent widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14225">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14225">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14226">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14226">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14227">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14227">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14228">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14228">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14229">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14229">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14230">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14230">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14231">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14231">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
        /* Call default widget background draw. */
        gx_widget_background_draw(widget);

        /* Add your own drawing here. */

        /* Draw child widgets. */
        gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```
