## <a name="gx_widget_client_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14268">gx_widget_client_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14268">gx_widget_client_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-client-area"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14269">Obtenha a área do cliente widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14269">Get widget client area</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14270">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14270">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_client_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE border_width,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_client_area);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14271">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14271">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14272">Este serviço calcula a área do widget ao subtrair a largura da fronteira widget do tamanho geral do widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14272">This service computes the client area of widget by subtracting the widget border width from the overall widget size.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14273">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14273">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14274">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14274">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14275">**border_width** Largura da borda widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14275">**border_width** Width of widget border</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14276">**return_client_area** Destino para a área de cliente de regresso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14276">**return_client_area** Destination for returning client area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14277">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14277">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14278">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Área de cliente widget bem sucedida obter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14278">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget client area get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14279">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14279">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14280">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14280">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14281">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) fronteira widget não é válida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14281">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Widget border not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14282">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14282">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14283">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14283">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14284">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14284">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE client_area
/* Get client area of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_client_get(&my_widget, my_widget_width,
                              &client_area);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “client_area” is the client area of “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14321">gx_widget_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14321">gx_widget_color_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14322">Obter cor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14322">Get color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14323">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14323">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_color_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14324">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14324">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14325">Este serviço obtém a cor associada ao ID de recursos fornecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14325">This service gets the color associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14326">Este serviço só deve ser chamado por widgets visíveis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14326">This service should only be called by visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14327">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14327">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14328">**widget** Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo do widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14328">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14329">**resource_id** Identificação de recursos de cor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14329">**resource_id** Resource ID of color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14330">**O apêndice B** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14330">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14331">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14331">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14332">**return_color** Ponteiro para destino para a cor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14332">**return_color** Pointer to destination for color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14333">**O apêndice A** contém cores pré-definidas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14333">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14334">Note que a aplicação também pode adicionar cores personalizadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14334">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14335">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14335">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14336">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Cor de sucesso obter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14336">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14337">**ID** de recursos inválidos de GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14337">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14338">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) tela widget não válida ou widget é invisível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14338">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14339">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14339">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14340">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14340">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14341">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14341">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14342">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14342">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14343">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14343">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR actual_color;

/* Get color for resource ID MY_FIRST_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_widget_color_get(my_widget, MY_FIRST_COLOR_RESOURCE_ID,
                            &actual_color);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the actual color is contained in “actual_color”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14347">gx_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14347">gx_widget_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14348">Criar widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14348">Create widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14349">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14349">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_create(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14350">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14350">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14351">Este serviço cria um widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14351">This service creates a widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14352">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14352">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14353">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14353">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14354">**nome** Nome lógico do widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14354">**name** Logical name of widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14355">**pai** Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14355">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14356">**estilo** Estilo, estilo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14356">**style** Style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14357">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14357">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14358">**widget_id** ID definido pela aplicação do widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14358">**widget_id** Application-defined ID of the widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14359">**tamanho** Tamanho do widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14359">**size** Size of the widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14360">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14360">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Widget de sucesso criar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14361">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14364">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14364">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14365">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14365">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14366">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget dos pais não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14366">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14367">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14367">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14368">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14368">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14369">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14369">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET my_widget;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Get client area of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_create(&my_widget, "my widget",
                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_WIDGET_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the widget “my_widget” has been created. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14408">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14408">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14409">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14409">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14410">Este serviço testa para determinar se o widget foi previamente criado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14410">This service tests to determine if the widget has previously been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14411">Se não forem encontrados erros, esta função volta GX_SUCCESS, independentemente de o widget ser criado ainda ou não.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14411">If no errors are encountered, this function return GX_SUCCESS, regardless if the widget is created yet or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14412">O resultado do teste está no ponteiro return_test.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14412">The result of the test is in the return_test pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14413">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14413">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14414">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14414">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14415">**return_test** Destino para o resultado do teste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14415">**return_test** Destination for test result</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14416">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14416">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conclusão do teste com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14417">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful test completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14418">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14418">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14419">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14419">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14420">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14420">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14421">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14421">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL was_created;

/* Test to see if widget “my_widget” is created. */
status = gx_widget_created_test(&my_widget, &was_created);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, no error occurred. If “was_created” is
GX_TRUE, the widget “my_widget” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14458">gx_widget_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14458">gx_widget_delete</span></span>
### <a name="delete-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14459">Eliminar widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14459">Delete widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14460">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14460">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_delete(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14461">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14461">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14462">Este serviço elimina o widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14462">This service deletes the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14463">Se o bloco de controlo widget for atribuído dinamicamente, o serviço gx_system_memory_free é invocado para armazenamento gratuito e dinamicamente atribuído.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14463">If the widget control block is dynamically allocated, the gx_system_memory_free service is invoked to free dynamically allocated storage.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14464">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14464">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14465">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14465">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14466">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14466">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14467">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Widget bem sucedido eliminar GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14467">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget delete GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14468">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14468">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14469">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14469">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14470">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) A função de livre de memória não está definida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14470">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14471">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14471">Allowed From</span></span>


## <a name="gx_widget_detach"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14510">gx_widget_detach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14510">gx_widget_detach</span></span>
### <a name="detach-widget-from-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14511">Widget detach do progenitor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14511">Detach widget from parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14512">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14512">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_detach(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14513">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14513">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14514">Este serviço separa o widget do seu progenitor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14514">This service detaches the widget from its parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14515">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14515">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14516">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14516">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14517">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14517">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Widget desprender GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget detach GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14519">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14519">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14520">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14520">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14521">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14521">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14522">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14522">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14523">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14523">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Detach widget “my_widget” from its parent. */
status = gx_widget_detach(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been detached. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14560">gx_widget_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14560">gx_widget_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14561">Desenhar widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14561">Draw widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14562">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14562">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14563">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14563">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14564">Este serviço desenha o widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14564">This service draws the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14565">Esta função é normalmente chamada internamente pelo mecanismo de atualização de lona GUIX, mas está exposta à aplicação para ajudar na implementação de funções de desenho personalizado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14565">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14566">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14566">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14567">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14567">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14568">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14568">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14569">**Nenhuma**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14569">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14570">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14570">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14571">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14571">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14572">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14572">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Call default widget draw. */
      gx_widget_draw(widget);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_draw_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14609">gx_widget_draw_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14609">gx_widget_draw_set</span></span>
### <a name="assign-the-widget-drawing-function"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14610">Atribua a função de desenho widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14610">Assign the widget drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14611">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14611">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_draw_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    VOID (*drawing_function) (GX_WIDGET *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14612">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14612">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14613">Este serviço substitui a função de desenho predefinido do widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14613">This service overrides the default drawing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14614">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14614">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14615">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14615">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14616">**drawing_function** Ponteiro para a função de desenho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14616">**drawing_function** Pointer to drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14617">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14617">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Substituição da função de desenho de widgets bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14618">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget drawing function override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14619">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14620">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14621">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14621">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14622">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14622">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14623">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14623">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14624">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14624">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function. */
VOID my_drawing_function(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}

/* Set the drawing function of widget “my_widget” to “my_drawing_function”. */
status = gx_widget_draw_set(&my_widget, my_drawing_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has the drawning function “my_drawing_function”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_generate"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14661">gx_widget_event_generate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14661">gx_widget_event_generate</span></span>
### <a name="generate-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14662">Gerar evento widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14662">Generate widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14663">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14663">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_generate(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    USHORT event_type, LONG value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14664">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14665">Este serviço gera um tipo GX_SIGNAL de evento, que é um tipo ou classe particular de GX_EVENT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14665">This service generates a GX_SIGNAL type of event, which is a particular type or class of GX_EVENT.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14666">gx_widget_event_generate() codifica o ID widget de 16 bits, juntamente com o passado em event_type, em um único valor de 32 bits GX_EVENT.gx_event_type.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14666">gx_widget_event_generate() encodes the 16 bit widget ID, along with the passed in event_type, into a single 32 bit GX_EVENT.gx_event_type value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14667">O parâmetro de valor é codificado no gx_event gerado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14667">The value parameter is encoded into the generated gx_event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14668">gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14668">gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata field.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14669">O campo gerado event.gx_event_target é sempre carregado com o progenitor do widget chamando, o que significa que o evento gerado é sempre enviado primeiro para o progenitor do widget gerador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14669">The generated event.gx_event_target field is always loaded with the calling widget’s parent, meaning the generated event is always sent first to the parent of the generating widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14670">Note que gx_widget_event_generate só devem ser utilizados para enviar GX_SIGNAL tipos de eventos de gama.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14670">Note that gx_widget_event_generate should only be used to send GX_SIGNAL range event types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14671">Para todos os outros tipos de eventos, incluindo os tipos de eventos definidos pelo utilizador, utilize a API gx_system_event_send() API, que concede o controlo total sobre todos os campos do evento empurrados na fila do evento GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14671">For all  other event types, including user defined event types, use the gx_system_event_send() API, which grants full control over every field of the event pushed in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14672">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14672">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14673">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14673">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14674">**event_type** Tipo de evento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14674">**event_type** Type of event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14675">**O apêndice E** contém eventos GUIX pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14675">**Appendix E** contains pre-defined GUIX events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14676">Eventos adicionais podem ser adicionados pela aplicação.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14676">Additional events may be added by the application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14677">**valor** Informações adicionais sobre eventos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14677">**value** Additional event information</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14678">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14678">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14679">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Geração de eventos widgets bem sucedidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14679">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event generation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14680">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14680">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14681">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14681">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14682">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14682">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14683">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14683">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14684">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14684">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14685">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14685">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Generate a redraw event for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_event_generate(&my_widget, GX_EVENT_REDRAW, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the redraw event for widget “my_widget” has been generated. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14723">gx_widget_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14723">gx_widget_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14724">Evento widget de processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14724">Process widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14725">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14725">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14726">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14726">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14727">Esta é a função de processamento de eventos predefinido para todos os widgets.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14727">This is the default event processing function for all widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14728">Quando uma função de processamento de eventos personalizado é escrita, a ação padrão para qualquer tipo de evento deve ser sempre passar o evento para o tipo de widget em que se baseia um widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14728">When a custom event processing function is written, the default action for any event type should always be to pass the event to the widget type upon which a widget is based.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14729">Widgets que são baseados na utilização mais básica do GX_WIDGET tipo de passe gx_widget_event_process como função de processamento de eventos predefinido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14729">Widgets that are based on the most basic GX_WIDGET type pass use gx_widget_event_process as their default event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14730">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14730">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14731">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14731">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14732">**evento** Ponteiro para o evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14732">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14733">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14733">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14734">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processamento de eventos widgets com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14734">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14735">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14735">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14736">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14736">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14737">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14737">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14738">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14738">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14739">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14739">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14740">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14740">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Process event “my_event” for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_event_process(&my_widget, &my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event “my_event” for widget “my_widget” has been processed. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14777">gx_widget_event_process_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14777">gx_widget_event_process_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-event-processing-function-of-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14778">Definir função de processamento de eventos de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14778">Set event processing function of widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14779">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14779">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT (*event_processing) (GX_WIDGET *, GX_EVENT *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14780">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14780">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14781">Este serviço substitui a função de processamento de eventos do widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14781">This service overrides the event processing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14782">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14782">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14783">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14783">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14784">**event_processing** Ponteiro para nova função de processamento de eventos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14784">**event_processing** Pointer to new event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14785">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14785">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14786">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processamento de eventos widgets com sucesso sobrepõem-se</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14786">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14787">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14787">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14788">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14788">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14789">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14789">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14790">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14790">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14791">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14791">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT my_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
      UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

      switch(event->gx_event_type)
      {
      case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;

      default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
               event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
      }
      return status;
}

/* Use “my_event_process” to process events for widget “my_tree_view”. */
status = gx_widget_event_process_set((GX_WIDGET *)&my_tree_view,
                    (VOID (*)(GX_WIDGET *))my_event_process);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS all event processing for widget “my_tree_view” is handled by “my_event_process”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_to_parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14828">gx_widget_event_to_parent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14828">gx_widget_event_to_parent</span></span>
### <a name="send-event-to-widgets-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14829">Enviar evento para o pai do Widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14829">Send event to widget’s parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14830">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14830">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_to_parent(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14831">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14831">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14832">Este serviço envia um evento para o pai do widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14832">This service sends an event to the widget’s parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14833">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14833">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14834">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14834">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14835">**evento** Ponteiro para o evento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14835">**event** Pointer to the event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14836">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14836">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14837">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) enviou com sucesso evento para o pai do widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14837">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully sent event to widget’s parent</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14838">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14838">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14839">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14839">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14840">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14840">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14841">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14841">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14842">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14842">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Send my_event to the widget’s parent */
status = gx_widget_event_to_parent(&my_widget, my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been delivered to the parent of my_widget. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14879">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14879">gx_widget_fill_color_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-background-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14880">Definir cor de fundo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14880">Set widget background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14881">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14881">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_fill_color_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_color_id);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14882">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14882">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14883">Este serviço define as cores de fundo do widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14883">This service sets the widget background colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14884">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14884">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14885">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14885">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14886">**normal_color_id** Identificação de recursos da cor de preenchimento em estado normal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14886">**normal_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14887">**O apêndice A** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14887">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14888">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14888">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14889">**selected_color_id** ID de recurso da cor de preenchimento quando o widget ganhar foco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14889">**selected_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14890">**O apêndice A** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14890">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14891">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14891">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14892">**disabled_color_id** ID de recurso da cor de preenchimento quando o estilo GX_STYLE_ENABLED não está definido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14892">**disabled_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14893">**O apêndice A** contém IDs de recursos de cor pré-definidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14893">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14894">Note que a aplicação pode adicionar IDs de recursos de cor personalizados também.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14894">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14895">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14895">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14896">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) definir com sucesso a cor de preenchimento de widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14896">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set widget fill color</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14897">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14897">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14898">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14898">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14899">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14899">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14900">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14900">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14901">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14901">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14902">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14902">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set background of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_fill_color_set(&my_widget,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” background has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14939">gx_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14939">gx_widget_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-child-widget-of-parent-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14940">Encontre widget infantil do widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14940">Find child widget of parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14941">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14941">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_find(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_depth, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14942">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14942">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14943">Este serviço procura através das crianças do progenitor especificado à procura de um widget com o valor de ID solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14943">This service searches through the children of the specified parent looking for a widget with the  requested ID value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14944">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14944">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14945">**pai** Ponteiro para widget dos pais a partir do qual a pesquisa é iniciada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14945">**parent** Pointer to parent widget from which search is started</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14946">**widget_id** Widget ID para procurar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14946">**widget_id** Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14947">**search_depth** Define o nível de nidificação recursivo no qual a função procurará widgets infantis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14947">**search_depth** Defines the recursive nesting level into which the function will search child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14948">Se este valor for <= 0, apenas são pesquisados os filhos imediatos do widget dos pais.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14948">If this value is <= 0, only immediate children of the parent widget are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14949">Se este valor for GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, todas as crianças de todos os widgets infantis são exaustivamente revistadas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14949">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, all children of all child widgets are exhaustively searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14950">Para qualquer outro valor > 0, este valor limita o quão profundamente aninhado esta função irá pesquisar através de widgets infantis procurados para o widget ID solicitado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14950">For any other value > 0, this value limits how deeply nested this function will search through child widgets looked for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14951">**return_widget** Ponteiro para destino para widget encontrado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14951">**return_widget** Pointer to destination for found widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14952">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14952">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14953">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Widget de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14953">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14954">**widget GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) não fount</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14954">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Widget not fount</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14955">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14955">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-14956">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14956">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14957">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14957">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-14958">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14958">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14959">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14959">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *widget_found;

/* Find widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_find(&my_widget, GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE
                        MY_WIDGET_ID, &widget_found);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pointer “widget_found” contains the pointer to the widget found. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_first_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14996">gx_widget_first_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14996">gx_widget_first_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-first-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14997">Devolva o ponteiro ao widget primeiro para crianças</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14997">Return pointer to first child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14998">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14998">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_first_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-14999">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-14999">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15000">O GUIX mantém uma lista estruturada de widgets de pais e filhos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15000">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15001">Este serviço devolve um ponteiro ao primeiro widget infantil do progenitor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15001">This service returns a pointer to the first child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15002">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15002">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15003">**pai** Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15003">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15004">**widget_return** Ponteiro para devolver ponteiro widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15004">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15005">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15005">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15006">**Ponteiro GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) devolvido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15006">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15008">**widget** GX_INVALID_WIDGET (0x12) Inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15008">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15009">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15009">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15010">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15010">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15011">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15011">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{
      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_first_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
            return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15016">gx_widget_previous_sibling_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15016">gx_widget_previous_sibling_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_focus_next"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15018">gx_widget_focus_next</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15018">gx_widget_focus_next</span></span>
### <a name="move-focus-to-next-widget-in-navigation-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15019">Mova o foco para o próximo widget na ordem de navegação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15019">Move focus to next widget in navigation order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15020">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15020">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_focus_next(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15021">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15021">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15022">Este serviço move o foco para o próximo widget irmão na lista de widgets ligados que aceitam o foco.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15022">This service moves focus to the next sibling widget in the linked list of widgets that accept focus.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15023">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15023">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15024">**widget** Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo do widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15024">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15025">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15025">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15026">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) foco foi movido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15026">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) focus was moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15027">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) não se moveu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15027">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) focus was not moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15028">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15028">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15029">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15030">**widget** GX_INVALID_WIDGET (0x12) Inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15030">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15031">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15031">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15032">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15032">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15033">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15033">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move focus to next widget in navigation order. */ status =
gx_widget_focus_next(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the focus has been moved to the next
widget in the navigation order */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15051">gx_widget_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15051">gx_widget_font_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-font-for-specified-resource-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15052">Obtenha o tipo de letra para iD de recursos especificados</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15052">Get font for specified resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15053">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15053">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_font_get(
    GX_WIDGETG *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15054">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15054">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15055">Este serviço recupera o tipo de letra associado ao ID de recursos especificado a partir da tabela de fontes do visor em que este widget é visível.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15055">This service retrieves the font associated with the specified resource ID from the font table of the display on which this widget is visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15056">Esta função só deve ser chamada por um widget visível.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15056">This function should only be called by a visible widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15057">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15057">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15058">**widget** Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo do widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15058">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15059">**resource_id** ID de recurso de fonte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15059">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15060">**return_font** Ponteiro para destino para ponteiro de fonte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15060">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15061">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15061">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15062">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Fonte recuperada com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15062">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15063">**ID** de recursos inválidos de GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15063">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15064">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) tela widget não válida ou widget é invisível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15064">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15065">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15065">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15066">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15066">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15067">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15067">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15068">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15068">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15069">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15069">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;
/* Get font for MY_FONT_ID. */
status = gx_widget_font_get(widget, MY_FONT_RESOURCE_ID, &my_font);
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font pointer has been retrieved in “my_font”. */
```

```C
UINT gx_widget_free(GX_WIDGETG *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15076">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15076">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15077">Este serviço liberta a memória associada a um bloco de controlo widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15077">This service releases the memory associated with a widget control block.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15078">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15078">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15079">**widget** Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo do widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15079">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15080">**resource_id** ID de recurso de fonte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15080">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15081">**return_font** Ponteiro para destino para ponteiro de fonte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15081">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15082">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15082">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15083">**widget GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) libertado com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15083">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully freed widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15084">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) A função de livre de memória não está definida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15084">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15085">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15085">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15086">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15086">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15087">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15087">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15088">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15088">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET widget;
UINT status;

status = gx_widget_allocate(&widget, sizeof(GX_WIDGET))

/* Free a runtime allocated widget. */
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
      status = gx_widget_free(widget);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the memory that allocated to the widget has been released. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_front_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15125">gx_widget_front_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15125">gx_widget_front_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-front"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15126">Mova o widget para a frente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15126">Move widget to front</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15127">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15127">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_front_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_BOOL *return_moved);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15128">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15128">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15129">Este serviço move o widget para a frente na lista de pedidos de Z dos widgets infantis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15129">This service moves the widget to the front in the parent Z-order list of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15130">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15130">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15131">**widget** Ponteiro para widget para mover</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15131">**widget** Pointer to widget to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15132">**return_moved** Ponteiro para destino para indicação widget foi movido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15132">**return_moved** Pointer to destination for indication widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15133">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15133">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15134">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Widget bem sucedido move-se para a frente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15134">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15135">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15135">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15136">Widget **GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) já na frente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15136">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) Widget already in front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15137">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15137">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15138">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15138">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15139">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15139">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15140">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15140">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15141">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15141">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL widget_moved;

/* Move widget “my_widget” to the front. */
status = gx_widget_front_move(&my_widget, &widget_moved);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “widget_moved” is GX_TRUE, the
widget “my_widget” was moved to the front . */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_height_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15178">gx_widget_height_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15178">gx_widget_height_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15179">Obtenha a altura do widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15179">Get widget height</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15180">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15180">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_height_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT *return_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15181">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15181">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15182">Este serviço obtém a altura do widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15182">This service gets the widget height.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15183">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15183">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15184">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15184">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15185">**return_height** Ponteiro para destino para altura widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15185">**return_height** Pointer to destination for widget height</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15186">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15186">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15187">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Altura de widget bem sucedida obter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15187">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget height get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15230">gx_widget_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15230">gx_widget_hide</span></span>
### <a name="hide-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15231">Ocultar widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15231">Hide widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15232">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15232">Prototype</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15233">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15233">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15234">Este serviço esconde o widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15234">This service hides the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15235">Este widget ainda está ligado ao seu progenitor, mas não é permitido desenhar na tela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15235">This widget is still attached to it's parent, but it is not allowed to draw on the canvas.</span></span>
