## <a name="gx_widget_last_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15282">gx_widget_last_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15282">gx_widget_last_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-last-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15283">Ponteiro de retorno para o último widget infantil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15283">Return pointer to last child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15284">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15284">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_last_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15285">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15285">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15286">O GUIX mantém uma lista estruturada de widgets de pais e filhos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15286">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15287">Este serviço devolve um ponteiro ao último widget infantil do progenitor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15287">This service returns a pointer to the last child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15288">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15288">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15289">**pai** Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15289">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15290">**widget_return** Ponteiro para devolver ponteiro widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15290">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15291">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15291">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15292">**Ponteiro GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) devolvido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15292">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15293">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15293">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15294">**widget** GX_INVALID_WIDGET (0x12) Inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15294">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15295">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15295">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15296">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15296">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15297">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15297">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_last_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{

      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_last_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
              return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15306">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15306">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_next_sibling_get(
    GX_WIDGET *current,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15307">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15307">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15308">O GUIX mantém uma lista estruturada de widgets de pais e filhos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15308">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15309">Este serviço devolve um ponteiro ao próximo irmão do widget atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15309">This service returns a pointer to the next sibling of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15310">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15310">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15311">**corrente** Ponteiro para widget atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15311">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15312">**widget_return** Ponteiro para devolver ponteiro widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15312">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15313">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15313">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15314">**Ponteiro GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) devolvido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15314">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15315">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15315">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15316">**widget** GX_INVALID_WIDGET (0x12) Inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15316">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15317">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15317">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15318">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15318">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15319">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15319">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve next sibling widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_next(GX_WIDGET *current)
{
      GX_WIDGET *sibling;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_next_sibling_get(current, &sibling);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
            return sibling;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15348">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15348">gx_widget_pixelmap_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-pixelmap"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15349">Obter pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15349">Get pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15350">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15350">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_pixelmap_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15351">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15351">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15352">Este serviço obtém o pixelmap associado ao ID de recursos fornecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15352">This service gets the pixelmap associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15353">Este serviço só deve ser solicitado para widgets visíveis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15353">This service should only be called for visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15354">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15354">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15355">**widget** Ponteiro para o bloco de controlo do widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15355">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15356">**pixelmap_id** ID de recursos Pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15356">**pixelmap_id** Pixelmap resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15357">**return_pixelmap** Ponteiro para o ponteiro de destino pixelmap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15357">**return_pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap destination pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15358">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15358">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15359">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pixelmap de sucesso obter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15359">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15360">**ID** de recursos inválidos de GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID (0x33)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15360">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15361">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) tela widget não válida ou widget é invisível</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15361">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15362">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15363">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15364">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15364">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15365">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15365">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15366">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15366">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_PIXELMAP *my_pixelmap;

/* Get the pixelmap associated with MY_PIXELMAP_ID. */
status = gx_widget_pixelmap_get(widget, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID,
                                &my_pixelmap);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_pixelmap” contains the pixemap pointer. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15445">gx_widget_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15445">gx_widget_shift</span></span>
### <a name="shift-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15446">Widget de turno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15446">Shift widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15447">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15447">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_shift(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift, 
    GX_BOOL mark_dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15448">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15448">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15449">Este serviço desloca o widget e, opcionalmente, marca-o como sujo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15449">This service shifts the widget and optionally marks it as dirty.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15450">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15450">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15451">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15451">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15452">**x_shift** Número de pixels para deslocar no eixo x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15452">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15453">**y_shift** Número de pixels para deslocar no eixo y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15453">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15454">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE para indicar sujo, caso contrário, GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15454">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE to indicate dirty, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15455">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15455">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15456">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Mudança de widget bem sucedida GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15456">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget shift GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15457">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15457">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15458">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15458">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15459">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15459">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15460">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15460">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15461">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15461">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Shift widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_shift(&my_widget, 10, 20, GX_FALSE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been shifted. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15498">gx_widget_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15498">gx_widget_show</span></span>
### <a name="show-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15499">Mostrar widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15499">Show widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15500">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15500">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_show(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15501">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15501">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15502">Este serviço mostra o widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15502">This service shows the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15503">O widget só se tornará visível se estiver ligado a um progenitor e o widget dos pais também for visível.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15503">The widget will become visible only if it is attached to a parent and the parent widget is also visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15504">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15504">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15505">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15505">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15506">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15506">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15507">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Widget de sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15507">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget show</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15508">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15508">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15509">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15509">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15510">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15510">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15511">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15511">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15512">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15512">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15513">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15513">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Show widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_show(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been shown. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15550">gx_widget_status_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15550">gx_widget_status_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15551">Adicionar o estado do widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15551">Add widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15552">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15552">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15553">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15553">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15554">Este serviço adiciona qualquer combinação de bandeiras de estado ao widget especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15554">This service adds any combination of status flags to the specified widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15555">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15555">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15556">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15556">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15557">**estado** Estado a adicionar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15557">**status** Status to add</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15558">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15558">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15559">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Estado do widget bem sucedido adicionar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15559">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15561">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15561">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15562">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15562">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15563">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15563">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15564">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15564">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add status to widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_add(&my_widget, status_to_add);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” status was. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15601">gx_widget_status_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15601">gx_widget_status_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15602">Obtenha o estado do widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15602">Get widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15603">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15603">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    ULONG *return_status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15604">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15604">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15605">Este serviço recupera bandeiras de estado do widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15605">This service retrieves status flags from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15606">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15606">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15607">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15607">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15608">**return_status** Ponteiro para o estado que está a ser devolvido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15608">**return_status** Pointer to the status being returned</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15609">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15609">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Estado widget bem sucedido obter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15610">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15611">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15612">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15612">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15613">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15613">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15614">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15614">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15615">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15615">Example</span></span>

```C
ULONT get_status;

/* Retrieve status flag from widget “my_widget”. */ status =
gx_widget_status_get(&my_widget, &get_status);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the status from widget “my_widget” is
saved to “get_status”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15651">gx_widget_status_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15651">gx_widget_status_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15652">Remover o estado do widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15652">Remove widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15653">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15653">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15654">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15654">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15655">Este serviço remove as bandeiras de estado especificadas da variável de estado interno dos widgets.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15655">This service removes the specified status flags from the widgets internal status variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15656">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15656">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15657">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15657">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15658">**estado** Estado a remover</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15658">**status** Status to remove</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15659">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15659">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15660">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Remoção do estado do widget bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15660">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status removal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15661">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15661">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15662">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15662">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15663">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15663">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15664">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15664">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15665">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15665">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_remove(&my_widget, status_to_remove);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the status flags are removed from the
widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_test"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15702">gx_widget_status_test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15702">gx_widget_status_test</span></span>
### <a name="test-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15703">Estado do widget de teste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15703">Test widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15704">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15704">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_test(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15705">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15705">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15706">Este serviço testa as bandeiras de estado do widget especificado e armazena o resultado na memória apontada por "return_test".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15706">This service tests the status flags of the specified widget and stores the result in the memory pointed by “return_test”.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15707">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15707">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15708">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15708">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15709">**estado** Estado a testar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15709">**status** Status to test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15710">**return_status** Ponteiro para destino para o resultado do teste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15710">**return_status** Pointer to destination for result of test</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15711">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15711">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15712">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Teste de estado widget bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15712">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15713">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15713">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15714">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15714">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15715">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15715">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15716">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15716">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15717">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15717">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL test_result;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_test(&my_widget, status_to_test,
                              &test_result);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” status was tested
and the result in “test_result”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15726">gx_widget_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15726">gx_widget_string_get</span></span>
### <a name="retrieve-string-associated-with-a-visible-widget-and-string-id-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15727">Obter corda associada a um widget visível e iD de corda (depreciado)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15727">Retrieve string associated with a visible widget and string ID (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15728">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15728">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_string_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15729">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15729">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15730">Este serviço é prevadido a favor de gx_widget_string_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15730">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_widget_string_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15731">Este serviço devolve a entrada da tabela de cordas para o valor de ID de cadeia dado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15731">This service returns the string table entry for the given string ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15732">Este serviço é semelhante ao gx_display_string_get, exceto que o visor ativo é determinado automaticamente em vez de ser transmitido pelo chamador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15732">This service is similar to gx_display_string_get, except the active display is determined automatically rather than being passed in by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15733">Este serviço só pode ser utilizado para widgets visíveis, ou seja, o visor associado a este widget é conhecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15733">This service can only be used for widgets which are visible, i.e. the display associated with this widget is known.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15734">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15734">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15735">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15735">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15736">**string_id** Valor de ID de cadeia do cabeçalho de recursos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15736">**string_id** String ID value from resources header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15737">**cadeia** Endereço de variável para cadeia de retorno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15737">**string** Address of variable to return string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15738">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15738">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15739">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Teste de estado widget bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15739">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15740">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15740">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15741">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15741">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15742">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15742">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15743">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15743">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15744">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15744">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */

      &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string has been retrieved */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_string_get_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15748">gx_widget_string_get_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15748">gx_widget_string_get_ext</span></span>
### <a name="retrieve-string-associated-with-a-visible-widget-and-string-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15749">Obter corda associada a um widget visível e iD de corda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15749">Retrieve string associated with a visible widget and string ID</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15750">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15750">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_string_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_STRING *string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15751">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15751">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15752">Este serviço devolve a entrada da tabela de cordas para o valor de ID de cadeia dado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15752">This service returns the string table entry for the given string ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15753">Este serviço é semelhante ao gx_display_string_get, exceto que o visor ativo é determinado automaticamente em vez de ser transmitido pelo chamador.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15753">This service is similar to gx_display_string_get, except the active display is determined automatically rather than being passed in by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15754">Este serviço só pode ser utilizado para widgets visíveis, ou seja, o visor associado a este widget é conhecido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15754">This service can only be used for widgets which are visible, i.e. the display associated with this widget is known.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15755">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15755">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15756">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15756">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15757">**string_id** Valor de ID de cadeia do cabeçalho de recursos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15757">**string_id** String ID value from resources header</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15758">**cadeia** Endereço de variável para cadeia de retorno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15758">**string** Address of variable to return string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15759">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15759">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15760">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Teste de estado widget bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15760">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15761">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15761">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15762">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15762">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15763">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15763">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15764">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15764">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15765">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15765">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING string;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */

status = gx_widget_string_get_ext(&my_widget,
                          GX_STRING_ID_SHUTDOWN, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string has been retrieved */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15769">gx_widget_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15769">gx_widget_style_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15770">Adicione estilo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15770">Add widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15771">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15771">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15772">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15772">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15773">Este serviço adiciona um estilo ao widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15773">This service adds a style to the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15774">Além disso, são tomadas as seguintes ações.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15774">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15775">Se o estilo adicionado for GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT de estatuto serão adicionados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15775">If the added style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15776">Se o estilo adicionado for GX_STYLE_ENABLED, GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE de estatuto serão adicionados.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15776">If the added style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15777">Se o widget estiver visível, é automaticamente invalidado e em fila para redesenhar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15777">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15778">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15778">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15779">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15779">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15780">**estilo** Novo estilo para adicionar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15780">**style** New style to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15781">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15781">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15782">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15782">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15783">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Sucesso estilo widget adicionar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15783">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15784">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15784">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15785">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15785">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15786">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15786">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15787">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15787">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15788">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15788">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15789">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15789">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Add style to widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_add(&my_widget, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the style was successfully applied to the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15826">gx_widget_style_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15826">gx_widget_style_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15827">Obtenha estilo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15827">Get widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15828">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15828">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG *return_style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15829">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15829">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15830">Este serviço recupera a bandeira de estilo do widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15830">This service retrieves style flag from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15831">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15831">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15832">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15832">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15833">**return_style** Ponteiro para o estilo que está sendo devolvido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15833">**return_style** Pointer to the style being returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15834">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15834">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15835">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) recuperou com sucesso o estilo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15835">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved widget style</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15836">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15836">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15837">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15837">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15838">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15839">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15839">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15840">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15840">Initialization and threads</span></span>


### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15841">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15841">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve style from widget into “style”. */
status = gx_widget_style_get(&my_widget, &style);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the style flag from widget is saved in “style”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15878">gx_widget_style_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15878">gx_widget_style_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15879">Remova o estilo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15879">Remove widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15880">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15880">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15881">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15881">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15882">Este serviço remove um estilo do widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15882">This service removes a style from the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15883">Além disso, são tomadas as seguintes ações.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15883">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15884">Se o estilo removido for GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT de estado serão removidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15884">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15885">Se o estilo removido for GX_STYLE_ENABLED, GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE de estado serão removidos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15885">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15886">Se o widget estiver visível, é automaticamente invalidado e em fila para redesenhar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15886">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15887">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15887">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15888">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15888">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15889">**estilo** Estilo para remover.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15889">**style** Style to remove.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15890">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15890">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15891">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15891">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15892">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Estilo widget bem sucedido remover</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15892">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style remove</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15893">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15893">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15894">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15894">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15895">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15895">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15896">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15896">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15897">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15897">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15898">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15898">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove style from widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_remove(&my_widget,
                                GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED style was removed from the widget “my_widget”.*/
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15935">gx_widget_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15935">gx_widget_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15936">Definir estilo widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15936">Set widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15937">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15937">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15938">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15938">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15939">Este serviço define um estilo para o widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15939">This service sets a style to the widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15940">Se o estilo definido incluir GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, o estado GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT será adicionado, caso contrário o estado será removido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15940">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15941">Se o estilo definido incluir GX_STYLE_ENABLED, o estado GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE será adicionado, caso contrário o estado será removido.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15941">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15942">Se o widget estiver visível, é automaticamente invalidado e em fila para redesenhar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15942">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15943">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15943">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15944">**widget** Ponteiro para widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15944">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15945">**estilo** Estilo para definir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15945">**style** Style to set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15946">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15946">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15947">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15947">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15948">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Conjunto de estilo widget bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15948">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15949">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15949">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15950">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15950">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-15951">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15951">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15952">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15952">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-15953">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15953">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-15954">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-15954">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set style GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT to the widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_set(&my_widget, GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” style is set to GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_top_visible_child_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16102">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16102">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-visible-child-that-is-top-of-z-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16103">Devolva o ponteiro para a criança visível que está no topo da ordem Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16103">Return pointer to visible child that is top of Z order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16104">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16104">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(
    GX_WIDGET *current,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16105">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16105">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-16106">O GUIX mantém uma lista estruturada de widgets de pais e filhos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16106">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8738c-16107">Este serviço devolve um ponteiro à criança mais visível do widget atual.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16107">This service returns a pointer to the topmost visible child of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16108">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16108">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16109">**corrente** Ponteiro para widget atual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16109">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16110">**widget_return** Ponteiro para devolver ponteiro widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16110">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16111">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16111">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16112">**Ponteiro GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) devolvido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16112">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16113">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16113">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16114">**widget** GX_INVALID_WIDGET (0x12) Inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16114">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16115">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16115">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-16116">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16116">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16117">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16117">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve topmost visible widget on the display */

GX_WIDGET *get_top_window(GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root)
{
    GX_WIDGET *top_window;
    UINT status;

    status = gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(root, &top_window);
    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return top_window;
    }
    return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_client_height_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16227">gx_window_client_height_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16227">gx_window_client_height_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-client-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16228">Obtenha a altura do cliente da janela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16228">Get window client height</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16229">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16229">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_height_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_VALUE *return_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16230">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16230">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-16231">Este serviço tem a altura do cliente da janela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16231">This service gets the client height of the window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16232">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16232">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16233">**janela** Ponteiro para janela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16233">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16234">**return_height** Ponteiro para destino para a altura do cliente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16234">**return_height** Pointer to destination for client height</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16236">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Altura do cliente da janela bem sucedida obter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16236">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client height get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16237">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16237">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16238">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16238">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16239">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16239">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Get client height of “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_client_scroll"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16257">gx_window_client_scroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16257">gx_window_client_scroll</span></span>
### <a name="scroll-window-clients"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16258">Percorra clientes da janela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16258">Scroll window clients</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16259">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16259">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_scroll(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_VALUE x_scroll,
    GX_VALUE y_scroll);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16260">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16260">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-16261">Este serviço desloca os clientes da janela pelo valor especificado.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16261">This service scrolls the window clients by the specified amount.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16262">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16262">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16263">**janela** Ponteiro para janela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16263">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16264">**x_scroll** Montante para deslocar no eixo x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16264">**x_scroll** Amount to scroll on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16265">**y_scroll** Montante para rolar no eixo y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16265">**y_scroll** Amount to scroll on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16266">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16266">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16267">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Pergaminho de cliente de janela bem sucedido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16267">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client scroll</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16268">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16268">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16269">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16269">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16270">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16270">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16271">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) O valor do pergaminho não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16271">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll value(s) not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16272">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16272">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16274">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16274">Example</span></span>

```C

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the clients of window “my_window” have been scrolled. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16291">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16291">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_width_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16292">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16292">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-16293">Este serviço obtém a largura do cliente da janela especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16293">This service gets the client width of the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16294">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16294">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16296">**return_height** Ponteiro para destino para a largura do cliente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16296">**return_height** Pointer to destination for client width</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16297">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16297">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16299">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16299">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16301">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16301">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_window_close"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16319">gx_window_close</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16319">gx_window_close</span></span>


## <a name="gx_window_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16349">gx_window_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16349">gx_window_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16350">Criar janela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16350">Create window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16351">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16351">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_create(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT window_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16352">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16352">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-16353">Este serviço cria uma janela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16353">This service creates a window.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-16354">GX_WINDOW é derivado de GX_WIDGET e suporta todos os gx_widget serviços da API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16354">GX_WINDOW is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16355">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16355">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16356">**janela** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de janela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16356">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16357">**nome** Nome lógico da janela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16357">**name** Logical name of window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16358">**pai** Ponteiro para widget dos pais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16358">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16359">**estilo** Estilo de janela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16359">**style** Window style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16360">**O apêndice D** contém estilos gerais pré-definidos para todos os widgets, bem como estilos específicos de widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16360">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16361">**window_id** ID definido pela aplicação da janela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16361">**window_id** Application-defined ID of the window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16362">**tamanho** Tamanho da janela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16362">**size** Size of the window</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16363">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16363">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16364">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Janela de sucesso criar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16364">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16365">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16365">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16366">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16366">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16367">Widget **GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) já criado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16367">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16368">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Tamanho do bloco de controlo de widget inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16368">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16369">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16369">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16370">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16370">Allowed From</span></span>

```C

/* Create window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_create(&my_window, "my window",
                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                          MY_WINDOW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS window “my_window” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16416">gx_window_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16416">gx_window_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-window-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16417">Evento de janela de processo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16417">Process window event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16418">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16418">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_event_process(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16419">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16419">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-16420">Este serviço processa um evento para esta janela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16420">This service processes an event for this window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16421">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16421">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16422">**janela** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de janela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16422">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16423">**evento** Ponteiro para o evento para processar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16423">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16424">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16424">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16425">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Processamento bem sucedido de eventos de janela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16425">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16426">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16427">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16428">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16428">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16429">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16429">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-16430">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16430">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16431">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16431">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_window_event_process(GX_WINDOW *window,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default window
            event processing */
            status = gx_window_event_process(window, event);
            break;
        }
        return status;
}
```
