## <a name="gx_window_execute"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16447">gx_window_execute</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16447">gx_window_execute</span></span>
### <a name="modally-execute-a-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16448">Modally executar uma janela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16448">Modally execute a window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16449">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16449">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_execute(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    ULONG *return_ptr)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16450">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16450">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-16451">Este serviço executa modally uma janela.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16451">This service modally executes a window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16452">Qualquer entrada do utilizador (eventos de caneta, etc.) fora da área do cliente da janela será ignorada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16452">Any user input (pen events, etc.) outside of the window client area will be ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16453">Note que esta função introduz um ciclo de execução de bloqueio contínuo e não volta ao chamador até que a execução do modelo seja terminada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16453">Note that this function enters a continuous blocking execution loop, and does not return to the caller until the model execution is terminated.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-16454">A execução modal termina quando o processamento do evento para qualquer evento recebido devolve um valor de estado não zero, ou quando a função API gx_window_close é invocada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16454">Modal execution terminates when the event processing for any received event returns a non-zero status value, or when the gx_window_close API function is invoked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16455">O código de devolução de processamento de eventos não zero é devolvido ao chamador através do return_ptr passado para esta API</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16455">The non-zero event processing return code is returned to the caller through the return_ptr passed into this API</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16456">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16456">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16457">**janela** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo de janela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16457">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16458">**return_ptr** Localização para salvar o estado de saída da execução modal.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16458">**return_ptr** Location to save modal execution exit status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16459">Pode ser GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16459">May be GX_NULL.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16460">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16460">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16461">**execução** bem sucedida GX_SUCCESS (0x00)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16461">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful execution</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16462">**GX_SYSTEM_EVENT_RECEIVE_ERROR(0x05)** Evento de recolha da fila do evento falhou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16462">**GX_SYSTEM_EVENT_RECEIVE_ERROR(0x05)** Pickup event from event queue failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16463">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16463">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16464">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16464">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16465">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16465">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16466">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16466">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-16467">Inicialização e fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16467">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16468">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16468">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Execute a modal window. */
status = gx_window_execute(&my_window, &return_code);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the window was executed, and return_code holds the execution return code. */
```

### <a name="process-event-for-the-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16536">Evento de processo para a janela raiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16536">Process event for the root window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16537">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16537">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_root_create(
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window,
    GX_EVENT *event)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16538">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-16539">Este serviço processa eventos para a janela de raiz especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16539">This service processes events for the specified root window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16540">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16540">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16541">**root_window** Ponteiro para bloco de controlo da janela raiz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16541">**root_window** Pointer to root window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16542">**evento** Ponteiro para o evento a ser processado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16542">**event** Pointer to the event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16543">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16543">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16544">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Evento de janela de raiz processado com sucesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16544">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed root window event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16545">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Inválido desta função</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16545">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16546">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16546">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16547">Permitido a partir de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16547">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-16548">Fios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16548">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16549">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16549">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic root window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_root_window_event_process(GX_ROOT_WINDOW *root,
                                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default root window
            event processing */
        status = gx_window_root_event_process(root, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_scrollbar_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16631">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16631">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-window-scrollbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16632">Encontre a barra de pergaminho da janela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16632">Find window scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16633">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16633">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scrollbar_find(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    USHORT type,
    GX_SCROLLBAR **return_scrollbar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16634">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16634">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-16635">Este serviço encontra a barra de deslocação para a janela especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16635">This service finds the scrollbar for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16636">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16636">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16637">**janela** Ponteiro para janela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16637">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16638">**tipo** GX_TYPE_VERTICAL_SCROLL ou GX_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16638">**type** GX_TYPE_VERTICAL_SCROLL or GX_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16639">**return_scrollbar** Ponteiro para destino para barra de deslocamento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16639">**return_scrollbar** Pointer to destination for scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16640">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16640">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16641">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Encontrar barra de pergaminho de janela bem sucedida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16641">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scrollbar find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16642">**barra de** GX_NOT_FOUND (0x09) não encontrada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16642">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Scrollbar not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16643">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ponteiro inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16643">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16644">Widget **GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) não é válido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16644">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16645">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Tipo inválido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16645">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid type</span></span>

```

UINT gx_window_wallpaper_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID *return_wallpaper_id);
```

### <a name="set-window-wallpaper"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16695">Definir papel de parede da janela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16695">Set window wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16696">Prototype</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16696">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_set(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID wallpaper_id,
    GX_BOOL tile);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16697">Descrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16697">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8738c-16698">Este serviço define o papel de parede para a janela especificada.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16698">This service sets the wallpaper for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16699">Parâmetros</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16699">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16700">**janela** Ponteiro para janela</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16700">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16701">**wallpaper_id** ID de recursos de papel de parede para usar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16701">**wallpaper_id** Resource ID of wallpaper to use</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="8738c-16702">**azulejo** Papel de parede é em azulejo se GX_TRUE, caso contrário o papel de parede não é azulejo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16702">**tile** Wallpaper is tiled if GX_TRUE, otherwise wallpaper is not tiled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16703">Valores de devolução</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16703">Return Values</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="8738c-16710">Exemplo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8738c-16710">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set wallpaper for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_wallpaper_set(&my_window,
                                 MY_WALLPAPER_RESOURCE_ID,
                                 GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the wallpaper for window “my_window” is set. */
```
